compare: But he didn't stay away for long. He said: "I have grasped knowledge that you have not grasped.

src: Es wird für sie keine Speise geben außer aus trockenen Dornen,
ref: They will have no food except bitter thorn,
draft: There will be no food for them except from dry thorns.
hil: There will be no food for them but dry thorns.
compare: There will be no food for them but dry thorns.

src: Und wenn ihr (es) nicht vermögt, also gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: If you do not have the means, then surely God is forgiving and kind.
draft: And if you are not able to, then surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
hil: And if you are not able to, then surely Allah is Most Forgiving, Ever Merciful.
compare: And if you are not able to, then surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

src: Aber nein, die meisten von ihnen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: Nay, but the most of them have no knowledge.
draft: But no, most of them don't know.
hil: Most of them do not know, no.
compare: But no, most of them don't know.

src: Und die ihre Scham bewahren,
ref: Who guard their sex
draft: And those who preserve their modesty.
hil: Those who guard their modesty
compare: Those who guard their modesty

src: Ibrahim!
ref: "O Ibrahim (Abraham)!
draft: Ibrahim!
hil: Ibrahim!
compare: Ibrahim!

src: Gehen sie jedoch weg, so ist es kein Vergehen für euch, wenn sie zu ihrem Besten über sich selbst verfügen.
ref: But if they leave (of their own accord), you will not be blamed for what they do with themselves in their own rights.
draft: However, if they go away, it is not a wrong against you, if they dispose of themselves for their own benefit.
hil: If they go away, it is not wrong for you if they dispose of themselves for their own benefit.
compare: If they go away, it is not wrong for you if they dispose of themselves for their own benefit.

src: Was hinderte dich daran, nachdem du gesehen hattest, daß sie irregingen,
ref: What stopped you when you saw them going astray;
draft: What stopped you after you saw that they wandered off?
hil: What prevented you from (doing something), after you had seen that they had gone astray?
compare: What prevented you from (doing something), after you had seen that they had gone astray?

src: Und (erinnere daran), als WIR dir sagten: "Gewiß, dein HERR wird die Menschen zugrunde richten!" Und WIR machten das Traumgesicht, dasWIR dich sehen ließen, nur als Fitna für die Menschen, so auch den verfluchten Baum im Quran.
ref: When We said to you: "Verily your Lord circumscribes mankind," and showed you the vision and the accursed tree of the Qur'an, it was as a bone of contention for men.
draft: And (remember) when WE said to you: "Surely, your Lord will destroy mankind." And WE only showed you the vision in order to test the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran.
hil: And remember when WE told you, 'Surely, your LORD will destroy mankind!' And WE showed you the vision only to test the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran.
compare: And (remember) when WE said to you: "Surely, your Lord will destroy mankind." And WE only showed you the vision in order to test the people, as well as the cursed tree in the Quran.

src: Also was ist mit denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, sie kommen zu dir eilend
ref: What is the matter with unbelievers that they stare at you with fixed gazes and hasten towards you
draft: So what about those who committed kufr, they come to you hastily.
hil: What about those who have committed kufr? They come to you hastily.
compare: So what about those who committed kufr, they come to you hastily.

src: Hast du etwa nicht diejenigen gesehen, denen ein Teil der Schrift gegeben wurde, sie erkaufen sich das Irregehen und wollen, daß auch ihr irregeht?!
ref: Have you not seen the people who were given a share of the Book, but who purchased only error, and wish that you also go astray?
draft: Have you not seen those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given, they buy error and wish that you would stray from the Right Way?
hil: Do you not see those who were given a portion of the Scripture, they purchase misguidance and they wish that you would be misguided?
compare: Do you not see those who were given a portion of the Scripture, they purchase misguidance and they wish that you would be misguided?

src: Und wenn dann unsere Boten zu ihnen kommen, um sie abzuberufen, sagen sie: «Wo sind diejenigen, die ihr anstelle Gottes anzurufen pflegtet?»
ref: Until, when Our envoys come to them, to take their souls away, they will say, “Where are they whom you used to pray to besides God?”
draft: And when our messengers come to them to take them away, they say, "Where are those whom you used to invoke besides Allah?"
hil: And when our messengers come to take them away, they say, 'Where are those whom you used to invoke besides Allah?'
compare: And when our messengers come to them to take them away, they say, "Where are those whom you used to invoke besides Allah?"

src: Bist du denn gegen meinen Befehl ungehorsam gewesen?»
ref: Did you not disobey my command?" (And Moses pulled him by the hair).
draft: "Have you been disobedient against my order?"
hil: Have you been disobedient to my order?
compare: Have you been disobedient to my order?

src: Es läßt nichts aus, ob klein oder groß, sondern hält alles aufgezeichnet."
ref: They will find in it whatsoever they had done.
draft: "It doesn't leave anything out, whether small or large, but records everything."
hil: It does not leave anything out, small or large, but records everything.
compare: "It doesn't leave anything out, whether small or large, but records everything."

src: Sie sagten: "Wenn er stiehlt, so stahl bereits sein Bruder vor ihm." Yusuf behielt es jedoch bei sich und offenbarte es ihnen nicht, er sagte (bei sich): "Ihr seid sicherlich niedriger in der Stellung.
ref: They [(Yusuf's (Joseph) brothers] said: "If he steals, there was a brother of his [Yusuf (Joseph)] who did steal before (him)." But these things did Yusuf (Joseph) keep in himself, revealing not the secrets to them.
draft: They said: "If he steals, then his brother has already stolen before him." However, Yusuf kept it to himself and did not reveal it to them, he said (to himself): "You are certainly lower in rank".
hil: They said, "If he steals, then his brother has already stolen before him." However, Joseph kept his reaction to himself without disclosing the truth to them. He merely said to himself, "You are an evil lot."
compare: They said: "If he steals, then his brother has already stolen before him." However, Yusuf kept it to himself and did not reveal it to them, he said (to himself): "You are certainly lower in rank".

src: Hat nicht Derjenige, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat, (auch) die Macht, ihresgleichen zu erschaffen? Ja doch! Und Er ist der Allerschaffer und Allwissende.
ref: "Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof?" - Yea, indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme, of skill and knowledge (infinite)!
draft: Does not He who created the heavens and the earth have the power to create the like of them? Yes, indeed! And He is the All-Creator, the All-Knower.
hil: The One who created the heavens and the earth, do they not have the power to create the like of them? Yes, indeed! And He is the All-Creator, the All-Knower.
compare: Does not He who created the heavens and the earth have the power to create the like of them? Yes, indeed! And He is the All-Creator, the All-Knower.

src: Sie sagen: «Unser Herr, unser Unglück hat uns besiegt, und wir waren abgeirrte Leute.
ref: They will say: "O Lord, our misery overwhelmed us, so we remained a people astray.
draft: They say, "Our Lord, our misfortune has overcome us, and we were mistaken people."
hil: They say, 'Our Lord, our misfortune has overcome us, and we were mistaken people.'
compare: They say, "Our Lord, our misfortune has overcome us, and we were mistaken people."

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Greift ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten nicht vor, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!
ref: O YOU WHO believe, do not forestall the judgements of God and His Apostle, and have fear of God.
draft: You, who have internalized the imam! Do not precede Allah and His Messenger, and act with Taqwa towards Allah!
hil: You who have internalized the faith! Do not advance ahead of Allah and His Messenger, and act in accordance with Taqwa towards Allah!
compare: You who have internalized the faith! Do not advance ahead of Allah and His Messenger, and act in accordance with Taqwa towards Allah!

src: Darum wende dich von ihnen ab und sprich: "Frieden!" Und bald werden sie es wissen.
ref: Therefore excuse them and proclaim, “Peace”; for they will soon come to know.
draft: Therefore turn away from them and say, "Peace!" And soon they will know.
hil: Turn away from them and say, 'Peace!' And soon they will know.
compare: Therefore turn away from them and say, "Peace!" And soon they will know.

src: ER sagte: "Fürchtet euch beide nicht! Gewiß, ICH bin mit euch beiden, ICH höre und sehe.
ref: He said, “Do not fear – I am with you, All Hearing and All Seeing.”
draft: He said: "Do not be afraid, both of you! Indeed, I am with both of you, I hear and see."
hil: He said, "Do not fear, verily, I am with you both, I hear and see you."
compare: He said, "Do not fear, verily, I am with you both, I hear and see you."

src: Sag: "Soll ich euch in Kenntnis setzen über schlimmere Vergeltung als für dies, (was ihr uns verübelt), bei ALLAH?: Es ist (die Vergeltung für) denjenigen, wen ALLAH verflucht, über den ER zürnt und aus denen ER Affen, Schweine und Taghut-Anbeter machte." Diese haben die niedrigere Stellung und sind vom rechten Weg noch mehr verirrt.
ref: Say, “Shall I tell you of those who are in a worse position than this, in Allah’s sight? It is those whom Allah has cursed and has wreaked His wrath upon and turned some of them into apes and swine, and worshippers of the devil; theirs is a worse destination and they have wandered further astray from the Straight Path.”
draft: Say: "Shall I inform you of [something] worse than that as penalty from Allah? [It is] whom Allah has cursed and with whom He became angry and made of them apes and pigs and slaves of Taghut. Those are in worse position and further astray from the sound way."
hil: Say: "Should I inform you of something worse than what you blame us for, with Allah? It is [the punishment for] those whom Allah curses, with whom He becomes angry, and whom He makes into apes and pigs and worshipers of Taghut. They are in an inferior position and further astray from the right way."
compare: Say: "Shall I inform you of [something] worse than that as penalty from Allah? [It is] whom Allah has cursed and with whom He became angry and made of them apes and pigs and slaves of Taghut. Those are in worse position and further astray from the sound way."

src: Nun belohnt sie Gott für das, was sie gesagt haben mit Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werden sie ewig weilen.
ref: God will reward them for saying so with gardens where streams flow by, where they will live for ever.
draft: Now God rewards them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein they will dwell forever.
hil: God rewards them now for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein they will dwell forever.
compare: Now God rewards them for what they have said with gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein they will dwell forever.

src: Und das Jenseits ist wahrlich besser für dich als das Diesseits.
ref: What is to come is better for you than what has gone before;
draft: And the hereafter is truly better for you than this world.
hil: And the hereafter is indeed better for you than this world.
compare: And the hereafter is truly better for you than this world.

src: Sei nun geduldig. Das Versprechen Gottes ist wahr.
ref: So have thou patience; verily the promise of Allah is true.
draft: Be patient now. The promise of God is true.
hil: Be patient. The promise of God is true.
compare: Be patient. The promise of God is true.

src: Dann wird Er euch eure Sünden vergeben und euch eingehen lassen in Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen, und in angenehme Wohnungen in den Gärten von Eden.
ref: He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens with rivers flowing by, and excellent mansions in the garden of Eden.
draft: Then He will forgive your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and to pleasant dwellings in the gardens of Eden.
hil: Then Allah will forgive you your sins and admit you into gardens beneath which rivers flow, and into pleasant residences in the gardens of Eden.
compare: Then He will forgive your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and to pleasant dwellings in the gardens of Eden.

src: Da zogen sie beide weiter, bis, als sie dann einen Jungen trafen, er ihn tötete.
ref: The two went on till they came to a boy, whom he killed.
draft: Then they both continued until they met a boy and he killed him.
hil: Then they continued until they encountered a boy, and he killed him.
compare: Then they both continued until they met a boy and he killed him.

src: Und sooft eine Sura herabgesandt wird, schauen sie einander an (und sagen): "Sieht euch jemand?" Dann wenden sie sich ab. Allah hat ihre Herzen abgewendet, weil sie Leute sind, die es nicht begreifen.
ref: And whenever a chapter is sent down, one of them looks at the other; “Is there someone watching you?” – and then they turn away; Allah has inverted their hearts because they are a people who do not understand.
draft: And whenever a sura is sent down, they look at each other, (saying), “Does anyone see you?” and then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away (from the truth) because they are a people who do not understand.
hil: When a Surah is revealed, they look at one another, (saying), "Is anyone watching you?" and then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away from the truth because they are people who do not understand.
compare: When a Surah is revealed, they look at one another, (saying), "Is anyone watching you?" and then they turn away. Allah has turned their hearts away from the truth because they are people who do not understand.

src: Ob Wir dich einen Teil dessen, was Wir ihnen androhen, sehen lassen oder dich abberufen, zu Uns wird ihre Rückkehr sein. Dann ist Gott Zeuge über das, was sie tun.
ref: Whether We show you some of the promise (of punishment in wait) for them, or take you to Ourself, their returning is to Us in the end; and God is a witness to all they do.
draft: Whether We let you see some of what We threaten them with, or make you die, unto Us they shall return, and God is witness over what they do.
hil: Whether We make you see a part of what We threaten them with, or We cause you to die, to Us is their return, and Allah is Witness over what they do.
compare: Whether We let you see some of what We threaten them with, or make you die, unto Us they shall return, and God is witness over what they do.

src: Und er beerbt sie, wenn sie kein Kind hat.
ref: And he inherits from her if she leaves no children.
draft: And he inherits from her if she has no child.
hil: And he inherits from her if she has no child.
compare: And he inherits from her if she has no child.

src: Denken sie nicht über den Quran nach?!
ref: Do they not ponder on what the Qur'an says?
draft: Do you not think about the Quran?!
hil: Do they not ponder on what the Quran says?
compare: Do you not think about the Quran?!

src: Und wenn sie das Sinnlose hören, wenden sie sich davon ab und sagen: "Uns gehören unsere Handlungen und euch gehören eure Handlungen, Salam sei mit euch!
ref: When they hear idle talk they turn aside and say: "To us our actions, to you yours.
draft: And when they hear the meaningless, they turn away from it and say, "Our actions belong to us and your actions belong to you. Peace be upon you!
hil: And when they hear the meaningless, they turn away from it and say, 'Our actions belong to us and your actions belong to you.' Peace be upon you!
compare: And when they hear the meaningless, they turn away from it and say, "Our actions belong to us and your actions belong to you. Peace be upon you!

src: Dennoch wollen sie dir mit denjenigen, die es außer Ihm geben soll, Furcht einflößen. Und wen Allah in die Irre gehen läßt, der hat niemanden, der ihn rechtleitet.
ref: They frighten you with others apart from Him, although he whom Allah lets go astray, none can guide him to the Right Way.
draft: Nevertheless, they want to scare you with those whom there are supposed to be besides Him. And whoever Allah lets go astray, for him there is no guide.
hil: Nonetheless, they want to instill fear in you with those besides Him who are supposed to exist. And whoever Allah leads astray, for him there is no one who will guide him.
compare: Nonetheless, they want to instill fear in you with those besides Him who are supposed to exist. And whoever Allah leads astray, for him there is no one who will guide him.

src: Auch die Sterne sind durch seinen Befehl dienstbar gemacht worden.
ref: The stars are subjected by His Command.
draft: Also the stars have been made servile by his command.
hil: By His command, even the stars have been made subservient.
compare: By His command, even the stars have been made subservient.

src: ICH werde euch Meine Ayat zeigen, so fordert keine Eile von Mir.
ref: We will show you Our signs, then you will not desire to hasten (the punishment).
draft: I will show you my verses, so do not demand haste from me.
hil: I will show you my verses, so do not demand haste from me.
compare: I will show you my verses, so do not demand haste from me.

src: Und zu Ihm werdet ihr zurückgebracht.
ref: And to Him will you be brought back in the end.
draft: And to Him you will be returned.
hil: And to Him you shall be returned.
compare: And to Him you will be returned.

src: Sag: "Es wird mir nur alsWahy zuteil, daß euer Gott nur ein einziger Gott ist.
ref: Say: "This is what has been revealed to me: 'Your God is one and only God.'
draft: Say: "It is only revealed to me by Wahy that your God is only one God."
hil: Say, “It is only revealed to me through Wahy that your God is only one God.”
compare: Say, “It is only revealed to me through Wahy that your God is only one God.”

src: ER sagte: "Adam! Teile ihnen deren Namen mit!" Und nachdem er ihnen deren Namen mitgeteilt hatte, sagte ER: "Sagte ICH euch etwa nicht, daß ICH das Verborgene der Himmel und der Erde kenne, und daß ICH das kenne, was ihr offenlegt und was ihr zu verheimlichen pflegtet?!"
ref: He said, ‘O Adam, inform them of their names,’ and when he had informed them of their names, He said, ‘Did I not tell you that I know the Unseen of the heavens and the earth, and that I know whatever you disclose and whatever you conceal?’
draft: He said: "Adam! Tell them their names!" And after he had told them their names, he said: "Did I not tell you that I know the secrets of heaven and earth and that I know what you reveal and what you hide?!"
hil: He said, "Adam, tell them their names!" And after he had told them their names, he said, "Didn't I tell you that I know the secrets of the heavens and the earth, and that I know what you reveal and what you conceal?"
compare: He said, "Adam, tell them their names!" And after he had told them their names, he said, "Didn't I tell you that I know the secrets of the heavens and the earth, and that I know what you reveal and what you conceal?"

src: Und wenn ihr eure Riten beendet habt, dann gedenket Gottes, wie ihr eurer Väter (früher) gedacht habt oder mit noch innigerem Gedenken. Unter den Menschen gibt es welche, die sagen: «Unser Herr, beschenke uns im Diesseits.»
ref: So when you have completed your Hajj rites, remember Allah as you used to remember your forefathers, in fact more than that; and among the people are some that say, “Our Lord!
draft: And when you have completed your rituals, then remember God as you have remembered your fathers (before) or with even more intimate remembrance. Among the people there are those who say, "Our Lord, bestow upon us [favor] in this world."
hil: And when you have completed your rituals, then remember God as you remembered your fathers (before) or with even more intimate remembrance. Among the people, there are those who say: 'Our Lord, bestow upon us [favor] in this world.'
compare: And when you have completed your rituals, then remember God as you remembered your fathers (before) or with even more intimate remembrance. Among the people, there are those who say: 'Our Lord, bestow upon us [favor] in this world.'

src: So vergelten Wir den Übeltätern.
ref: That is how We requite the transgressors:
draft: So we punish the wrongdoers.
hil: Thus do We requite the evildoers.
compare: Thus do We requite the evildoers.

src: Darum fürchtet Allah, ihr Verständigen, auf daß ihr erfolgreich sein möget.
ref: So fear God, O men of wisdom; you may haply find success.
draft: Therefore, fear Allah, you who are wise, so that you may be successful.
hil: Therefore, fear Allah, you who are wise, so that you may be successful.
compare: Therefore, fear Allah, you who are wise, so that you may be successful.

src: Friede sei auf euch!
ref: Peace be to you.
draft: Peace be upon you!
hil: Peace be upon you!
compare: Peace be upon you!

src: Sag: Allah hat die Wahrheit gesprochen. So folgt dem Glaubensbekenntnis Ibrahims, (als) Anhänger des rechten Glaubens, und er gehörte nicht zu den Götzendienern.
ref: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Allah is truthful; so follow the religion of Ibrahim, who was free from all falsehood; and he was not of the polytheists.”
draft: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Ibrahim, (as) a follower of the right faith, and he was not one of the idolaters.
hil: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. Therefore, follow the creed of Ibrahim, a follower of the right faith, and he was not one of the idolaters.
compare: Say: Allah has spoken the truth. So follow the creed of Ibrahim, (as) a follower of the right faith, and he was not one of the idolaters.

src: Sag: "Ihr Menschen! Bereits kam die Wahrheit zu euch von eurem HERRN. Wer also der Rechtleitung folgt, der folgt der Rechtleitung nur für seinen eigenen Nutzen. Wer jedoch irregeht, der geht nur irre zu seinem eigenen Schaden. Und ich bin kein Wakil über euch."
ref: Say: "O men, the truth has come to you from your Lord, so he who follows the right path does so for himself, and he who goes astray errs against himself, and I am not a guardian over you.
draft: Say: "O mankind! The truth has come to you from your Lord. Whoever follows the right path does so for his own good, and whoever strays, does so at his own peril. I am not a guardian over you."
hil: Say: 'O mankind! The truth has now come to you from your Lord (i.e. the Quran and Prophet Muhammad SAW). Whoever follows the truth, does so for their own benefit, and whoever strays, does so at their own peril. And I am not a guardian over you.'
compare: Say: 'O mankind! The truth has now come to you from your Lord (i.e. the Quran and Prophet Muhammad SAW). Whoever follows the truth, does so for their own benefit, and whoever strays, does so at their own peril. And I am not a guardian over you.'

src: Hierauf rufe sie. Sie werden eilends zu dir kommen.
ref: Then [after slaughtering them] put on each hill a portion of them; then call them - they will come [flying] to you in haste.
draft: Then she calls. They will come to you in a hurry.
hil: Then she calls. They will come to you in a hurry.
compare: Then she calls. They will come to you in a hurry.

src: Haben denn die Gläubigen nicht den Versuch (, daran zu zweifeln,) aufgegeben, daß, wenn Allah gewollt hätte, Er sicher der ganzen Menschheit hätte den Weg weisen können?
ref: Have the believers not learnt that if God had so willed He could have guided all mankind?
draft: Have not the believers given up the attempt (to doubt) that if Allah had willed, He could have certainly guided all mankind?
hil: Have the believers not given up the attempt to doubt that if Allah had willed, He could certainly have guided all mankind's way?
compare: Have not the believers given up the attempt (to doubt) that if Allah had willed, He could have certainly guided all mankind?

src: Und (damit) Er die Heuchler und Heuchlerinnen und die Götzendiener und Götzendienerinnen strafe, die von Allah die böse Erwartung hegen.
ref: And that He may chastise the hypocritical men and the hypocritical women and the associaters and the associatresses, the thinkers of evil thought concerning Allah.
draft: And so that he may punish the male and female hypocrites and those who associate partners with Allah who entertain evil thoughts about Allah.
hil: And so that He may punish the male and female hypocrites and those who associate partners with Allah who entertain evil thoughts about Allah.
compare: And so that he may punish the male and female hypocrites and those who associate partners with Allah who entertain evil thoughts about Allah.

src: Dann rief er in den Finsternissen: "Es gibt keinen Gott außer Dir!
ref: Glory be to Thee!
draft: Then he cried out in the darkness: "There is no god except You!
hil: He then called out in the darkness, "There is no god except for You!"
compare: Then he cried out in the darkness: "There is no god except You!

src: Ihr haltet sie (beide Zeugen) nach dem rituellen Gebet auf, dann schwören sie bei ALLAH - falls ihr Zweifel hegen solltet -: "Wir erkaufen uns damit nichts Geringfügiges, selbst dann nicht, wenn derjenige, (für den wir Zeugnis ablegen), ein Verwandter ist, und wir verbergen nicht das von ALLAH gebotene Zeugnis, sonst gehören wir doch zu den Verfehlenden."
ref: Detain them after the service of prayer, and if you doubt their word make them swear by God that: "We shall not take a bribe even though it be offered by a near relative, nor hide the testimony of God, for then we shall surely be sinful."
draft: You detain them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer, then they swear by Allah - if you should doubt -: "We do not acquire any trifle thereby, not even if the one (for whom we bear witness) were a kinsman, and we do not conceal what Allah has enjoined upon us in testimony, for then indeed we would be among the sinful."
hil: After the ritual prayer, you detain both witnesses and then they swear by Allah - in case you should doubt -: 'We do not purchase anything trivial with it, not even if the person we bear witness for is a relative, and we do not conceal the testimony that Allah commanded, otherwise we would be among the wrongdoers'.
compare: You detain them (both witnesses) after the ritual prayer, then they swear by Allah - if you should doubt -: "We do not acquire any trifle thereby, not even if the one (for whom we bear witness) were a kinsman, and we do not conceal what Allah has enjoined upon us in testimony, for then indeed we would be among the sinful."

src: Dann sagten sie: "Etwa einem einzigen Menschen von uns folgen wir?
ref: And said: "Should we follow only one man among us?
draft: Then they said, "Do we follow only one person among us?"
hil: Then they said, 'Do we follow only one person among us?'
compare: Then they said, "Do we follow only one person among us?"

src: Und gedenke deines HERRN viel und lobpreise Ihn zu Sonnenuntergang und zu Sonnenaufgang!"
ref: And mention thy Lord oft, and give glory at evening and dawn.'
draft: "And remember your Lord much and praise Him at sunset and at sunrise!"
hil: And remember your Lord much and praise Him at sunset and at sunrise!
compare: And remember your Lord much and praise Him at sunset and at sunrise!

src: Dann ängstigte sich insgeheim, Musa.
ref: And Moses felt afraid within himself.
draft: Then Musa became secretly frightened.
hil: Then Musa was secretly frightened.
compare: Then Musa became secretly frightened.

src: Hast Du nicht gesehen, daß Allah Wasser vom Himmel niedersendet und es als Quellen in die Erde dringen läßt und dadurch Gewächs hervorbringt, das mannigfaltig an Farben ist?
ref: Beholdest thou not that Allah sendeth down water from the heaven, and causeth it to enter springs in the earth, and thereafter produceth thereby corn various coloured.
draft: Have you not seen that Allah sends down water from the sky and allows it to penetrate into the earth as springs, thus causing crops to grow which are manifold in colors?
hil: Did you not see that Allah sends down water from the sky and allows it to penetrate into the earth as springs, thus causing crops to grow which are manifold in colors?
compare: Have you not seen that Allah sends down water from the sky and allows it to penetrate into the earth as springs, thus causing crops to grow which are manifold in colors?

src: Laß uns herausbringen, damit wir gottgefällig Gutes tun, anderes als das, das wir zu tun pflegten." Haben WIR euch etwa nicht ein langes Lebensalter gewährt, während dessen derjenige sich erinnern konnte, der sich erinnern wollte?!
ref: Extricate us, so that we may do good deeds, the opposite of what we used to do”; (It will be said to them) “And did We not give you an age long enough, in which anyone who wants to understand would have understood?
draft: Let us find out so that we can do good in the sight of God, other than what we used to do." Have WE not granted you a long life span during which anyone who wanted to remember could remember?!
hil: Let us find out how we can do good pleasing to God, other than what we used to do." Have We not granted you a long life span during which anyone who wanted to remember could remember?!
compare: Let us find out how we can do good pleasing to God, other than what we used to do." Have We not granted you a long life span during which anyone who wanted to remember could remember?!

src: Und wenn Wellen wie überschattende Hüllen sie überdecken, rufen sie zu Gott, wobei sie Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig in der Religion sind. Wenn Er sie ans Land errettet, zeigen nur einige von ihnen einen maßvollen Wandel.
ref: And when the waves cover them like shadows they call upon God, making their religion sincerely His; but when He has delivered them to the land, some of them are lukewarm.
draft: And when waves cover them like overshadowing veils, they call unto God, being sincere in religion unto Him, but when He delivereth them to the land, some of them compromise.
hil: And when waves cover them like overshadowing veils, they call upon God, being sincere to Him in religion, as followers of pure faith, and they offer prayers and give alms. This is the true religion. However, when He delivers them to the land, some of them forget why they were calling upon Him before and they set up equals to Him in order to mislead people from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for some time; you are indeed of the companions of the Fire."
compare: And when waves cover them like overshadowing veils, they call upon God, being sincere to Him in religion, as followers of pure faith, and they offer prayers and give alms. This is the true religion. However, when He delivers them to the land, some of them forget why they were calling upon Him before and they set up equals to Him in order to mislead people from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for some time; you are indeed of the companions of the Fire."

src: Wäre dies ein demnächst verfügbarer Profit mit einer Reise von mittlerer Entfernung gewesen, wären sie dir gewiß gefolgt.
ref: Were it a gain at hand or a short journey, they would have surely followed you, but the distance seemed too far to them.
draft: If this had been a profit available soon with a medium-distance journey, they would surely have followed you.
hil: If it had been a profit available soon with a moderate-distance journey, they would have certainly followed you.
compare: If it had been a profit available soon with a moderate-distance journey, they would have certainly followed you.

src: Von Zaqqum-Bäumen essen
ref: Will eat of the tree of Zaqqum,
draft: Eating from Zaqqum trees.
hil: Eating from Zaqqum trees.
compare: Eating from Zaqqum trees.

src: Allah aber ist der Schutzherr der Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: And Allah is the Friend of the God-fearing.
draft: Allah, however, is the protector of the God-fearing.
hil: Allah, however, is the patron of the righteous.
compare: Allah, however, is the protector of the God-fearing.

src: Folge dem, was dir an Wahy von deinem HERRN zuteil wurde.
ref: Follow what was revealed to you from your Lord.
draft: Follow what has been revealed to you by your LORD.
hil: Follow what has been revealed to you by your LORD.
compare: Follow what has been revealed to you by your LORD.

src: (Ist es) etwa einer, der im Glanz aufgezogen wird und nicht beredt im Wortstreit ist?
ref: Can one who has been raised on ornaments and cannot present her case coolly in a dispute (be associated with God?)
draft: Is it someone who is raised in glory and is not fluent in verbal dispute?
hil: Is it someone who is raised in glory and is not eloquent in verbal dispute?
compare: Is it someone who is raised in glory and is not eloquent in verbal dispute?

src: Keiner außer Allah kann sie abwenden.
ref: There is no one to unveil it apart from God.
draft: No one can avert them except for Allah.
hil: No one besides Allah can avert it.
compare: No one can avert them except for Allah.

src: Wenn sie sich abkehren, so befinden sie sich in Widerstreit.
ref: But if they turn away, then they are in schism.
draft: If they turn away, they will be in conflict.
hil: But if they turn away, then they are in schism, and Allah will suffice thee for defence against them.
compare: But if they turn away, then they are in schism, and Allah will suffice thee for defence against them.

src: Er ist es, Der euch erschaffen hat.
ref: It is He who created you.
draft: He is the one who created you.
hil: He is the one who created you.
compare: He is the one who created you.

src: Und wisset, daß Allah dessen gewahr ist, was in euren Seelen ist.
ref: Know that God knows what is in your hearts.
draft: And know that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.
hil: And be aware that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.
compare: And know that Allah is aware of what is in your souls.

src: Das Feuer darin ist mit Brennstoff,
ref: Full of fire fed by faggots,
draft: The fire inside is fueled,
hil: The fire within is fueled,
compare: The fire within is fueled,

src: Doch wenn sie sich abkehren, so liebt Allah die Ungläubigen nicht.
ref: But if they turn their backs, God loves not the unbelievers.
draft: But if they turn away, then Allah does not love the unbelievers.
hil: But if they turn away, Allah does not love the unbelievers.
compare: But if they turn away, then Allah does not love the unbelievers.

src: Sag (in Meinem Namen): "Meine Diener, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!"
ref: Tell them: "O my creatures who have come to belief, have fear of displeasing your Lord.
draft: Say (in my name): "My servants who have internalized faith, act with Taqwa towards ALLAH!"
hil: Say (in My name): "O believers who have internalized faith, act with Taqwa towards Allah!"
compare: Say (in My name): "O believers who have internalized faith, act with Taqwa towards Allah!"

src: Doch die, denen Kenntnis und Glauben verliehen wurden, sagen: "lhr habt wahrlich gemäß dem Buche Allahs bis zum Tage der Auferstehung (im Grabe) geweilt.
ref: But those endowed with knowledge and faith will say, “You remained in God’s Book until the Day of Resurrection.
draft: But those who have been given knowledge and faith say, "Indeed, you have remained according to the Book of Allah until the Day of Resurrection (in the grave)."
hil: Those who have been granted knowledge and faith say, "Indeed, you have certainly remained in accordance with the book of Allah until the Day of Resurrection (in the grave)."
compare: But those who have been given knowledge and faith say, "Indeed, you have remained according to the Book of Allah until the Day of Resurrection (in the grave)."

src: Was dich an Gutem traf, dies ist von ALLAH. Und was dich an Unglück traf, dies ist aufgrund eigener (Verfehlungen). Und wir entsandten dich für die Menschen als Gesandten. Und ALLAH genügt als Bezeugender.
ref: Whatever good reaches you, O listeners, is from Allah, and whatever ill reaches you is from yourselves; and We have sent you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) as a Noble Messenger towards all mankind; and Allah is Sufficient, as a Witness.
draft: What befell you of good is from Allah, and what befell you of evil is from yourself. And We have sent you, [O Muhammad], to the people as a messenger, and sufficient is Allah as Witness.
hil: What befell you of good is from Allah, and what befell you of evil is from yourself. And We have sent you, [O Muhammad], to the people as a messenger, and sufficient is Allah as Witness.
compare: What befell you of good is from Allah, and what befell you of evil is from yourself. And We have sent you, [O Muhammad], to the people as a messenger, and sufficient is Allah as Witness.

src: Greift ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten nicht vor, und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber!
ref: Do not put (yourselves) forward before Allah and His Messenger (SAW), and fear Allah.
draft: Do not precede Allah and His Messenger and act with Taqwa towards Allah!
hil: Do not put yourselves ahead of Allah and His Messenger and act in accordance with Taqwa towards Allah! Indeed, Allah knows all!
compare: Do not put yourselves ahead of Allah and His Messenger and act in accordance with Taqwa towards Allah! Indeed, Allah knows all!

src: Doch Allah gehört die Macht, und auch Seinem Gesandten und den Gläubigen.
ref: In truth, all honour belongs to Allah, and to His Messenger, and to the believers.
draft: But power belongs to Allah, and also to His messenger and the believers.
hil: All power belongs to Allah, and also to His messenger and to the believers.
compare: All power belongs to Allah, and also to His messenger and to the believers.

src: Laßt sie auf Allahs Erde weiden und fügt ihr nichts Böses zu, sonst überkommt euch eine baldige Strafe."
ref: So leave her alone to graze on God's earth, and do not molest her, otherwise the swiftest punishment would befall you."
draft: "Let them graze on Allah's earth and do not harm them, otherwise a swift punishment will overcome you."
hil: Let them graze on the land of Allah and do not harm them, otherwise you will be overcome by a swift punishment.
compare: "Let them graze on Allah's earth and do not harm them, otherwise a swift punishment will overcome you."

src: Sind es aber zwei (Schwestern), dann erhalten sie zwei Drittel von seiner Erbschaft.
ref: In ease he has two sisters then they will get two-thirds of the heritage.
draft: But if they are two (sisters), then they receive two thirds of his inheritance.
hil: But
compare: But

src: Vergib uns unsere Verfehlungen und unsere Übertretungen in unseren Angelegenheiten, mache uns standhaft und stehe uns bei gegen die kufr-betreibenden Leute!"
ref: Forgive us our sins and the excesses committed during our efforts, and keep our feet steady, and bestow us help over the disbelievers.”
draft: "Forgive us our faults and our transgressions in our affairs, make us steadfast and support us against the unbelieving people!"
hil: Forgive us our faults and our transgressions in our affairs, make us steadfast and support us against the disbelieving people.
compare: "Forgive us our faults and our transgressions in our affairs, make us steadfast and support us against the unbelieving people!"

src: Sag: Wenn Allah wollte, würde ich ihn euch nicht verlesen, und Er würde euch nicht davon Kenntnis geben. Ich habe doch vordem ein Leben lang unter euch verweilt.
ref: Say, ‘Had Allah [so] wished, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I have dwelled among you for a lifetime before it.
draft: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had dwelt among you a lifetime before [this].
hil: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had dwelt among you a lifetime before [this].
compare: Say: If Allah had willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you, for I had dwelt among you a lifetime before [this].

src: Und gehe auf der Erde nicht freudenerregt! Gewiß, ALLAH liebt keinen stolzen Eingebildeten.
ref: Do not walk around puffed-up with pride; God does not love arrogant and boastful people.
draft: And do not walk on the earth with conceit and arrogance. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful.
hil: And walk not on the earth with haughty self-conceit. Verily, Allah likes not each arrogant boaster.
compare: And do not walk on the earth with conceit and arrogance. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful.

src: Daß ihr (sogar) die Gräber besucht.
ref: Till you reach the grave.
draft: "That you (even) visit the graves."
hil: "That you (even) visit the graves."
compare: "That you (even) visit the graves."

src: ALLAH leitet nicht diejenigen Menschen recht, die Unrecht begehen.
ref: And Allah guides not those people who are the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers).
draft: ALLAH does not guide those people who commit wrongdoing.
hil: Allah does not guide people who commit injustice on the right path.
compare: ALLAH does not guide those people who commit wrongdoing.

src: Er sagte: "Bringt ihr mir die frohe Kunde ungeachtet dessen, daß ich vom Alter getroffen bin?
ref: "You bring me the good news now," he said, "when old age has come upon me.
draft: He said, "Are you bringing me the good news despite the fact that I am struck by old age?"
hil: He said, "Are you bringing me the good news despite the fact that I am struck by old age?"
compare: He said, "Are you bringing me the good news despite the fact that I am struck by old age?"

src: Und warne die Menschen vor dem Tag, an dem die Strafe über sie kommen wird.
ref: Warn the people of that Day when the punishment would be inflicted upon them.
draft: And warn the people about the day when the punishment will come upon them.
hil: Warn mankind of the day when the punishment will come upon them.
compare: Warn mankind of the day when the punishment will come upon them.

src: Tauscht er dann aber nach der bösen Tat etwas Gutes ein, dann bin Ich voller Vergebung und barmherzig.
ref: But if he substitutes good in place of evil, I am Most Forgiving, Most Compassionate.
draft: He who then trades something good after the evil deed, I'm full of forgiveness and mercy.
hil: If he exchanges something good after committing an evil act, then I am full of forgiveness and mercy.
compare: If he exchanges something good after committing an evil act, then I am full of forgiveness and mercy.

src: ER sagte: "Gewiß, ICH weiß, was ihr nicht wißt."
ref: And God said: "I know what you do not know."
draft: He said, "Certainly, I know what you do not know."
hil: He said, 'Certainly, I know what you do not know.'
compare: He said, "Certainly, I know what you do not know."

src: Aber Allah läßt im richtigen Maß herabkommen, was Er will.
ref: So He gives according to measure as He will.
draft: But Allah sends down in the right measure what He wills.
hil: God sends down in proper measure whatever He wills.
compare: God sends down in proper measure whatever He wills.

src: O Yusuf, wende dich ab von dieser Sache, und du (, o Frau), bitte um Vergebung für deine Sünde.
ref: “O Yusuf! Disregard this – and O woman!
draft: O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (oh woman), ask for forgiveness for your sin.
hil: O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (o woman), seek forgiveness for your sin.
compare: O Yusuf, turn away from this matter, and you (o woman), seek forgiveness for your sin.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der die Schrift wahrheitsgemäß hinabsandte sowie Almizan. Und was läßt dich wissen?! Vielleicht liegt die Stunde doch nahe.
ref: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book with the truth, and the Scales of Justice; and what do you know – possibly the Last Day could really be near!
draft: "ALLAH is the one who sent down the scripture truthfully, as well as Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near."
hil: Allah is the One who sent down the scripture truthfully, as well as Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near.
compare: "ALLAH is the one who sent down the scripture truthfully, as well as Almizan. And what makes you know?! Perhaps the Hour is near."

src: Dies, weil ihre Gesandten immer wieder zu ihnen mit den klaren Beweisen kamen, sie aber sagten: "Sollen (etwa) menschliche Wesen uns rechtleiten?" So wurden sie ungläubig und kehrten sich ab.
ref: That is because, when their Messengers came to them with clear proofs they said: 'Shall humans be our guides' They disbelieved and turned away, but Allah was not in need (of them).
draft: "This because their messengers came to them again and again with clear proofs, but they said, 'Should human beings guide us?' So they became unbelievers and turned away."
hil: This is because their messengers kept coming to them with clear proofs, but they said, "Shall (mere) human beings guide us?" Thus, they became disbelievers and turned away.
compare: This is because their messengers kept coming to them with clear proofs, but they said, "Shall (mere) human beings guide us?" Thus, they became disbelievers and turned away.

src: Vielleicht werdet ihr (Allah) fürchten.
ref: It is expected that this will produce piety in you.
draft: Maybe you will fear (Allah).
hil: Perhaps you will fear (Allah) <revision> No changes needed.
compare: Maybe you will fear (Allah).

src: Gewiß, wer ALLAH gegenüber Schirk betreibt, dem hat ALLAH bereits die Dschanna für haram erklärt und sein Aufenthaltsort ist das Feuer." Und für die Unrecht-Begehenden gibt es keine Helfer.
ref: Whosoever associates a compeer with God, will have Paradise denied to him by God, and his abode shall be Hell; and the sinners will have none to help them.
draft: Certainly, whoever commits shirk towards Allah, Allah has already declared Jannah as haram for him and his abode is the Fire. And for the wrongdoers, there are no helpers.
hil: Indeed, he who commits shirk against Allah, Allah has already declared Paradise forbidden for him, and his destination is the Fire. And the wrongdoers will have no helpers.
compare: Indeed, he who commits shirk against Allah, Allah has already declared Paradise forbidden for him, and his destination is the Fire. And the wrongdoers will have no helpers.

src: Diejenigen, die Enthaltsamkeit von ihren Frauen beschwören, sollen vier Monate warten.
ref: Those who vow abstinence from their wives must wait for four months.
draft: Those who call for abstinence from their wives shall wait four months.
hil: Those who swear abstinence from their wives should wait for four months.
compare: Those who swear abstinence from their wives should wait for four months.

src: Doch vergebt und seid nachsichtig, bis Allah Seine Entscheidung ergehen läßt. Wahrlich, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: But you forbear and overlook till God fulfil His plan; and God has power over all things.
draft: But forgive and be indulgent, until Allah makes His decision. Truly, Allah has power over all things.
hil: Forgive and overlook until Allah brings His command. Truly, Allah has power over all things.
compare: But forgive and be indulgent, until Allah makes His decision. Truly, Allah has power over all things.

src: An jenem Tag habt ihr keinen Zufluchtsort und keine Möglichkeit, (irgend etwas) abzustreiten.
ref: You will have no place of refuge then nor time for denying.
draft: On that day, you will have no place of refuge and no possibility to deny (anything).
hil: On that day, you will have no place of refuge and no way to deny anything.
compare: On that day, you will have no place of refuge and no way to deny anything.

src: Diejenigen, die sie anrufen, trachten nach einem Mittel zu ihrem Herrn (und wetteifern), wer von ihnen (Ihm) am nächsten sei, und hoffen auf Seine Barmherzigkeit und fürchten Seine Strafe.
ref: Those they invoke themselves seek the way to their Lord, (striving) which one of them shall be nearest (to Him); and hope for His grace, and dread His punishment.
draft: Those who call upon them seek a means to their Lord (and compete) as to who of them is closest to Him, and hope for His mercy and fear His punishment.
hil: Those whom they call upon are seeking means of access to their Lord and competing as to who is closest to Him, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is to be feared.
compare: Those whom they call upon are seeking means of access to their Lord and competing as to who is closest to Him, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is to be feared.

src: Dein Herr ist wahrlich voll Huld gegen die Menschen. Aber die meisten von ihnen sind nicht dankbar.
ref: Verily your Lord is gracious to men, though most men are ungrateful.
draft: Your Lord is truly full of grace towards people. But most of them are not grateful.
hil: Your Lord is indeed full of grace towards people. However, most of them are not thankful.
compare: Your Lord is truly full of grace towards people. But most of them are not grateful.

src: Und diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin bleiben sie ewig.
ref: They are the inmates of Hell, where they will abide for ever.
draft: And these are the companions of fire. In it they remain forever.
hil: And these are the companions of the Fire. In it they will remain forever.
compare: And these are the companions of the Fire. In it they will remain forever.

src: Gewiß, mit denjenigen, die ihre Religion spalteten und zu Lagern geworden sind, hast du nichts gemein.
ref: As for those who have created schisms in their order, and formed different sects, you have no concern with them.
draft: Certainly, you have nothing in common with those who divided their religion and became factions.
hil: Certainly, you have nothing in common with those who have split their religion and become factions.
compare: Certainly, you have nothing in common with those who divided their religion and became factions.

src: Für diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, wurde dann Kleidung aus Feuer gefertigt.
ref: But they who disbelieve will be fitted out with garments of flames.
draft: For those who have practiced disbelief, clothing made of fire was then made.
hil: For those who have committed disbelief, clothing made of fire was then fashioned.
compare: For those who have committed disbelief, clothing made of fire was then fashioned.

src: Also werden jene, die gläubig sind und gute Werke tun, in den Gärten der Wonne sein.
ref: Then those who had come to believe and done the right will be in gardens of delight.
draft: Therefore, those who believe and do good deeds will be in the Gardens of Paradise.
hil: Those who believe and do good deeds will be in the Gardens of Paradise.
compare: Therefore, those who believe and do good deeds will be in the Gardens of Paradise.

src: Bereits kam zu euch Unser Gesandter, um euch vieles von dem zu enthüllen, was ihr von der Schrift verborgen habt, und vieles unenthüllt zu lassen. Bereits kam doch zu euch von ALLAH Licht und deutliche Schrift!
ref: Indeed this Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) of Ours has come to you, revealing to you a lot of the things which you had hidden in the Book, and forgiving a lot of them; indeed towards you has come a light* from Allah, and a clear Book. (* The Holy Prophet is a light from Allah).
draft: Already Our Messenger has come to you and disclosed to you much of what you used to conceal from the Book and overlooked. Certainly, there has come to you from Allah a light and a clear Book.
hil: Our apostle has already come to you, O people of the Book, and has uncovered much of what you have kept hidden in the scripture and left much undisclosed. Indeed, light and a clear scripture from Allah have already come to you.
compare: Already Our Messenger has come to you and disclosed to you much of what you used to conceal from the Book and overlooked. Certainly, there has come to you from Allah a light and a clear Book.

src: Und dem Zeugen und dem, was bezeugt ist!
ref: And the witness and the witnessed,
draft: And the witness and what is witnessed!
hil: And the witness and what is witnessed!
compare: And the witness and what is witnessed!

src: Und wenn Allah es gewollt hätte, hätte Er euch in Bedrängnis gebracht. Wahrlich, Allah ist Allmächtig, Allweise.
ref: And had Allah so willed, He could have harassed you; verily Allah is Mighty, Wise.
draft: "And if Allah had willed, He could have put you in difficulty. Indeed, Allah is All-Powerful, All-Wise."
hil: If Allah had intended it, He would have brought you into distress. Indeed, Allah is All-Powerful, All-Wise.
compare: "And if Allah had willed, He could have put you in difficulty. Indeed, Allah is All-Powerful, All-Wise."

src: Eine Rechtleitung und Barmherzigkeit für die Rechtschaffenen,
ref: And a guidance and grace for those who do good,
draft: A guidance and mercy for the righteous.
hil: A guidance and mercy for the righteous.
compare: A guidance and mercy for the righteous.

src: Und sprich zu den gläubigen Frauen, daß sie ihre Blicke zu Boden schlagen und ihre Keuschheit wahren und ihren Schmuck nicht zur Schau tragen sollen - bis auf das, was davon sichtbar sein darf, und daß sie ihren Schal um ihre Kleidungsausschnitte schlagen und ihren Schmuck vor niemand (anderem) enthüllen sollen als vor ihren Gatten oder Vätern oder den Vätern ihrer Gatten oder ihren Söhnen oder den Söhnen ihrer Gatten oder ihren Brüdern oder den Söhnen ihrer Brüder oder Söhnen ihrer Schwestern oder ihren Frauen oder denen, die sie von Rechts wegen besitzen, oder solchen von ihren männlichen Dienern, die keinen Geschlechtstrieb mehr haben, und den Kindern, die der Blöße der Frauen keine Beachtung schenken. Und sie sollen ihre Füße nicht so (auf den Boden) stampfen, daß bekannt wird, was sie von ihrem Schmuck verbergen.
ref: And command the Muslim women to keep their gaze low and to protect their chastity, and not to reveal their adornment except what is apparent, and to keep the cover wrapped over their bosoms; and not to reveal their adornment except to their own husbands or fathers or husbands’ fathers, or their sons or their husbands’ sons, or their brothers or their brothers’ sons or sisters’ sons, or women of their religion, or the bondwomen they possess, or male servants provided they do not have manliness, or such children who do not know of women’s nakedness, and not to stamp their feet on the ground in order that their hidden adornment be known; and O Muslims, all of you turn in repentance together towards Allah, in the hope of attaining success.
draft: And tell the believing women to lower their gaze and guard their private parts and not display their adornment except that which ordinarily appears thereof and to draw their head-coverings over their bosoms and not display their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their womenfolk, their slaves, such as are beyond all blame, or the male attendants who lack vigour, or children who know naught of women's nakedness. And let them not stamp their feet so as to reveal what they hide of their adornment.
hil: Speak to the believing women and tell them to lower their gaze and safeguard their private parts and not display their adornment except for that which is apparent thereof; and to wrap their headcovers over their bosoms; and not to display their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their fathers-in-law, their sons, their step-sons, their brothers, their brothers' and sisters' sons, their women attendants, or those male attendants who have no physical desire, or children who are not yet aware of the private aspects of women; and they shall not strike their feet (on the ground) so that it may not be known what they hide of their adornment. And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you, O believers, that you might succeed.
compare: And tell the believing women to lower their gaze and guard their private parts and not display their adornment except that which ordinarily appears thereof and to draw their head-coverings over their bosoms and not display their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their womenfolk, their slaves, such as are beyond all blame, or the male attendants who lack vigour, or children who know naught of women's nakedness. And let them not stamp their feet so as to reveal what they hide of their adornment.

src: Sie empfinden insgeheim Reue, wenn sie die Pein sehen. Und zwischen ihnen wird in Gerechtigkeit entschieden, und ihnen wird nicht Unrecht getan.
ref: And they shall conceal remorse when they behold the torment, and the matter will be decreed between them in equity, and they shall not be wronged.
draft: They secretly feel remorse when they see the pain. And justice is decided between them, and they are not wronged.
hil: They secretly feel remorse when they see the punishment, and justice is decided between them without them being wronged.
compare: They secretly feel remorse when they see the pain. And justice is decided between them, and they are not wronged.

src: Und keiner begeht mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der im Namen ALLAHs Lügen erdichtet oder das Wahre ableugnet, nachdem es zu ihm gekommen war! Gibt es etwa nicht in Dschahannam eine Bleibe für die Kafir?!
ref: And who is a greater wrong-doer than he who fabricateth a lie against Allah or belieth the truth when it cometh unto him Will there not be in the Hell an abiding-place for the infidels?
draft: And no one commits more wrongdoing than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah or denies the truth after it has come to him! Is there not a place in Jahannam for the Kafir?!
hil: No one commits greater wrong than the one who fabricates lies in the name of Allah or denies the truth after it has come to him. Isn't there a dwelling in Hellfire for the disbelievers?
compare: No one commits greater wrong than the one who fabricates lies in the name of Allah or denies the truth after it has come to him. Isn't there a dwelling in Hellfire for the disbelievers?

src: Du warst nicht auf der westlichen Seite', als Wir Musa die Angelegenheit auftrugen, und du warst nicht zugegen.
ref: You were not there on the western side (of Mount Sinai) when We gave the commandments to Moses, nor were you witness (to the event).
draft: "You were not on the western side when we entrusted Musa with the matter, and you were not present."
hil: "You were not on the western side when We entrusted Musa with the matter, and you were not present."
compare: "You were not on the western side when we entrusted Musa with the matter, and you were not present."

src: Und werdet ihr nun Muslime werden?!
ref: (And say:) "Will you now submit?"
draft: And will you now become Muslims?!
hil: Will you now become Muslims?
compare: And will you now become Muslims?!

src: Bäche werden unter ihnen in den Gärten der Wonne fließen.
ref: At their feet shall flow streams of running water in gardens of delight.
draft: Streams will flow among them in the Gardens of Delight.
hil: Streams will flow among them in the Gardens of Delight.
compare: Streams will flow among them in the Gardens of Delight.

src: Und ihr pflegtet euch nicht so zu verdecken, daß nicht euer Gehör, eure Augen und eure Häute Zeugnis wegen euch ablegten. Aber ihr meintet, daß Gott nicht viel wisse von dem, was ihr tut.
ref: Not so did you cover yourselves, that your hearing, your eyes and your skins should not bear witness against you; but you thought that God would never know much of the things that you were working.
draft: And you did not conceal yourself in such a way that your hearing, your eyes, and your skins would not bear witness against you. But you thought that God did not know much about what you do.
hil: And you did not conceal yourselves so that your hearing, your eyes, and your skins would not bear testimony against you. But you thought that God did not know much about what you do.
compare: And you did not conceal yourself in such a way that your hearing, your eyes, and your skins would not bear witness against you. But you thought that God did not know much about what you do.

src: Diejenigen von den Leuten des Buches und von den Polytheisten, die nicht glauben, mögen es nicht gern, daß auf euch etwas Gutes von eurem Herrn herabgesandt wird.
ref: Those without faith among the people of the Book, and those who worship idols, do not wish that good should come to you from your Lord.
draft: Those of the people of the Book and the polytheists who disbelieve, do not like that anything good should be sent down to you from your Lord.
hil: "Those who disbelieve among the people of the book and the polytheists don't like that anything good should be sent down to you from your Lord."
compare: Those of the people of the Book and the polytheists who disbelieve, do not like that anything good should be sent down to you from your Lord.

src: Damit beleben Wir eine abgestorbene Ortschaft. Auf diese Weise werdet auch ihr hervorgebracht werden.
ref: Then We revive a dead land therewith, and even so you will be brought forth (from the dead),
draft: We are reviving a dead village. Thus you will also come into being.
hil: We are reviving a dead village. Thus, you will also emerge.
compare: We are reviving a dead village. Thus, you will also emerge.

src: Hierauf wird eure Rückkehr zu eurem Herrn sein.
ref: No one shall bear another's burden.
draft: Your return to your Lord will be on this.
hil: Your return to your Lord will be at this point.
compare: Your return to your Lord will be at this point.

src: Jede Gemeinschaft hat einen Gesandten. Wenn nun ihr Gesandter kommt, wird zwischen ihnen in Gerechtigkeit entschieden, und es wird ihnen kein Unrecht zugefügt.
ref: For every people there is an apostle; and when their apostle is come the matter is decided between them equitably, and no one is wronged.
draft: Every community has a messenger. When their messenger comes, justice will be decided between them, and no injustice will be done to them.
hil: Every community has a messenger. When their messenger comes, justice will be decided between them, and no injustice will be done to them.
compare: Every community has a messenger. When their messenger comes, justice will be decided between them, and no injustice will be done to them.

src: Und ihm dann die Herzader durchschnitten,
ref: Then cut off his aorta,
draft: And then they cut through his heart vein.
hil: And then they cut his heart vein.
compare: And then they cut his heart vein.

src: Sie waren beide in der Höhle, und er sagte zu seinem Gefährten: «Sei nicht traurig. Gott ist mit uns.»
ref: When both of them were in the cave, he said to his companion: "Do not grieve, for God is with us."
draft: They were both in the cave, and he said to his companion: "Do not be sad. God is with us."
hil: They were both in the cave and he said to his companion, "Do not be sad. God is with us."
compare: They were both in the cave, and he said to his companion: "Do not be sad. God is with us."

src: Allah wird aber keine Seele zurückstellen, wenn ihre Frist kommt. Und Allah ist Kundig dessen, was ihr tut.
ref: And Allah will never give respite to any soul when its promise arrives; and Allah is Aware of your deeds.
draft: Allah, however, will not delay any soul when its time has come. And Allah is aware of what you do.
hil: However, Allah will not delay any soul when its time comes and Allah is aware of what you do.
compare: However, Allah will not delay any soul when its time comes and Allah is aware of what you do.

src: Dann sagte ich: "Bittet euren HERRN um Vergebung! Gewiß, ER ist immer allvergebend,
ref: “I therefore told them, ‘Seek forgiveness from your Lord; He is indeed Most Forgiving.’
draft: Then I said, "Ask your Lord for forgiveness! Indeed, He is always forgiving.
hil: Then I said, 'Ask your Lord for forgiveness! Indeed, He is always forgiving.'
compare: Then I said, 'Ask your Lord for forgiveness! Indeed, He is always forgiving.'

src: Aber Allah hat (euch) bewahrt. Gewiß, Er weiß über das Innerste der Brüste Bescheid.
ref: But God spared you this, for He surely knows what is in the hearts of men.
draft: But Allah has preserved (you). Indeed, He knows what is in the hearts.
hil: But Allah has preserved you, Indeed, He knows what is in the innermost of the hearts.
compare: But Allah has preserved you, Indeed, He knows what is in the innermost of the hearts.

src: Und gedenke deines Herrn in deinem Herzen in Demut und Furcht, ohne laut vernehmbare Worte am Morgen und am Abend; und sei nicht einer der Unachtsamen.
ref: Meditate on your Lord inwardly with humility and trepidation, reciting His Book softly, morning and evening, and be not negligent.
draft: And remember your Lord within yourself with humility and in private, without loud words, in the morning and evening, and do not be one of the heedless.
hil: And commemorate your Lord within yourself humbly and with reverence, not audibly, morning and evening, and be not among the heedless.
compare: And remember your Lord within yourself with humility and in private, without loud words, in the morning and evening, and do not be one of the heedless.

src: Und von wo du auch herkommst, wende dein Gesicht in Richtung der heiligen Moschee.
ref: And wherever you come from, turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque.
draft: And no matter where you come from, turn your face towards the holy mosque.
hil: Wherever you come from, turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque.
compare: And no matter where you come from, turn your face towards the holy mosque.

src: Darin sollen sie verweilen auf ewig und immerdar.
ref: He has prepared for them Gardens under which rivers flow (Paradise), to dwell therein forever.
draft: They are to dwell therein forever and ever.
hil: They shall abide therein forever and ever.
compare: They are to dwell therein forever and ever.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der euch die Nacht machte, damit ihr euch darin ausruht, sowie den Tag hell. Gewiß, ALLAH hat bestimmt den Menschen Gunst erwiesen. Doch die meisten Menschen erweisen sich nicht dankbar.
ref: It is Allah Who created night for you so that you may gain rest in it, and the day giving sight; indeed Allah is Most Munificent towards mankind, but most people do not give thanks.
draft: ALLAH is the One Who made for you the night so that you may rest therein and the day to see. Surely, ALLAH has bestowed on mankind a great favor. But most people do not show gratitude.
hil: ALLAH is the One who made the night for you to rest in and the day to give light. Surely, ALLAH has shown favor to mankind. But most people do not show gratitude.
compare: ALLAH is the One who made the night for you to rest in and the day to give light. Surely, ALLAH has shown favor to mankind. But most people do not show gratitude.

src: Gleich wohlverwahrten Perlen.
ref: Like pearls within their shells,
draft: Equal well-kept pearls.
hil: Equal well-preserved pearls.
compare: Equal well-preserved pearls.

src: Das sind die, von denen Gott weiß, was in ihrem Herzen ist.
ref: The secrets of the hearts of these people are well known to God.
draft: These are those whom God knows what is in their hearts.
hil: These are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts.
compare: These are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts.

src: Darin erfaßt sie keine Mühsal, und sie werden nicht daraus vertrieben.
ref: No weariness will come upon them, nor will they be sent away from there.
draft: Therein they do not feel any hardship, and they will not be driven away from it.
hil: Therein they do not experience any hardship, and they will not be driven away from it.
compare: Therein they do not experience any hardship, and they will not be driven away from it.

src: Er ist ja der Allvergebende und Barmherzige.
ref: He is all-forgiving and all-merciful.
draft: He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: He is the Forgiver and Merciful.
compare: He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Und sag: "Ich hoffe, daß mein HERR mich zu einer besseren Führung als dieses rechtleitet.
ref: Say, "I hope that my Lord will provide me better guidance."
draft: And say: "I hope that my LORD will guide me to a better guidance than this right one.
hil: And say, 'I hope that my Lord guides me to a better guidance than this one.'
compare: And say, 'I hope that my Lord guides me to a better guidance than this one.'

src: Allah aber verspricht euch Vergebung von Sich aus und Huld. Allah ist Allumfassend und Allwissend.
ref: But God promises His pardon and grace, for God is bounteous and all-knowing.
draft: Allah, however, promises you forgiveness and grace. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.
hil: Allah, however, promises you forgiveness and grace. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.
compare: Allah, however, promises you forgiveness and grace. Allah is all-encompassing and all-knowing.

src: Als Lebensunterhalt für die Diener. Und Wir haben damit abgestorbene Ortschaften wieder belebt. So erfolgt auch das Herauskommen.
ref: As sustenance for the bondmen; and with it We revived a dead city; this is how you will be raised.
draft: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have revived dead villages with it. So the coming out also happens.
hil: As a livelihood for the servants. And by this, We revived dead villages. Thus, the emergence also occurs.
compare: As a livelihood for the servants. And we have revived dead villages with it. So the coming out also happens.

src: Was gibt es denn anstelle der Wahrheit außer dem Irregehen?!
ref: What then is there after the truth but error?
draft: What is there besides going astray instead of the truth?!
hil: What is there besides going astray instead of truth?!
compare: What is there besides going astray instead of the truth?!

src: Und verfertige das Schiff vor Unseren Augen und nach Unserer Eingebung. Und sprich Mich nicht an zugunsten derer, die Unrecht getan haben; sie werden ertränkt werden."
ref: “And build the ship in front of Us, and by Our command, and do not speak to Me regarding the unjust; they will surely be drowned.”
draft: "And manufacture the ship before our eyes and according to our inspiration. And do not address Me in favor of those who have done wrong; they will be drowned."
hil: Make the ship before Our eyes and according to Our inspiration. And do not address Me in favor of those who have done wrong; they will be drowned.
compare: "And manufacture the ship before our eyes and according to our inspiration. And do not address Me in favor of those who have done wrong; they will be drowned."

src: Diejenigen aber, die sie an seiner Stelle anrufen, entscheiden ohne jede Grundlage.
ref: But those they call apart from Him can not adjudge in the least.
draft: Those, however, who call upon them in his place, decide without any foundation.
hil: "However, those who call upon them in his place make decisions without any basis."
compare: Those, however, who call upon them in his place, decide without any foundation.

src: Da sagte er zu seinem Gefährten, während er mit ihm einen Wortwechsel führte: "Ich habe mehr Besitz als du und auch eine mächtigere Schar."
ref: Arguing one day with his friend he said: "I have more wealth than you and more powerful kinsmen."
draft: He said to his companion while having a conversation with him, "I have more property than you and also a more powerful group."
hil: He said to his companion, while having a conversation with him, "I have more possessions than you and also a more powerful group."
compare: He said to his companion, while having a conversation with him, "I have more possessions than you and also a more powerful group."

src: Aber Allah hebt auf, was der Satan dazwischenwirft. Hierauf legt Allah Seine Zeichen eindeutig fest.
ref: But God nullifies what Satan interjects, and God affirms His revelations.
draft: But Allah annuls what the Satan casts in between. After that, Allah sets His signs unequivocally.
hil: But Allah annuls what Satan casts in between. Then, Allah clearly establishes His signs.
compare: But Allah annuls what Satan casts in between. Then, Allah clearly establishes His signs.

src: Er sagte: "O mein Volk, was meint ihr, wenn ich mich auf einen klaren Beweis von meinem Herrn stütze und Er mir eine Barmherzigkeit von Sich hat zukommen lassen, die aber eurem Blick entzogen wurde, sollen wir sie euch da aufzwingen, wo sie euch zuwider ist?
ref: He said: "O my people, think. If I have a clear proof from my Lord, and He has bestowed on me His grace, though unknown to you, can we force it upon you when you are averse?
draft: He said: "O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear proof from my Lord, and He has sent to me a mercy from Himself but it has been made obscure to you, should we compel it upon you while you are averse to it?"
hil: He said, "O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear proof from my Lord, and He has shown me a mercy from Himself, but it has been concealed from your sight, should we force it upon you when you are averse to it?"
compare: He said: "O my people, what do you think if I rely on a clear proof from my Lord, and He has sent to me a mercy from Himself but it has been made obscure to you, should we compel it upon you while you are averse to it?"

src: Er sagte: "Allah bewahre mich davor, einer der Unwissenden zu sein."
ref: And he said: "God forbid that I be of the ignorant."
draft: He said, "God forbid that I should be one of the ignorant."
hil: He said, "God forbid that I should be one of the ignorant."
compare: He said, "God forbid that I should be one of the ignorant."

src: Ich bin doch nur ein Ermahner und ein Überbringer froher Botschaft für Leute, die den Iman verinnerlichen."
ref: I am only a bearer of warnings and bringer of happy news for those who believe."
draft: I am only a reminder and a messenger of good news for people who internalize the Iman.
hil: I am only a reminder and a messenger of good news for those who internalize faith.
compare: I am only a reminder and a messenger of good news for those who internalize faith.

src: damit er weiß, ob sie wohl die Botschaften ihres Herrn ausgerichtet haben, und daß Er das, was bei ihnen ist, umfaßt, und Er die Zahl von allem erfaßt'.
ref: So that He may know if they have delivered their Lord's messages. He comprehends all that has been given them, and keeps count of everything.
draft: 'so that he knows whether they have delivered the messages of their Lord, and that He encompasses what is with them and comprehends the count of all things.'
hil: So that he knows whether they have indeed conveyed the messages of their Lord, and that He encompasses what is with them, and He comprehends the count of all things.
compare: So that he knows whether they have indeed conveyed the messages of their Lord, and that He encompasses what is with them, and He comprehends the count of all things.

src: Sag: "Mein HERR weiß besser Bescheid über denjenigen, der mit der Rechtleitung kam, und über denjenigen, der in einem klaren Fehlgehen ist.
ref: Say: "My Lord knows who has come to guidance, and who is clearly in error."
draft: Say: "My Lord knows best about the one who came with guidance, and the one who is in clear error."
hil: Say, 'My Lord knows better about the one who came with guidance, and the one who is in clear error.'
compare: Say: "My Lord knows best about the one who came with guidance, and the one who is in clear error."

src: Und rezitiere das, was dir als Wahy von der Schrift deines HERRN zuteil wurde.
ref: Recite what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord.
draft: And recite what was revealed to you from the scripture of your LORD as a revelation.
hil: Recite what was revealed to you from the scripture of your Lord as a revelation.
compare: Recite what was revealed to you from the scripture of your Lord as a revelation.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Erklärt nicht für haram die Tay-yibat dessen, was ALLAH euch für halal erklärte, und übertretet nicht! Gewiß, ALLAH liebt nicht die Übertretenden.
ref: O believers, forbid not such good things as God has permitted you; and transgress not; God loves not transgressors.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! Do not declare as haram the Tay-yibat of what ALLAH has declared halal to you, and do not transgress! Surely, ALLAH does not love the transgressors.
hil: O you who have internalized the faith! Do not declare as unlawful the good things that Allah has made lawful to you. And do not transgress! Indeed, Allah does not love the transgressors.
compare: O you who have internalized the faith! Do not declare as unlawful the good things that Allah has made lawful to you. And do not transgress! Indeed, Allah does not love the transgressors.

src: (Alles) Lob gehört Allah, dem Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde, Der die Engel zu Gesandten gemacht hat mit Flügeln, (je) zwei, drei und vier! Er fügt der Schöpfung hinzu, was Er will. Gewiß, Allah hat zu allem die Macht.
ref: All praise is to Allah, the Maker of the heavens and the earth, Who assigns angels as messengers – who have pairs of two, three, four wings; He increases in creation whatever He wills; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.
draft: (All) praise belongs to Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, who has made the angels messengers with wings, (in) two, three and four (pairs). He adds to creation what He wills. Certainly, Allah has power over all things.
hil: (All) praise belongs to Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, who has made the angels messengers with wings, (in) two, three and four (pairs). He adds to creation what He wills. Certainly, Allah has power over all things.
compare: (All) praise belongs to Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, who has made the angels messengers with wings, (in) two, three and four (pairs). He adds to creation what He wills. Certainly, Allah has power over all things.

src: Allein nur diejenigen lassen sich warnen, die verständig sind.
ref: Only they think who are wise."
draft: Only those who are wise can be warned.
hil: Only those who are wise can be warned.
compare: Only those who are wise can be warned.

src: Aber die meisten Menschen glauben nicht.
ref: Verily, it is the truth from your Lord, but most of the mankind believe not.
draft: But most people don't believe.
hil: But most people do not believe.
compare: But most people don't believe.

src: Aber es glaubten Musa nur junge Leute aus seinem Volk, trotz ihrer Furcht vor Fir'aun und ihrer führenden Schar, davor, daß er sie verfolgen würde.
ref: But none believed in Moses except some children of his people, for fear that Pharaoh and his chiefs would persecute them.
draft: But only young people from his people believed in Musa, despite their fear of Pharaoh and his leaders, that he would persecute them.
hil: "But only young people from his people believed in Musa, despite their fear of Pharaoh and his leading group, that he would persecute them."
