compare: Many of the owners of the book would like to make you, after you have become believers, again unbelievers, out of envy in their souls, after the truth has been made clear to them. But forgive and be lenient until Allah issues His decision. Truly, Allah has power over all things.

src: Dir steht es nicht zu, dich darin hochmütig zu verhalten.
ref: You have no right to be insolent here.
draft: "You are not entitled to behave arrogantly in it."
hil: You have no right to behave arrogantly in it.
compare: "You are not entitled to behave arrogantly in it."

src: Und das Herz der Mutter Musas wurde leer.
ref: The mother of Moses was perturbed in the morning.
draft: And the heart of Musa's mother became empty.
hil: And the heart of Musa's mother became empty.
compare: And the heart of Musa's mother became empty.

src: (Es ist) der durchbohrend helle Stem.
ref: It is the star that shines with a piercing brightness --
draft: The piercingly bright stem.
hil: The piercingly bright trunk.
compare: The piercingly bright stem.

src: Sie beide unterstanden zwei rechtschaffenen (Dienern) von Unseren Dienern, doch handelten sie verräterisch an ihnen, und so haben ihnen diese vor Allah nichts genützt.
ref: They were under two of Our righteous servants, but they betrayed them.
draft: They both were subject to two honest (servants) of Our servants, but they acted treacherously towards them, and so these (servants) did not help them before Allah.
hil: They both were accountable to two righteous (servants) of Our servants, but they acted treacherously towards them, and so these (servants) did not help them before Allah.
compare: They both were accountable to two righteous (servants) of Our servants, but they acted treacherously towards them, and so these (servants) did not help them before Allah.

src: Und die den Tag des Gerichtes für wahr halten,
ref: And those who believe in the Day of Judgement,
draft: And those who believe in the Day of Judgment to be true.
hil: And those who believe in the Day of Judgment to be true.
compare: And those who believe in the Day of Judgment to be true.

src: Habt ihr betrachtet, was euch an Sperma entfließt?
ref: Just consider (the semen) that you emit,
draft: Have you considered what semen flows away from you?
hil: Have you considered what semen is flowing from you?
compare: Have you considered what semen is flowing from you?

src: Gewiß, bereits erwies ALLAH den Mumin Gutes, als ER ihnen einen Gesandten schickte, der zu ihnen gehört, der ihnen Seine Ayat vorträgt, sie läutert und ihnen die Schrift und die Weisheit lehrt.
ref: Allah has indeed bestowed a great favour upon the Muslims, in that He sent to them a Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) from among them, who recites to them His verses, and purifies them, and teaches them the Book and wisdom; and before it, they were definitely in open error.
draft: Certainly, ALLAH has already done good to the Mumin by sending them a messenger from among themselves, who recites His verses to them, purifies them, and teaches them the scripture and wisdom.
hil: Certainly, Allah has already done good to the Mumin when He sent a messenger to them from among themselves who recites His verses to them, purifies them, and teaches them the scripture and wisdom.
compare: Certainly, ALLAH has already done good to the Mumin by sending them a messenger from among themselves, who recites His verses to them, purifies them, and teaches them the scripture and wisdom.

src: Wo geht ihr denn hin?
ref: So whither do you stray?
draft: Where are you going then?
hil: Where are you going then?
compare: Where are you going then?

src: Fügt sie sich, so stiftet in Ge rechtigkeit Frieden zwischen ihnen und seid gerecht. Wahrlich, Allah liebt die Gerechten.
ref: And if it does revert, make peace between them with justice, and be equitable for Allah loves the equitable.
draft: If they comply, then establish justice between them and be fair. Truly, Allah loves the just.
hil: If they comply, establish peace between them in righteousness and be fair. Verily, Allah loves the just.
compare: If they comply, establish peace between them in righteousness and be fair. Verily, Allah loves the just.

src: So ist die Pein. Doch die Pein des Jenseits ist größer, wenn sie es nur wüßten!
ref: Such is Our chastisement; and the punishment of the Hereafter will be greater, if only they knew!
draft: So it is with pain. But the pain of the hereafter is greater, if only they knew!
hil: The pain is like this. However, the agony of the hereafter is greater if only they knew!
compare: So it is with pain. But the pain of the hereafter is greater, if only they knew!

src: Gewiß, im Aufeinanderfolgen von Nacht und Tag und was ALLAH in den Himmeln und der Erde erschaffen hat, gibt es sicherlich Ayat für Menschen, die Taqwa gemäß handeln.
ref: In the alternation of night and day, and all that He has created in the heavens and the earth, are certainly signs for people who fear God.
draft: Certainly, in the succession of night and day and in what ALLAH has created in the heavens and the earth, there are indeed signs for people who act according to Taqwa.
hil: Certainly, in the alternation of night and day, and in what Allah has created in the heavens and on the earth, there are undoubtedly signs for those who act in accordance with Taqwa.
compare: Certainly, in the succession of night and day and in what ALLAH has created in the heavens and the earth, there are indeed signs for people who act according to Taqwa.

src: Unser HERR umfaßt alles mit Wissen.
ref: Our Lord embraces all things in His knowledge.
draft: "Our Lord encompasses everything with knowledge."
hil: Our Lord encompasses everything with knowledge.
compare: "Our Lord encompasses everything with knowledge."

src: Dieser ist Der Allwissende über das Verborgene und das Sichtbare, Der Allwürdige, Der Allgnädige.
ref: Such is (He) the knower of the unknown and the known, the mighty and the merciful,
draft: "This is the All-Knowing of the Hidden and the Visible, the All-Worthy, the All-Merciful."
hil: "He is the All-Knowing of the Unseen and the Seen, the All-Worthy, the All-Merciful."
compare: "He is the All-Knowing of the Unseen and the Seen, the All-Worthy, the All-Merciful."

src: Das ist etwas von dem, was mich mein Herr gelehrt hat.
ref: This knowledge is one of the things my Lord has taught me.
draft: This is something my master has taught me.
hil: This is part of what my Lord has taught me.
compare: This is part of what my Lord has taught me.

src: Gewiß, WIR umhüllten ihre Herzen doch mit Bedeckung, damit sie ihn (den Quran) nicht begreifen, und machten ihre Ohren schwerhörig. Selbst dann, wenn du sie zur Rechtleitung einladen würdest, werden sie nie einer Rechtleitung folgen.
ref: Verily We have placed a covering on their hearts so that they do not understand, and a deafness in their ears so that however you may call them to guidance they will never be guided aright.
draft: Surely, we have veiled their hearts with coverings, lest they should understand it (the Quran), and in their ears a heaviness, and into their minds a slumber. And even if you call them to the guidance, they will not follow the guidance at all.
hil: Surely, We veiled their hearts with coverings so that they could not understand the Quran, and We made their ears heavy. Even if you would invite them to the guidance, they will never follow the guidance.
compare: Surely, we have veiled their hearts with coverings, lest they should understand it (the Quran), and in their ears a heaviness, and into their minds a slumber. And even if you call them to the guidance, they will not follow the guidance at all.

src: Er sagte: "Gewiß, ich bin dein Bruder. So sei nicht bekümmert wegen dessen, was sie getan haben."
ref: He said, "I am your brother, so do not feel distressed about whatever they have been doing."
draft: He said, "Certainly, I am your brother. So don't worry about what they did."
hil: He said, 'Certainly, I am your brother. So don't be worried about what they have done.'
compare: He said, 'Certainly, I am your brother. So don't be worried about what they have done.'

src: (WIR offenbarten dir) wie WIR (den Gesandten) derjenigen Einteilenden hinabsandten,
ref: Like (those) We had sent to those schismatics who slandered their Books
draft: We revealed to you how we sent down (the messenger) of those who divide.
hil: We revealed to you how We sent down (the messenger) of those who divide.
compare: We revealed to you how We sent down (the messenger) of those who divide.

src: Immer wieder, wenn ihre Häute gargekocht sein werden, werden WIR sie ihnen gegen andere Häute austauschen, damit sie die Peinigung (richtig) erfahren.
ref: We shall burn them in Fire. As often as their skins are roasted through, We shall change them for other skins that they may taste the punishment.
draft: Again and again, when their skins will have been boiled tender, we will exchange them for other skins so that they may experience the torment correctly.
hil: Again and again, when their skins will have been boiled tender, we will exchange them with other skins so that they may experience the torment in the right way.
compare: Again and again, when their skins will have been boiled tender, we will exchange them with other skins so that they may experience the torment in the right way.

src: Erhebe dich und warne
ref: Arise and warn,
draft: Rise up and warn.
hil: Rise up and warn.
compare: Rise up and warn.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allwissend, allkundig.
ref: Surely God knows and is cognisant.
draft: Sure, ALLAH is all-knowing, all-seeing.
hil: Allah is all-knowing and all-seeing.
compare: Allah is all-knowing and all-seeing.

src: Allah ist mit den Standhaften."
ref: God is with those who are patient (and persevere)."
draft: "Allah is with the steadfast."
hil: Allah is with the steadfast.
compare: "Allah is with the steadfast."

src: Aber nein! Wenn ihr es sicher wüßtet!
ref: And yet if you knew with positive knowledge
draft: But no! If you only knew for sure!
hil: But no! If you only knew for sure!
compare: But no! If you only knew for sure!

src: Und sie fragen dich nach den Felsenbergen, dann sag: "Mein HERR wird sie in (kleinste) Teilchen zerkleinern.
ref: They will ask you about the mountains. Tell them: "My Lord will uproot them from the base,
draft: And they ask you about the rocky mountains, then say, "My LORD will shatter them into tiny pieces."
hil: And if they ask you about the rocky mountains, then say, "My Lord will shatter them into tiny pieces."
compare: And if they ask you about the rocky mountains, then say, "My Lord will shatter them into tiny pieces."

src: Und diejenigen von euch, die abberufen werden und Gattinnen hinterlassen - so sollen diese (mit sich) selbst vier Monate und zehn (Tage) abwarten. Wenn sie dann ihre festgesetzte Zeit erreicht haben, so ist für euch keine Sünde in dem, was sie in rechtlicher Weise mit sich selbst unternehmen. Allah ist dessen, was ihr tut, Kundig.
ref: Wives of men who die among you should wait (after their husbands death) for four months and ten days; and when the term is over there is no sin if they do what they like with themselves honourably, for God is aware of all that you do.
draft: And those of you who are taken away and leave wives - they shall wait for themselves (a period of) four months and ten (days). And when their appointed time has reached, then there is no sin on you concerning what they have been doing to themselves in accordance with what is lawful. And Allah is Aware of what you do.
hil: And those of you who are called away and leave wives should wait for themselves (a period of) four months and ten (days). When their appointed time has reached, then there is no sin upon you concerning what they do with themselves in legal terms. Allah is aware of what you do.
compare: And those of you who are taken away and leave wives - they shall wait for themselves (a period of) four months and ten (days). And when their appointed time has reached, then there is no sin on you concerning what they have been doing to themselves in accordance with what is lawful. And Allah is Aware of what you do.

src: Behaltet sie aber nicht aus Schadenslust, um Übertretungen zu begehen. Wer dies tut, der hat sich selbst Unrecht getan.
ref: It is transgression to retain them merely for harassment; and whoever' does that indeed wrongs his own self.
draft: Keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions. Whoever does this has done wrong to themselves.
hil: Do not keep them out of malice to commit transgressions. Whoever does this has done wrong to themselves.
compare: Keep them not out of malice to commit transgressions. Whoever does this has done wrong to themselves.

src: Und diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, sagen: "Würde ihm doch eine Aya von seinem HERRN hinabgesandt!" Sag: "Gewiß ALLAH läßt abirren, wen ER will, und leitet zu Sich denjenigen recht, der sich reumütig besinnt.
ref: And those who disbelieve say: 'Why has no sign been sent down to him by his Lord' Say: 'Allah leads astray whom He will, and guides those who repent,
draft: And those who committed disbelief say: "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him] in repentance."
hil: And those who disbelieved say, "If only a sign from his Lord had been sent down to him." Say, "Indeed, Allah sends astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back to Him in repentance."
compare: And those who disbelieved say, "If only a sign from his Lord had been sent down to him." Say, "Indeed, Allah sends astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back to Him in repentance."

src: Als er sie nun mit ihrem Bedarf ausgestattet hatte, sagte er: "Bringt mir einen (Halb)bruder von euch väterlicherseits. Seht ihr denn nicht, daß ich volles Maß gebe und daß ich der beste Obdachgeber bin?
ref: And when he provided them with their provisions he said, “Bring your step-brother to me; do you not see that I measure in full and that I am the best host?”
draft: When he had equipped her with what she needed, he said, "Bring me a (half) brother of yours from your father's side. Don't you see that I give full measure and that I am the best provider of shelter?
hil: And when he had equipped her with what she needed, he said, "Bring me a (half) brother of yours from your father's side. Have you not seen that I have given full measure and that I am the best of hosts?"
compare: And when he had equipped her with what she needed, he said, "Bring me a (half) brother of yours from your father's side. Have you not seen that I have given full measure and that I am the best of hosts?"

src: Schlecht ist, was sie erkaufen.
ref: Vile is that wherewith they have bartered.
draft: Bad is what they buy.
hil: Bad is what they purchase.
compare: Bad is what they purchase.

src: Was für eine erfreuliche Belohnung nach dem Diesseits!"
ref: How excellent the recompense of Paradise!
draft: "What a pleasant reward after this world!"
hil: "What a delightful reward after this life!"
compare: "What a delightful reward after this life!"

src: Und sie sagen: "Der Allerbarmer hat Sich Kinder genommen." Preis sei Ihm!
ref: And they said, “The Most Gracious has chosen a son – Purity is to Him!
draft: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken children for Himself." Praise be to Him!
hil: And they said, “The Most Merciful has taken an offspring for Himself” – Purity be to Him! Indeed, to Him belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth. All are submissive to Him.
compare: And they said, “The Most Merciful has taken an offspring for Himself” – Purity be to Him! Indeed, to Him belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth. All are submissive to Him.

src: Meidet darum den Greuel der Götzen und meidet das Wort der Lüge.
ref: Avoid the repugnance of idols, and false and frivolous talk.
draft: Therefore, avoid the abomination of idols and avoid the word of lies.
hil: Therefore, avoid the abomination of idols and avoid the word of lies.
compare: Therefore, avoid the abomination of idols and avoid the word of lies.

src: Und weshalb speist ihr nicht von dem, worauf ALLAHs Name (beim Schächten) erwähnt wurde, nachdem ER euch deutlich das vorgetragen hat, was ER euch für haram erklärte - außer dem, wozu ihr gezwungen werdet?!
ref: And why should you not eat of that over which the name of God has been pronounced, when He has made it distinctly clear what is forbidden, unless you are constrained to do so.
draft: And why do you not eat of that upon which Allah's name has been mentioned while He has explained in detail to you what He has forbidden you, excepting that to which you are compelled.
hil: And why do you not eat from that which Allah's Name has been mentioned upon when He has clearly informed you of what He has declared haram for you, except what you are compelled to?
compare: And why do you not eat of that upon which Allah's name has been mentioned while He has explained in detail to you what He has forbidden you, excepting that to which you are compelled.

src: Sag: "Egal ob ihr das, was ihr in euren Brüsten tragt, verheimlicht oder offenbart, ALLAH weiß darüber Bescheid, und ER weiß, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist. Und ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: Say: "Whether you conceal or reveal whatsoever is in your hearts it is all known to God, as is known to Him all that is in the heavens and the earth; and God has the power over all things."
draft: Say: "Whether you conceal or reveal what you carry in your breasts, Allah is aware of it, and He knows what is in the heavens and on earth. And Allah is All-Powerful over everything."
hil: Say: "Whether you conceal or reveal what you carry in your breasts, God knows about it and He knows what is in the heavens and on earth. And God is Almighty over everything."
compare: Say: "Whether you conceal or reveal what you carry in your breasts, Allah is aware of it, and He knows what is in the heavens and on earth. And Allah is All-Powerful over everything."

src: Esset von dem, was Allah euch gegeben hat und folgt nicht die Fußstapfen des Satans.
ref: Eat of what Allah has provided for you, and follow not the footsteps of Shaitan (Satan).
draft: Eat of what Allah has given you and do not follow the footsteps of Satan.
hil: Eat from what Allah has given you and do not follow the footsteps of Satan.
compare: Eat of what Allah has given you and do not follow the footsteps of Satan.

src: Wenn ihr leidet, so leiden sie auch, wie ihr leidet; ihr aber erhofft von Gott, was sie nicht erhoffen. Gott weiß Bescheid und ist weise.
ref: If you are suffering, they are also suffering like you, but you expect from Allah what they do not expect, and Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.
draft: "If you suffer, they also suffer, as you suffer; but you hope for from God what they do not hope for. God knows best and is wise."
hil: If you suffer, they too suffer just as you do; however, you hope for from Allah what they cannot hope for. Allah knows best and is wise.
compare: "If you suffer, they also suffer, as you suffer; but you hope for from God what they do not hope for. God knows best and is wise."

src: Und sollte ER dir Gutes bestimmen, so kann niemand Seine Gunst abwenden.
ref: And if He wants good for you, none can repel His grace.
draft: And if HE intends good for you, no one can turn away His favor.
hil: If HE intends good for you, no one can turn away His favor.
compare: And if HE intends good for you, no one can turn away His favor.

src: Sie befragen dich über Berauschendes und Glücksspiel. Sprich: "In beiden liegt großes Übel und Nutzen für die Menschen.
ref: They ask you about drinking and gambling.
draft: They ask you about intoxication and gambling. Say, "In both there is great evil and benefit for people.
hil: They ask you about intoxication and gambling. Say, 'In both there is great evil and benefit for people.'
compare: They ask you about intoxication and gambling. Say, "In both there is great evil and benefit for people.

src: über den Sieg von ALLAH. ER verhilft zum Sieg, wem ER will.
ref: He helps whomever He wants.
draft: "About the victory of Allah. He grants victory to whom He wills."
hil: About the victory of Allah. He helps whom He wills.
compare: "About the victory of Allah. He grants victory to whom He wills."

src: Sie sagten: "Halte ihn mit seinem Bruder hin, und schicke in die Städte Boten,
ref: They said: "Put him and his brother off (awhile) and send out heralds to the cities
draft: They said, "Keep him waiting with his brother, and send messengers to the cities."
hil: They said, "Keep him waiting with his brother, and send messengers to the cities."
compare: They said, "Keep him waiting with his brother, and send messengers to the cities."

src: Du meinst, sie bilden eine Einheit, aber ihre Herzen sind geteilt. Dies, weil sie Leute sind, die keinen Verstand haben.
ref: Their valour is great, among themselves; you think of them as a host; but their hearts are scattered; that is because they are a people who have no sense.
draft: You mean, they form a unit, but their hearts are divided. This is because they are people who have no sense.
hil: You think they form a unit, but their hearts are divided. This is because they are people who lack understanding.
compare: You think they form a unit, but their hearts are divided. This is because they are people who lack understanding.

src: Am Tag, da Wir mit der größten Gewalt zupacken werden, gewiß, da werden Wir Vergeltung üben.
ref: The day that We shall seize them with a grievous hold, We will indeed castigate them.
draft: On the day we will seize with the greatest force, certainly, we will take revenge.
hil: On the day when we seize with the greatest power, we will surely take revenge.
compare: On the day when we seize with the greatest power, we will surely take revenge.

src: Und ihr seid die Überlegenen!
ref: You shall prevail.
draft: And you are the superior ones!
hil: And you are the superior ones!
compare: And you are the superior ones!

src: Frag die Kinder Israels, wie viele deutliche Zeichen Wir ihnen zukommen ließen. Wenn aber einer die Gnade Gottes eintauscht, nachdem sie zu ihm gekommen ist, so verhängt Gott eine harte Strafe.
ref: Ask the Descendants of Israel how many clear signs We gave them; and whoever alters Allah’s favour which came to him, then indeed Allah’s punishment is severe.
draft: Ask the children of Israel how many clear signs We have sent them. But whoever exchanges the grace of God after it has come to him - indeed, God is severe in penalty.
hil: Ask the Children of Israel how many clear signs We have sent them. But whoever exchanges the grace of Allah [for disbelief] after it has come to him - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
compare: Ask the children of Israel how many clear signs We have sent them. But whoever exchanges the grace of God after it has come to him - indeed, God is severe in penalty.

src: Gewiß, WIR sind es, Der belebt und sterben läßt, und zu Uns ist das Werden,
ref: We are the one who give life and death, and to Us will be the destination.
draft: Certainly, WE are the one who gives life and lets die, and becoming belongs to Us.
hil: It is true, WE are the One who gives life and causes death, and to Us is the ultimate return.
compare: It is true, WE are the One who gives life and causes death, and to Us is the ultimate return.

src: Da schmetterte ihr Herr sie für ihre Sünde nieder, und so ebnete Er über ihnen die Erde ein.
ref: So God obliterated them for their crime, and (destroyed) all of them alike.
draft: "Her master struck her down for her sin, and thus He leveled the earth over them."
hil: "Her Lord struck her down for her sin, and in this way He leveled the earth over them."
compare: "Her Lord struck her down for her sin, and in this way He leveled the earth over them."

src: Da brachen aus ihm zwölf Quellen hervor, so daß jede Menschengruppe wußte, wo ihre Trinkstelle war. - «Eßt und trinkt von dem, was Gott beschert hat, und verbreitet nicht Unheil auf der Erde.»
ref: 'Eat and drink of God's providing, and mischief not in the earth, doing corruption.'
draft: Twelve springs erupted from him, so that every group of people knew where their drinking place was. - "Eat and drink of what God has bestowed, and do not spread mischief on earth."
hil: Twelve springs erupted from him so that every group of people knew where their drinking place was. 'Eat and drink of what God has bestowed, and do not spread mischief on earth.'
compare: Twelve springs erupted from him, so that every group of people knew where their drinking place was. - "Eat and drink of what God has bestowed, and do not spread mischief on earth."

src: Und wenn du sie fragst, wer Wasser vom Himmel herabkommen läßt und die Erde damit nach ihrem Absterben belebt, sagen sie bestimmt: «Gott.» Sprich: Lob sei Gott!
ref: And if you asked them, "Who sends down rain from the sky and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness?" they would surely say " Allah."
draft: And if you ask them who lets water come down from the sky and with it revives the earth after its death, they will definitely say, "God." Say: Praise be to God!
hil: And if you ask them who lets water come down from the sky and revive the earth with it after its death, they will surely say, 'God.' Say, 'Praise be to God!'
compare: And if you ask them who lets water come down from the sky and with it revives the earth after its death, they will definitely say, "God." Say: Praise be to God!

src: Und übereile dich nicht mit dem Koran, bevor er dir zu Ende offenbart worden ist.
ref: And be not in haste (O Muhammad SAW) with the Quran before its revelation is completed to you, and say: "My Lord!
draft: And do not rush with the Quran before it has been fully revealed to you.
hil: Do not rush with the Quran before it has been fully revealed to you.
compare: And do not rush with the Quran before it has been fully revealed to you.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH wird die Nifaq- und die Kufr-Betreibenden in Dschahannam versammeln, allesamt.
ref: Indeed God will put the hypocrites and infidels together in Hell.
draft: Surely, ALLAH will gather the hypocrites and the disbelievers altogether in Jahannam (Hell).
hil: Surely, ALLAH will gather the hypocrites and the disbelievers altogether in Jahannam (Hell)
compare: Surely, ALLAH will gather the hypocrites and the disbelievers altogether in Jahannam (Hell).

src: Wenn Gott für mich Schaden will, können sie denn seinen Schaden beheben?
ref: If God willed any harm for me, can they lift His harm?
draft: If God wants to harm me, can they fix his damage?
hil: If God intends to harm me, are they able to fix His damage?
compare: If God intends to harm me, are they able to fix His damage?

src: Nein, es ist schlechter für sie. Am Tag der Auferstehung wird ihnen das, womit sie gegeizt haben, als Halskette umgelegt werden.
ref: In fact, it is worse; for what they grudged will be hung around their necks on the Day of Resurrection.
draft: No, it is worse for them. On the Day of Resurrection, what they have hoarded will be hung around their necks as a necklace.
hil: No, it is worse for them. On the Day of Resurrection, what they have hoarded will be hung around their necks as a necklace.
compare: No, it is worse for them. On the Day of Resurrection, what they have hoarded will be hung around their necks as a necklace.

src: Und ihr werdet befragt werden.
ref: You will surely be questioned about it.
draft: "And you will be questioned."
hil: And you will be questioned.
compare: And you will be questioned.

src: Unser Herr umfaßt alle Dinge in seinem Wissen. Auf Gott vertrauen wir.
ref: For our Lord has embraced everything with knowledge, and in Allah we have put our trust.
draft: Our Lord encompasses all things in his knowledge. We trust in God.
hil: Our Lord encompasses all things in His knowledge. We put our trust in God.
compare: Our Lord encompasses all things in his knowledge. We trust in God.

src: Und führe ihnen als Gleichnis zwei Männer an.
ref: Tell them the parable of two men.
draft: "And cite for them the example of two men"
hil: And present to them the example of two men as a parable.
compare: And present to them the example of two men as a parable.

src: Diese sind wie die An'am, nein, sondern sie sind noch abirrender! Diese sind die wirklichen Achtlosen.
ref: They are people unconcerned.
draft: These are like the An'am, no, but they are even more erring! These are the real heedless.
hil: They are like the An'am, no, but they are still more misguided! These are the real heedless.
compare: They are like the An'am, no, but they are still more misguided! These are the real heedless.

src: "Mein Söhnchen! Sollte es sich auch nur um das Gewicht eines Senfkorns handeln, das sich in einem Stein, in den Himmeln oder auf Erden befinden sollte, ALLAH bringt sie.
ref: "O my son, whatsoever it may be, even though equal to a mustard seed in weight, or within a rock or in the sky or in the earth, God will bring it forth.
draft: "My little son! Even if it were only the weight of a mustard seed, which should be in a rock, in the heavens or on earth, ALLAH will bring them."
hil: My little son! Even if it were only the weight of a mustard seed, whether in a rock or in the heavens or on earth, Allah will bring it forth.
compare: "My little son! Even if it were only the weight of a mustard seed, which should be in a rock, in the heavens or on earth, ALLAH will bring them."

src: Sie werden aber (seiner) nicht gedenken, außer daß Allah es will.
ref: And what advice will they heed, except if Allah wills?
draft: They will not mention him except that Allah wills it.
hil: They will not remember him, except as Allah wills it.
compare: They will not remember him, except as Allah wills it.

src: Und WIR haben dir die Schrift mit der Wahrheit hinabgesandt als Bestätigung dessen, was ihr von der Schrift voranging, und als Hüter über sie.
ref: And to you We have revealed the Book containing the truth, confirming the earlier revelations, and preserving them (from change and corruption).
draft: And WE have sent down to you the Scripture with the truth, confirming what was before it of the Scripture and as a guardian over it.
hil: We have sent down to you the Scripture with the truth, confirming what came before it of the Scripture and as a guardian over it.
compare: We have sent down to you the Scripture with the truth, confirming what came before it of the Scripture and as a guardian over it.

src: Und sollten sie dem Salam zugeneigt sein, dann sei ihm ebenfalls zugeneigt und übe ALLAH gegenüber Tawakkul!
ref: But if they incline to peace, you also incline to it, and (put your) trust in Allah.
draft: And if you are inclined to the Salam, then be inclined to it as well and exercise Tawakkul towards ALLAH!
hil: If they are inclined to peace, then be inclined to it as well, and put your trust in Allah towards it!
compare: And if you are inclined to the Salam, then be inclined to it as well and exercise Tawakkul towards ALLAH!

src: Und erzähle von der Gnade deines Herrn.
ref: And keep recounting the favours of your Lord.
draft: And tell of the grace of your Lord.
hil: And speak of the grace of your Lord.
compare: And tell of the grace of your Lord.

src: Und jedes Volk hat einen, der es rechtleitet.
ref: You are only a warner, and every people has its guide.
draft: And every people has one who guides it right.
hil: Every people has one who guides it right.
compare: And every people has one who guides it right.

src: Und Saatfelder und eine treffliche Stätte,
ref: And fields and stately mansions,
draft: And fields of crops and a splendid site.
hil: And fields of crops and a wonderful place.
compare: And fields of crops and a wonderful place.

src: Danach werdet ihr zu eurem Herrn heimkehren; und Er wird euch verkünden, was ihr zu tun pflegtet. Wahrlich, Er weiß wohl, was in den Herzen ist.
ref: You will return to your Lord in the end and He will declare to you what you have done: He knows well what is in the hearts of men.
draft: After that you will return to your Lord; and He will let you know what you used to do. Verily, He knows well what is in the hearts.
hil: Afterward, you will be returned to your Lord, and He will inform you of what you used to do. Surely, He knows what is in the hearts.
compare: Afterward, you will be returned to your Lord, and He will inform you of what you used to do. Surely, He knows what is in the hearts.

src: Dann ließen Wir Unsere Gesandten ihren Spuren folgen; und Wir ließen (ihnen) Jesus, den Sohn der Maria, folgen, und Wir gaben ihm das Evangelium. Und in die Herzen derer, die ihm folgten, legten Wir Güte und Barmherzigkeit.
ref: Thereafter in their footsteps We caused Our apostles to follow, and We caused lsa, son Of Maryam, to follow them, and We vouchsafed Unto him the Injil, and We placed In the hearts of those who followed him tenderness and mercy.
draft: Then We sent Our messengers following in their footsteps, and We sent Jesus son of Mary after them, and gave him the Gospel; and put compassion and mercy into the hearts of those who followed him.
hil: We caused Our messengers to follow in their footsteps; We gave Jesus, son of Mary, (to follow) in their wake, and We gave him the Gospel. And We put compassion and mercy into the hearts of those who followed him.
compare: Then We sent Our messengers following in their footsteps, and We sent Jesus son of Mary after them, and gave him the Gospel; and put compassion and mercy into the hearts of those who followed him.

src: Gewiß, Pharao erhob sich in Arroganz im Lande und machte dessen Bewohner zu Parteien.
ref: Pharaoh exalted himself in the land, and divided its people into factions.
draft: Sure, Pharaoh rose in arrogance in the country and made its inhabitants into parties.
hil: Surely, Pharaoh became haughty in the land and turned its inhabitants into factions.
compare: Surely, Pharaoh became haughty in the land and turned its inhabitants into factions.

src: - Am Tag, da die Erde, sie freilassend, sich ihnen aufspalten wird und sie eilig (hervorkommen).
ref: The day the earth will split asunder they will come out hurriedly.
draft: On the day when the Earth, releasing them, will split open for them and they will hurry forth.
hil: On the day when the Earth will split open for them, freeing them, and they will hasten forth.
compare: On the day when the Earth, releasing them, will split open for them and they will hurry forth.

src: Dann tut Er ihnen am Tag der Auferstehung kund, was sie getan haben.
ref: And on the Day of Judgement He will announce their deeds to them.
draft: Then on the Day of Resurrection, He will inform them of what they did.
hil: On the Day of Resurrection, He will inform them of what they have done.
compare: On the Day of Resurrection, He will inform them of what they have done.

src: Er (Zakariyya) sagte: "Mein Herr, setze mir ein Zeichen." Er sagte: "Dein Zeichen ist, daß du drei Tage lang nicht zu den Menschen sprechen wirst außer durch Gebärden. Und gedenke deines Herrn häufig und preise (Ihn) am Abend und am frühen Morgen!"
ref: He said: 'Lord, appoint for me a sign' He said: 'Your sign is that you shall not speak to people except by signs for three days' And remember your Lord abundantly, exalt Him in the evening and at the dawn'
draft: He (Zakariyya) said: "My Lord, give me a sign." He said: "Your sign is that you shall not speak to the people for three nights, although being without fault. And remember your Lord much [throughout] the day and night."
hil: He (Zakariyya) said, "My Lord, grant me a sign." He said, "Your sign shall be that you will not speak to people for three nights, although being without fault. And remember your Lord much throughout the day and night, and exalt [Him] in the evening and morning."
compare: He (Zakariyya) said, "My Lord, grant me a sign." He said, "Your sign shall be that you will not speak to people for three nights, although being without fault. And remember your Lord much throughout the day and night, and exalt [Him] in the evening and morning."

src: Und Salomo (machten Wir) den Wind (dienstbar), der in seinem Auftrage in das Land blies, das Wir gesegnet hatten.
ref: We made tempestuous winds obedient to Solomon which blew swiftly to sail at his bidding (with his ships) to the land We had blessed.
draft: And We made Solomon's command the wind which blew into the land which We had blessed.
hil: And We made the wind subservient to Solomon's command, blowing into the land which We had blessed.
compare: And We made the wind subservient to Solomon's command, blowing into the land which We had blessed.

src: Meine Macht hat mich verlassen."
ref: Vanished has my power from me."
draft: "My power has left me."
hil: "My power has left me."
compare: "My power has left me."

src: Und subhanallah, Der HERR aller Schöpfung.
ref: Praised be God, the Lord of all the worlds.
draft: And subhanallah, the Lord of all creation.
hil: And subhanallah, the Lord of all creation.
compare: And subhanallah, the Lord of all creation.

src: Dann sagten WIR: "Adam!
ref: Then We said: "O Adam!
draft: Then we said: "Adam!"
hil: {"output": "Then WE said, 'Adam!'"}.
compare: Then we said: "Adam!"

src: Sag: "ALLAH leitet die Erschaffung ein, dann wiederholt ER sie!"
ref: Say: "It is God alone who first creates and then reverts it.
draft: Say: "ALLAH initiates creation, then repeats it!"
hil: Say: "Allah initiates creation, then repeats it!"
compare: Say: "ALLAH initiates creation, then repeats it!"

src: Und in die Herzen derer, die ihm folgten, legten Wir Güte und Barmherzigkeit.
ref: And We set in the hearts of those who followed him tenderness and mercy.
draft: And into the hearts of those who followed him, We placed kindness and mercy.
hil: And We placed kindness and mercy into the hearts of those who followed him.
compare: And into the hearts of those who followed him, We placed kindness and mercy.

src: Und (mir wurde befohlen): "Richte dein Antlitz auf die einzig wahre Religion, und sei nicht einer der Götzendiener.
ref: And to set my face toward the way, as one upright, and not be one of those who associate others with God.
draft: And (I was commanded): "Direct your face towards the only true religion, and do not be one of the idolaters."
hil: Direct your face towards the only true religion, and do not be one of the idolaters.
compare: And (I was commanded): "Direct your face towards the only true religion, and do not be one of the idolaters."

src: Mose sagte zu ihm: «Darf ich dir folgen, auf daß du mich von dem lehrst, was du über den rechten Weg belehrt worden bist?»
ref: Moses said to him: "May I attend upon you that you may instruct me in the knowledge you have been taught of the right way?"
draft: Mose said to him: "May I follow you so that you can teach me what you have been taught about the right path?"
hil: Moses said to him, "May I follow you so that you can teach me what you have been taught about the right path?"
compare: Mose said to him: "May I follow you so that you can teach me what you have been taught about the right path?"

src: Dann haben Wir das Zeichen der Nacht ausgelöscht und das Zeichen des Tages hell gemacht, damit ihr nach Huld von eurem Herrn trachtet und damit ihr die Zahl der Jahre und die (Zeit)rechnung wißt. Und alles haben Wir ganz ausführlich dargelegt.
ref: Then We make dark the portent of the night, and We make the portent of the day sight-giving, that ye may seek bounty from your Lord, and that ye may know the computation of the years, and the reckoning; and everything have We expounded with a clear expounding.
draft: Then We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day bright, so that you may seek bounty from your Lord, and so that you may know the number of years and the calculation [of time]. And everything We have set out in detail.
hil: We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day bright, so that you may seek bounty from your Lord, and so that you may know the number of years and the calculation [of time]. And We have explained everything in detail.
compare: Then We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day bright, so that you may seek bounty from your Lord, and so that you may know the number of years and the calculation [of time]. And everything We have set out in detail.

src: Also Niedergang ist für diejenigen, die Unrecht begingen, bei der Peinigung eines qualvollen Tages bestimmt.
ref: Woe alas to the sinners for the torment of the grievous Day!
draft: Also decline is determined for those who committed injustice in the torment of an agonizing day.
hil: Decline is destined for those who have committed injustice, in the punishment of an agonizing day.
compare: Decline is destined for those who have committed injustice, in the punishment of an agonizing day.

src: Hat er Brüder, so steht seiner Mutter ein Sechstel zu. (Dies gilt) nach Berücksichtigung eines Testamentes, das er etwa gemacht hat, oder einer (bestehenden) Schuld. - Eure Väter und eure Söhne: Ihr wißt nicht, wer von ihnen euch im Nutzen nähersteht. - (Dies ist) eine Pflicht von seiten Gottes.
ref: Your fathers and your sons -- you know not which out of them is nearer in profit to you.
draft: If he has brothers, then his mother is entitled to one-sixth. (This applies) after taking into account any will he may have made, or any (existing) debts. - Your fathers and your sons: you do not know which of them is nearest to you in benefit. - (This is) an obligation from God's side.
hil: One-sixth of the inheritance belongs to his mother if he has brothers, after taking into account any testament he may have made or existing debts. You do not know who among your parents and children is closer to you in benefit. This is an obligation from God's side.
compare: One-sixth of the inheritance belongs to his mother if he has brothers, after taking into account any testament he may have made or existing debts. You do not know who among your parents and children is closer to you in benefit. This is an obligation from God's side.

src: Dachten die Menschen etwa, daß sie in Ruhe gelassen werden, zu sagen: "Wir verinnerlichten den Iman", ohne daß sie einer Fitna unterzogen werden?!
ref: Do men think they will get away by saying: "We believe," and will not be tried?
draft: Did people think they could say "We internalized the imam" without being subjected to fitna?!
hil: Did people think they could say "We internalized the faith" without being subjected to discord?!
compare: Did people think they could say "We internalized the imam" without being subjected to fitna?!

src: O die ihr glaubt, entweiht nicht die Kultzeichen Allahs, noch den Schutzmonat, noch die Opfertiere, noch die Halsgehänge, noch die, die das geschützte Haus aufsuchen, indem sie nach Huld von ihrem Herrn trachten und nach Wohlgefallen. - Wenn ihr den Weihezustand abgelegt habt, dann dürft ihr jagen. - Und der Haß, den ihr gegen (bestimmte) Leute hegt, weil sie euch von der geschützten Gebetsstätte abgehalten haben, soll euch ja nicht dazu bringen zu übertreten.
ref: O you who believe, do not violate the (sanctity of) offerings to God, nor the rites of the holy month, nor sacrificial cattle with garlands (that are brought to the Ka'bah), nor of the people who flock to the Holy House seeking the bounties of their Lord, and His pleasure. Hunt when you have laid aside the robe of the pilgrim.
draft: O ye who believe! Profane not Allah's monuments nor the Sacred Month nor the offerings nor the garlands, nor those repairing to the Sacred House, seeking the grace and pleasure of their Lord. But when ye have left the sacred territory, then go hunting (if ye will). And let not your hatred of a folk who (once) stopped your going to the inviolable place of worship seduce you to transgress;
hil: Do not defile the monuments and symbols of Allah, nor the sacred month, nor the offerings, nor the garlands, nor those heading for the Sacred House, seeking grace from their Lord and His approval. And once you have completed the state of consecration, you are allowed to hunt. But do not let the hatred you harbor against certain people who prevented you from the protected place of worship lead you to transgress. Help each other to piety and fear of God, but do not help each other to sin and transgression.
compare: Do not defile the monuments and symbols of Allah, nor the sacred month, nor the offerings, nor the garlands, nor those heading for the Sacred House, seeking grace from their Lord and His approval. And once you have completed the state of consecration, you are allowed to hunt. But do not let the hatred you harbor against certain people who prevented you from the protected place of worship lead you to transgress. Help each other to piety and fear of God, but do not help each other to sin and transgression.

src: Das ist die Huld Gottes. Und Gott genügt als der, der Bescheid weiß.
ref: This is a favour from God; and sufficient is God, the all-knowing.
draft: "This is the grace of God. And God suffices as the one who knows best".
hil: "This is the grace of Allah. And Allah suffices as the one who knows best."
compare: "This is the grace of God. And God suffices as the one who knows best".

src: Sag: "Sollen wir euch eine Mitteilung über die Erfolglosesten beim Handeln machen?!"
ref: Say: "Shall I tell you whose labour will be wasted?
draft: Say: "Should we give you a message about the least successful in trading?!"
hil: Say, 'Should we give you a message about the least successful in trading?!'
compare: Say, 'Should we give you a message about the least successful in trading?!'

src: Doch ALLAH leitet recht, wen ER will.
ref: Allah guides whom He will.
draft: But ALLAH guides right whoever He wants.
hil: Indeed Allah guides whom He wills to the right path.
compare: Indeed Allah guides whom He wills to the right path.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH bleibt nichts verborgen, weder auf Erden noch im Himmel.
ref: There is nothing in the earth and the heavens that is hidden from God.
draft: Surely, Allah knows everything, neither on earth nor in heaven is anything hidden from Him.
hil: Verily, Allah knows everything, on earth and in heaven, nothing is hidden from Him.
compare: Surely, Allah knows everything, neither on earth nor in heaven is anything hidden from Him.

src: Euch werden weder eure Verwandten noch eure Kinder nützen. Am Tag der Auferstehung richtet ALLAH unter euch. Und ALLAH ist dessen, was ihr tut, allsehend.
ref: Neither your relations nor your offspring will in the least benefit you, on the Day of Resurrection; He will separate you from them; and Allah is seeing your deeds.
draft: You will not benefit from either your relatives or your children. On the day of resurrection, Allah will judge among you. And Allah is all-seeing of what you do.
hil: On the Day of Resurrection, neither your relatives nor your children will benefit you. Allah will judge among you, and Allah is all-seeing of what you do.
compare: On the Day of Resurrection, neither your relatives nor your children will benefit you. Allah will judge among you, and Allah is all-seeing of what you do.

src: Und dein HERR ist Der Allvergebende, mit der Allgnade. Würde ER sie belangen für das, was sie sich erworben haben, hätte ER ihnen die Peinigung beschleunigt. Nein, sondern für sie ist ein Termin bestimmt, vor dem sie keine Zuflucht finden werden.
ref: And your Lord is the Oft Forgiver, the Merciful; if He seized them for their deeds, He would soon send the punishment upon them; but for them is an appointed time from which they will not find any refuge.
draft: And your LORD is The Most Forgiving, with the All-Grace. If HE were to take them to task for what they have earned, HE would have hastened their punishment. No, but there is a time appointed for them beyond which they will find no refuge.
hil: And your Lord is The Most Forgiving, full of grace. If He were to take them to task for what they have earned, He would have hastened their punishment. No, rather a term is appointed for them that they will have no refuge from.
compare: And your LORD is The Most Forgiving, with the All-Grace. If HE were to take them to task for what they have earned, HE would have hastened their punishment. No, but there is a time appointed for them beyond which they will find no refuge.

src: Aber sie schnitten ihr die Sehnen durch. Da sagte er: "Genießt (euer Leben) in eurer Wohnstätte noch drei Tage lang.
ref: But they hamstrung her, and so He said, “Enjoy yourselves in your homes for three days.
draft: But they cut her tendons. He said, "Enjoy (your life) in your dwelling for three more days."
hil: They cut her tendons, then he said, "Enjoy your life in your dwelling for three more days."
compare: They cut her tendons, then he said, "Enjoy your life in your dwelling for three more days."

src: Wenn ihr sie anruft, hören sie euer Bittgebet nicht, und wenn sie (es) auch hörten, würden sie euch doch nicht erhören. Und am Tag der Auferstehung verleugnen sie, daß ihr (sie Allah) beigesellt habt. Keiner kann dir kundtun wie Einer, der Kenntnis von allem hat.
ref: If you call them, they do not hear your call; and supposedly if they heard it, they cannot fulfil your needs; and on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your ascribed partnership; and none will inform you like Him Who informs.
draft: If you call them, they will not hear your supplication, and even if they did, they would not answer you. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will deny that you associate partners with Allah. None can inform you like One who has knowledge of everything.
hil: If you call upon them, they will not hear your supplication, and even if they did, they would not answer you. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will deny that you associate partners with Allah. None can inform you like One who has knowledge of everything.
compare: If you call them, they will not hear your supplication, and even if they did, they would not answer you. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will deny that you associate partners with Allah. None can inform you like One who has knowledge of everything.

src: ER ist Der absolut Autarke!
ref: He is Rich (Free of all wants).
draft: He is the completely self-sufficient one!
hil: He is the Perfectly Self-sufficient One!
compare: He is the Perfectly Self-sufficient One!

src: O mein Volk, erfleht Vergebung von eurem Herrn, dann bekehrt euch reumütig zu Ihm; Er wird (den Segen) in reichlicher Weise vom Himmel über euch schicken und wird euch Kraft zu eurer Kraft hinzugeben. So wendet euch nicht als Schuldige ab."
ref: “And O my people! Seek forgiveness from your Lord, then incline towards Him in repentance – He will send abundant rain from the sky upon you and will give you much more strength than you have – and do not turn away committing crimes!”
draft: O my people, ask forgiveness from your Lord and then repent to Him. He will send down rain from the sky upon you in showers and increase you in strength [added blessings to your strength]. So do not turn away, [being] criminals.
hil: O my people, seek forgiveness from your Lord, then repent to Him remorsefully. He will send down abundant blessings upon you from the sky and will give you strength upon strength. So do not turn away as criminals.
compare: O my people, seek forgiveness from your Lord, then repent to Him remorsefully. He will send down abundant blessings upon you from the sky and will give you strength upon strength. So do not turn away as criminals.

src: Und wir erwarten für euch, daß ALLAH euch mit einer Peinigung trifft entweder (direkt) von Sich oder durch uns.
ref: Yet what we are waiting for you is the punishment of God, direct or through us.
draft: And we expect for you that ALLAH will inflict a punishment on you, either directly from Himself or through us.
hil: We expect that Allah will inflict a punishment on you, either directly from Himself or through us.
compare: And we expect for you that ALLAH will inflict a punishment on you, either directly from Himself or through us.

src: Diejenige, in deren Haus er war, suchte ihn dann gegen seine Neigung zu verführen.
ref: Now the woman in whose house he was solicited him, and closed the doors on them.
draft: The one in whose house he was then tried to seduce him against his will.
hil: The one in whose house he was then tried to seduce him against his will.
compare: The one in whose house he was then tried to seduce him against his will.

src: über diese Welt und das Jenseits. Sie befragen dich über die Waisen.
ref: (Their bearings) on this life and the Hereafter.
draft: about this world and the hereafter. They ask you about the orphans.
hil: They inquire of thee about the world and the Hereafter. They ask thee concerning orphans.
compare: about this world and the hereafter. They ask you about the orphans.

src: Ihre Angelegenheit steht (allein) bei Allah. Hierauf wird Er ihnen kundtun, was sie zu tun pflegten.
ref: Their case rests with God; then He will inform them of what they used to do.
draft: Your matter is solely with Allah. Then He will inform you of what you used to do.
hil: Your matter is solely with Allah. Then He will inform you of what you used to do.
compare: Your matter is solely with Allah. Then He will inform you of what you used to do.

src: Warum verbietest du das, was Allah dir erlaubt hat, um nach der Zufriedenheit deiner Frauen zu trachten?
ref: Why do you ban (for yourself) that which Allah has made lawful to you, seeking to please your wives?
draft: Why do you forbid what Allah has allowed you in order to seek the satisfaction of your wives?
hil: Why do you forbid what Allah has allowed you, just to seek the satisfaction of your wives?
compare: Why do you forbid what Allah has allowed you in order to seek the satisfaction of your wives?

src: (Das sind) diejenigen, die zu ihren Brüdern sagten, während sie daheim blieben: "Hätten sie uns gehorcht, wären sie nicht erschlagen worden."
ref: who said of their brothers (and they themselves held back), 'Had they obeyed us, they would not have been slain.'
draft: "These are" the ones who said to their brothers while staying at home, "If only they had listened to us, they would not have been killed."
hil: "These are" those who said to their brothers while staying at home, "If only they had listened to us, they would not have been killed."
compare: "These are" those who said to their brothers while staying at home, "If only they had listened to us, they would not have been killed."

src: ER ließ beide Meere aufeinandertreffen,
ref: He has set two seas in motion that flow side by side together,
draft: He caused both seas to meet.
hil: He caused both seas to meet.
compare: He caused both seas to meet.

src: Sind sie dir dann aber ungehorsam, so sprich: "lch bin schuldlos an dem, was ihr tut."
ref: If they do not obey you, tell them: "I am not responsible for what you do."
draft: Are you disobedient to them, then say: "I am innocent of what you do."
hil: "Ich bin unschuldig an dem, was ihr tut", say if they are disobedient to you.
compare: Are you disobedient to them, then say: "I am innocent of what you do."

src: Und (auch) mit denen, die sagen: "Wir sind Christen'" haben Wir ihr Abkommen getroffen. Aber dann vergaßen sie einen Teil von dem, womit sie ermahnt worden waren.
ref: And with those who say 'We are Christians' We took compact; and they have forgotten a portion of that they were reminded of.
draft: And (also) with those who say, "We are Christians," We have made their agreement. But then they forgot a part of what they were reminded of.
hil: And We have made a covenant with those who say, "We are Christians," but then they forgot a part of what they were reminded of.
compare: And We have made a covenant with those who say, "We are Christians," but then they forgot a part of what they were reminded of.

src: Und sie können es nicht vereiteln.
ref: They cannot get the better (of Us).
draft: And they cannot thwart it.
hil: And they cannot thwart it.
compare: And they cannot thwart it.

src: Du bist ja der Steinigung würdig.
ref: [Tafsir At-Tabari]
draft: You are worthy of stoning.
hil: You are worthy of stoning.
compare: You are worthy of stoning.

src: Gibt es denn einen (anderen) Gott neben Allah? Nein!
ref: Is there another god with God?
draft: Is there any other god besides Allah? No!
hil: Is there any god besides Allah? No!
compare: Is there any god besides Allah? No!

src: "Wurde den Kafir vergolten, was sie zu machen pflegten?"
ref: Will not the infidels pay for what they had done?
draft: "Did the infidel get what they used to do?"
hil: Did the infidel receive the recompense for what they used to do?
compare: Did the infidel receive the recompense for what they used to do?

src: Sind diese gleich? Preis sei Allah!
ref: Are they equal in comparison?
draft: Are they the same? Price be to Allah!
hil: Are these the same? Glory be to Allah!
compare: Are these the same? Glory be to Allah!

src: Also hinsichtlich derjenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht und gottgefällig Gutes getan haben, diese sind in einem Garten, sie freuen sich.
ref: Those who believed and did the right will be feasted in a rich, well-watered meadow.
draft: Regarding those who internalized the faith and did good deeds pleasing to God, they are in a garden, they rejoice.
hil: Regarding those who have internalized faith and done good deeds pleasing to God, they are in a garden and rejoice.
compare: Regarding those who have internalized faith and done good deeds pleasing to God, they are in a garden and rejoice.

src: Dann nachdem von ihren Herzen der Schrecken weggenommen worden war, sagten sie: "Was sagte denn euer HERR?" Sie sagten: "Die Wahrheit!"
ref: When terror is lifted from their hearts, they shall say: 'What did your Lord say' 'The truth' they shall answer.
draft: Then, after the terror had been removed from their hearts, they said, "What did your lord say?" They said, "Truth!"
hil: After the fear was lifted from their hearts, they said, "What did your Lord say?" They said, "The truth!"
compare: After the fear was lifted from their hearts, they said, "What did your Lord say?" They said, "The truth!"

src: Sag: "Ich bin über euch kein Wakil."
ref: Say: "I am not a warden over you."
draft: Say: "I am not your trustee."
hil: Say: 'I am not your trustee.'
compare: Say: "I am not your trustee."

src: Dann gewiß, sie werden doch in Dschahannam hineingeworfen.
ref: Then they will indeed burn in Hell.
draft: Then certainly, they will be thrown into Jahannam.
hil: {'output': 'Then surely, they will be thrown into Jahannam.'}
compare: {'output': 'Then surely, they will be thrown into Jahannam.'}

src: Es gibt keinen Platz für euch hier, so kehrt um!"
ref: There is no stand (possible) for you (against the enemy attack!)
draft: "There is no room for you here, so turn around!"
hil: There is no place for you here, so turn back!
compare: "There is no room for you here, so turn around!"

src: Sie sagten: "O unser Vater, wir gingen, um einen Wettlauf zu machen, und ließen Yusuf bei unseren Sachen zurück. Da fraß ihn der Wolf.
ref: And said: "We went racing with one another and left Joseph to guard our things when a wolf devoured him.
draft: They said: "O our father, we went to race and left Joseph with our things. Then the wolf ate him."
hil: They said: "O our father, we went to race and left Joseph with our things. Then the wolf ate him."
compare: They said: "O our father, we went to race and left Joseph with our things. Then the wolf ate him."

src: Doch wenn eine entscheidende Sura herabgesandt wird und darin von Kampf die Rede ist, dann siehst du die, in deren Herzen Krankheit ist, dich mit dem Blick eines (Menschen) anschauen, der im Sterben von Ohnmacht befallen wird; also wehe ihnen!
ref: But when a categorical Surah is revealed that mentions war, you should see those who are sceptical staring at you like a man in the swoon of death. Alas the woe for them!
draft: But when a decisive Surah is sent down and it is about fighting, then you see those in whose hearts is disease looking at you with the look of one overcome by death. So woe to them!
hil: And when a decisive Surah is sent down, wherein fighting is mentioned, you will see those in whose hearts is a disease looking at you with the look of one dying from fainting. So woe to them!
compare: But when a decisive Surah is sent down and it is about fighting, then you see those in whose hearts is disease looking at you with the look of one overcome by death. So woe to them!

src: Zweifellos sind sie es, die im Jenseits die Verlierenden sein werden.
ref: They will surely be losers in the life to come,
draft: Undoubtedly, they will be the losers in the afterlife.
hil: Undoubtedly, they are the ones who will be the losers in the afterlife.
compare: Undoubtedly, they are the ones who will be the losers in the afterlife.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der diejenigen von den Schriftbesitzern, die Kufr betrieben haben, von ihren Wohnstätten zur ersten Vertreibung heraustreiben ließ. Ihr dachtet nicht, daß sie herauskommen werden, und sie dachten, daß ihre Burgen sie vor ALLAH schützen würden. Dann kam ALLAH zu ihnen von da, womit sie nicht rechneten, und warf in ihre Herzen den Schrecken. Sie zerstörten ihre Häuser mit ihren eigenen Händen und den Händen der Mumin. So zieht (daraus) eine Lehre, ihr mit Einblick!
ref: It is He Who expelled the disbelievers among the People given the Book(s) from their homes, for their first gathering; you did not expect them to leave, whereas they assumed that their fortresses would save them from Allah, so Allah’s command came to them from a place they had not imagined; and He instilled awe in their hearts, so they ruin their own houses by their own hands and at the hands of the Muslims; therefore learn a lesson, O those who can perceive!
draft: He is the one who expelled those from the people of the Scripture who committed disbelief from their homes at the first expulsion. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah ; but [the decree of] Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take warning, O people of vision.
hil: He is the One who drove out those among the people of the Book who disbelieved from their homes at the first gathering. You did not think that they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would defend them from Allah. But then Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts. They destroyed their homes by their own hands and by those of the believers. So take a lesson from this, O people of insight!
compare: He is the one who expelled those from the people of the Scripture who committed disbelief from their homes at the first expulsion. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah ; but [the decree of] Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take warning, O people of vision.

src: Einer Seele wird nicht auferlegt, außer was sie vermag.
ref: No person shall have a burden laid on him greater than he can bear.
draft: A soul is not burdened with more than it is able to bear.
hil: A soul is not burdened with more than it is capable of.
compare: A soul is not burdened with more than it is able to bear.

src: So handelten (auch) diejenigen, die vor ihnen waren. Obliegt denn den Gesandten etwas anderes als die deutliche Übermittlung (der Botschaft)?
ref: So did those before them; yet is aught for the Messengers, but to deliver the manifest Message?
draft: So did (also) those who came before them. Do the messengers have any other task than the clear transmission (of the message)?
hil: Those before them acted in the same way. Are the messengers tasked with anything other than the clear transmission of the message?
compare: Those before them acted in the same way. Are the messengers tasked with anything other than the clear transmission of the message?

src: Gewiß, die Stunde wird sicher eintreffen. So übe schöne Nachsicht.
ref: Surely the Hour is coming; so pardon thou, with a gracious pardoning.
draft: Surely, the hour will certainly come. So practice beautiful patience.
hil: Indeed, the hour will surely come. So practice beautiful patience.
compare: Surely, the hour will certainly come. So practice beautiful patience.

src: Doch sie folgten ihren Neigungen.
ref: And they follow their own desires?
draft: But they followed their inclinations.
hil: But they followed their inclinations.
compare: But they followed their inclinations.

src: Und unter den Menschen gibt es auch manch einen, der sich selbst veräußern würde im Streben nach dem Wohlwollen Gottes.
ref: And of mankind is he who would sell himself, seeking the Pleasure of Allah.
draft: And among people there are also some who would sell themselves in the pursuit of the goodwill of God.
hil: And among people, there are also some who would sell themselves in pursuit of the goodwill of God.
compare: And among people, there are also some who would sell themselves in pursuit of the goodwill of God.

src: Bereits ist zu euch doch eine Bestätigung von eurem HERRN gekommen. Und WIR haben euch ein klares Licht hinabgesandt.
ref: Verily, there has come to you a convincing proof (Prophet Muhammad SAW) from your Lord, and We sent down to you a manifest light (this Quran).
draft: Already a confirmation has come to you from your Lord. And We have sent down to you a clear light.
hil: A confirmation from your Lord has already come to you. And We have sent down to you a clear light.
compare: Already a confirmation has come to you from your Lord. And We have sent down to you a clear light.

src: Und wenn ihr zum Gebet ruft, treiben sie damit ihren Spott und Scherz. Dies (ist so), weil sie Leute sind, die es nicht begreifen.
ref: (Nor make friends with) those who, when you call (the faithful) to prayer, make mock of it and jest, because they do not understand.
draft: And when you call for prayer, they make fun and joke about it. This is because they are people who do not understand.
hil: When you call them to prayer, they ridicule and make fun of it. This is because they are people who do not comprehend.
compare: When you call them to prayer, they ridicule and make fun of it. This is because they are people who do not comprehend.

src: Nein, ihre Herzen befinden sich davor in abgründiger Achtlosigkeit.
ref: But their hearts are heedless of this.
draft: No, their hearts are in abyssal carelessness beforehand.
hil: No, their hearts are in profound neglect beforehand.
compare: No, their hearts are in profound neglect beforehand.

src: Dann lege auf jeden Berg ein Stück von ihnen, und dann rufe sie.
ref: Scatter them over the mountain-tops, then call them back.
draft: Then place a piece of them on each mountain, and then call them.
hil: Then place a piece of them on each mountain and call them.
compare: Then place a piece of them on each mountain and call them.

src: Und wenn sie (die Mumin-Dienerinnen) verheiratet sind und dann Unzucht begehen, dann ist ihnen die Hälfte des Strafmaßes auferlegt, das für freie Frauen vorgesehen ist.
ref: But if they are married and guilty of adultery, inflict on them half the punishment (enjoined) for gentlewomen.
draft: And if they (the Moomin servants) are married and then commit adultery, then they are subject to half the penalty provided for free women.
hil: If the Moomin servant women are married and then commit adultery, they are subjected to half of the penalty that is prescribed for free women.
compare: And if they (the Moomin servants) are married and then commit adultery, then they are subject to half the penalty provided for free women.

src: Aber Allah ist Erhaben über das, was sie (Ihm) beigesellen.
ref: But God is above what they ascribe to Him.
draft: But Allah is exalted above what they associate with Him.
hil: Allah is exalted above what they associate with Him.
compare: But Allah is exalted above what they associate with Him.

src: Darum übe Vergebung in schöner Weise.
ref: So turn away (from them) with a grace.
draft: Therefore practice forgiveness in a beautiful way.
hil: Therefore, practice forgiveness in a beautiful manner.
compare: Therefore, practice forgiveness in a beautiful manner.

src: Und betört hat euch in bezug auf Gott der Betörer.
ref: And the chief deceiver (Satan) deceived you in respect of Allah."
draft: And the beguiler has beguiled you regarding God.
hil: The deceiver has beguiled you with regard to God.
compare: And the beguiler has beguiled you regarding God.

src: Bereits kam zu euch Unser Gesandter, um euch nach einer (langen) Zeit, in der Gesandte ausgeblieben sind, (die Schrift) zu erklären, damit ihr nicht sagt: "Zu uns kam weder ein Überbringer froher Botschaft, noch ein Ermahner." So kam zu euch bereits sowohl ein Überbringer froher Botschaft als auch ein Ermahner.
ref: Indeed this Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) of Ours has come to you, revealing to you Our commands, after the Noble Messengers had stopped arriving for ages, for you might claim, “Never did any Harbinger of Glad Tidings or Herald of Warning come to us” – so this Harbinger of Glad Tidings and Herald of Warning has come to you; and Allah is Able to do all things.
draft: Already Our messenger came to you to explain (the scripture) to you after a period of time without messengers, lest you say, "No bringer of good news or warner came to us." So there has come to you a bringer of good news and a warner.
hil: Our messenger has already come to you to explain the scripture to you after a period of time without messengers, so that you do not say: "No bringer of good news or warner came to us." Thus, a bringer of good news and a warner has already come to you.
compare: Our messenger has already come to you to explain the scripture to you after a period of time without messengers, so that you do not say: "No bringer of good news or warner came to us." Thus, a bringer of good news and a warner has already come to you.

src: Und ich erkläre mich nicht selbst für unschuldig.
ref: "And I free not myself (from the blame).
draft: And I do not declare myself innocent.
hil: And I do not declare myself innocent.
compare: And I do not declare myself innocent.

src: (O Du) Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde, Du bist mein Schutzherr im Diesseits und Jenseits. Berufe mich als (Dir) ergeben ab und nimm mich unter die Rechtschaffenen auf."
ref: You are my Wali (Protector, Helper, Supporter, Guardian, etc.) in this world and in the Hereafter, cause me to die as a Muslim (the one submitting to Your Will), and join me with the righteous."
draft: "(O You) creator of heaven and earth, You are my protector in this life and the hereafter. Call me your devoted servant and take me among the righteous."
hil: (O You) Creator of the heavens and the earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Summon me as your devoted servant and admit me among the righteous.
compare: (O You) Creator of the heavens and the earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Summon me as your devoted servant and admit me among the righteous.

src: Weshalb haltet ihr diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, von dem Gebotenen von ALLAH ab, im Streben danach, es zu verfälschen, während ihr wißt?"
ref: Why do you stop those who have believed, from the Path of Allah, seeking to make it seem crooked, while you (yourselves) are witnesses [to Muhammad SAW as a Messenger of Allah and Islam (Allah's Religion, i.e. to worship none but Him Alone)]?
draft: Why do you keep those who have internalized the Iman from obeying what is commanded by ALLAH, striving to distort it, while you know?
hil: Why do you keep those who have internalized the faith from obeying what is commanded by ALLAH, striving to distort it, while you know?
compare: Why do you keep those who have internalized the Iman from obeying what is commanded by ALLAH, striving to distort it, while you know?

src: Ein solcher (Gott) kann wahrlich (auch) die Toten wieder lebendig machen. Und Er hat Macht zu allen Dingen.
ref: Verily. He is the Quickener of the dead, and He is over every-thing potent.
draft: Such (God) can truly (also) make the dead alive again. And He has power over all things.
hil: Output: Such (God) can truly make the dead alive again, and He has power over all things.
compare: Output: Such (God) can truly make the dead alive again, and He has power over all things.

src: Allah liebt nicht, wer eingebildet und prahlerisch ist,
ref: God does not surely love those who are arrogant and boastful,
draft: "Allah does not love those who are conceited and boastful."
hil: Allah does not love those who are conceited and boastful.
compare: "Allah does not love those who are conceited and boastful."

src: Fast hätten sie dich verführt (und) von dem (abgebracht), was Wir dir offenbart haben, damit du gegen Uns etwas anderes erdichtest.
ref: They almost lured you away from what We have revealed to you, so that you would invent something else in Our name.
draft: Almost they would have led you astray and turned you away from what We have revealed to you, so you would fabricate something else against Us.
hil: They almost led you astray and turned you away from what We have revealed to you, so that you would fabricate something else against Us.
compare: They almost led you astray and turned you away from what We have revealed to you, so that you would fabricate something else against Us.

src: Und kommt dem Besitz der Waise nicht nahe, es sei denn zu ihrem Besten, bis sie ihre Volljährigkeit erreicht hat.
ref: And that you approach not the property of the orphan, save in the fairer manner, until he is of age.
draft: And do not come close to the property of the orphan, unless it is for their own benefit, until they have reached adulthood.
hil: Do not approach the property of the orphan, unless it is for their own benefit, until they have reached adulthood.
compare: And do not come close to the property of the orphan, unless it is for their own benefit, until they have reached adulthood.

src: Sollten sie über euch die Oberhand gewinnen, werden sie euch steinigen oder euch in ihre Gemeinschaft umkehren lassen.
ref: For, if they appear in front of you, they will stone you to death or restore you to their religion.
draft: If they gain the upper hand over you, they will stone you or turn you into their community.
hil: If they gain the upper hand over you, they will stone you or convert you to their community.
compare: If they gain the upper hand over you, they will stone you or turn you into their community.

src: Diejenigen von den Kindern Israils, die Kufr betrieben haben, wurden aus dem Munde von Dawud und von 'Isa Ibnu-Maryam verflucht. Dies war wegen dem, was sie sich widersetzt haben, und dem, was sie zu übertreten pflegten.
ref: Cursed were disbelievers among the children of Israel by David and Jesus, son of Mary, because they rebelled and transgressed the bounds.
draft: Those of the Children of Israel who committed disbelief were cursed by the mouths of David and Isa son of Maryam. This was because of what they used to disobey and transgress.
hil: Those of the Children of Israel who committed disbelief were cursed by David and Isa, son of Maryam. This was because of their disobedience and transgressions.
compare: Those of the Children of Israel who committed disbelief were cursed by David and Isa, son of Maryam. This was because of their disobedience and transgressions.

src: Und ALLAH macht gewiß kenntlich diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, und ER macht gewiß kenntlich die Munafiq.
ref: God will surely know the believers and know the hypocrites.
draft: And Allah certainly reveals those who have internalized faith, and He certainly reveals the hypocrites.
hil: Surely, Allah distinguishes those who have internalized faith and He distinguishes the hypocrites.
compare: And Allah certainly reveals those who have internalized faith, and He certainly reveals the hypocrites.

src: Aber wir werden dir ganz gewiß Zauberei gleicher Art bringen. So setze zwischen uns und dir eine Verabredung(szeit) fest, die weder wir noch du verfehlen werden, an einem Ort, der (uns allen) gleichermaßen recht ist."
ref: “So we will also produce before you a similar magic, therefore set up an agreed time between us and you, from which neither we nor you shall turn away, at a level place.”
draft: "But we will certainly bring you magic of the same kind. So set a meeting time and place between us and you that neither we nor you will miss, at a place that is equally convenient for all of us."
hil: We will certainly bring you magic of the same kind. So let us set a mutually convenient time and place for a meeting between us and you, which neither we nor you will miss.
compare: "But we will certainly bring you magic of the same kind. So set a meeting time and place between us and you that neither we nor you will miss, at a place that is equally convenient for all of us."

src: Bitte für uns um die Vergebung unserer Verfehlungen, denn wir waren gewiß Verfehlende."
ref: Seek forgiveness for our sins, for we were indeed guilty.”
draft: Please ask for the forgiveness of our shortcomings, for we were certainly erring.
hil: Please pray for the forgiveness of our faults, for we were certainly faulting.
compare: Please pray for the forgiveness of our faults, for we were certainly faulting.

src: Dann werden sie bereuen, was sie in ihren Herzen verbargen.
ref: Then will they be repentant of what they had concealed in their hearts.
draft: Then they will regret what they hid in their hearts.
hil: They will then regret what they concealed in their hearts.
compare: Then they will regret what they hid in their hearts.

src: Emporgehoben und rein gehalten,
ref: Exalted and holy,
draft: Lifted up and held in.
hil: Lifted up and kept clean.
compare: Lifted up and held in.

src: ER verhilft zum Sieg, wem ER will.
ref: He supports whomever He wills.
draft: He helps to victory whom He wills.
hil: He helps whom He will; He is all-mighty, ever-merciful.
compare: He helps to victory whom He wills.

src: Unser HERR! Ich ließ von meiner Nachkommenschaft in einem unfruchtbaren Tal nieder - bei Deinem Muharram-Haus, unser HERR! - damit sie das rituelle Gebet ordnungsgemäß verrichten.
ref: I have settled some of my children, O Lord, in a barren valley near Your sacred House, so that, O our Lord, they may be constant in devotion.
draft: "Our LORD! I have settled some of my offspring in an uncultivable valley near Your sacred House (Kaaba) in order, Our LORD, that they may establish the prayer."
hil: Our Lord! I have settled some of my offspring in a barren valley near Your Holy House, Our Lord, so that they may perform the prayer properly.
compare: Our Lord! I have settled some of my offspring in a barren valley near Your Holy House, Our Lord, so that they may perform the prayer properly.

src: Und WIR gaben 'Isa Ibnu-Maryam, die Wunderzeichen und unterstützten ihn mit Ruhhul-qudus.
ref: And We gave 'Iesa (Jesus), the son of Maryam (Mary), clear signs and supported him with Ruh-ul-Qudus [Jibrael (Gabriel)].
draft: And WE gave 'Isa Ibn Maryam the signs and supported him with the Holy Spirit.
hil: And We gave 'Isa Ibn Maryam clear signs and supported him with the Holy Spirit.
