compare: And We gave 'Isa Ibn Maryam clear signs and supported him with the Holy Spirit.

src: Sie haben doch das, was darin steht, erforscht.
ref: And they have read this in it.
draft: You have researched what's written in it, haven't you?
hil: You have indeed explored what is stated therein.
compare: You have indeed explored what is stated therein.

src: Als ihr es mit euren Zungen übernahmt und ihr mit eurem Mund das ausspracht, wovon ihr keine Kenntnis hattet, da hieltet ihr es für eine geringe Sache, während es vor Allah eine große war.
ref: When you talked about it and said what you did not know, and took it lightly -- though in the sight of God it was serious --
draft: As you took it on with your tongues and spoke with your mouths what you had no knowledge of, you deemed it a little thing whereas in the sight of Allah it is most serious.
hil: When you took it on with your tongues and spoke with your mouths of that which had no knowledge, you considered it to be a trivial matter while in the sight of Allah it was of great importance.
compare: When you took it on with your tongues and spoke with your mouths of that which had no knowledge, you considered it to be a trivial matter while in the sight of Allah it was of great importance.

src: Sie durch andere zu ersetzen, die besser sind als sie. Und niemand kann Uns voraus sein.
ref: To bring better people than they in their place; and they will not be able to thwart Us.
draft: They are to be replaced by others who are better than them. And no one can surpass us.
hil: To replace them with others who are better than them. And no one can surpass us.
compare: They are to be replaced by others who are better than them. And no one can surpass us.

src: Am Tage, wenn die Heuchler und die Heuchlerinnen zu den Gläubigen sagen werden: "Wartet auf uns!
ref: On the Day when the hypocrites men and women will say to the believers: "Wait for us!
draft: On the day when the hypocrites, both men and women, will say to the believers: "Wait for us!
hil: On the day when the hypocrites, both men and women, will say to the believers: 'Wait for us!'
compare: On the day when the hypocrites, both men and women, will say to the believers: "Wait for us!

src: (Es wird ihnen) wie den Leuten Pharaos und denen (ergehen), die vor ihnen waren: Sie hielten die Zeichen ihres Herrn für eine Lüge, darum ließen Wir sie zugrunde gehen um ihrer Sünden willen, und Wir ertränkten die Leute Pharaos; sie alle waren Frevler.
ref: This was the case with the people of Pharaoh and those before them, who rejected the signs of their Lord and were destroyed for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh as they were oppressors.
draft: "They will suffer the fate of the people of Pharaoh and those before them, who rejected the Signs of their Lord: We destroyed them for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh - all were wrongdoers."
hil: They will suffer the same fate as the people of Pharaoh and those before them: they disbelieved in the signs of their Lord and thus We destroyed them for their sins. And We drowned the people of Pharaoh, and they were all wrongdoers.
compare: "They will suffer the fate of the people of Pharaoh and those before them, who rejected the Signs of their Lord: We destroyed them for their sins, and We drowned the people of Pharaoh - all were wrongdoers."

src: Und sie freuen sich dabei über das, was Gott ihnen von seiner Huld zukommen ließ.
ref: Exulting in that which Allah hath vouchsafed them of His grace.
draft: And they rejoice in what God has bestowed upon them of His grace.
hil: And they rejoice in what Allah has bestowed upon them of His grace.
compare: And they rejoice in what God has bestowed upon them of His grace.

src: Sag: "Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, ich handle auch.
ref: Tell them: "O my people, go on acting on your part, I am acting on mine.
draft: Say: "My people! Act according to your positions, I do the same."
hil: Say, O my people! Act according to your positions, and I will act according to mine.
compare: Say, O my people! Act according to your positions, and I will act according to mine.

src: Genügt es ihnen denn nicht, daß Wir das Buch auf dich hinabgesandt haben, das ihnen verlesen wird?
ref: Is it not sufficient for them that We have revealed the Book to you which is read out to them?
draft: Is it not enough for them that We have sent down to you the Book which is recited to them?
hil: Does it not suffice for them that We have revealed to you the Book that is recited to them?
compare: Does it not suffice for them that We have revealed to you the Book that is recited to them?

src: Und hätte ALLAH ihnen die Deportation nicht bestimmt, hätte ER sie doch im Diesseits gepeinigt.
ref: Had God not decreed exile for them, He would have punished them in this life.
draft: And if Allah had not destined deportation for them, he would certainly have punished them in this life.
hil: If Allah had not decreed for them deportation, He would have certainly inflicted them with torment in this world.
compare: If Allah had not decreed for them deportation, He would have certainly inflicted them with torment in this world.

src: Ihm gehören die Schönsten Namen.
ref: His are all the names beautiful.
draft: "He has the most beautiful names."
hil: He owns the most beautiful names.
compare: He owns the most beautiful names.

src: Und es gibt nichts, was kleiner ist als dies oder größer, das nicht in einem deutlichen Buch stünde.
ref: Not what is less than that or what is greater than that but is (written) in a Clear Record. (Tafsir At-Tabari.
draft: And there is nothing that is smaller or larger than this that is not written in a clear book.
hil: And there is nothing smaller or greater than this that is not written in a clear book.
compare: And there is nothing smaller or greater than this that is not written in a clear book.

src: Wer aber jetzt horcht, der findet, daß eine Sternschnuppe auf ihn lauert.
ref: But he who listeneth now findeth a flame in wait for him;
draft: But whoever listens now, finds that a shooting star is lurking on him.
hil: Whoever listens now will find a shooting star waiting for him.
compare: Whoever listens now will find a shooting star waiting for him.

src: Dann wird ihre Heimstätte die Hölle sein - welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: What a miserable resort.
draft: Then their home will be hell - what a terrible storage place!
hil: Their residence will be hell - what a terrible storage place!
compare: Their residence will be hell - what a terrible storage place!

src: Einem jeden von ihnen wird zuteil, was er an Schuld erworben hat.
ref: Each person among them bears his share in the sin.
draft: Each of them receives what he has earned in guilt.
hil: Each of them shall receive what he has acquired in guilt.
compare: Each of them shall receive what he has acquired in guilt.

src: "Am Tag, wenn sie im Feuer der Fitna unterzogen werden."
ref: The day they will be burnt in the Fire,
draft: "On the day they are subjected to the fire of Fitna."
hil: On the day when they are subjected to the fire of Fitna, their faith will not benefit anyone who did not believe before, or did not do good works through their faith. Say: 'Just wait, we are waiting too.'
compare: "On the day they are subjected to the fire of Fitna."

src: Und dem Berg Sinai,
ref: The Mount Sinai,
draft: And the mountain Sinai,
hil: And to the mountain Sinai,
compare: And the mountain Sinai,

src: Sprich: "Allah weiß am besten wie lange sie verweilten." Ihm gehören das Verborgene der Himmel und der Erde. Wie sehend ist Er! Und wie hörend! Sie haben keinen Helfer außer Ihm, und Er teilt Seine Befehlsgewalt mit keinem.
ref: Say, “Allah well knows how long they stayed; for Him only are the hidden of the heavens and the earth; how well He sees and hears! They do not have any supporter besides Him; and He does not associate anyone in His command.”
draft: "Say: 'Allah knows best how long they stayed.' He has the secrets of the heavens and the earth. How seeing is He! And how hearing! They have no helper but Him, and He shares His command with none."
hil: Say: "Allah knows best how long they stayed." To Him belong the secrets of the heavens and the earth. How seeing is He! And how hearing! They have no helper but Him, and He shares His command with none.
compare: "Say: 'Allah knows best how long they stayed.' He has the secrets of the heavens and the earth. How seeing is He! And how hearing! They have no helper but Him, and He shares His command with none."

src: So rächten Wir uns an ihnen.
ref: So We punished them too.
draft: So we took revenge on them.
hil: So did We take revenge on them.
compare: So did We take revenge on them.

src: "Dies ist so, weil ihr ungläubig bliebt, als Allah allein angerufen wurde; doch als Ihm Götter zur Seite gesetzt wurden, da glaubtet ihr.
ref: This has come upon you because when God alone was invoked you disbelieved; but when partners were associated with Him, you believed.
draft: "This is so because you remained unbelieving when Allah alone was invoked, but when gods were set beside Him, then you believed."
hil: This is because you remained unbelieving when Allah was invoked alone, but when partners were ascribed to Him, you believed.
compare: This is because you remained unbelieving when Allah was invoked alone, but when partners were ascribed to Him, you believed.

src: Und Wir werden euch ganz gewiß mit ein wenig Furcht und Hunger und Mangel an Besitz, Seelen und Früchten prüfen.
ref: We will certainly test you with some fear and hunger, and some loss of possessions and lives and crops.
draft: And We will certainly test you with a little fear and hunger and a lack of possessions, souls and fruits.
hil: And We will certainly test you with a little fear, hunger, lack of possessions, souls, and fruits.
compare: And We will certainly test you with a little fear and hunger and a lack of possessions, souls and fruits.

src: Und zwischen uns und euch sind Feindschaft und Haß auf immer sichtbar geworden, bis ihr an Gott allein glaubt.»
ref: Enmity and hatred has surfaced between us and you, forever, until you believe in God alone.”
draft: "And enmity and hatred have become visible between us and you until you believe in God alone."
hil: And enmity and hatred have become visible between us and you until you believe in God alone.
compare: "And enmity and hatred have become visible between us and you until you believe in God alone."

src: Und was wäre dabei, wenn sie den Iman an ALLAH und an den Jüngsten Tag verinnerlicht und vom Rizq gegeben hätten, das ALLAH ihnen gewährte?! Und ALLAH ist immer über sie allwissend.
ref: What have they (to fear) if they believe in Allah and the Last Day and spend (aright) of that which Allah hath bestowed upon them, when Allah is ever Aware of them (and all they do)?
draft: And what would it matter if they internalized the imam to ALLAH and the Day of Judgment and gave from the Rizq that ALLAH granted them?! And ALLAH is always all-knowing about them.
hil: And what would it matter if they had internalized the imam into ALLAH and the Day of Judgment, and given from the provisions that ALLAH granted them?! And ALLAH is always all-knowing about them.
compare: And what would it matter if they internalized the imam to ALLAH and the Day of Judgment and gave from the Rizq that ALLAH granted them?! And ALLAH is always all-knowing about them.

src: ICH will von ihnen keinerlei Rizq, und ICH will nicht, daß sie Mich speisen.
ref: I want no sustenance from them nor do I want them to feed Me.
draft: I do not want any provision from them, and I do not want them to feed me.
hil: I do not want any sustenance from them, and I do not want them to feed me.
compare: I do not want any provision from them, and I do not want them to feed me.

src: Wahrhaftig!
ref: By your life!
draft: Truly!
hil: Truly!
compare: Truly!

src: Mein Besitz hat mir nichts genützt.
ref: Of no use was even my wealth.
draft: My possession has not benefited me.
hil: My possession has benefited me nothing.
compare: My possession has not benefited me.

src: Sie (, die anderen,) sagten: "O Musa, gewiß werden wir es niemals betreten, solange sie darin sind.
ref: They said: "O Moses, we shall never, never enter so long as they are there.
draft: They (the others) said, "O Musa, we will never enter it as long as they are in it."
hil: They said, 'O Musa, we will never enter it as long as they are in it.'
compare: They (the others) said, "O Musa, we will never enter it as long as they are in it."

src: Und du siehst die Schiffe es durchspalten, damit ihr nach etwas von seiner Huld strebt und auf daß ihr dankbar werdet.
ref: And thou seest therein ships cleaving the water, that ye may seek of His graCe, and that haply ye may give thanks.
draft: And you see the ships splitting it apart, so that you strive for something of his grace and may become grateful.
hil: And you see the ships plough through it so that you may seek of His bounties and, perhaps, be grateful.
compare: And you see the ships plough through it so that you may seek of His bounties and, perhaps, be grateful.

src: Oder wer ist anstelle des Erbarmers derjenige, der euch eine Heerschar wäre, die euch unterstützen könnte?
ref: What other army do you have to help you apart from Ar-Rahman?
draft: Or, instead of the Mercy, who would be the one to be a host for you, to support you?
hil: Who, other than the Merciful, would be the one to host a multitude that could support you?
compare: Who, other than the Merciful, would be the one to host a multitude that could support you?

src: Und ER ist Der Allgnädige, Der Allvergebende.
ref: He is all-merciful, all-forgiving.
draft: And HE is The Most Merciful, The Most Forgiving.
hil: He is the Oft-Forgiving, the Most Merciful.
compare: And HE is The Most Merciful, The Most Forgiving.

src: Und WIR ließen vom Himmel Wasser in Abgewogenheit fallen, dann ließen WIR es in der Erde unterbringen. Und WIR sind, um es vergehen zu lassen, doch allmächtig.
ref: We send down water from the sky in determined measure, and store it up in the earth; and We have power to drain it away.
draft: And WE caused water to come down from the sky in measured amounts, and settled it in the earth, and behold We are certainly able to withdraw it.
hil: We caused water to come down from the sky in measured amounts, and settled it in the earth, and behold We are certainly able to withdraw it.
compare: And WE caused water to come down from the sky in measured amounts, and settled it in the earth, and behold We are certainly able to withdraw it.

src: Und so haben wir euch in Verirrung fallen lassen, denn wir waren ja selbst in Verirrung gefallen."
ref: For we had led you astray. In fact we ourselves were astray."
draft: "And so we let you fall into error, because we ourselves had fallen into error."
hil: We had indeed let you fall into misguidance, for we ourselves had gone astray.
compare: We had indeed let you fall into misguidance, for we ourselves had gone astray.

src: Und, o mein Volk, dies ist die Kamelstute Gottes, euch zum Zeichen. Laßt sie auf Gottes Erde weiden und rührt sie nicht mit etwas Bösem an. Sonst ergreift euch eine baldige Pein.»
ref: And O my people! yonder is the she-camel of Allah: a sign unto you; so let her alone, feeding in Allah's land, and touch her not with evil, lest there may overtake you a torment nigh.
draft: And, O my people, this is the camel of God, as a sign for you. Let her graze on God's earth and do not touch her with anything evil. Otherwise, a swift punishment will seize you.
hil: And O my people, this is the she-camel of God, a sign for you. Allow her to graze on God's earth, and do not harm her with any evil, otherwise, a swift punishment will seize you.
compare: And, O my people, this is the camel of God, as a sign for you. Let her graze on God's earth and do not touch her with anything evil. Otherwise, a swift punishment will seize you.

src: An jenem Tage werden Wir die einen von ihnen wie Wogen gegen die anderen anstürmen lassen, und es wird in den Sur gestoßen.
ref: On that Day, We will leave them surging upon one another.
draft: On that day, we will let those of them surge against the others like waves, and it will be cast into the trumpet.
hil: On that day, We will let some of them surge against others like waves, and they will be pushed into the trumpet.
compare: On that day, We will let some of them surge against others like waves, and they will be pushed into the trumpet.

src: Allah hatte ja Wohlgefallen an den Gläubigen, als sie dir unter dem Baum den Treueid leisteten.
ref: God was pleased with the believers, when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.
draft: Allah was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.
hil: Allah was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.
compare: Allah was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you under the tree.

src: Schauen sie denn nicht zu den Kamelen, wie sie erschaffen sind
ref: Do they not then ponder how the clouds were formed;
draft: Do they not look at the camels, how they are created?
hil: Do they not look at camels, how they are created?
compare: Do they not look at camels, how they are created?

src: Er ging daran, das Schiff zu verfertigen. Und sooft Vornehme aus seinem Volk an ihm vorbeikamen, verhöhnten sie ihn.
ref: So he built the ark; and when groups of his people passed by him, they scoffed at him.
draft: He started to build the ship. And as often as nobles from his people passed by him, they mocked him.
hil: He began to build the ship. And every time nobles from his people passed by him, they mocked him.
compare: He started to build the ship. And as often as nobles from his people passed by him, they mocked him.

src: Fürchtet ihr sie etwa?
ref: Are you afraid of them?
draft: Do you fear them?
hil: Do you fear them?
compare: Do you fear them?

src: Ihr hättet unmöglich deren Bäume wachsen lassen können.
ref: It was not in your power to make trees germinate.
draft: You could not have possibly let their trees grow.
hil: You could not have possibly let their trees grow.
compare: You could not have possibly let their trees grow.

src: Begehren sie (etwa) Macht bei ihnen (zu finden)? Gewiß, alle Macht gehört Allah.
ref: Then (know that) undoubtedly all honour is for Allah.
draft: Do they desire power to be found with them? Certainly, all power belongs to Allah.
hil: They crave power to be found in them? Surely, all power belongs to Allah.
compare: Do they desire power to be found with them? Certainly, all power belongs to Allah.

src: An jenem Tag werden sie an derselben Pein teilhaben.
ref: So, they will become partners in punishment.
draft: On that day they will share the same torment.
hil: On that day they will share the same torment.
compare: On that day they will share the same torment.

src: Das Gute verweigert, Übertretungen begeht und Zweifel hegt,
ref: "Every obstructor of good, transgressor, and the sceptic,
draft: The good refuses, commits transgressions and harbors doubts.
hil: "The good refuses, commits transgressions, and harbors doubts."
compare: "The good refuses, commits transgressions, and harbors doubts."

src: Als ihnen aber vorgeschrieben wurde zu kämpfen, kehrten sie sich ab bis auf wenige von ihnen. Und Gott weiß Bescheid über die, die Unrecht tun.
ref: But when they were ordered to fight they turned away, except for a few; yet God knows the sinners.
draft: When they were commanded to fight, they turned away, except for a few of them. And God is aware of the wrongdoers.
hil: When they were commanded to fight, they turned away except for a few of them. And God is knowledgeable about those who do wrong.
compare: When they were commanded to fight, they turned away, except for a few of them. And God is aware of the wrongdoers.

src: Das ist der Lohn der Feinde Allahs: das (Höllen)feuer, in dem sie die ewige Wohnstätte haben, als Vergeltung dafür, daß sie Unsere Zeichen zu verleugnen pflegten.
ref: This is the requital for God's enemies: Hell, where they will have their lasting home, as punishment for denying Our revelations.
draft: "This is the recompense of Allah's enemies: the (Hell)fire, in which they will have an eternal home, as a recompense for denying Our signs."
hil: Verily, the Fire is the reward of Allah's enemies; therein they will have an eternal abode, as a recompense for denying Our signs.
compare: "This is the recompense of Allah's enemies: the (Hell)fire, in which they will have an eternal home, as a recompense for denying Our signs."

src: Und wenn ALLAH dich zu einer Gruppe von ihnen wiederkehren läßt und diese dich um Erlaubnis (zur Teilnahme) am Aufbruch bitten, dann sag: "Ihr werdet mit mir nie und nimmer aufbrechen und den bewaffneten Kampf gegen keinen Feind mit mir aufnehmen.
ref: If you come back to them by (the grace of) God, and they seek your permission to go (to fight), you should tell them: "You will never go out nor fight the enemy with me any more.
draft: And if ALLAH allows you to return to a group of them and they ask you for permission (to participate) in the departure, then say, "You will never break up with me and take up armed struggle against no enemy."
hil: If ALLAH allows you to return to a group of them and they ask you for permission to join the departure, then say: 'You will never and under no circumstances depart with me and undertake armed combat against any enemy along with me.'
compare: And if ALLAH allows you to return to a group of them and they ask you for permission (to participate) in the departure, then say, "You will never break up with me and take up armed struggle against no enemy."

src: Ich fürchte, daß sie mich der Lüge bezichtigen."
ref: Verily! I fear that they will belie me."
draft: "I'm afraid they'll accuse me of lying."
hil: I'm afraid they will accuse me of lying.
compare: "I'm afraid they'll accuse me of lying."

src: Sie schmiedeten Ränke, und Wir schmiedeten Ränke, ohne daß sie es merkten.
ref: They hatched up the plot; We also planned without their knowledge.
draft: They hatched plots, and we hatched plots without them realizing it.
hil: They hatched plots, and we hatched plots without them realizing it.
compare: They hatched plots, and we hatched plots without them realizing it.

src: Und wende dich nicht in Arroganz von den Leuten ab! Und gehe auf der Erde nicht freudenerregt!
ref: Do not hold men in contempt, and do not walk with hauteur on the earth.
draft: And do not turn away from people in arrogance! And do not walk on the earth exultantly!
hil: Do not turn away arrogantly from the people, nor walk exultantly on the Earth.
compare: Do not turn away arrogantly from the people, nor walk exultantly on the Earth.

src: Sag: "Weder Ihr wer-det nach dem zur Rechenschaft gezogen, was wir schwer verfehlten, noch wir werden nach dem zur Rechenschaft gezogen, was ihr tut."
ref: Say: "You will not be questioned about the sins that we have committed, nor shall we be questioned about your deeds."
draft: Say: "Neither you will be held accountable for what we greatly failed, nor will we be held accountable for what you do."
hil: Say: "Neither will you be held accountable for what we greatly failed, nor will we be held accountable for what you do."
compare: Say: "Neither will you be held accountable for what we greatly failed, nor will we be held accountable for what you do."

src: Bis zum Tag der bestimmten Zeit.»
ref: Till the appointed day."
draft: "Until the day of the specified time."
hil: "Until the day of the specified time."
compare: "Until the day of the specified time."

src: Und an dem Tage, wo die Stunde herankommt, werden die Schuldigen schwören, daß sie nicht länger als eine Stunde (auf Erden) weilten - so sehr sind sie an (Selbsttäuschung gewöhnt.
ref: The day Resurrection is set the sinners will swear: "We did not tarry more than an hour (and cannot be guilty)." That is how they have always been deceived.
draft: And on the day when the hour comes, the guilty ones will swear that they did not tarry (on earth) longer than an hour - so accustomed are they to self-deception.
hil: On the day when the hour comes, the guilty ones will swear that they did not tarry (on earth) longer than an hour, so accustomed are they to self-deception.
compare: And on the day when the hour comes, the guilty ones will swear that they did not tarry (on earth) longer than an hour - so accustomed are they to self-deception.

src: Sie hatten eine stärkere Kraft als ihr und mehr Vermögen und Kinder.
ref: They were more powerful than you, and had more wealth and children.
draft: They had a stronger power than her and more assets and children.
hil: They had a stronger power than you and more wealth and children.
compare: They had a stronger power than you and more wealth and children.

src: Und die Aussöhnung ist besser. Doch die Seelen sind der Habsucht zugeneigt.
ref: Reconciliation is good even though men's souls are swayed by greed.
draft: And reconciliation is better. But souls are inclined to greed.
hil: Reconciliation is better, but souls are inclined towards greed.
compare: Reconciliation is better, but souls are inclined towards greed.

src: Steh auf (zum Gebet) die ganze Nacht, bis auf einen kleinen Teil,
ref: Keep watch all the night except some,
draft: Get up (for prayer) all night, except for a small part.
hil: Stand up for prayer all night, except for a small part.
compare: Stand up for prayer all night, except for a small part.

src: (Von ihnen) sagen wir uns vor Dir los. Nicht uns dienten sie ja."
ref: We clear ourselves before You: They never worshipped us."
draft: We let go of them in front of you. They did not serve us, after all.
hil: We declare ourselves dissociated from them before You. They did not serve us, after all.
compare: We declare ourselves dissociated from them before You. They did not serve us, after all.

src: Der ihnen versprochene Zeitpunkt ist der Tagesanbruch. Ist nicht der Tagesanbruch schon nahe?"
ref: Their hour of doom is in the morning: Is not the morning nigh?"
draft: The promised time to them is the break of day. Isn't daybreak already near?
hil: The promised time to them is the break of day. Isn't daybreak already close?
compare: The promised time to them is the break of day. Isn't daybreak already close?

src: Und sag: Wirkt! Allah wird euer Tun sehen, und (auch) Sein Gesandter und die Gläubigen.
ref: And say, "Do [as you will], for Allah will see your deeds, and [so, will] His Messenger and the believers.
draft: And say: It works! Allah will see your actions, and (also) His messenger and the believers.
hil: Say: It works! God will see your conduct, so will His Apostle and the faithful; for you will in the end go back to Him, who knows the unknown and the known, who will tell you of what you were doing.
compare: And say: It works! Allah will see your actions, and (also) His messenger and the believers.

src: (Sie treten ein in) Dschannat von 'Adn, die Der Allgnade Erweisende Seinen Dienern von der Welt des Verborgenen versprochen hat.
ref: In the gardens of Eden promised by Ar-Rahman to His creatures in the unknown (future).
draft: "They enter Paradise of 'Adn, which The All-Merciful has promised His servants from the world of the Unseen."
hil: They will enter the Garden of 'Adn, which The All-Merciful has promised His servants from the world of the Unseen.
compare: They will enter the Garden of 'Adn, which The All-Merciful has promised His servants from the world of the Unseen.

src: Und WIR lehrten ihn nicht das Dichten und dies gebührt ihm nicht! Er ist doch nichts anderes außer Ermahnung und ein klarer Quran,
ref: And We have not taught him (Prophet Mohammed- peace and blessings be upon him) to recite poetry, nor does it befit him; it is nothing but an advice and the bright Qur’an.
draft: And WE did not teach him poetry, nor does it befit him; it is nothing but a reminder and a clear Quran.
hil: We have not taught him to versify, nor is it worthy of him. He is nothing but a reminder and a clear Quran.
compare: And WE did not teach him poetry, nor does it befit him; it is nothing but a reminder and a clear Quran.

src: Allah hat auf dich das Buch und die Weisheit herabgesandt und dich gelehrt, was du (vorher) nicht wußtest.
ref: God has revealed to you the Scripture and wisdom, and has taught you what you did not know.
draft: Allah has revealed to you the Book and Wisdom, and taught you what you did not know before.
hil: Allah has sent down to you the Book (The Quran) and wisdom, and taught you that which you knew not before.
compare: Allah has sent down to you the Book (The Quran) and wisdom, and taught you that which you knew not before.

src: Gewiß, wir werden ihn und die Seinen erretten, bis auf seine Frau, die zu denen gehört, die zurückbleiben sollen."
ref: We are to save him and his family except his wife, for she is one of those who will stay behind."
draft: "Surely, we will save him and his family, except for his wife who is among those who should stay behind."
hil: Indeed, we will rescue him and his family except for his wife who is among those who should stay behind.
compare: "Surely, we will save him and his family, except for his wife who is among those who should stay behind."

src: Und sie lernten, was ihnen schadete und nicht nützte. Und sie wußten, daß derjenige, der dies erkauft, im Jenseits keinen Anteil hat.
ref: Indeed, they learned what harms them and does not profit them, yet they knew that anyone who buys it would have no share in the Everlasting Life.
draft: And they learned what harmed them and was of no use to them. And they knew that the one who purchased this would have no share in the hereafter.
hil: And they learned what harmed them and was of no use to them. And they knew that whoever bought it would truly have no share in the Hereafter.
compare: And they learned what harmed them and was of no use to them. And they knew that whoever bought it would truly have no share in the Hereafter.

src: Ich will, daß du die Last meiner Sünde und deiner Sünde trägst und so unter den Bewohnern des Feuers bist, und dies ist der Lohn der Frevler."
ref: I would rather you suffered the punishment for sinning against me, and for your own sin, and became an inmate of Hell. And that is the requital for the unjust."
draft: "I want you to bear the burden of my sin and your sin and thus be among the inhabitants of the fire, and this is the reward of the wicked."
hil: I want you to bear the burden of my sin and your sin, and thus be among the inhabitants of the fire, and this is the reward of the wicked.
compare: I want you to bear the burden of my sin and your sin, and thus be among the inhabitants of the fire, and this is the reward of the wicked.

src: Und ER machte euch die Nacht, das Tageslicht, die Sonne und den Mond gratis fügbar.
ref: He has subjected to you the night, the day, the sun and the moon.
draft: And HE made the night, the daylight, the sun and the moon available for free.
hil: He made the night, the daylight, the sun, and the moon freely available to you.
compare: He made the night, the daylight, the sun, and the moon freely available to you.

src: Mein HERR! Laß mich des rituellen Gebets ordnungsgemäßer Verrichtender sein sowie von meiner Nachkommenschaft. Mein HERR! Und erfülle mein Bittgebet!
ref: My Lord! make me establisher of prayer and also from my progeny, our Lord! and accept Thou my supplication.
draft: My Lord! Let me be a proper performer of the ritual prayer, as well as my offspring. My Lord! And fulfill my supplication!
hil: My Lord! Allow me and my offspring to perform the ritual prayer properly. My Lord! And fulfill my supplication!
compare: My Lord! Let me be a proper performer of the ritual prayer, as well as my offspring. My Lord! And fulfill my supplication!

src: Und was für ein erbärmlicher Aufenthaltsort!
ref: Their dwelling place will be Hell; - and worst indeed is that place for rest.
draft: And what a miserable place of stay!
hil: And what a miserable place of abode!
compare: And what a miserable place of stay!

src: Und Allah ist wahrlich Allverzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
draft: And Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Merciful.
hil: And indeed Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
compare: And Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Merciful.

src: (Er ist) der Schöpfer der Himmel und der Erde in ihrer schönsten Form. Wie soll Er Kinder haben, wo Er doch keine Gefährtin hat und Er (sonst) alles erschaffen hat?
ref: Creator of the heavens and the earth from nothingness, how could He have a son when He has no mate?
draft: "He is the creator of the heavens and the earth in their most beautiful form. How can He have children when He has no companion and has created everything else?"
hil: "He is the creator of the heavens and the earth in their most beautiful form. How can He have children when He has no companion and has created everything else?"
compare: "He is the creator of the heavens and the earth in their most beautiful form. How can He have children when He has no companion and has created everything else?"

src: Heute habe Ich euch eure Religion vervollkommnet und Meine Gunst an euch vollendet, und Ich bin mit dem Islam als Religion für euch zufrieden. - Und wer sich aus Hunger in einer Zwangslage befindet, ohne zu einer Sünde hinzuneigen, so ist Allah Allvergebend und Barmherzig.
ref: This day, I have perfected your religion for you, completed My Favour upon you, and have chosen for you Islam as your religion. But as for him who is forced by severe hunger, with no inclination to sin (such can eat these above-mentioned meats), then surely, Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
draft: Today I have perfected your religion for you, completed my favor upon you, and chosen Islam as your religion. And whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: "I have perfected for you your religion, completed My favor upon you, and chosen Islam as your religion." "And whoever is forced by severe hunger
compare: Today I have perfected your religion for you, completed my favor upon you, and chosen Islam as your religion. And whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Sie sagen: "Aber nein!
ref: They will say, "No!
draft: They say: "But no!
hil: They say, 'No!'
compare: They say, 'No!'

src: ER sagte: "Deine Aya sei, daß du mit den Menschen drei volle Nächte nicht reden kannst."
ref: "Though sound," He answered, "you will not talk to any one for three nights running."
draft: He said, "Your affliction is that you will not be able to speak with people for three full nights."
hil: He said, "Your token is that you will not speak to people for three full nights."
compare: He said, "Your affliction is that you will not be able to speak with people for three full nights."

src: Darum rufe du auf und verhalte dich recht, wie dir befohlen worden ist. Und folge nicht ihren Neigungen, sondern sprich: Ich glaube an das, was Gott an Büchern herabgesandt hat, und mir ist befohlen worden, unter euch Gerechtigkeit zu üben.
ref: Therefore call thou, and go straight as thou hast been commanded; do not follow their caprices.
draft: Therefore, you should call out and act correctly as you have been commanded. And do not follow their inclinations, but say: I believe in what God has revealed in the books, and I have been commanded to practice justice among you.
hil: Therefore, you should call out and act correctly as you have been commanded. And do not follow their inclinations, but say: I believe in what God has revealed in the books, to you and to them, and I have been commanded to practice justice among you, humbly submitting to Allah. Those will have their reward with their Lord, and do not exchange the verses of Allah for a small price. Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
compare: Therefore, you should call out and act correctly as you have been commanded. And do not follow their inclinations, but say: I believe in what God has revealed in the books, and I have been commanded to practice justice among you.

src: Ich kann euch nicht retten, noch könnt ihr mich retten.
ref: Neither can I help you nor can you give me help.
draft: I can not save you, nor can you save me.
hil: I cannot save you, nor can you save me.
compare: I can not save you, nor can you save me.

src: Und gehe auf Erden nicht freudenerregt! Gewiß, dabei wirst du weder die Erde zerlöchern können, noch wirst du die Berghöhen an Höhe erreichen.
ref: And do not strut about the land with insolence: Surely you cannot cleave the earth, nor attain the height of mountains in stature.
draft: And do not walk on the earth with exultation! You will certainly neither be able to pierce the earth nor reach the mountains in height.
hil: Do not walk on the earth with exultation! Surely, in doing so, you will neither be able to pierce the earth nor reach the heights of the mountains.
compare: And do not walk on the earth with exultation! You will certainly neither be able to pierce the earth nor reach the mountains in height.

src: Sehen sie denn nicht, daß Allah, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen hat, (auch) die Macht hat, ihresgleichen zu erschaffen? Und Er hat ihnen eine Frist gesetzt, an der es keinen Zweifel gibt, doch die Ungerechten weigern sich (und wollen nichts) außer dem Unglauben.
ref: Do they not see that Allah Who has created the heavens and the earth is Able to create people similar to them, and has set a term for them in which there is no doubt? So the unjust do not accept without being ungrateful.
draft: Do they not see that Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth, also has the power to create the like of them? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse (everything) except disbelief.
hil: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and the earth, has the power to create their like? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse everything except disbelief.
compare: Do they not see that Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth, also has the power to create the like of them? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse (everything) except disbelief.

src: Ihm gereicht zum Vorteil, was er erworben hat, und ihm gereicht zum Schaden, was er begangen hat.
ref: Each will enjoy what (good) he earns, as indeed each will suffer from (the wrong) he does.
draft: He benefits from what he has gained and is harmed by what he has committed.
hil: He benefits from what he has acquired, and he suffers from what he has committed.
compare: He benefits from what he has gained and is harmed by what he has committed.

src: Ihr macht sie zu Schreibblättern, die ihr offenlegt, aber auch vieles davon verheimlicht.
ref: Some of it ye disclose and much thereof ye conceal.
draft: You turn them into writing papers that you disclose, but also hide a lot of it.
hil: You turn them into writing papers that you disclose, but also hide much of it.
compare: You turn them into writing papers that you disclose, but also hide a lot of it.

src: (So war) Allahs Gesetzmäßigkeit mit denjenigen, die zuvor dahingegangen sind - und Allahs Anordnung ist ein fest gefaßter Beschluß
ref: This has been the way of God with (apostles) who have gone before you, and God's command is a determined act.
draft: (Thus it was) Allah's regularity with those who passed away before - and Allah's command is an established decree.
hil: Thus it was Allah's way with those who have passed away before - and Allah's decree is a firmly established decision.
compare: (Thus it was) Allah's regularity with those who passed away before - and Allah's command is an established decree.

src: Und Wir ließen dem Mose das Buch zukommen.
ref: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture, but dispute arose therein.
draft: "And We sent the book to Moses."
hil: And We sent the book to Moses.
compare: "And We sent the book to Moses."

src: Derjenige, Der mich erschuf.
ref: who created me.
draft: The one who created me.
hil: The one who created me.
compare: The one who created me.

src: Aber Taube hören nicht den Ruf, wenn sie gewarnt werden.
ref: But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
draft: But pigeons don't hear the call when they are warned.
hil: But deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
compare: But pigeons don't hear the call when they are warned.

src: Aber ihr seid ja Leute, die der Versuchung ausgesetzt sind.»
ref: In reality you are a people under trial (for your own inauspiciousness)."
draft: "But you are people who are exposed to temptation."
hil: "But you are people who are susceptible to temptation."
compare: "But you are people who are exposed to temptation."

src: Was Allah den Menschen an Barmherzigkeit gewährt, das kann keiner zurückhalten; und was Er zurückhält, das kann nach Ihm keiner freigeben; und Er ist der Allmächtige, der Allweise.
ref: There is none who can take away the favours He bestows on man; and there is none apart from Him to restore what He has withheld. He is all-mighty and all-wise.
draft: What Allah grants to mankind in terms of mercy, no one can withhold, and what He withholds, no one can release after Him; and He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.
hil: ["output": "Whatever mercy Allah bestows upon humankind, no one can withhold it, and whatever He withholds, no one can release it after Him; and He is the Almighty, the All-Wise."]
compare: ["output": "Whatever mercy Allah bestows upon humankind, no one can withhold it, and whatever He withholds, no one can release it after Him; and He is the Almighty, the All-Wise."]

src: Ich folge ausschließlich dem, was mir als Wahy zuteil wird. Und ich bin doch nichts anderes als ein deutlicher Warner."
ref: I only follow what is revealed to me; I am only a clear warner.'
draft: I only follow what is revealed to me as Wahy. And I am nothing but a clear warner.
hil: I only follow what is revealed to me as Wahy and I am nothing but a clear warner.
compare: I only follow what is revealed to me as Wahy. And I am nothing but a clear warner.

src: Das sind die, die Gott rechtgeleitet hat.
ref: They are those whom Allah had guided.
draft: These are the ones whom God has guided to the right path.
hil: These are the ones whom God has guided to the right path.
compare: These are the ones whom God has guided to the right path.

src: Das sind die, die das diesseitige Leben gegen das Jenseits erkauft haben.
ref: Those are they who have bought the life of this world at the price of the Hereafter.
draft: These are those who have bought the worldly life [for the price] of the Hereafter.
hil: These are those who have bartered away good guidance for error and pardon for punishment; how great their striving will be for the Fire.
compare: These are those who have bought the worldly life [for the price] of the Hereafter.

src: Und gewähre ihnen noch eine kurze Frist.
ref: And give them respite for a little while.
draft: And give them a short deadline.
hil: Grant them a brief respite.
compare: Grant them a brief respite.

src: Sprich: Das ist mein Weg.
ref: Say: 'This is my way.
draft: Speak: This is my path.
hil: Say: This is my way.
compare: Speak: This is my path.

src: Oder sagen sie: "Er hat es ersonnen"? Nein!
ref: What! They dare say that, “He has fabricated it”?
draft: Or do they say, "He devised it?" No!
hil: Or do they say, "has he devised it?" No!
compare: Or do they say, "He devised it?" No!

src: Alles Lob gebührt ALLAH, Dem alles gehört, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist.
ref: Praise belongs to God to whom belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth.
draft: All praise is due to ALLAH, to whom belongs everything that is in the heavens and on the earth.
hil: All praise is due to ALLAH, to whom belongs everything that is in the heavens and on the earth.
compare: All praise is due to ALLAH, to whom belongs everything that is in the heavens and on the earth.

src: Gewiß, mir wurde vom Wissen das zuteil, was dir nicht zuteil wurde, so folge mir, dann leite ich dich recht auf einen geraden Weg!
ref: There has come to me of knowledge that which came not unto you. So follow me.
draft: Certainly, I have been granted the knowledge that you have not been granted. So follow me, and I will guide you straight on a right path!
hil: Certainly, I have been granted knowledge that was not granted to you. So follow me, and I will guide you straight on the right path!
compare: Certainly, I have been granted the knowledge that you have not been granted. So follow me, and I will guide you straight on a right path!

src: Und WIR entsandten dich nur als Überbringer froher Botschaft und als Warner.
ref: Yet We have not sent you but to give good tidings and to warn.
draft: And We sent you only as a bearer of good tidings and a warner.
hil: We have sent you only as a messenger with good news and as a warner.
compare: And We sent you only as a bearer of good tidings and a warner.

src: O ihr Menschen, ein Gleichnis ist geprägt, so hört darauf: Gewiß, jene, die ihr an Allahs Statt anruft, werden in keiner Weise vermögen, eine Fliege zu erschaffen, auch dann nicht, wenn sie sich dazu zusammentäten. Und wenn die Fliege ihnen etwas raubte, könnten sie es ihr nicht entreißen.
ref: O men, give ear to this parable: Those you worship other than God can never create as much as a fly, even if they get together to do so; and if the fly were to rob them of a thing they would not be able to snatch it away from it.
draft: O people, a parable is coined, so listen to it: truly those whom you invoke besides Allah will never be able to create a fly, even if they banded together to do so. And if a fly steals something from them, they cannot recover it from it.
hil: O people! A parable has been coined, so listen to it! Surely, those whom you worship other than God can never create as much as a fly, even if they get together to do so; and if the fly were to rob them of a thing they would not be able to snatch it away from it. How weak the seeker and how weak the sought!
compare: O people, a parable is coined, so listen to it: truly those whom you invoke besides Allah will never be able to create a fly, even if they banded together to do so. And if a fly steals something from them, they cannot recover it from it.

src: Aber er vergaß (sie). Und wir fanden bei ihm keine Entschlossenheit.
ref: He forgot Our commandment and We did not find in him the determination to fulfil Our commandments.
draft: But he forgot (her). And we found no determination with him.
hil: But he forgot (her). And we found no determination in him.
compare: But he forgot (her). And we found no determination in him.

src: Diejenigen aber, die ungläubig sind und Unsere Zeichen für Lüge erklären, für sie wird es schmachvolle Strafe geben.
ref: But those who did not believe and called Our revelations lies, will be given disgraceful punishment.
draft: But those who disbelieve and reject Our signs, for them will be the disgraceful punishment.
hil: Those who disbelieve and deny Our revelations will face a humiliating punishment.
compare: But those who disbelieve and reject Our signs, for them will be the disgraceful punishment.

src: ER sagte: "Das ist ein Mir verbindlicher, geradliniger Weg:
ref: (To which God) said: "This way is right by Me.
draft: He said: "This is a binding, straightforward path for me."
hil: He said, 'This is a binding, straightforward path for me.'
compare: He said, 'This is a binding, straightforward path for me.'

src: "Gaben Wir euch nicht ein genügend langes Leben, so daß ein jeder, der sich besinnen wollte, sich darin hätte besinnen können?
ref: Did We not give you a long enough span of life so that he who remembered may reflect? And did not the warner come to you?
draft: Did We not give you a sufficiently long life, so that anyone who wanted to reflect could have reflected in it?
hil: Did we not grant you a long enough life so that anyone who wished to reflect could have reflected therein?
compare: Did we not grant you a long enough life so that anyone who wished to reflect could have reflected therein?

src: Auch sollst du Mitteilung machen über denjenigen, der Unseren Ayat gegenüber Kufr betrieben und gesagt hat: "Ganz gewiß werden mir Vermögen und Kinder zuteil!"
ref: Have you seen him who denies Our revelations, and says: "I will certainly be given wealth and children."
draft: Also, you should report about the one who has committed Kufr against Our Ayat and said, "Indeed, wealth and children will certainly be given to me!"
hil: You should also report about the one who committed Kufr against Our signs and said, "Surely, wealth and children will be given to me!"
compare: You should also report about the one who committed Kufr against Our signs and said, "Surely, wealth and children will be given to me!"

src: (dies) als Ermahnung. Und nie sind Wir ungerecht.
ref: To advise; and We never oppress.
draft: (this) as a warning. And We are never unjust.
hil: (This is) a reminder. And We are never unjust.
compare: (this) as a warning. And We are never unjust.

src: Sind die beiden im Gleichnis etwa gleich? Lob sei Gott!
ref: All praise belongs to Allah!
draft: Are the two in the parable equal? Praise be to God!
hil: Are the two in the parable equal? Praise be to God!
compare: Are the two in the parable equal? Praise be to God!

src: Und wenn sie den bewaffneten Kampf gegen euch aufnahmen, dann tötet sie.
ref: But if they attack you, then kill them.
draft: And if they take up armed struggle against you, then kill them.
hil: And if they take up armed struggle against you, then slay (kill) them.
compare: And if they take up armed struggle against you, then kill them.

src: Und als ihnen gesagt wurde: "Verinnerlicht den Iman, wie die (anderen) Menschen den Iman verinnerlicht haben", sagten sie: "Sollen wir etwa den Iman verinnerlichen, wie die Beschränkten den Iman verinnerlicht haben?"
ref: When asked to believe as others do, they say: "Should we believe like fools?"
draft: And when they were told, "Internalize the faith as other people have internalized the faith," they said, "Are we supposed to internalize the faith as the limited ones have internalized the faith?"
hil: And when they were told, "Internalize the faith as people have internalized the faith," they said, "Should we internalize the faith like the limited ones have internalized the faith?"
compare: And when they were told, "Internalize the faith as people have internalized the faith," they said, "Should we internalize the faith like the limited ones have internalized the faith?"

src: Gewiß, ALLAH macht, was ER will.
ref: Verily God does as He pleases.
draft: Sure, ALLAH does what HE wants.
hil: Indeed, Allah does whatever He wants.
compare: Sure, ALLAH does what HE wants.

src: Diejenigen, denen das Buch zugekommen ist, sind erst uneins geworden, nachdem das Wissen zu ihnen gekommen war, dies aus ungerechter Auflehnung untereinander.
ref: Those who were given the Book were not at variance except after the knowledge came to them, being insolent one to another.
draft: Those to whom the book has come only became divided after knowledge had come to them, and they act out of unjust resentment among themselves.
hil: And they did not cause divisions except after knowledge had come to them, because of unjust resentment among themselves.
compare: And they did not cause divisions except after knowledge had come to them, because of unjust resentment among themselves.

src: Und er hatte keine Schar, die ihm gegen Allah zu helfen vermöchte, und er konnte sich selbst nicht wehren.
ref: He had no body to help him other than God, nor was he able to save himself.
draft: And he had no company that could help him against Allah, and he could not defend himself.
hil: And he had no company that could help him against Allah, and he could not defend himself.
compare: And he had no company that could help him against Allah, and he could not defend himself.

src: Über sie kommt eine Pein, die unabwendbar ist.»
ref: Verily, there will come a torment for them which cannot be turned back."
draft: "An agony comes over her that is inevitable."
hil: "An agony comes over her that is inevitable."
compare: "An agony comes over her that is inevitable."

src: Also, dann sollen sie mit ihren Verbindungen hochsteigen!
ref: Then let them climb up the ladders (to the heavens).
draft: So then they should rise with their connections!
hil: So they should rise with their connections!
compare: So then they should rise with their connections!

src: Auf solche (Sünder) wird ein böses Unheil niederfallen; und Allah ist zornig auf sie; und Er hat sie verflucht und Gahannam für sie bereitet. Und das ist eine üble Bestimmung.
ref: God is wroth with them, and has cursed them, and has prepared for them Gehenna -- an evil homecoming!
draft: Such (sinners) will befall an evil calamity, and Allah is angry with them, and He has cursed them and prepared Gahannam for them. And that is an evil destiny.
hil: Calamity shall befall such (sinners); Allah is angry with them, and He has cursed them and prepared hellfire for them. And that is an evil fate.
compare: Calamity shall befall such (sinners); Allah is angry with them, and He has cursed them and prepared hellfire for them. And that is an evil fate.

src: Und vervollständigt die Hadsch und die 'Umra für ALLAH! Und solltet ihr daran gehindert werden, dann (opfert) das, was an Opfertieren verfügbar ist, und rasiert nicht eure Köpfe, bis das Opfertier seinen Opferplatz erreicht hat.
ref: Fulfil the Pilgrimage and the Visitation unto God; but if you are prevented, then such offering as may be feasible. And shave not your heads, till the offering reaches its place of sacrifice.
draft: And complete the Hajj and Umrah for Allah! And if you are prevented, then [offer] what can be obtained with ease of sacrificial animals. And do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of slaughter.
hil: Complete the Hajj and Umrah for Allah! And if you are prevented, then offer what can be obtained with ease of sacrificial animals. And do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of slaughter.
compare: And complete the Hajj and Umrah for Allah! And if you are prevented, then [offer] what can be obtained with ease of sacrificial animals. And do not shave your heads until the sacrificial animal has reached its place of slaughter.

src: Hätte es doch aus den Generationen vor euch manche gegeben, die einsichtig waren, welche Verderben auf Erden verboten!
ref: Why were there not, out of the generations that passed away before you, righteous men who would forbid others from causing corruption on the earth?
draft: If only there had been some among the generations before you who were insightful about the destruction on Earth that is forbidden!
hil: If only there had been some among the generations before you who were insightful about the destruction on Earth that is forbidden!
compare: If only there had been some among the generations before you who were insightful about the destruction on Earth that is forbidden!

src: (Er), der sieben Himmel in Schichten erschaffen hat.
ref: Who created the seven skies one above the other.
draft: (He) who created the seven heavens in layers.
hil: He who created the seven heavens in layers.
compare: (He) who created the seven heavens in layers.

src: Sie haben Allah nicht eingeschätzt, wie es Ihm gebührt', wo die ganze Erde am Tag der Auferstehung in Seiner Hand gehalten wird und (auch) die Himmel in Seiner Rechten zusammengefaltet sein werden. Preis sei Ihm! Erhaben ist Er über das, was sie (Ihm) beigesellen.
ref: And they did not realise the importance of Allah as was His right; and on the Day of Resurrection, He will compress the lands and the heavens will be rolled up by His power; Purity and Supremacy are to Him, from all what they ascribe as partners.
draft: They did not estimate Allah as He deserved it, where the whole earth will be held in His hand on the Day of Resurrection and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Glory be to Him! Exalted is He above what they associate with Him.
hil: They did not estimate Allah as He deserved it, where on the Day of Resurrection, the entire earth will be held in His hand and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Glory be to Him! Exalted is He above what they associate with Him.
compare: They did not estimate Allah as He deserved it, where the whole earth will be held in His hand on the Day of Resurrection and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Glory be to Him! Exalted is He above what they associate with Him.

src: Allah ist wahrlich Allverzeihend und Allvergebend.
ref: Verily God is forgiving and kind.
draft: Allah is truly All-Forgiving and All-Merciful.
hil: Verily, Allah is All-Forgiving and All-Merciful.
compare: Verily, Allah is All-Forgiving and All-Merciful.

src: Und den Himmel haben Wir mit Kraft aufgebaut.
ref: And the heaven!
draft: And We built the heaven with might.
hil: We have constructed the heavens with power.
compare: And We built the heaven with might.

src: Sollten sie jedoch Kinder haben, dann bekommt ihr das Viertel von dem, was sie hinterlassen haben, nach (der Vollstreckung) des Testaments, das sie hinterlegt haben, und nach (der Begleichung) der Schulden.
ref: If they had children, you get one-fourth of what they leave. After fulfilling any bequest and paying off debts.
draft: If they have children, then the quarter of what they have left will be passed on to you after the execution of the will they have deposited and the settlement of the debts.
hil: If they have children, you will get a quarter of what they left behind after execution of the will they have deposited and the settlement of the debts.
compare: If they have children, then the quarter of what they have left will be passed on to you after the execution of the will they have deposited and the settlement of the debts.

src: Mit Sicherheit ist ALLAHs Versprechen wahr, doch die meisten wissen es nicht.
ref: Remember, the promise of God is true. But most of them do not know.
draft: With certainty, Allah's promise is true, but most do not know it.
hil: It is a promise of God; and God does not go back on His promise. Yet most men do not understand.
compare: It is a promise of God; and God does not go back on His promise. Yet most men do not understand.

src: Dein Herr hat dich weder verlassen, noch verabscheut.
ref: Your Lord has neither left you, nor despises you.
draft: Your Lord has neither left you, nor despised you.
hil: Your Lord has neither abandoned you nor despised you.
compare: Your Lord has neither left you, nor despised you.

src: Und auch manche von ihren Vätern, ihren Nachkommen und ihren Brüdern.
ref: as We did their fathers, their descendants, and their brothers.
draft: And also some of their fathers, their offspring, and their brothers.
hil: And some of their fathers, their offspring, and their brothers as well.
compare: And also some of their fathers, their offspring, and their brothers.

src: Und als er dort ankam, wurde gerufen: "Baraka wurde verliehen dem, das im Feuer ist, sowie dem um es herum. Und subhanallah, Der HERR aller Schöpfung.
ref: So when he reached it, it was proclaimed, “Blessed is he who is in the location of the fire (Moosa) and those who are close to it (the angels); and Purity is to Allah, the Lord Of The Creation.”
draft: And when he arrived there, it was announced: "Baraka has been bestowed upon him who is in the fire, as well as on those around it. And subhanallah, the LORD of all creation.
hil: "And when he arrived there, it was proclaimed, 'Baraka has been bestowed upon him who is in the fire as well as on those around it. And subhanallah, The Lord of all creation.'"
compare: "And when he arrived there, it was proclaimed, 'Baraka has been bestowed upon him who is in the fire as well as on those around it. And subhanallah, The Lord of all creation.'"

src: Als er dann (die Lücke) zwischen den beiden Wallabhängen auf gleicher Höhe zuschütten ließ, sagte er: "Blast!" Als er dann es (das Eisen) erhitzte, sagte er: "Bringt mir geschmolzenes Kupfer, das ich darüber gieße!"
ref: At length, when he had filled up the space between the two steep mountain-sides, He said, "Blow (with your bellows)" Then, when he had made it (red) as fire, he said: "Bring me, that I may pour over it, molten lead."
draft: When he then had the gap between the two ramparts filled on the same level, he said: "Fire!" When he then heated it (the iron), he said: "Bring me melted copper which I pour over it!"
hil: When he had the gap between the two ramparts filled at the same level, he said, "Fire!" And when he heated it (the iron), he said, "Bring me melted copper so that I can pour it over it!"
compare: When he then had the gap between the two ramparts filled on the same level, he said: "Fire!" When he then heated it (the iron), he said: "Bring me melted copper which I pour over it!"

src: Und du hast eine Verabredung, die dir nicht gebrochen wird. Und schau auf deinen Gott, dessen Andacht du dich dauernd hingegeben hast.
ref: And thereafter a tryst awaits thee thou canst not fail to keep Behold thy god, to whom all the day thou wast cleaving!
draft: And you have an appointment that will not be broken for you. And look at your God, whose devotion you have constantly devoted yourself to.
hil: And you have an appointment that will not be broken for you. And look to your God, whose devotion you have constantly devoted yourself to.
compare: And you have an appointment that will not be broken for you. And look to your God, whose devotion you have constantly devoted yourself to.

src: Und ER erschafft, was ihr nicht kennt.
ref: He created other things too which you do not know.
draft: And HE creates what you do not know.
hil: HE creates what you do not know.
compare: HE creates what you do not know.

src: ER sagte: "Geh!
ref: (And God) said: "Away!
draft: He said, "Go!"
hil: He said, "Go!"
compare: He said, "Go!"

src: Also diejenigen, die den Iman an ihn verinnerlicht, ihn geehrt, ihm zum Sieg verholfen haben und dem Licht (Quran) gefolgt sind, das ihm hinabgesandt wurde, diese sind die wirklichen Erfolgreichen.
ref: Those who believe and honour and help him, and follow the light sent with him, are those who will attain their goal."
draft: So those who internalized faith in him, honored him, helped him to victory, and followed the light (Quran) that was revealed to him, these are the real successful ones.
hil: Those who have internalized faith in him, honored him, helped him to victory, and followed the light (Quran) that was revealed to him, these are the real successful ones.
compare: Those who have internalized faith in him, honored him, helped him to victory, and followed the light (Quran) that was revealed to him, these are the real successful ones.

src: Doch ich verfüge nicht über das, was ihr übereilt haben wollt.
ref: But what you wish to be hastened is not within my power.
draft: But I don't have what you want in a hurry.
hil: "But I don't have what you wanted hastily."
compare: "But I don't have what you wanted hastily."

src: Gespottet wurde schon vor dir über Gesandte. Da umschloß diejenigen, die sie verhöhnt hatten, das, worüber sie spotteten.
ref: Surely the apostles have been mocked before you; but what they had mocked rebounded on the mockers themselves.
draft: Mockery has already been made of messengers before you. So those who mocked them were enclosed by what they mocked.
hil: Mockery has been made of messengers before you. So those who had mocked them encircled themselves with that which they were ridiculing.
compare: Mockery has been made of messengers before you. So those who had mocked them encircled themselves with that which they were ridiculing.

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, fürchtet Allah; und eine jede Seele schaue nach dem, was sie für morgen vorausschickt. Und fürchtet Allah; wahrlich, Allah ist dessen wohl kundig, was ihr tut.
ref: O People who Believe! Fear Allah, and every soul must see what it has sent ahead for tomorrow; and fear Allah; indeed Allah is Aware of your deeds.
draft: O you who believe, fear Allah, and let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
hil: O you who believe, fear Allah, and let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Aware of what you do.
compare: O you who believe, fear Allah, and let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

src: Und für sie ist eine schmerzhafte Pein bestimmt.
ref: They will have a painful punishment.
draft: And for them a painful torment is determined.
hil: And for them, a painful torment is determined.
compare: And for them a painful torment is determined.

src: Und Fir'aun sagte: "O ihr führende Schar, keinen anderen Gott weiß ich für euch als mich (selbst). So entfache mir, o Haman, einen Brand auf Lehm, und mache mir einen Hochbau, auf daß ich zum Gott Musas emporsteige. Ich glaube fürwahr, daß er zu den Lügnern gehört."
ref: 'Assembly' said Pharaoh, 'I do not know that you have any god except me' 'O Haman, kindle a fire upon clay and make me a tower so that I can climb to see the God of Moses, I think that he is one of the liars'
draft: And Pharaoh said, "O you eminent ones, I know of no other god for you besides myself. So kindle for me, O Haman, [a fire upon] the clay and make for me a tower that I may look at the God of Moses. And indeed, I do think he is among the liars."
hil: And Pharaoh said, 'O you eminent ones, I know of no other lord for you but myself. So fire some clay to build a tower for me that I may see the God of Moses, whom I certainly consider to be a liar.'
compare: And Pharaoh said, "O you eminent ones, I know of no other god for you besides myself. So kindle for me, O Haman, [a fire upon] the clay and make for me a tower that I may look at the God of Moses. And indeed, I do think he is among the liars."

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch Seine Ayat zeigt und euch Rizq vom Himmel nach und nach hinabsendet.
ref: It is He who shows you His signs, and sends you food from the heavens.
draft: HE is the One who shows you His verses and gradually sends down Rizq (sustenance) for you from the heaven.
hil: HE is the One who shows you His verses and gradually sends down Rizq for you from the sky.
compare: HE is the One who shows you His verses and gradually sends down Rizq (sustenance) for you from the heaven.

src: Diese verinnerlichen den Iman an ihn. Und wer von Al-ahzab daran Kufr betreibt, dem ist das Feuer bestimmt.
ref: Such believe therein, and whoso disbelieveth therein of the clans, the Fire is his appointed place.
draft: These internalize faith in him. And whoever commits Kufr against Al-ahzab, the Fire is destined for him.
hil: Those internalize faith in him, and whoever commits Kufr against Al-ahzab, the Fire is destined for him.
compare: Those internalize faith in him, and whoever commits Kufr against Al-ahzab, the Fire is destined for him.

src: Er sagte: "O wehe mir! War ich unfähig, zu sein wie dieser Rabe und die böse Tat an meinem Bruder zu verbergen?"
ref: He said: woe unto me was incapable of being like unto this raven so that I might cover the corpse of my brother!
draft: He said: "Oh woe is me! Was I unable to be like this raven and hide the evil deed from my brother?"
hil: He said, "Oh woe is me! Was I incapable of being like that raven, hiding the evil deed from my brother?"
compare: He said: "Oh woe is me! Was I unable to be like this raven and hide the evil deed from my brother?"

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Sagt nicht ra'ina, sondern sagt unzurna und hört zu! Und für die Kafir ist eine qualvolle Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: O believers, do not say, 'Observe us,' but say, 'Regard us'; and give ear; for unbelievers awaits a painful chastisement.
draft: You, who have internalized the imam! Do not say 'ra'ina', but say 'unzurna' and listen! And for the Kafir is a painful punishment determined.
hil: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Do not say 'ra'ina', but say 'unzurna' and listen! And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment determined.
compare: Those of you who have internalized the faith! Do not say 'ra'ina', but say 'unzurna' and listen! And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment determined.

src: Der alles gut gemacht hat, was Er erschuf.
ref: who has created all things well.
draft: The one who has done everything well, which He created.
hil: He who has made everything well, that which He created.
compare: The one who has done everything well, which He created.

src: Gewiß, Allah vergibt die Sünden alle. Er ist ja der Allvergebende und Barmherzige.
ref: Despair not of the Mercy of Allah: for Allah forgives all sins: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
draft: Certainly, Allah forgives all sins. He is the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: Undoubtedly, Allah forgives all sins. He is indeed the All-Forgiving and Merciful.
compare: Certainly, Allah forgives all sins. He is the All-Forgiving and Merciful.

src: Er ist es, der die Himmel und die Erde der Wahrheit entsprechend erschaffen hat.
ref: It is He who created the heavens and the earth with a definite purpose.
draft: He is the one who created the heavens and the earth according to the truth.
hil: It is He Who has created the heavens and the earth according to the truth.
compare: He is the one who created the heavens and the earth according to the truth.

src: Und zu Seinen Ayat zählt euer Schlaf während der Nacht und am Tag und euer Anstreben nach Seiner Gunst. Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die hören.
ref: And among His signs is your sleeping during the night and day, and your seeking His munificence; indeed in this are signs for people who heed.
draft: And among His signs is your sleep during the night and day, and your pursuit of His bounty. Surely, in that are signs for a people who listen.
hil: Among His signs are your sleep during the night and day, as well as your endeavor to obtain His favor. Surely, in that there are signs for those who listen.
compare: Among His signs are your sleep during the night and day, as well as your endeavor to obtain His favor. Surely, in that there are signs for those who listen.

src: Oder dachten diejenigen, in deren Herzen Krankheit ist, daß ALLAH ihren Groll nie hervorbringen wird?!
ref: Do they whose minds are filled with doubt, think that God will not expose their malice?
draft: Or did those in whose hearts there is sickness think that Allah will never manifest their malice?
hil: And did those who have a disease in their hearts think that Allah will not bring forth their malice?
compare: And did those who have a disease in their hearts think that Allah will not bring forth their malice?

src: Sag: "Wer gewährt euch Rizq von den Himmeln und der Erde?" Sag: "ALLAH!
ref: Proclaim, “Who provides you sustenance from the sky and the earth?”
draft: Say: "Who grants you sustenance from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "ALLAH!"
hil: Say: 'Who provides for you from the heavens and earth?' Say: 'Allah' Surely, either we or you are rightly guided or in clear error.
compare: Say: "Who grants you sustenance from the heavens and the earth?" Say: "ALLAH!"

src: Und WIR schenkten ihm Ishaq und Ya'qub, bestimmten die Prophetenschaft und die Schrift bei seiner Nachkommenschaft und ließen ihm seine Belohnung im Diesseits zuteil werden.
ref: And, We gave him (Abraham), Isaac and Jacob and appointed on his descendants the Prophethood and the Book.
draft: And WE gave him Isaac and Jacob, established prophecy and scripture with his descendants, and granted him his reward in this world.
hil: And WE gave him Isaac and Jacob, established prophethood and scripture in his offspring, and granted him his reward in this life.
compare: And WE gave him Isaac and Jacob, established prophethood and scripture in his offspring, and granted him his reward in this life.

src: Aber nein! Die Ungerechten befinden sich in deutlichem Irrtum.
ref: Nay, but the evildoers are in manifest error.
draft: But no! The unjust are in clear error.
hil: But no, the unjust are clearly mistaken.
compare: But no, the unjust are clearly mistaken.

src: Diese erhoben sich jedoch in Arroganz und waren schwer verfehlende Leute.
ref: But they behaved arrogantly and were Mujrimun (disbelievers, sinners, polytheists, criminals, etc.) folk.
draft: These, however, rose in arrogance and were greatly mistaken people.
hil: These, however, rose in arrogance and were greatly mistaken people.
compare: These, however, rose in arrogance and were greatly mistaken people.

src: Doch kooperiert nicht bei dem Verwerflichen und bei der Übertretung! Und handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber.
ref: Assist each other to virtue and piety, and assist not each other to sin and transgression, Fear Allah: verily Allah is Severe in chastising.
draft: But do not cooperate in wrongdoing and transgression! And act according to Taqwa toward Allah.
hil: Do not cooperate in wrongdoing and transgression! And act with Taqwa towards Allah.
compare: Do not cooperate in wrongdoing and transgression! And act with Taqwa towards Allah.

src: (Fordert) dann hernach entweder Gnade oder Lösegeld, bis der Krieg seine Lasten (von euch) wegnimmt. Das ist so.
ref: Then, either free them by grace orransom until war shall lay down its loads, in this way, it shall be.
draft: Then later, demand either mercy or ransom until the war takes its toll off you. That's it.
hil: Then, afterwards, demand either mercy or ransom until the war takes its toll off you. That's it.
compare: Then later, demand either mercy or ransom until the war takes its toll off you. That's it.

src: Davon sind diejenigen Götzendiener ausgenommen, mit denen ihr einen Vertrag eingegangen seid und die es euch an nichts haben fehlen lassen und die keine anderen gegen euch unterstützt haben.
ref: Except those idolaters with whom you have a treaty, who have not failed you in the least, nor helped anyone against you.
draft: Excluded from that are those idolaters with whom you have made a treaty and who have not subsequently failed you in any way, nor lent support to anyone against you.
hil: Excluded from this are the idolaters with whom you have entered into a treaty and who have not subsequently failed you in any way, nor lent support to anyone against you.
compare: Excluded from that are those idolaters with whom you have made a treaty and who have not subsequently failed you in any way, nor lent support to anyone against you.

src: - denn gewiß, vor der Strafe ihres Herrn (kann) sich niemand sicher glauben,
ref: Surely no one can be secure from the punishment of his Lord, --
draft: because certainly, nobody can feel safe from the punishment of their Lord.
hil: Verily, no one can feel safe from the punishment of their Lord.
compare: Verily, no one can feel safe from the punishment of their Lord.

src: Am Tag, da sie auf ihren Gesichtern ins (Höllen)feuer gezerrt werden: "Kostet die Berührung der Sengenden."
ref: On that Day they will be dragged into the fire faces foremost, (and told:) "Taste the feel of Hell."
draft: On the day they are dragged into the (Hell)fire on their faces: "Taste the touch of the Burning."
hil: On the day when they are dragged into the fire on their faces, they will taste the touch of the scorching heat.
compare: On the day when they are dragged into the fire on their faces, they will taste the touch of the scorching heat.

src: Und richte deine Wünsche auf deinen Herrn aus.
ref: And turn to your Lord with all your love.
draft: And direct your desires towards your Lord.
hil: Direct your desires towards your Lord.
compare: And direct your desires towards your Lord.

src: So ruft Ihn an, (wobei ihr) Ihm gegenüber aufrichtig in der Religion (seid).
ref: Therefore pray to Him with obedience all-exclusive.
draft: So call him, (where you) be sincere towards him in religion.
hil: Call upon Him while being sincere towards Him in religion.
compare: Call upon Him while being sincere towards Him in religion.

src: Aber viele von ihnen waren Frevler.
ref: But many of them are wicked.
draft: But many of them were sinners.
hil: But many of them were transgressors.
compare: But many of them were transgressors.

src: Eine Gruppe von meinen Dienern pflegte zu sagen: >Unser Herr, wir glauben, so vergib uns und erbarme dich unser.
ref: There was a section among My creatures that said: 'O Lord, we believe.
draft: "A group of my servants used to say: 'Our Lord, we believe, so forgive us and have mercy on us.'"
hil: "A group of My bondmen used to say: 'Our Lord, we have accepted faith, so forgive us and have mercy on us. You are the Best Among The Merciful.'”
compare: "A group of my servants used to say: 'Our Lord, we believe, so forgive us and have mercy on us.'"

src: Und wenn Wir eine Stadt verderben wollen, befehlen Wir denen, die in ihr üppig leben, (zu freveln), und sie freveln in ihr.
ref: And when We decide to destroy a town (population), We (first) send a definite order (to obey Allah and be righteous) to those among them [or We (first) increase in number those of its population] who are given the good things of this life.
draft: And when We will to destroy a city, We command the affluent among them, so they defiantly disobey therein; thus the word proved true against it, and We destroyed it utterly. (Quran 17:16)
hil: And if We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein, and so the word proved true against it, and We destroyed it utterly.
compare: And if We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein, and so the word proved true against it, and We destroyed it utterly.

src: Soll die Ermahnung (ausgerechnet) auf ihn aus unserer Mitte herabgesandt worden sein?"
ref: Hath Unto him the admonition been sent down from amongst us!
draft: Should the admonishment have been sent down upon him (of all people) from our midst?
hil: Should the admonition have been sent down upon him (of all people) from our midst?
compare: Should the admonishment have been sent down upon him (of all people) from our midst?

src: Gewiß, wen DU ins Feuer eintreten läßt, den hast DU bereits mit Sicherheit erniedrigt.
ref: Whom Thou causest to enter the Fire: him indeed Thou hast confounded.
draft: Certainly, whom you let enter into the fire, you have already lowered with certainty.
hil: Indeed, whoever you let enter the fire, you have already humiliated them with certainty.
compare: Indeed, whoever you let enter the fire, you have already humiliated them with certainty.

src: Und sie sagten: "Unser HERR!
ref: And they said, “Our Lord!
draft: And they said, "Our Lord!
hil: And they said, "Our Lord!"
compare: And they said, "Our Lord!

src: Sie sagten: "Wir werden seinen Vater trotz seiner Zuneigung ihm gegenüber zu überreden suchen.
ref: They said, “We will solicit him from his father.
draft: They said: "We will try to persuade his father despite his affection towards him."
hil: They said, "We will try to convince his father despite his affection towards him."
compare: They said, "We will try to convince his father despite his affection towards him."

src: Wenn WIR wollen, lassen WIR mit ihnen die Erde versinken oder lassen WIR über ihnen Bruchteile vom Himmel fallen. Gewiß, darin ist doch eine Aya für jeden umkehrenden Diener.
