ref: If We will, We can bury them into the earth or cause a part of the sky to fall on them; indeed in this is a sign for every repentant bondman.
draft: If we want, we let the earth sink with them or we let fragments fall from the sky above them. Surely, therein is an Aya for every returning servant.
hil: If We will, We can make the earth sink with them or let fragments from the sky fall on them. Surely, therein is a sign for every repentant servant.
compare: If we want, we let the earth sink with them or we let fragments fall from the sky above them. Surely, therein is an Aya for every returning servant.

src: O meine Kinder, geht und erkundigt euch über Yusuf und seinen Bruder. Und gebt nicht die Hoffnung auf das Erbarmen Allahs auf.
ref: O sons, go in search of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of God.
draft: O my children, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not give up hope for Allah's mercy.
hil: O children of mine, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not lose hope in the mercy of Allah.
compare: O children of mine, go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother. And do not lose hope in the mercy of Allah.

src: Der Ungläubige ist ein Helfer gegen seinen Herrn.
ref: The unbeliever has always been an auxiliary against his Lord.
draft: The unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.
hil: The unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.
compare: The unbeliever is a helper against his Lord.

src: Und sollten sie gegen euch den bewaffneten Kampf aufnehmen, werden sie euch den Rücken flüchtend kehren, dann wird ihnen nicht beigestanden.
ref: And if they fight you, they will turn around and flee, then they will not be helped.
draft: And if they take up armed combat against you, they will turn their backs on you in flight, then no one will stand by them.
hil: And if they take up armed combat against you, they will turn their backs on you in flight, then no one will stand by them.
compare: And if they take up armed combat against you, they will turn their backs on you in flight, then no one will stand by them.

src: Und was lehrt dich wissen, was At-Tariq ist?
ref: How will you comprehend what the night star is?
draft: And what teaches you to know what At-Tariq is?
hil: What teaches you to know what At-Tariq is?
compare: And what teaches you to know what At-Tariq is?

src: Und solltest du sie um Rechtleitung bitten, hören sie bestimmt nicht.
ref: When you call upon them for guidance, they do not hear.
draft: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.
hil: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.
compare: And if you ask them for guidance, they certainly won't listen.

src: Es wird (zu ihnen) gesagt werden: "Betretet die Tore der Hölle, ewig darin zu bleiben."
ref: "Enter the gates of Hell," they will be told, "and there abide for ever."
draft: It will be said to them: "Enter the gates of hell, to abide therein forever."
hil: It will be said to them, 'Enter the gates of Hell to abide therein forever.'
compare: It will be said to them: "Enter the gates of hell, to abide therein forever."

src: Und WIR erhöhten die einen von ihnen über die anderen um Stellungen, damit die einen von ihnen die anderen zu Beschäftigten nehmen. Doch die Gnade deines HERRN ist besser als das, was sie anhäufen.
ref: We have distributed among them their comforts in the life of this world, and gave high status to some over others so that they mock at each other; and the mercy of your Lord is better than all what they hoard.
draft: And WE elevated some of them above the others in ranks so that some of them may take others in their service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than what they accumulate.
hil: And We raised some of them above others in ranks, so that some of them may take others in their service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than whatever they accumulate.
compare: And WE elevated some of them above the others in ranks so that some of them may take others in their service. But the mercy of your Lord is better than what they accumulate.

src: Doch nur diejenigen, die zuhören, hören auf dich, während die Toten ALLAH erweckt. Dann werden sie zu Ihm zurückgebracht.
ref: Only they will respond who can hear. As for the dead, raised they will be by God, then to Him they will be returned.
draft: But only those who listen, listen to you, while the dead are awakened by Allah. Then they are brought back to Him.
hil: Only those who listen will heed you, while the dead will be awakened by Allah. Then they will be returned to Him.
compare: Only those who listen will heed you, while the dead will be awakened by Allah. Then they will be returned to Him.

src: Und wenn ihnen gesagt wird: "Folgt dem, was ALLAH hinabsandte." Sagen sie: "Nein, sondern wir folgen dem, woran wir unsere Ahnen fanden."
ref: and when it is said to them, 'Follow what God has sent down,' they say, 'No; but we will follow such things as we found our fathers doing.' What?
draft: And when they are told, "Follow what Allah has sent down," they say, "No, we will follow that which we found our fathers following."
hil: And when they are told to follow what Allah has sent down, they say, "No, we will follow that which we found our forefathers following."
compare: And when they are told, "Follow what Allah has sent down," they say, "No, we will follow that which we found our fathers following."

src: Und es wurde den Menschen gesagt: "Wollt ihr euch nicht versammeln,
ref: And the people were also asked to assemble.
draft: And it was said to the people: "Do you not want to gather,
hil: And it was said to the people: 'Do you not want to assemble,'
compare: And it was said to the people: 'Do you not want to assemble,'

src: Ihr, die den Iman bekundet habt!
ref: O People who Believe!
draft: You who have declared faith in the Imam!
hil: O you who believe!
compare: O you who believe!

src: Das Bleibende (an Lohn) von Allah ist besser für euch, wenn ihr gläubig seid. Und ich bin nicht Hüter über euch."
ref: That which is left to you by God is better, if you are true believers; yet I am not a warden over you."
draft: "The lasting (reward) from Allah is better for you if you are believers. And I am not the guardian over you."
hil: The lasting reward from Allah is better for you if you are believers. And I am not your keeper.
compare: "The lasting (reward) from Allah is better for you if you are believers. And I am not the guardian over you."

src: (Er ist) der Erschaffer der Himmel und der Erde.
ref: The Creator of the heavens and the earth.
draft: He is the creator of the heavens and the earth.
hil: He is the creator of the heavens and the earth.
compare: He is the creator of the heavens and the earth.

src: Und Frömmigkeit besteht nicht darin, daß ihr durch die Hinterseite in die Häuser geht. Frömmigkeit besteht darin, daß man gottesfürchtig ist.
ref: Piety does not lie in entering the house through the back door, for the pious man is he who follows the straight path.
draft: And piety does not consist in entering houses through the back. Piety consists in being God-fearing.
hil: Piety does not consist in entering houses through the back door. Piety consists in being God-fearing.
compare: Piety does not consist in entering houses through the back door. Piety consists in being God-fearing.

src: Sie alle haben WIR vor den Menschen ausgezeichnet,
ref: And each one of them We favoured over all mankind.
draft: They all have distinguished US in front of people.
hil: All of them, We have distinguished before people.
compare: They all have distinguished US in front of people.

src: Die Vornehmen seines Volkes, die nicht glaubten, sagten: "Wir sehen in dir nur einen Menschen unseresgleichen und wir sehen, daß dir keine als jene gefolgt sind, die aller äußeren Erscheinung nach die Niedrigsten unter uns sind, noch sehen wir in euch irgendeinen Vorzug vor uns; nein, wir erachten euch für Lügner."
ref: The leaders of the people who were unbelievers, replied: "We see that you are but a man like us, and see that none among us follows you but the meanest and immature of judgement, and do not see any excellence in you above us. In fact, we think you are a liar."
draft: The nobles of his people who did not believe said, "We only see in you a person like ourselves, and we see that none but those who are the lowest among us have followed you by appearance, nor do we see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you to be a liar."
hil: The nobles of his people who did not believe said, 'We see in you only a person like ourselves, and we see that none of those who are apparently the lowest among us have followed you, nor do we see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you to be liars.'
compare: The nobles of his people who did not believe said, "We only see in you a person like ourselves, and we see that none but those who are the lowest among us have followed you by appearance, nor do we see any superiority in you over us; no, we consider you to be a liar."

src: Und das Wort wird über sie fällig werden dafür, daß sie Unrecht taten, und da werden sie nicht reden.
ref: When the sentence will have been passed upon them for their wickedness, they will not be able to say a word.
draft: And the word will be passed against them because they did wrong, and they will not speak.
hil: The word will come due upon them because they have done wrong, and then they shall not speak.
compare: And the word will be passed against them because they did wrong, and they will not speak.

src: Er steht für die Gerechtigkeit ein. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm, dem Mächtigen, dem Weisen.
ref: He upholds justice there is no god except He, the Mighty, the Wise.
draft: He stands up for justice. There is no god except Him, the Mighty, the Wise.
hil: He advocates for justice. There is no god but He, the Mighty, the Wise.
compare: He stands up for justice. There is no god except Him, the Mighty, the Wise.

src: Und WIR machten sie zu Imamen, die zum Feuer einladen. Und am Tag der Auferstehung wird ihnen nicht beigestanden.
ref: We made them the leaders of those who call to Hell; and on the Day of Judgement they will not be helped.
draft: And WE made them into imams who invite to the fire. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will not be helped.
hil: We made them into imams who invite to the fire. And they will not be helped on the Day of Resurrection.
compare: We made them into imams who invite to the fire. And they will not be helped on the Day of Resurrection.

src: Er sagte: «Doch. Aber mein Herz soll Ruhe finden.»
ref: Ibrahim said, “Surely yes, why not?
draft: He said, "Yes. But my heart should find peace."
hil: He said, 'Yes. But my heart should find peace.'
compare: He said, "Yes. But my heart should find peace."

src: Kinder Adams! Bereits haben WIR euch Kleidung hinabgesandt, die eure Schamteile bedeckt, auch schmückende Kleidung.
ref: O sons of Adam, We have revealed to you a dress that would both hide your nakedness and be an adornment, but the raiment of piety is best.
draft: Children of Adam! We have already sent down to you clothing that covers your private parts, as well as adornment clothing.
hil: Children of Adam! We have already sent down to you clothing that covers your private parts, as well as adornment clothing.
compare: Children of Adam! We have already sent down to you clothing that covers your private parts, as well as adornment clothing.

src: Sie werden sagen: "(All dies ist) Allahs." Sprich: "Wieso also seid ihr verblendet?"
ref: Thereupon they will say, “Such greatness is only that of Allah”; say, “Then by what magic are you deceived?”
draft: You will say: "(All this is) Allah's." Say: "So why are you misguided?"
hil: They will say: "(All this is) Allah's." Say: "So why are you misled?"
compare: They will say: "(All this is) Allah's." Say: "So why are you misled?"

src: Vielmehr (soll er sagen): "Seid Gottesgelehrte mit dem, was ihr gelehrt habt und mit dem, was ihr studiert habt."
ref: Rather, 'Be you masters in that you know the Book, and in that you study.'
draft: Rather (he should say): "Be scholars of God with what you have taught and what you have studied."
hil: "Rather, he should say, 'Be scholars of God with what you have been taught and with what you have studied.'"
compare: "Rather, he should say, 'Be scholars of God with what you have been taught and with what you have studied.'"

src: Ich folge nur dem, was mir eingegeben wird.
ref: I only follow what is sent down to me."
draft: I only follow what is given to me.
hil: I only follow what is revealed to me.
compare: I only follow what is revealed to me.

src: Er (Moses) sagte: "lch tat es damals, als ich auf dem Irrweg war.
ref: (Moses) replied: "I did do that and I was in the wrong,
draft: He (Moses) said: "I did it at that time when I was misled."
hil: Moses said, 'I did it at that time when I was misguided.'
compare: Moses said, 'I did it at that time when I was misguided.'

src: Sie werden mit silbernen Spangen geschmückt sein. Und ihr Herr wird sie von einem reinen Trank trinken lassen.
ref: And adorned they shall be with bracelets of silver: and their Lord shall give them drink a beverage pure.
draft: They will be decorated with silver clasps. And their lord will let them drink from a pure drink.
hil: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their master will let them drink from a pure drink.
compare: They will be adorned with silver clasps. And their master will let them drink from a pure drink.

src: Die damit rechnen, daß sie ihrem Herrn begegnen und daß sie zu Ihm zurückkehren werden.
ref: Who are conscious that they have to meet their Lord, and to Him they have to return.
draft: Those who expect to meet their lord and that they will return to Him.
hil: Those who expect to encounter their Lord and [are aware] that they will return to Him.
compare: Those who expect to encounter their Lord and [are aware] that they will return to Him.

src: Und diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben.
ref: They are the residents of Hell where they will live for ever.
draft: And these are the companions of the fire. They will remain therein forever.
hil: And these are the companions of the Fire. They will abide therein forever.
compare: And these are the companions of the fire. They will remain therein forever.

src: Dann verdorrt es, und du siehst es gelb werden. Dann macht Er es zu zermalmtem Zeug.
ref: Thereafter it wirhereth, and thou beholdest it turn yellow; then He maketh it chaff.
draft: Then it withers, and you see it turn yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.
hil: Then it withers, and you see it turn yellow. Then He crushes it into pieces.
compare: Then it withers, and you see it turn yellow. Then He turns it into crushed stuff.

src: Und erwähne den Bruder von 'Aad, als er seine Leute in Al-ahqaf warnte, und bereits vergingen die Warner vor ihm und hinter ihm: "Dient nichts anderes als ALLAH!
ref: And remember (Hud) the brother of 'Ad, when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf (the curved sand-hills in the southern part of Arabian Peninsula).
draft: And mention the brother of Aad when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf, and already the warners had passed away before him and behind him: "Serve nothing but Allah!"
hil: And mention the brother of Aad, when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf, and already the warners before him and behind him had passed away: "Serve nothing but Allah!"
compare: And mention the brother of Aad when he warned his people in Al-Ahqaf, and already the warners had passed away before him and behind him: "Serve nothing but Allah!"

src: Aber was für ihre Teilhaber ist, das erreicht Allah nicht, während das, was für Allah ist, ihre Teilhaber erreicht.
ref: So what is for their associates reaches not God; and what is for God reaches their associates.
draft: But what is for their partners, Allah does not reach, while what is for Allah, reaches their partners.
hil: But what belongs to their partners, Allah does not attain, while what belongs to Allah, attains their partners.
compare: But what belongs to their partners, Allah does not attain, while what belongs to Allah, attains their partners.

src: Sag: Wenn ich ihn ersonnen haben sollte, so vermögt ihr für mich nichts gegen Allah (auszurichten). Er weiß sehr wohl, worüber ihr euch (ausgiebig) auslaßt.
ref: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “If I have fabricated it, then (I know that) you have no power to support me against Allah; He well knows the matters you are involved in; He is Sufficient as a Witness between me and you; and He only is the Oft Forgiving, the Most Merciful.”
draft: Say: "If I had invented it, you could not do anything against Allah for me. He knows best what you elaborate so extensively".
hil: Say: "If I were to have invented it, you could do nothing to harm me with Allah. He knows well what you discuss so extensively."
compare: Say: "If I were to have invented it, you could do nothing to harm me with Allah. He knows well what you discuss so extensively."

src: Und Nuh rief Uns ja bereits zu - welch trefflicher Erhörer sind Wir fürwahr!
ref: Noah had verily called to Us. And how gracious was He who answered (him).
draft: And Nuh called to us - what an excellent listener we truly are!
hil: And indeed Nuh called to Us - what an excellent listener We truly are!
compare: And Nuh called to us - what an excellent listener we truly are!

src: Und gib denen frohe Botschaft, die Gutes tun.
ref: So give glad tidings to those who are doers of good.
draft: And give good tidings to those who do good.
hil: Give good tidings to those who do good.
compare: And give good tidings to those who do good.

src: ALLAH wird ihnen gewiß vergelten Besseres als das, wie sie handelten, und wird ihnen noch mehr von Seiner Gunst geben. Und ALLAH gewährt Rizq, wem ER will, ohne Berechnung.
ref: That God may reward them for the best of their deeds, and bestow more on them of His bounty, for God gives whom He please without measure.
draft: "ALLAH will surely repay them with something better than what they have done, and will give them even more of His grace. And ALLAH grants Rizq (sustenance) to whom He wills, without measure."
hil: Allah will surely recompense them with something better than what they have done and will grant them more of His grace. And Allah provides Rizq (sustenance) to whomever He wills, without measure.
compare: "ALLAH will surely repay them with something better than what they have done, and will give them even more of His grace. And ALLAH grants Rizq (sustenance) to whom He wills, without measure."

src: Er macht sie deutlich für Leute, die Bescheid wissen.
ref: He manifesteth them for people who have knowledge.
draft: He makes it clear for people in the know.
hil: He makes it clear to people in the know.
compare: He makes it clear to people in the know.

src: Dann vertauschten es diejenigen, die Unrecht taten, mit einem Ausspruch, der anders war als das, was ihnen gesagt worden war. Da sandten Wir über diejenigen, die Unrecht taten, ein Zorngericht vom Himmel herab dafür, daß sie frevelten.
ref: But the wicked changed and perverted the word We had spoken to a word distorted, and We sent from heaven retribution on the wicked, for they disobeyed.
draft: Then those who did wrong substituted a statement other than that which had been said to them, so We sent down upon the wrongdoers a punishment from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying.
hil: And then those who committed injustices exchanged it for a statement other than that which had been said to them. So We sent down upon the wrongdoing a punishment from the sky for their transgression.
compare: Then those who did wrong substituted a statement other than that which had been said to them, so We sent down upon the wrongdoers a punishment from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying.

src: Und wen ALLAH abirren läßt, für den gibt es keinen Weg (zur Rechtleitung).
ref: He whom God allows to go astray has no way.
draft: And whoever Allah lets go astray, for him there is no way (to guidance).
hil: Whoever Allah leads astray, for him there is no way (to guidance).
compare: And whoever Allah lets go astray, for him there is no way (to guidance).

src: Sie gebieten das Rechte und verbieten das Verwerfliche, verrichten das Gebet und entrichten die Abgabe und gehorchen Allah und Seinem Gesandten.
ref: They advocate virtue, forbid evil, perform the prayers, practice charity, and obey God and His Messenger.
draft: They enjoin what is right and forbid what is reprehensible, perform prayer and give alms and obey Allah and His messenger.
hil: They enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong, perform the prayer and give alms, and obey Allah and His Messenger.
compare: They enjoin what is right and forbid what is reprehensible, perform prayer and give alms and obey Allah and His messenger.

src: Die Bewohner von Medina und die arabischen Beduinen in ihrer Umgebung dürfen nicht hinter dem Gesandten Gottes zurückbleiben und sich selbst ihm vorziehen. Dies, weil sie weder auf dem Weg Gottes Durst oder Mühsal oder Hunger erleiden noch einen Schritt unternehmen, der die Ungläubigen in Groll versetzt, noch einem Feind etwas zufügen, ohne daß dadurch ein gutes Werk für sie aufgezeichnet würde.
ref: It was not worthy of the people of Madina, and the Arabs of the desert around them, to abandon the Prophet of God, and to care more for themselves than for him; for there is no hardship or thirst or hunger that they know in the service of God, and no place they walk on where walking provokes the unbelievers, and no harm they receive from the enemy, but is put down as a good deed in their favour.
draft: The inhabitants of Medina and the Arab Bedouins in their vicinity may not remain behind the Messenger of God and prefer themselves to him. This is because they neither suffer thirst, hardship, or hunger on God's path, nor take a step that would upset the unbelievers, nor inflict harm on an enemy without it being recorded for them as a good deed.
hil: The inhabitants of Medinah and the people around it should not lag behind the Messenger of Allah and consider their own lives dearer than him, because they do not suffer from thirst, pain or hunger on Allah's cause, nor take a step that angers the disbelievers, nor harm an enemy without recording a good deed for them in place of all these. Allah does not waste the virtuous.
compare: The inhabitants of Medina and the Arab Bedouins in their vicinity may not remain behind the Messenger of God and prefer themselves to him. This is because they neither suffer thirst, hardship, or hunger on God's path, nor take a step that would upset the unbelievers, nor inflict harm on an enemy without it being recorded for them as a good deed.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allkräftig, allwürdig.
ref: Verily God is all-powerful and all-mighty.
draft: Surely, Allah is omnipotent, worthy of all honor.
hil: Surely, Allah is Almighty and Worthy of all honor.
compare: Surely, Allah is omnipotent, worthy of all honor.

src: Doch selbst dann, wenn sie sich mit ihrer Kleidung verhüllen, ER kennt alles, was sie verheimlichen und was sie offenlegen.
ref: But when they cover themselves up with their garments, He knows what they hide and what they expose.
draft: But even then, when they veil themselves with their clothing, HE knows everything they hide and everything they reveal.
hil: Even when they veil themselves with their clothing, He knows everything they hide and everything they reveal.
compare: Even when they veil themselves with their clothing, He knows everything they hide and everything they reveal.

src: Und das Schiff kam auf dem Güdyy zur Rast.
ref: The Ark came to rest on Mount Judi.
draft: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
hil: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
compare: And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.

src: Und rufe neben Allah keinen anderen Gott an. Es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm.
ref: And call not upon another god with God; there is no god but He.
draft: And call upon no other god beside Allah. There is no god but Him.
hil: And call upon no other god beside Allah. There is no god but Him.
compare: And call upon no other god beside Allah. There is no god but Him.

src: Sag: "Diejenigen in den Himmeln und auf Erden kennen das Verborgene nicht, nur ALLAH (kennt es)!" Und sie merken nicht, wann sie erweckt werden.
ref: Say: "No one in the heavens and the earth has knowledge of the unknown except God, nor can they know when they will be raised again.
draft: Say, "Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen except Allah, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected."
hil: Say, "Observe that those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen except Allah, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected."
compare: Say, "Those in the heavens and on earth do not know the unseen except Allah, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected."

src: Oder sagen sie etwa: "Er hat ihn sich selbst ausgedacht'"? Nein!
ref: What! They say, “He has invented the Qur'an”?
draft: Or do they say: "He came up with it himself"? No!
hil: Or do they say: 'He made it up himself?' No!
compare: Or do they say: "He came up with it himself"? No!

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ändert nichts von dem worin Menschen sind, bis sie das ändern, was sie in sich tragen. Und wenn ALLAH für Menschen Übel bestimmt, so kann es nicht aufgehalten werden.
ref: Lo! Allah changeth not the condition of a folk until they (first) change that which is in their hearts; and if Allah willeth misfortune for a folk there is none that can repel it, nor have they a defender beside Him.
draft: Sure, ALLAH does not change anything in what people are, until they change what they carry within themselves. And if ALLAH intends evil for people, it cannot be stopped.
hil: Indeed, ALLAH does not change anything in people until they change what they bring within themselves. And if ALLAH has decreed evil upon people, it cannot be stopped.
compare: Indeed, ALLAH does not change anything in people until they change what they bring within themselves. And if ALLAH has decreed evil upon people, it cannot be stopped.

src: Und unter ihnen ist eine Gruppe, die mit ihren Zungen die Schrift verdrehen, damit ihr denkt, dies gehöre zur Schrift, obwohl es nicht zur Schrift gehört, noch dazu sagen sie: "Es sei von ALLAH", doch es ist nicht von ALLAH. Und sie verbreiten Lügen im Namen ALLAHs, während sie es wissen.
ref: Among them is a section which distorts in reading the Scripture in a way that though it sounds like the Scripture, in fact it is not; yet they say it is from God, when they know it is not; and they lie about God, and knowingly.
draft: And among them is a group who twist their tongues with the scripture so that you think that it belongs to the scripture even though it does not belong to the scripture, and they also say, "It is from Allah," but it is not from Allah. And they spread lies in the name of Allah while they know it.
hil: And among them are a group who twist the scripture with their tongues so that you may think it is part of the scripture, but it is not from the scripture. They say, 'It is from Allah,' but it is not from Allah. And they spread lies in Allah's name, though they know it.
compare: And among them are a group who twist the scripture with their tongues so that you may think it is part of the scripture, but it is not from the scripture. They say, 'It is from Allah,' but it is not from Allah. And they spread lies in Allah's name, though they know it.

src: Und haltet sie an; denn sie sollen befragt werden."
ref: And detain them, for they will be questioned."
draft: "And stop them; for they shall be questioned."
hil: And stop them, for they shall be questioned.
compare: And stop them, for they shall be questioned.

src: Und ER ist mit euch, wo ihr seid.
ref: And He is with you (by His Knowledge) wheresoever you may be.
draft: And HE is with you, wherever you are.
hil: "IT" is with you wherever you are.
compare: And HE is with you, wherever you are.

src: Vielmehr ist Allah euer Schutzherr; und Er ist der beste Helfer.
ref: Allah is your Patron and He is the best of the helpers.
draft: Rather, Allah is your protector; and He is the best helper.
hil: Allah is rather your protector; and He is the best helper.
compare: Rather, Allah is your protector; and He is the best helper.

src: Fürwahr, ungläubig sind diejenigen, die sagen: "Gewiß, Allah ist einer von dreien."
ref: They are unbelievers who say, 'God is the Third of Three.
draft: Truly, those who say, "Surely Allah is one of three" are unbelievers.
hil: Verily, those who say, 'Surely Allah is one of three' are unbelievers.
compare: Truly, those who say, "Surely Allah is one of three" are unbelievers.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu Madyan ihren Bruder Shuayb. Er sagte: «O mein Volk, dienet Gott. Ihr habt keinen Gott außer Ihm. Ein deutliches Zeichen ist von eurem Herrn zu euch gekommen, so gebt volles Maß und Gewicht und zieht den Menschen nichts ab, was ihnen gehört, und stiftet nicht Unheil auf der Erde, nachdem sie in Ordnung gebracht worden ist. Das ist bestimmt besser für euch, so ihr gläubig seid.
ref: And We sent Shuaib to Madyan from their community; he said, “O my people! Worship Allah – you do not have any God except Him; indeed a clear proof has come to you from your Lord, so measure and weigh in full and do not give the people their goods diminished, and do not spread turmoil in the earth after it is organised; this is for your good, if you believe.”
draft: And (We sent) to Madyan their brother Shuayb. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. So fulfill the measure and weight and do not deprive people of their due and cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. That is better for you, if you should be believers.
hil: And (We sent) their brother Shuayb to Madyan. He said, 'O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. So fulfill the measure and weight and do not deprive people of their due and cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. That is better for you, if you should be believers.'
compare: And (We sent) to Madyan their brother Shuayb. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. There has come to you clear evidence from your Lord. So fulfill the measure and weight and do not deprive people of their due and cause not corruption upon the earth after its reformation. That is better for you, if you should be believers.

src: Seine Blütenstände sind so, als wären sie Köpfe der Satane.
ref: Its spathes are like the prickly pear.
draft: His inflorescences are as if they were heads of the devils.
hil: His inflorescences are like the heads of devils.
compare: His inflorescences are like the heads of devils.

src: (Geht also) mit unseren Zeichen. Ihr und diejenigen, die euch folgen, werden die Sieger sein.»
ref: By virtue of Our signs, you and those who follow you will be the triumphant.”
draft: "So (goes it) with our signs. You and those who follow you will be the winners."
hil: Go forth, then, with our signs. You and those who follow you will be the victors.
compare: Go forth, then, with our signs. You and those who follow you will be the victors.

src: Und Sulaiman beerbte Dawud.
ref: And Sulaiman (Solomon) inherited (the knowledge of) Dawud (David).
draft: And Solomon inherited David.
hil: And Solomon inherited David.
compare: And Solomon inherited David.

src: Kein Anderer als der Allerbarmer hält sie zurück.
ref: Nothing holds them aloft but God.
draft: No one but the Most Merciful holds it back.
hil: No one but the Most Merciful holds them back.
compare: No one but the Most Merciful holds it back.

src: So vergelten Wir den Ungerechten.
ref: That is how We requite the iniquitous.
draft: So we reward the unjust.
hil: Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.
compare: Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.

src: Und Mein Fluch soll auf dir bis zum Tage des Gerichts lasten."
ref: Upon you will be My damnation till the Day of Doom."
draft: "And my curse shall rest upon you until Judgment Day."
hil: My curse shall rest upon you until Judgment Day.
compare: "And my curse shall rest upon you until Judgment Day."

src: Entsinnt euch Meiner Gaben, die ICH euch gewährt habe, und daß ICH euch den Menschen gegenüber auszeichnete.
ref: Remember the favour of Mine, which I bestowed upon you and gave you superiority over others of your time. (by sending the Noble Messengers to your nation)
draft: Remember My gifts that I have granted you, and that I distinguished you from other people.
hil: Remember the gifts I have granted you, and that I distinguished you from other people.
compare: Remember the gifts I have granted you, and that I distinguished you from other people.

src: Sprich: "Er ist es, Der euch ins Dasein rief und Der euch Ohren und Augen und Herzen gab; (aber) gering ist es, was ihr an Dank wißt!"
ref: Say: "It is He who raised you and gave you ears and eyes and hearts. How little are the thanks you offer!"
draft: Speak: "He is the one who called you into being and who gave you ears and eyes and hearts; (but) little is what you know of gratitude!"
hil: {"output": "Say, 'He is the one who called you into being and who gave you ears and eyes and hearts; (but) little is what you know of gratitude!'"}.
compare: Speak: "He is the one who called you into being and who gave you ears and eyes and hearts; (but) little is what you know of gratitude!"

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Wenn ihr zum rituellen Gebet aufstehen wollt, dann wascht (vorher) eure Gesichter, eure Hände und Arme bis zu den Ellenbogen, benetzt eure Köpfe und (wascht) eure Füße bis zu den Knöcheln.
ref: O believers, when you stand up for the service of prayer wash your faces and hands up to elbows, and also wipe your heads, and wash your feet up to the ankles.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! When you want to stand up for ritual prayer, then wash your faces, your hands, and arms up to the elbows ( beforehand), moisten your heads, and wash your feet up to the ankles.
hil: O believers! When you wish to stand up for ritual prayer, wash your faces, your hands up to the elbows, and your feet up to the ankles. Moisten your heads beforehand.
compare: O believers! When you wish to stand up for ritual prayer, wash your faces, your hands up to the elbows, and your feet up to the ankles. Moisten your heads beforehand.

src: Dies (geschieht), weil sie dem folgten, was Allah erzürnte, und das haßten, was ihm wohlgefällig war. So macht Er ihre Werke zunichte.
ref: This is because they followed the matter which displeases Allah, and they disliked what pleases Him – He therefore squandered away all their deeds.
draft: This happens because they followed what angered Allah and hated what was pleasing to Him. Thus, He nullifies their deeds.
hil: This occurs because they followed what angered God and hated what was pleasing to Him, thus nullifying their deeds.
compare: This happens because they followed what angered Allah and hated what was pleasing to Him. Thus, He nullifies their deeds.

src: Und sag: "Die Wahrheit ist von eurem HERRN. Wer will, der soll den Iman verinnerlichen, und wer will, der soll Kufr betreiben."
ref: Say: "The truth is from your Lord: So believe if you like, or do not believe if you will."
draft: And say, "The truth is from your Lord. Whoever wishes, let him internalize faith, and whoever wishes, let him commit disbelief."
hil: And say: "The truth is from your Lord." Let whoever wishes, internalize faith, and let whoever wishes, commit disbelief.
compare: And say: "The truth is from your Lord." Let whoever wishes, internalize faith, and let whoever wishes, commit disbelief.

src: ALLAH gehört, was in den Himmeln und auf Erden ist. Gewiß, ALLAH ist Der absolut Autarke, Der Alllobenswürdige.
ref: To Allah only belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and in the earth; indeed Allah only is the Absolute, the Most Praiseworthy.
draft: ALLAH owns what is in the heavens and on earth. Indeed, ALLAH is the entirely self-sufficient, the all-glorious.
hil: Allah owns everything in the heavens and on earth. Surely, Allah is the absolute self-sufficient and the all-praiseworthy.
compare: ALLAH owns what is in the heavens and on earth. Indeed, ALLAH is the entirely self-sufficient, the all-glorious.

src: Und WIR ließen darin einen Fluß entspringen.
ref: And We made a river flow through them.
draft: And we let a river spring from it.
hil: And We caused a river to flow through it.
compare: And We caused a river to flow through it.

src: Das, was Gott für euch an Lebensunterhalt herabgesandt hat und was ihr in Verbotenes und Erlaubtes eingeteilt habt, - sprich: Hat Gott es euch erlaubt, oder erdichtet ihr etwas gegen Gott?
ref: And you have made of it lawful and unlawful." Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Has Allah permitted you (to do so), or do you invent a lie against Allah?"
draft: What God has sent down to you as a means of livelihood and what you have classified as forbidden and permissible, speak: Has God permitted it to you, or are you making up something against God?
hil: What provision has God sent down to you, and what have you classified as forbidden and permissible? Say, 'Has God permitted it to you, or are you inventing something against God?'
compare: What God has sent down to you as a means of livelihood and what you have classified as forbidden and permissible, speak: Has God permitted it to you, or are you making up something against God?

src: Und jeder Seele wird in vollem Maß zukommen, was sie getan hat. Er weiß sehr wohl Bescheid über das, was sie tun.
ref: And every soul will be repaid for its deeds in full, and He knows very well what they used to do.
draft: And every soul will receive in full measure what it has done. He knows very well what they do.
hil: And each soul will be fully recompensed for what it had done; He is well aware of what they do.
compare: And each soul will be fully recompensed for what it had done; He is well aware of what they do.

src: Diejenigen nun, die gottergeben sind, bemühen sich um den rechten Wandel.
ref: Those who have submitted have taken the right course;
draft: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right conduct.
hil: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right conduct.
compare: Those who are devoted to God strive for the right conduct.

src: Und viel Beute, die sie nehmen würden.
ref: And the many spoils that they were to take.
draft: And a lot of loot they would take.
hil: They would take a lot of loot.
compare: And a lot of loot they would take.

src: ALLAH richtet zwischen euch am Tag der Auferstehung in dem, worüber ihr uneins zu sein pflegtet."
ref: God will judge between you on the Day of Judgement in what you are at variance."
draft: "ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection regarding that which you used to differ."
hil: ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection regarding that which you used to differ.
compare: ALLAH will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection regarding that which you used to differ.

src: Nein! Vielmehr ist die Stunde (des Gerichts) der ihnen versprochene Zeitpunkt. Und die Stunde ist noch schrecklicher und bitterer.
ref: Surely the Hour will be the moment of their promise, and that moment will be calamitous and distressing.
draft: No! Rather, the hour (of judgment) is the promised time for them. And the hour is even more terrible and bitter.
hil: Rather, the Hour is their appointment. And the Hour is even more dreadful and bitter.
compare: Rather, the Hour is their appointment. And the Hour is even more dreadful and bitter.

src: angelehnt darin auf Liegen.
ref: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches.
draft: leaning on them on loungers.
hil: reclining on loungers.
compare: reclining on loungers.

src: Für diejenigen, die Gutes tun, gibt es hier im Diesseits Gutes.
ref: For those who do good in this world, is goodness.
draft: "For those who do good, there is good here in this life."
hil: For those who do good, there is good here in this world.
compare: For those who do good, there is good here in this world.

src: Dann sprachen Wir: "Geht beide zum Volk, das Unsere Zeichen verworfen hat": dann zerstörten Wir sie alle vollständig.
ref: Then We told them: "Go to the people who have rejected Our signs." Then We annihilated them completely.
draft: Then We said: "Go both of you to the people who have rejected Our signs"; then We destroyed them completely.
hil: We then said, "Go both of you to the people who have rejected Our signs," and We destroyed them completely.
compare: We then said, "Go both of you to the people who have rejected Our signs," and We destroyed them completely.

src: Doch wenn ihr in Furcht seid, dann betet zu Fuß oder im Reiten. Und wenn ihr in Sicherheit seid, gedenkt Allahs, wie Er euch das gelehrt hat, was ihr nicht wußtet.
ref: If you fear (war or danger), pray while standing or on horseback; but when you have safety again remember God, for He taught you what you did not know.
draft: But if you are in fear, then pray on foot or while riding. And when you are secure, remember Allah as He has taught you that which you did not previously know.
hil: If you are afraid, pray on foot or on horseback, but when you are secure, remember Allah as He taught you what you did not know before.
compare: But if you are in fear, then pray on foot or while riding. And when you are secure, remember Allah as He has taught you that which you did not previously know.

src: Acht Paare: zwei von den Schafen und zwei von den Ziegen.
ref: There are eight pairs, two of the species of sheep and two of goats.
draft: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.
hil: Eight pairs: two of the sheep and two of the goats.
compare: Eight pairs: two from the sheep and two from the goats.

src: Und Wir haben Mose das Buch zukommen lassen.
ref: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture [the Taurat (Torah)].
draft: And We have sent down the Book to Moses.
hil: And We have sent the book down to Moses.
compare: And We have sent the book down to Moses.

src: Und es werden sie dort ewig junge Knaben bedienen. Wenn du sie siehst, hältst du sie für verstreute Perlen.
ref: Immortal youths shall surround them, waiting upon them; when you see them, you would think they are scattered pearls.
draft: And there, forever young boys will serve them. When you see them, you consider them scattered pearls.
hil: They will be served there by eternal young boys. When you see them, you think that they are scattered pearls.
compare: And there, forever young boys will serve them. When you see them, you consider them scattered pearls.

src: Doch, mit Sicherheit! Gewiß, sein HERR war über ihn allsehend.
ref: Yes indeed; his Lord had sight of him.
draft: Yes, for sure! Certainly, his Lord was all-seeing over him.
hil: But God was certainly all-seeing over him.
compare: But God was certainly all-seeing over him.

src: Und WIR ließen diejenigen Leute, die unterdrückt wurden, erben das Östliche und das Westliche des Landes, das WIR mit Baraka erfüllt haben. Und das gute Versprechen deines HERRN für die Kinder Israils wurde vollständig eingelöst als Belohnung für die Geduld, die sie aufbrachten. Und WIR vernichteten das, was Pharao und seine Leute bewerkstelligten, und das, was sie an Bauten errichteten.
ref: And We made the people who were oppressed, the inheritors of the eastern and western parts of the land in which We placed blessings; and the good promise of your Lord was fulfilled for the Descendants of Israel – the reward of their patience; and We destroyed whatever Firaun and his people built and whatever they had contrived.
draft: And WE made those people who were oppressed inherit the Eastern and Western parts of the land which WE have blessed with Baraka. And the good promise of your LORD for the Children of Israel was fulfilled because of their patience. And WE destroyed what Pharaoh and his people had accomplished and what they had built.
hil: And We gave those people who were oppressed a share in the East and West of the land, which We have blessed. And the good promise of your Lord to the Children of Israel was fulfilled completely as a reward for their patience. And We destroyed what Pharaoh and his people had accomplished and all the structures they had built.
compare: And We gave those people who were oppressed a share in the East and West of the land, which We have blessed. And the good promise of your Lord to the Children of Israel was fulfilled completely as a reward for their patience. And We destroyed what Pharaoh and his people had accomplished and all the structures they had built.

src: Auch haben sie eine Schuldklage gegen mich erhoben, deshalb fürchte ich, daß sie mich umbringen."
ref: And they have a charge (of murder) against me. So I fear that they will kill me."
draft: "They have also filed a lawsuit against me, that's why I'm afraid they will kill me."
hil: They have also brought a charge of guilt against me, therefore I fear that they will kill me.
compare: "They have also filed a lawsuit against me, that's why I'm afraid they will kill me."

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt diejenigen, die euren Din zum Spott und zur Belustigung mißbrauchen von denjenigen, denen die Schrift vor euch zuteil wurde, und von den Kafir, nicht als Wali!
ref: O ye who believe! take not as friends those who make a mockery and fun of your religion from among those who have been vouchsafed the Book before you and other infidels.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! Do not take those who abuse your Din for ridicule and amusement from those to whom the Scripture was befores and from the Kafir, not as Wali!
hil: You who have believed, do not take as allies those who take your religion in ridicule or as amusement - those who were given the Scripture before you and the disbelievers. And fear Allah, if you should [truly] be believers.
compare: You who have believed, do not take as allies those who take your religion in ridicule or as amusement - those who were given the Scripture before you and the disbelievers. And fear Allah, if you should [truly] be believers.

src: Nimm Almosen von ihrem Besitz, auf daß du sie dadurch reinigen und läutern mögest.
ref: Accept the offerings they make from their wealth in order to cleanse and purify them for progress, and invoke blessings upon them.
draft: Take alms from their possession, so that you may purify and cleanse them thereby.
hil: Take alms from their possession, so that you may purify and cleanse them thereby.
compare: Take alms from their possession, so that you may purify and cleanse them thereby.

src: So gewähre den Ungläubigen noch eine Frist.
ref: So give a respite to the disbelievers.
draft: So grant the unbelievers an additional period of time.
hil: Grant the unbelievers an additional period of time.
compare: So grant the unbelievers an additional period of time.

src: Sie folgen einem bloßen Wahn und ihren persönlichen Neigungen, obwohl doch die Weisung ihres Herrn zu ihnen kam.
ref: They only follow conjecture and wish-fulfilment, even though guidance had come to them already from their Lord.
draft: They follow nothing but an illusion and their personal inclinations, even though the instruction of their Lord has come to them.
hil: They follow nothing but an illusion and their personal inclinations, even though the instruction of their Lord has come to them.
compare: They follow nothing but an illusion and their personal inclinations, even though the instruction of their Lord has come to them.

src: ER sagte: "Das von Mir Versprochene umfaßt nicht die Unrecht-Begehenden."
ref: He said 'My covenant shall not reach the evildoers.'
draft: He said, "What I promised does not include those who commit wrongdoings."
hil: He said, "What I have promised does not include those who commit wrongdoings."
compare: He said, "What I have promised does not include those who commit wrongdoings."

src: Das Wasser nahm ab, und die Angelegenheit war entschieden. Es hielt auf dem Djudi an.
ref: And the water was diminished (made to subside) and the Decree (of Allah) was fulfilled (i.e. the destruction of the people of Nuh (Noah).
draft: The water level dropped, and the matter was decided. It stopped at the Djudi.
hil: The water level dropped, and the matter was settled. It stopped at the Djudi.
compare: The water level dropped, and the matter was decided. It stopped at the Djudi.

src: Doch WIR sehen mit euch nicht eure Fürbittenden, die ihr unter euch als Partner (für ALLAH) angenommen habt. Gewiß, bereits ist (die Bindung) zwischen euch unterbrochen und euch ist das abhanden gekommen, was ihr angenommen habt.
ref: We do not see with you your intercessors, those you asserted to be associates in you; the bond between you is now broken; that which you ever asserted has now gone astray from you.
draft: But we do not see with you your intercessors whom you have taken as partners (for Allah) among yourselves. Indeed, the bond between you has already been broken and you have lost that which you have taken.
hil: But We do not see with you those whom you have accepted as partners (for Allah)
compare: But we do not see with you your intercessors whom you have taken as partners (for Allah) among yourselves. Indeed, the bond between you has already been broken and you have lost that which you have taken.

src: Und hätten WIR ihnen geboten: "ihr sollt euch selbst töten oder eure Wohnstätten verlassen, würden dies nur wenige von ihnen tun." Und hätten sie doch das getan, womit sie ermahnt werden, wäre es besser für sie und würde sie noch mehr (im Iman) bestärken.
ref: If We had commanded them to lay down their lives and to go forth from their homes, only a few would have obeyed; though had they followed what they had been commanded it would surely have been good for them and the strengthening of their faith.
draft: And if we had commanded them, "Kill yourselves or leave your homes," only a few of them would have done it. But if they had done what they were instructed, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened their faith even more.
hil: If we had commanded them, "You should kill yourselves or leave your homes", only a few of them would have done it. And if they had done what they were instructed, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened their faith even more.
compare: If we had commanded them, "You should kill yourselves or leave your homes", only a few of them would have done it. And if they had done what they were instructed, it would have been better for them and would have strengthened their faith even more.

src: Und (denke daran,) wenn sie (dereinst) im (Höllen)feuer miteinander streiten, dann sagen die Schwachen zu denjenigen, die sich hochmütig verhielten: "Wir waren doch eure Gefolgsleute; könnt ihr uns nun einen Teil des (Höllen)feuers abnehmen?"
ref: As they will noisily argue in the Fire, the weaker ones will say to the arrogant: "We were your followers, so will you take over some of our share of the fire?"
draft: And (remember,) when they argue with each other in the fire of Hell, the weak say to those who behave arrogantly: "We were your followers; can you now take a part of the fire of Hell from us?"
hil: And (remember,) when they argue with each other in the Fire of Hell, the weak say to those who behaved arrogantly: "We were your followers, can you now take from us a portion of the Fire?"
compare: And (remember,) when they argue with each other in the fire of Hell, the weak say to those who behave arrogantly: "We were your followers; can you now take a part of the fire of Hell from us?"

src: Wenn ihr ALLAH (Seiner Sache) eine Hasan-Anleihe gebt, wird ER euch vervielfachen und euch vergeben.
ref: If you lend a goodly loan to God, He will double it for you, and forgive you.
draft: If you give ALLAH (His matter) a good loan, HE will multiply it for you and forgive you.
hil: If ye give a goodly loan to Allah, He will multiply it for you and will forgive you, for Allah is most Grateful and Forbearing.
compare: If ye give a goodly loan to Allah, He will multiply it for you and will forgive you, for Allah is most Grateful and Forbearing.

src: Und erwähne in der Schrift Isma'il!
ref: Commemorate Ishmael in the Book.
draft: And mention Ishmael in the scripture!
hil: Mention Ishmael in the scripture!
compare: And mention Ishmael in the scripture!

src: Da wandte Er sich euch wieder gnädig zu.
ref: Then He accepted your repentance.
draft: He turned back to you in grace.
hil: Then He turned to you again with mercy. He is Relenting 'and Merciful.
compare: Then He turned to you again with mercy. He is Relenting 'and Merciful.

src: Erhaben ist Allah, der König, der Wahre!
ref: So high exalted be God, the true King!
draft: Sublime is Allah, the King, the True!
hil: Exalted is God, the real King!
compare: Sublime is Allah, the King, the True!

src: Er (Fir'aun) sagte: "Ihr glaubt an ihn, bevor ich es euch erlaube?
ref: (The Pharaoh) said: "You have come to believe without my dispensation.
draft: He (Pharaoh) said: "You believe in him before I allow you to do so?"
hil: He (Pharaoh) said, 'Do you believe in him before I permit you to do so?'
compare: He (Pharaoh) said, 'Do you believe in him before I permit you to do so?'

src: Dann warf Moses seinen Stock hin, und siehe, er verschlang (all) das, was sie vorgetäuscht hatten.
ref: Then Moses threw down his staff, and lo, it swallowed up their conjurations.
draft: Then Moses threw his staff, and behold, it devoured all that which they had made up.
hil: And then Moses threw down his rod, and behold, it devoured all that they had feigned.
compare: Then Moses threw his staff, and behold, it devoured all that which they had made up.

src: Und sie haben Gott Teilhaber gegeben: die Djinn, wo Er sie doch erschaffen hat. Und sie haben Ihm Söhne und Töchter angedichtet, ohne (richtiges) Wissen.
ref: Yet they ascribe to jinns a partnership with God, although He created them; and they ascribe to Him sons and daughters, without possessing any knowledge.
draft: And they made Allah a partner, the jinn while He created them, and they fabricated for Him sons and daughters without knowledge.
hil: And they have associated partners with God, the jinn, even though He created them. And they attributed to Him sons and daughters without knowledge.
compare: And they have associated partners with God, the jinn, even though He created them. And they attributed to Him sons and daughters without knowledge.

src: Sag: "ALLAH genügt als Zeuge zwischen mir und euch!
ref: Say: "Sufficient is Allah for a witness between me and you.
draft: Say, "ALLAH suffices as a witness between me and you!"
hil: Say: 'Allah suffices as a witness between me and you!'
compare: Say: 'Allah suffices as a witness between me and you!'

src: Sondern nur, wenn einer mit einem gesunden Herzen zu Gott kommt.»
ref: But to him who comes to God with a tranquil heart."
draft: But only if one comes to God with a healthy heart.
hil: But only when one comes to God with a healthy heart.
compare: But only if one comes to God with a healthy heart.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir vermissen den Kelch des Königs.
ref: "We cannot find the master's goblet.
draft: They said: "We miss the king's chalice."
hil: They said, "We miss the king's chalice."
compare: They said, "We miss the king's chalice."

src: Für alle sind Rangstufen bestimmt für das, was sie getan haben, und dies, damit Er ihnen ihre Taten voll erstatte. Und ihnen wird nicht Unrecht getan.
ref: Each will have a position in accordance with his deeds; and no wrong will be done to them.
draft: "For everyone, ranks are determined for what they have done, and this so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds. And they will not be wronged."
hil: Every individual has their place determined according to their deeds, so that He may fully compensate them for their actions, and they will not be wronged.
compare: "For everyone, ranks are determined for what they have done, and this so that He may fully compensate them for their deeds. And they will not be wronged."

src: Und Wir machen damit (manch) totes Land wieder lebendig; so wird auch das Herauskommen (erfolgen).
ref: And We give life therewith to a dead land. Thus will be the resurrection (of the dead).
draft: And we make (some) dead land alive again with it; thus the coming out (will succeed) as well.
hil: And indeed, We make dead land alive again with it; therefore, the emergence will also happen.
compare: And indeed, We make dead land alive again with it; therefore, the emergence will also happen.

src: (Es sind) diejenigen, wenn WIR sie im Lande festigen, dann verrichten sie ordnungsgemäß das rituelle Gebet, entrichten die Zakat, rufen zum Gebilligten auf und raten vomMißbilligten ab. Und ALLAH gehört das Anschließende von den Angelegenheiten.
ref: The people who, if We give them control in the land, would keep the prayer established and pay charity and enjoin virtue and forbid from evil; and for Allah only is the result of all works.
draft: (They are) the ones who, when WE establish them in the land, perform their prayers properly, pay the zakat, enjoin what is right, and forbid what is wrong. And to ALLAH belongs the outcome of all affairs.
hil: Those are the ones, whom when WE establish them firmly in the land, they perform the ritual prayer, pay the Zakat, enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And to ALLAH belongs the outcome of all affairs.
compare: (They are) the ones who, when WE establish them in the land, perform their prayers properly, pay the zakat, enjoin what is right, and forbid what is wrong. And to ALLAH belongs the outcome of all affairs.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch aus Erde erschuf, dann aus Nutfa, dann aus 'Alaqa, dann bringt ER euch als Kind heraus, dann damit ihr reif werdet, dann damit ihr Alte werdet - und von euch gibt es manche, deren (Seelen) vorher eingezogen werden - und damit ihr eine festgelegte Frist erreicht. Und damit ihr begreift.
ref: It is He who created you from dust, then a drop of semen, then the embryo; afterwards He brings you forth as a child; then you attain the age of manhood, and then reach old age. But some of you die before you reach the appointed term that you may haply understand.
draft: He is the One who created you from the earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [time of] maturity, then [further] that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a specified term; and perhaps you will use reason.
hil: He is the One who created you from earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, then brought you out as a child, then made you grow to maturity, then made you grow to old age. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a specified term, and perhaps you may use reason.
compare: He is the One who created you from the earth, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [time of] maturity, then [further] that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a specified term; and perhaps you will use reason.

src: Und es kamen die Brüder Yusufs und traten zu ihm ein; er erkannte sie, sie aber erkannten ihn nicht.
ref: The brothers of Joseph came (to Egypt) and visited him. He recognised them, though they did not recognise him.
draft: And the brothers of Joseph came and entered unto him; he recognized them, but they did not recognize him.
hil: And the brothers of Yusuf came and entered unto him; he recognized them, but they did not recognize him.
compare: And the brothers of Yusuf came and entered unto him; he recognized them, but they did not recognize him.

src: Seid ihr darin also gleich (und) fürchtet sie, wie ihr einander fürchtet?
ref: Whom you fear as you fear each other?
draft: Are you then equal in it (and) fear them as you fear one another?
hil: Are you then equal in it (and) fear them as you fear one another?
compare: Are you then equal in it (and) fear them as you fear one another?

src: Dies sind (die Mittel) zur Aufklärung für die Menschheit und eine Führung und Barmherzigkeit für Leute, die einen festen Glauben haben.
ref: These are precepts of wisdom for men, and guidance and grace for people who believe with certainty.
draft: These are the means of enlightenment for humanity and a guidance and mercy for people who have a firm faith.
hil: These are the means of enlightenment for mankind and a guidance and mercy for people who have a firm faith.
compare: These are the means of enlightenment for mankind and a guidance and mercy for people who have a firm faith.

src: Und zehrt nicht ihr Vermögen auf zu eurem Vermögen hinzu. Das wäre eine große Sünde.
ref: And do not consume their properties by combining them with yours, for that would be a serious sin.
draft: And do not consume your property by adding it to your wealth. That would be a great sin.
hil: Do not consume your property by adding it to your wealth, and that would be a great sin.
compare: And do not consume your property by adding it to your wealth. That would be a great sin.

src: Verderben auf den Menschen! Wie undankbar ist er!
ref: May man be slain – how ungrateful he is!
draft: Destruction upon humanity! How ungrateful he is!
hil: Calamity upon humanity! How ungrateful he is!
compare: Destruction upon humanity! How ungrateful he is!

src: Also und wer ALLAHs Hurumat hochachtet, dies ist gut für ihn bei seinem HERRN.
ref: Apart from this, whoever respects the sacred ordinances of God, will find a better reward for him with his Lord.
draft: So whoever respects ALLAH's Hurumat, this is good for him with his LORD.
hil: And whoever respects ALLAH's prohibitions, it is good for him before his Lord.
compare: And whoever respects ALLAH's prohibitions, it is good for him before his Lord.

src: Und (erinnere daran), als WIR dir sagten: "Gewiß, dein HERR wird die Menschen zugrunde richten!" Und WIR machten das Traumgesicht, dasWIR dich sehen ließen, nur als Fitna für die Menschen, so auch den verfluchten Baum im Quran. Und WIR ermahnen sie, doch dies bestärkt sie nur zu einer noch größeren Übertretung.
ref: And when We proclaimed to you, “Indeed all mankind is within the control of your Lord”; and We did not create the spectacle* which We showed you except to try mankind, and the Tree** which is cursed in the Qur’an; and We warn them – so nothing increases for them except extreme rebellion. (* The Ascent of the Holy Prophet to the heavens and beyond, which the disbelievers denied as just a dream. ** The Zakkum tree which will grow in hell and be the food for its inhabitants.)
draft: And (remember) when WE told you: "Surely, your Lord will destroy the people." And WE made the vision which WE showed you and the cursed tree in the Quran only a trial for the people. And WE warn them, but it only increases their transgression.
hil: And (remember) when We told you: 'Surely, your Lord will destroy the people.' And We made the vision which we showed you and the cursed tree in the Qur'an only as a temptation for men. We warn them, but it only increases their transgression.
compare: And (remember) when WE told you: "Surely, your Lord will destroy the people." And WE made the vision which WE showed you and the cursed tree in the Quran only a trial for the people. And WE warn them, but it only increases their transgression.

src: Und er sprach: "O meine Söhne, zieht nicht durch ein einziges Tor ein, sondern zieht durch verschiedene Tore ein; ich kann euch nichts gegen Allah nützen. Die Entscheidung ruht bei Allah allein.
ref: (As they were leaving) their father said to them: "O my sons, do not seek one approach but employ different ways (of attaining your object). If anything should befall you from God I shall not be able to avert it, for all authority belongs to God.
draft: And he said, "O my sons, do not enter through a single gate, but enter through different gates; I cannot be of any use to you against Allah. The decision rests solely with Allah."
hil: And he said, "My sons, do not enter through a single gate, but enter through different gates. I cannot be of any use to you against Allah. The decision rests solely with Allah."
compare: And he said, "My sons, do not enter through a single gate, but enter through different gates. I cannot be of any use to you against Allah. The decision rests solely with Allah."

src: Da sagte er: "O mein Volk, dient Allah, erwartet den Jüngsten Tag und richtet auf der Erde nicht unheilstiftend Verderben an."
ref: He said: "O people, worship God and be ready for the Day of Resurrection. Do no evil, and create no mischief in the land."
draft: He said, "O my people, worship Allah, expect the Day of Judgment, and do not spread mischief on earth."
hil: He said, "O my people, worship Allah, expect the Day of Judgment, and do not spread mischief on earth."
compare: He said, "O my people, worship Allah, expect the Day of Judgment, and do not spread mischief on earth."

src: Ist es denn für die Menschen verwunderlich, daß Wir einem Mann von ihnen (als Offenbarung) eingegeben haben: "Warne die Menschen und verkünde denen, die glauben, die frohe Botschaft, daß sie bei ihrem Herrn einen wahrhaftigen Stand haben"?
ref: Are the people astonished that a man who is one of them was commanded by Us to warn them and to bring glad tidings to those who believe that they have a true precedence with their Lord?
draft: Is it surprising for people that we have revealed to a man from among them, "Warn the people and give good news to those who believe that they are in a truthful position with their Lord"?
hil: Is it amazing for people that we revealed to a man from among them (as revelation): 'Warn people and give good news to those who believe that they have a true position with their Lord'?
compare: Is it amazing for people that we revealed to a man from among them (as revelation): 'Warn people and give good news to those who believe that they have a true position with their Lord'?

src: Als der Schrecken von Abraham gewichen und die frohe Botschaft zu ihm gekommen war, begann er mit Uns über das Volk von Lot zu streiten.
ref: When Abraham's fear was dispelled, and the good news had come to him, he pleaded for the people of Lot with Us.
draft: When the terror had subsided from Abraham and the happy news had come to him, he began to argue with Us about the people of Lot.
hil: When the terror had passed from Abraham and the good news had come to him, he began to argue with us about the people of Lot.
compare: When the terror had subsided from Abraham and the happy news had come to him, he began to argue with Us about the people of Lot.

src: Das ist, was euch für den Tag der Abrechnung verheißen ist.
ref: This is what is promised you for the Day of Reckoning.
draft: This is what is promised to you for the day of reckoning.
hil: This is what is promised to you for the Day of Judgment.
compare: This is what is promised to you for the Day of Judgment.

src: Da fanden sie in ihr eine Mauer, die einzustürzen drohte, und so richtete er sie auf.
ref: There they found a wall that was crumbling, which he repaired.
draft: Then they found a wall in her that was about to collapse, so he fixed it.
hil: And then they found in it a wall that was about to collapse, and so he straightened it up.
compare: And then they found in it a wall that was about to collapse, and so he straightened it up.

src: Das verursacht dem Propheten Ungelegenheit, und er ist scheu vor euch, jedoch Allah ist nicht scheu vor der Wahrheit.
ref: And when ye ask of them aught, ask it of them from behind a curtain.
draft: This causes inconvenience to the prophet, and he is shy before you, but Allah is not shy of the truth.
hil: This causes inconvenience to the Prophet, and he is shy before you, but Allah is not shy of the truth.
compare: This causes inconvenience to the prophet, and he is shy before you, but Allah is not shy of the truth.

src: Sie machten für ihn, was er begehrte: Paläste und Bildwerke, Becken wie Teiche und feststehende Kochbottiche: "Wirkt ihr vom Hause Davids in Dankbarkeit." Und nur wenige von Meinen Dienern sind dankbar.
ref: fashioning for him whatsoever he would -- places of worship, statues, porringers like water-troughs, and anchored cooking-pots. 'Labour, O House of David, in thankfulness; for few indeed are those that are thankful among My servants.'
draft: They did for him what he coveted: palaces and statues, pools like ponds and fixed cooking tubs: "Be grateful, you are from the house of David." And only a few of My servants are grateful.
hil: They did for him what he desired: palaces and sculptures, pools like ponds, and fixed cooking troughs. "Be grateful that you are from the house of David." And only a few of My servants are grateful.
compare: They did for him what he desired: palaces and sculptures, pools like ponds, and fixed cooking troughs. "Be grateful that you are from the house of David." And only a few of My servants are grateful.

src: Sei geduldig.
ref: So be patient.
draft: Be patient.
hil: Be patient.
compare: Be patient.

src: So wurde Fir'aun sein böses Tun ausgeschmückt, und er wurde vom (rechten) Weg abgehalten. Aber Fir'auns listige Tat wird nur zugrunde gehen.
ref: So the evil of his deeds was decked out fair to Pharaoh, and he was barred from the way, and Pharaoh's guile came only to ruin.
draft: Thus Pharaoh's evil deed was adorned for him, and he was turned away from the (right) path. But Pharaoh's cunning actions will only result in his ruin.
hil: Pharaoh's evil deeds were made attractive to him, and he was led astray from the right path. But Pharaoh's cunning plan will only lead to his downfall.
compare: Pharaoh's evil deeds were made attractive to him, and he was led astray from the right path. But Pharaoh's cunning plan will only lead to his downfall.

src: (Schon) vor ihnen haben das Volk Nuhs und nach diesen die Gruppierungen (ihre Gesandten) der Lüge bezichtigt.
ref: The people of Noah had denied before them, and many factions after them.
draft: (Already) before them, the people of Nuh (Noah) and after them, the factions (accused their messengers) of lying.
hil: (Already) before them, the people of Nuh (Noah) and after them, the factions (accused their messengers) of lying.
compare: (Already) before them, the people of Nuh (Noah) and after them, the factions (accused their messengers) of lying.

src: Und wenn ihr euch mit ihnen zusammentut, so sind sie eure Brüder. Allah weiß den Unheilstifter vom Heilstifter (zu unterscheiden).
ref: Say: "The best thing to do is what is for their good; if ye mix their affairs with yours, they are your brethren; but Allah knows the man who means mischief from the man who means good.
draft: And if you ally yourselves with them, then they are your brothers. Allah distinguishes between the mischief makers and the reformers (literally: the healer).
hil: If you ally yourselves with them, then they are your brothers. Allah knows how to distinguish between those who cause mischief and those who bring benefit (literally: the healer).
compare: If you ally yourselves with them, then they are your brothers. Allah knows how to distinguish between those who cause mischief and those who bring benefit (literally: the healer).

src: Die Woge trennte sie beide, und so war er einer von denen, die ertränkt wurden.
ref: And a wave came between them, and he was among those who were drowned.
draft: The wave separated both of them, and so he was one of those who drowned.
hil: The wave separated both of them, and so he was one of those who drowned.
compare: The wave separated both of them, and so he was one of those who drowned.

src: Dann sagten sie: "ALLAH gegenüber üben wir doch Tawakkul.
ref: They answered: "We have placed our trust in God.
draft: Then they said, "We practice Tawakkul towards Allah."
hil: Then they said, 'We practice Tawakkul towards Allah'.
compare: Then they said, "We practice Tawakkul towards Allah."

src: Und wirf nur, was in deiner Rechten ist; es wird das verschlingen, was sie gemacht haben; denn das, was sie gemacht haben, ist nur die List eines Zauberers. Und ein Zauberer soll keinen Erfolg haben, woher er auch kommen mag."
ref: Throw down what is in your right hand: It will swallow up what they have conjured. For what they have fashioned is only a trick of the sorcerer; and a sorcerer does not succeed wherever he may come."
draft: "And throw only what is in your right hand; it will consume what they have made; for what they have made is only the trickery of a magician. And a magician shall not succeed, [no matter] from wherever he may come."
hil: And throw only that which is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have made. Indeed, what they have made is nothing but the trick of a magician. And the magician will not succeed [no matter] from wherever he may come.
compare: "And throw only what is in your right hand; it will consume what they have made; for what they have made is only the trickery of a magician. And a magician shall not succeed, [no matter] from wherever he may come."

src: Bitte also deinen Herrn für uns, daß Er uns (Speise) von dem hervorbringe, was die Erde wachsen läßt, (von) Kräutern, Gurken, Knoblauch, Linsen und Zwiebeln Da sagte er: "Wollt ihr etwa das, was geringer ist, in Tausch nehmen für das, was besser ist?
ref: We shall never put up with only one kind of food, so call upon your Lord to produce for us what the earth grows – some herbs, cucumbers, corn, lentils and onions”; he said, “What!
draft: Please ask your lord for us, that He may bring forth for us food from what the earth produces - herbs, cucumbers, garlic, lentils, and onions." He said, "Do you wish to exchange what is better for what is inferior?"
hil: "Please ask your Lord on our behalf to produce from what the earth grows - herbs, cucumbers, garlic, lentils, and onions - food for us." He said, "Do you want to exchange what is inferior for what is better?"
compare: Please ask your lord for us, that He may bring forth for us food from what the earth produces - herbs, cucumbers, garlic, lentils, and onions." He said, "Do you wish to exchange what is better for what is inferior?"

src: Und wer mehr Gutes freiwillig gibt, so ist dies besser für ihn. Und wenn ihr fastet, ist es besser für euch, würdet ihr es nur wissen.
ref: Should anyone do good of his own accord, that is better for him, and to fast is better for you, should you know.
draft: And whoever voluntarily gives more (do) good, it is better for him. And if you fast, it is better for you, if you only knew.
hil: And whoever voluntarily gives more (does) good, it is better for him. And if you fast, it is better for you if you only knew.
compare: And whoever voluntarily gives more (does) good, it is better for him. And if you fast, it is better for you if you only knew.

src: Hast du nicht gesehen, wie dein Herr an den Aad gehandelt hat,
ref: Have you not seen what your Lord did to the 'Ad
draft: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with Aad?
hil: Do you not see how your Lord dealt with Aad?
compare: Do you not see how your Lord dealt with Aad?

src: Sag: "Den Überschuß."
ref: Tell them: "The utmost you can spare."
draft: Say, "The surplus."
hil: Say, "The surplus."
compare: Say, "The surplus."

src: Dies sind die Verse des Quran - eines deutlichen Buches.
ref: THESE are the verses of the Qur'an, and collection of explicit laws,
draft: These are the verses of the Quran - a clear book.
hil: These are the verses of the Quran - a perspicuous book.
compare: These are the verses of the Quran - a perspicuous book.

src: O Prophet, Wir erlaubten dir deine Gattinnen, denen du ihre Brautgabe gegeben hast, und jene, die du von Rechts wegen aus (der Zahl) derer besitzt, die Allah dir als Kriegsbeute gegeben hat, und die Töchter deines Vaterbruders und die Töchter deiner Vaterschwestern und die Töchter deines Mutterbruders und die Töchter deiner Mutterschwestern, die mit dir ausgewandert sind, und jedwede gläubige Frau, die sich dem Propheten schenkt, vorausgesetzt, daß der Prophet sie zu heiraten wünscht; (dies gilt) nur für dich und nicht für die Gläubigen. Wir haben bereits bekanntgegeben, was Wir ihnen bezüglich ihrer Frauen und jener, die sie von Rechts wegen besitzen, verordnet haben, so daß sich (daraus) keine Verlegenheit für dich ergibt. Und Allah ist Allverzeihend, Barmherzig.
ref: O Prophet, We have made lawful for thee thy wives whom thou hast given their wages and what thy right hand owns, spoils of war that God has given thee, and the daughters of thy uncles paternal and aunts paternal, thy uncles maternal and aunts maternal, who have emigrated with thee, and any woman believer, if she give herself to the Prophet and if the Prophet desire to take her in marriage, for thee exclusively, apart from the believers -- We know what We have imposed upon them touching their wives and what their right hands own -- that there may be no fault in thee; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
draft: O Prophet, we have allowed you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those whom your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you [of captives] and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a believing woman if she gives herself to the Prophet [and] if the Prophet wishes to marry her, [this is] only for you, excluding the [other] believers. We certainly know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and those their right hands possess, [but this is for you] in order that there will be upon you no discomfort. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
hil: O Prophet, We have made lawful to you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you [of captives] and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who emigrated with you, and a believing woman if she gives herself to the Prophet [and] if the Prophet wishes to marry her. This is only for you, excluding the [other] believers. We have already made known concerning you the way wherein We enjoined upon them who were before you, and We laid upon you the same commandment, that you observe God's commands and abstain from evil; and to that end We have revealed this reminder unto you. And Allah is All-Forgiving, All-Merciful.
compare: O Prophet, we have allowed you your wives to whom you have given their due compensation and those whom your right hand possesses from what Allah has returned to you [of captives] and the daughters of your paternal uncles and the daughters of your paternal aunts and the daughters of your maternal uncles and the daughters of your maternal aunts who emigrated with you and a believing woman if she gives herself to the Prophet [and] if the Prophet wishes to marry her, [this is] only for you, excluding the [other] believers. We certainly know what We have made obligatory upon them concerning their wives and those their right hands possess, [but this is for you] in order that there will be upon you no discomfort. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
