hil: And (remember) when WE shook the mountain above them like an awning when they thought it would fall on them. Take seriously what WE have given you and remember it so that you may act according to Taqwa.
compare: And (remember) when WE shook the mountain above them like an awning when they thought it would fall on them. Take seriously what WE have given you and remember it so that you may act according to Taqwa.

src: Als Freudenbote und Warner.
ref: Announcing happy news and warnings.
draft: As a messenger of joy and warning.
hil: As a messenger of joy and warning.
compare: As a messenger of joy and warning.

src: Diejenigen, die glaubten und ausgewandert sind und sich mit ihrem Vermögen und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf dem Weg Gottes eingesetzt haben, und diejenigen, die (jene) untergebracht und unterstützt haben, sind untereinander Freunde. Mit denen aber, die glauben und nicht ausgewandert sind, habt ihr keine Freundschaft zu pflegen, bis sie auswandern. Wenn sie euch jedoch um Unterstützung wegen der (euch gemeinsamen) Religion bitten, so habt ihr die Pflicht zur Unterstützung, außer gegen Leute, zwischen denen und euch eine Vertragspflicht besteht. Und Gott sieht wohl, was ihr tut.
ref: Indeed those who accepted faith and left their homes and belongings for Allah, and fought with their wealth and their lives in Allah's cause, and those who gave shelter and provided help, are the heirs of one another; and those who believed but did not leave their homes – you have no right in their estates until they migrate; and if they seek help from you in the matter of religion then it is your duty to provide help, except against the people between whom and you is a treaty; and Allah sees your deeds.
draft: Those who believed and emigrated and strove hard in the cause of Allah with their wealth and their lives are greater in rank in the sight of Allah. And it is they who are the beneficiaries. Their Lord gives them good tidings of mercy from Him, and approval, and gardens for them wherein is enduring pleasure. They will abide therein forever. Indeed, Allah has with Him a great reward. As for the ones who believed but did not emigrate, you do not owe them any obligation of friendship until they emigrate. But if they seek your help in Religion, it is your duty to give them help, except against a people with whom you have a treaty of mutual alliance. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.
hil: Those who believed and emigrated and strove hard in the cause of Allah with their wealth and their lives are greater in rank in the sight of Allah. And it is they who are the beneficiaries. Their Lord gives them good tidings of mercy from Him, and approval, and gardens for them wherein is enduring pleasure. They will abide therein forever. Indeed, Allah has with Him a great reward. As for those believers who did not emigrate, you are not obliged to befriend them until they do so. However, if they seek your help in religion, you must help them, except for those who have a treaty with you. Allah watches over everything you do.
compare: Those who believed and emigrated and strove hard in the cause of Allah with their wealth and their lives are greater in rank in the sight of Allah. And it is they who are the beneficiaries. Their Lord gives them good tidings of mercy from Him, and approval, and gardens for them wherein is enduring pleasure. They will abide therein forever. Indeed, Allah has with Him a great reward. As for those believers who did not emigrate, you are not obliged to befriend them until they do so. However, if they seek your help in religion, you must help them, except for those who have a treaty with you. Allah watches over everything you do.

src: Und Wir gaben bereits Dawud und Sulaiman Wissen. Und sie sagten: "(Alles) Lob gehört Allah, der uns vor vielen Seiner gläubigen Diener bevorzugt hat!"
ref: We gave David and Solomon knowledge; and they said: "All praise be to God who has favoured us over many of His creatures who believe."
draft: And We had already given David and Solomon knowledge. And they said, "All praise is [due] to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants."
hil: And We have already bestowed knowledge upon David and Solomon. And they said, 'All praise is due to God, Who has preferred us over many of His believing servants.'
compare: And We had already given David and Solomon knowledge. And they said, "All praise is [due] to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants."

src: Dies sind die Ayat der Schrift und des erläuternden Quran.
ref: These are the verses of the Book and the perspicuous oration.
draft: These are the verses of the scripture and the explanatory Quran.
hil: These are the verses of the Book and the enlightening Quran.
compare: These are the verses of the scripture and the explanatory Quran.

src: Diejenigen, die glaubten und ausgewandert sind und sich mit ihrem Vermögen und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf dem Weg Gottes eingesetzt haben, und diejenigen, die (jene) untergebracht und unterstützt haben, sind untereinander Freunde.
ref: Those who accepted the faith and set out of their homes, and fought in the way of God wealth and soul, and those who gave them shelter and helped them, are friends of one another.
draft: Those who believe and have emigrated and have used their wealth and their own person on the path of God, and those who have accommodated and supported them, are friends among themselves.
hil: Those who have believed and emigrated and have used their wealth and their own person on the path of God, and those who have accommodated and supported them, are friends among themselves.
compare: Those who believe and have emigrated and have used their wealth and their own person on the path of God, and those who have accommodated and supported them, are friends among themselves.

src: Jede Trinkzeit soll (dann abwechselnd) wahrgenommen werden.
ref: Each one's right to drink being established (by turns).
draft: Every drinking time should be taken (alternately) then.
hil: Every drinking time should be perceived (alternately) then.
compare: Every drinking time should be perceived (alternately) then.

src: Und hütet euch vor einem Tag, an dem keine Seele etwas anstelle einer anderen übernehmen kann und von keiner Fürsprache noch Ersatz(leistung) angenommen wird und ihnen keine Hilfe zuteil wird!
ref: Take heed of the day when no man will be useful to man in the least, when no intercession matter nor ransom avail, nor help reach them.
draft: And beware of a day when no soul can take the place of another, and no intercession or replacement will be accepted from them, and they will receive no help!
hil: Beware of the day when no soul can replace another, nor will intercession or compensation be accepted from them, nor will they receive any help!
compare: And beware of a day when no soul can take the place of another, and no intercession or replacement will be accepted from them, and they will receive no help!

src: Doch WIR lassen es nur nach einem bekannten Maß nach und nach hinabsenden.
ref: And We send it not down except in a known measure.
draft: However, WE only let it gradually sink according to a known measure.
hil: We, however, gradually lower it only according to a known measure.
compare: However, WE only let it gradually sink according to a known measure.

src: Er wollte euch aber in alledem, was Er euch gegeben hat, auf die Probe stellen. Darum sollt ihr um die guten Dinge wetteifern.
ref: If Allah willed, He would have made you one nation, but that (He) may test you in what He has given you; so strive as in a race in good deeds.
draft: He wanted to put you to the test in all that He has given you. Therefore, you should strive for the good things.
hil: But He wanted to test you in all that He has given you. Therefore, you should strive for the good things.
compare: He wanted to put you to the test in all that He has given you. Therefore, you should strive for the good things.

src: Und Gottes Wille wird durch nichts vereitelt weder in den Himmeln noch auf der Erde. Er weiß Bescheid und ist mächtig.
ref: And Allah is not such that anything in the heavens or in the earth can break away from His control; indeed He is All Knowing, Able.
draft: And God's will is not thwarted by anything, neither in the heavens nor on earth. He knows what's going on and is powerful.
hil: And God's will is not thwarted by anything, neither in the heavens nor on earth. He knows what's going on and is powerful.
compare: And God's will is not thwarted by anything, neither in the heavens nor on earth. He knows what's going on and is powerful.

src: Er ist ja eine Erinnerung.
ref: Verily this Qur'an is an Admonition.
draft: He is a memory.
hil: He is indeed a memory.
compare: He is indeed a memory.

src: DU hast mich aus Feuer geschaffen, aber ihn hast DU aus Lehm geschaffen."
ref: "You created me from fire, and him from clay."
draft: "You have created me from fire, but you have created him from clay."
hil: You created me from fire, but you created him from clay.
compare: "You have created me from fire, but you have created him from clay."

src: O die ihr glaubt, zehrt nicht euren Besitz untereinander auf nichtige Weise auf, es sei denn, daß es sich um einen Handel in gegenseitigem Einvernehmen handelt. Und tötet euch nicht selbst (gegenseitig). Allah ist gewiß Barmherzig gegen euch.
ref: O you who believe! do not devour your property among yourselves falsely, except that it be trading by your mutual consent; and do not kill your people; surely Allah is Merciful to you.
draft: O you who believe, do not consume one another's property unjustly but only [in lawful] business by mutual consent. And do not kill yourselves [or one another]. Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.
hil: O you who believe, do not consume one another's property unjustly but only [in lawful] business by mutual consent. And do not kill yourselves [or one another]. Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.
compare: O you who believe, do not consume one another's property unjustly but only [in lawful] business by mutual consent. And do not kill yourselves [or one another]. Indeed, Allah is to you ever Merciful.

src: Diejenigen, die über ihn uneins sind, sind im Zweifel über ihn.
ref: Those who disagree in the matter are only lost in doubt.
draft: Those who are divided about him are doubtful about him.
hil: Those who are divided about him are doubtful about him.
compare: Those who are divided about him are doubtful about him.

src: WIR werden ihnen doch noch Unsere Ayat in allen Bereichen zeigen und an ihnen selber, damit ihnen deutlich wird, daß er (der Quran) gewiß dieWahrheit ist.
ref: We will show Our signs to them in the horizons of the external world and within themselves, until it becomes clear to them that it's the truth.
draft: We will still show them our verses in all areas and to themselves, so that it becomes clear to them that it (the Quran) is certainly the truth.
hil: We will still show them Our signs in all areas and in themselves, so that it becomes clear to them that the Quran is indeed the truth.
compare: We will still show them Our signs in all areas and in themselves, so that it becomes clear to them that the Quran is indeed the truth.

src: Weshalb, wenn euch gesagt wird: "Brecht auf fi-sabilillah", werdet ihr träge an der Stelle haftend?!
ref: What is the matter with you, that when it is said to you, “Migrate in Allah's cause”, you sit on the ground with heaviness?
draft: Why, when you are told, "Set out in the path of Allah," do you linger with heaviness in your heart?
hil: Why do you become inactive at the spot instead of moving forward in the path of Allah when you are told to do so?
compare: Why, when you are told, "Set out in the path of Allah," do you linger with heaviness in your heart?

src: Und ER machte euch aus euren Partnerwesen Kinder und Enkel und gewährte euch Rizq von den Tay-yibat.
ref: He has created your sons and grandsons from your spouses and has given you pure things for your sustenance.
draft: And HE made you children and grandchildren out of your partner beings and granted you Rizq from the Tay-yibat.
hil: He made you children and grandchildren from your partner beings and granted you sustenance from the good things.
compare: He made you children and grandchildren from your partner beings and granted you sustenance from the good things.

src: Sie schwören euch, damit ihr mit ihnen zufrieden seid.
ref: They will plead on oath that you accept them.
draft: They swear to you, so that you are satisfied with them.
hil: They swear before you that you may be pleased with them; so if you become pleased with them, then indeed Allah will never be pleased with the sinful.
compare: They swear before you that you may be pleased with them; so if you become pleased with them, then indeed Allah will never be pleased with the sinful.

src: Dies, weil sie ALLAHs Ayat gegenüber Kufr zu betreiben und die Propheten zu Unrecht zu töten pflegten. Dies war für das, wie sie sich widersetzten und zu übertreten pflegten.
ref: Therefore settle down in Egypt or any city, where you will get what you demand”; and disgrace and misery were destined for them; and they returned towards Allah’s wrath; that was because they disbelieved in Allah’s signs and wrongfully martyred the Prophets; that was for their disobedience and transgression.
draft: This is because they used to commit Kufr against the verses of Allah and used to unjustly kill the Prophets. This was due to their opposition and transgression.
hil: This is because they disbelieved in Allah's signs and used to unjustly kill the prophets. This was due to their opposition and transgression.
compare: This is because they disbelieved in Allah's signs and used to unjustly kill the prophets. This was due to their opposition and transgression.

src: Bereits brachten wir dir eine Aya von deinem HERRN. Und Salam sei auf demjenigen, welcher der Rechtleitung folgt.
ref: We bring you a sign from your Lord, and peace be upon him who follows guidance.
draft: We have already brought you an Aya from your Lord, and peace be upon the one who follows the guidance.
hil: We have already brought you a sign from your Lord, and peace be upon those who follow the guidance.
compare: We have already brought you a sign from your Lord, and peace be upon those who follow the guidance.

src: Und wenn sie darauf nicht reagieren, dann wisset, es ist mit Allahs Wissen offenbart worden; und es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm.
ref: If they do not answer you, then know it has been revealed with the knowledge of God, and that there is no god but He.
draft: And if they do not respond to it, then know that it has been revealed with Allah's knowledge; and there is no god but Him.
hil: And if they do not respond, know that it has been revealed with Allah's knowledge; and there is no god but Him.
compare: And if they do not respond, know that it has been revealed with Allah's knowledge; and there is no god but Him.

src: Allah hat doch das Wort jener gehört, die mit dir wegen ihres Mannes stritt und sich vor Allah beklagte.
ref: God has heard the words of her that disputes with thee concerning her husband, and makes complaint unto God.
draft: Allah has heard the words of those who disputed with you concerning their husband and complained to Allah.
hil: Allah has indeed heard the speech of the woman who is arguing with you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) concerning her husband and is complaining to Allah; and Allah hears the conversation of you both; indeed Allah is All Hearing, All Knowing.
compare: Allah has heard the words of those who disputed with you concerning their husband and complained to Allah.

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu "Ad ihren Bruder Hud.
ref: And We sent Hud, their brother, to the people of 'Ad.
draft: And (We sent) to "Ad their brother Hud.
hil: And to 'Ad (people, We sent) their brother Hud.
compare: And to 'Ad (people, We sent) their brother Hud.

src: Gib mir ein, daß ich mich Deiner Wohltat, die DU mir und meinen Eltern gewährt hast, dankbar erweise, und daß ich gottgefällig Gutes tue, woran DU Wohlgefallen findest.
ref: Help me to be grateful for Your favours which You have bestowed upon me, and upon both my parents, and to do good deeds that will please You.
draft: Admit that I show gratitude for your kindness that you have shown to me and my parents, and that I do good deeds pleasing to God, which you find pleasing.
hil: Grant me that I may show gratitude for Your benevolence towards me and my parents, and that I may do good deeds pleasing to God, that You find pleasing.
compare: Grant me that I may show gratitude for Your benevolence towards me and my parents, and that I may do good deeds pleasing to God, that You find pleasing.

src: Gewiß, sie haben sehr viele von den Menschen in die Irre geführt.
ref: They have indeed led astray many among mankind.
draft: Certainly, they have misled many of the people.
hil: Certainly, they have misled many of the people.
compare: Certainly, they have misled many of the people.

src: Alhamdulillah: Alles Lob gebührt ALLAH, Der die Himmel und die Erde erschaffen und die Finsternis und das Licht gemacht hat. Dann (trotzdem) stellen diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, ihrem HERRN etwas gleich.
ref: All praise is to Allah, Who has created the heavens and the earth, and has created darkness and light; yet the disbelievers appoint equals (false deities) to their Lord!
draft: Alhamdulillah: All praise is due to Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth and made darkness and light. Yet those who committed disbelief associate (others with) their Lord.
hil: All praise is due to Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth and made darkness and light. Yet those who committed disbelief associate something with their Lord.
compare: Alhamdulillah: All praise is due to Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth and made darkness and light. Yet those who committed disbelief associate (others with) their Lord.

src: Aber Gott läßt nicht unbeachtet, was ihr tut.
ref: God is not unaware of all you do.
draft: But God does not disregard what you do.
hil: God does not overlook what you do.
compare: But God does not disregard what you do.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt euch eure Eltern und eure Geschwister nicht als Wali, wenn sie den Kufr dem Iman vorziehen. Und wer von euch sie als Wali nimmt, diese sind die wirklichen Unrecht-Begehenden.
ref: O you who believe, do not hold your fathers and brothers as friends if they hold disbelief more dear than faith; and those of you who do so are iniquitous.
draft: You, who have internalized faith! Do not take your parents and your siblings as protectors if they prefer Kufr over faith. And whoever of you takes them as protectors, these are the real wrongdoers.
hil: O ye who believe! Take not your fathers and your brothers for friends if they prefer infidelity to faith. And whoever of you takes them as friends, they are the real wrongdoers.
compare: O ye who believe! Take not your fathers and your brothers for friends if they prefer infidelity to faith. And whoever of you takes them as friends, they are the real wrongdoers.

src: Und ER ist Derjenige, Der aus dem Wasser einen Menschen erschuf, dann machte ER ihn zur Abstammung und Verschwägerung. Und dein HERR ist immer allmächtig.
ref: And it is He Who created man from water, then appointed relatives and in-laws for him; and your Lord is All Able.
draft: And HE is the One who created a human being from water, then made him into kinship and affinity. And your Lord is always omnipotent.
hil: He is the One who created a human being from water, then made him into kinship and affinity. And your Lord is always omnipotent.
compare: And HE is the One who created a human being from water, then made him into kinship and affinity. And your Lord is always omnipotent.

src: Und er betrat die Stadt um eine Zeit, da ihre Bewohner in einem Zustand der Unachtsamkeit waren; und er fand da zwei Männer, die miteinander kämpften.
ref: He came to the city when the people were in a care-free mood, and saw two men quarrelling, one belonging to his community, the other to his enemies.
draft: And he entered the city at a time when its inhabitants were careless; and there he found two men fighting with each other.
hil: And he entered the city at a time when its inhabitants were heedless, and he found two men there fighting with each other.
compare: And he entered the city at a time when its inhabitants were heedless, and he found two men there fighting with each other.

src: Als er dort ankam, wurde ihm vom rechten Ufer des Tales im gesegneten Fleck (Land) aus dem Baum zugerufen: "O Musa, gewiß, Ich bin Allah, der Herr der Weltenbewohner."
ref: When he drew near, a voice called out to him from the tree on the blessed spot on the right side of the valley: "O Moses, I am verily God, the Lord of all the worlds.
draft: When he arrived there, he was called by a tree on the blessed spot (land) on the right bank of the valley: "O Musa, surely I am Allah, the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds."
hil: When he arrived there, a tree on the blessed spot (land) on the right bank of the valley called out to him: "O Moses, surely I am Allah, the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds."
compare: When he arrived there, he was called by a tree on the blessed spot (land) on the right bank of the valley: "O Musa, surely I am Allah, the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds."

src: Bringt sie nicht heraus aus ihren Wohnstätten! Und sie gehen nicht weg, außer wenn sie eine bewiesene Abscheulichkeit begehen.
ref: Do not expel them from their houses, nor should they go away themselves, unless they are openly guilty of adultery.
draft: Do not bring them out of their dwellings! And they do not leave, unless they commit a proven atrocity.
hil: Do not bring them out of their dwellings! And they do not leave, unless they commit a proven atrocity.
compare: Do not bring them out of their dwellings! And they do not leave, unless they commit a proven atrocity.

src: Allah hat Wohlgefallen an ihnen, und sie haben Wohlgefallen an Ihm. Jene sind Allahs Gruppierung.
ref: Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah.
draft: "Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. They are the group of Allah."
hil: Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. They are the group of Allah.
compare: "Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. They are the group of Allah."

src: Und haltet nicht am Eheband mit den ungläubigen Frauen fest, sondern verlangt das zurück, was ihr (für sie) ausgegeben habt, und lasset (die Ungläubigen) das zurückverlangen, was sie (für sie) ausgegeben haben.
ref: Do not retain your (marriage) ties with unbelieving women. Ask for the return of what you have spent (on them); and the unbelievers should ask for the return of what they have spent.
draft: And do not hold onto the marriage bond with unbelieving women, but reclaim what you have spent (on them) and let (the unbelievers) reclaim what they have spent (on them).
hil: Do not cling to the marriage bond with unbelieving women, but claim back what you have spent on them and let the unbelievers claim back what they have spent on them.
compare: And do not hold onto the marriage bond with unbelieving women, but reclaim what you have spent (on them) and let (the unbelievers) reclaim what they have spent (on them).

src: Da empfing Adam von seinem Herrn Worte, und darauf nahm Er seine Reue an. Er ist ja der Reue-Annehmende und Barmherzige.
ref: Then his Lord sent commands to Adam and turned towards him: Indeed He is compassionate and kind.
draft: Then Adam received words from his Lord, and He accepted his repentance. Indeed, He is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful.
hil: Adam received words from his Lord and then He accepted his repentance. He is indeed the Accepter of repentance, the Merciful.
compare: Then Adam received words from his Lord, and He accepted his repentance. Indeed, He is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful.

src: Wahrlich, Wir haben dich mit der Wahrheit als Bringer froher Botschaft und als Warner entsandt; und es gibt kein Volk, in dem es nicht einmal schon Warner gegeben hätte.
ref: We have sent you with the truth, to give glad tidings and to warn. Never has there been a community to which an admonisher was not sent.
draft: Truly, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of glad tidings and a warner, and there is no nation where there has not been a warner before.
hil: Verily, We have sent you as a witness, a bearer of happy tidings, and an admonisher, and there was a Herald of Warning in every group.
compare: Truly, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of glad tidings and a warner, and there is no nation where there has not been a warner before.

src: Gott hat sich Abraham ja zum Vertrauten genommen.
ref: And God chose Abraham as friend.
draft: God has indeed taken Abraham as a confidant.
hil: God has indeed chosen Abraham as His confidant.
compare: God has indeed taken Abraham as a confidant.

src: "Stelle Panzerhemden her und füge die Ringe nach Maß ineinander."
ref: Saying: Make thou long coats of mail and measure the links (thereof).
draft: "Produce armored shirts and custom-fit the rings together."
hil: Make armored shirts and fit the rings together according to measure.
compare: Make armored shirts and fit the rings together according to measure.

src: Wie wog er ab!
ref: How moliciously he devised!
draft: How he weighed it!
hil: How he weighed it!
compare: How he weighed it!

src: Denen, die ungläubig sind, werden weder ihr Vermögen noch ihre Kinder vor Gott etwas nützen. Das sind die Gefährten des Feuers; sie werden darin ewig weilen.
ref: Indeed those who disbelieve – neither their wealth nor their offspring will help save them in the least, from Allah; and they are the people of fire; remaining in it forever.
draft: Those who are unbelievers, neither their wealth nor their children will be of any use to God. They are the companions of the fire; they will abide therein forever.
hil: Those who disbelieve, neither their wealth nor their offspring will save them in the least from Allah. They are the fuel of the fire and will abide therein forever.
compare: Those who are unbelievers, neither their wealth nor their children will be of any use to God. They are the companions of the fire; they will abide therein forever.

src: Allah hat ein Siegel auf ihre Herzen gelegt, so daß sie kein Wissen haben.
ref: Allah hath sealed up their hearts, so they know not.
draft: "Allah has set a seal on their hearts, so that they have no knowledge."
hil: "Allah has set a seal on their hearts, so that they have no knowledge."
compare: "Allah has set a seal on their hearts, so that they have no knowledge."

src: Zeigt mir, was sie von der Erde erschaffen haben.
ref: What have they created of the earth?
draft: Show me what they have created from the earth.
hil: Show me what they have created from the earth.
compare: Show me what they have created from the earth.

src: Oder denken sie etwa, daß WIR ihr Geheimnis und ihre heimliche Unterredung nicht hören?! Doch, mit Sicherheit!
ref: Or do they think that We do not hear what they conceal and their secret discourses?
draft: Or do they think that we do not hear their secret and clandestine conversation?! Yes, for sure!
hil: Or do they think that we do not hear their secret and clandestine conversation?! Yes, for sure!
compare: Or do they think that we do not hear their secret and clandestine conversation?! Yes, for sure!

src: Und wenn sie den Weg der Besonnenheit sehen, nehmen sie ihn sich nicht zum Weg. Wenn sie aber den Weg der Verirrung sehen, nehmen sie ihn sich zum Weg.
ref: Even if they see every sign, they will not believe in it; and if they see the path of rectitude, they will not adopt it for a path; and if they see the path of error, they will adopt it for a path.
draft: And when they see the path of prudence, they do not take it as their path. But if they see the path of error, they take it as their path.
hil: When they see the path of prudence, they do not take it as their path. But if they see the path of error, they take it as their path.
compare: And when they see the path of prudence, they do not take it as their path. But if they see the path of error, they take it as their path.

src: Er sagte: «Wenn du gewollt hättest, hättest du dafür einen Lohn nehmen können.»
ref: He said, “If you wanted, you could have obtained a payment for it.”
draft: He said, "If you had wanted to, you could have taken a wage for it."
hil: He said, "If you had wanted to, you could have gotten a wage for it."
compare: He said, "If you had wanted to, you could have gotten a wage for it."

src: (Gewähre uns) Deine Vergebung, unser Herr!
ref: Your forgiveness, our Lord.
draft: (Please) Grant us your forgiveness, our Lord!
hil: Our Lord, grant us Your forgiveness!
compare: (Please) Grant us your forgiveness, our Lord!

src: Gewiß, sie widersetzten sich mir und folgten demjenigen, dessen Vermögen und Kinder ihn nur am Verlust mehrten.
ref: They have disobeyed me, and they follow the one whose wealth and children increase nothing for him except ruin.”
draft: Sure, they opposed me and followed the one whose wealth and children only increased with loss.
hil: They indeed opposed me and followed the one whose wealth and children only increased with loss.
compare: Sure, they opposed me and followed the one whose wealth and children only increased with loss.

src: So verlasse dich auf Allah, denn du verfährst nach der offenkundigen Wahrheit.
ref: So you place your trust in God. Certainly you stand on positive truth.
draft: So rely on Allah, for you proceed in accordance with the obvious truth.
hil: So rely on Allah, for you proceed in accordance with the obvious truth.
compare: So rely on Allah, for you proceed in accordance with the obvious truth.

src: Gesandter! Verkünde, was dir von deinem HERRN hinabgesandt wurde! Und solltest du dies nicht tun, dann hast du Seine Botschaft nicht verkündet. Und ALLAH schützt dich vor den Menschen. Gewiß, ALLAH leitet die kufrbetreibende Gemeinschaft nicht recht.
ref: O Noble Messenger (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)! Convey all what has been sent down upon you from your Lord; and if you do not, then you have not conveyed any of His messages; and Allah will protect you from the people; indeed Allah does not guide the disbelievers.
draft: "Envoy! Announce what was sent down to you from your LORD! And if you do not do this, then you have not proclaimed His message. And ALLAH protects you from people. Indeed, ALLAH does not guide the disbelieving community rightly."
hil: O Messenger! Proclaim what has been sent down to you from your Lord. And if you do not, then you have not conveyed His message. And Allah will protect you from the people. Indeed, Allah does not guide the disbelieving community rightly.
compare: "Envoy! Announce what was sent down to you from your LORD! And if you do not do this, then you have not proclaimed His message. And ALLAH protects you from people. Indeed, ALLAH does not guide the disbelieving community rightly."

src: Da erhörte sie ihr Herr (und sprach): "Seht, Ich lasse kein Werk der Wirkenden unter euch verlorengehen, sei es von Mann oder Frau; die einen von euch sind von den anderen.
ref: The Lord heard their prayer and answered: "I suffer not the good deeds of any to go waste, be he a man or a woman: The one of you is of the other.
draft: Then her Lord heard her (and said): "Indeed, I will not allow to be lost the work of [any] worker among you, whether male or female; you are of one another.
hil: And then her Lord heard her (and said): 'Behold, I will not waste the work of any worker among you, be they male or female; you are all brothers and sisters to one another.
compare: Then her Lord heard her (and said): "Indeed, I will not allow to be lost the work of [any] worker among you, whether male or female; you are of one another.

src: Wo auch immer ihr seid, der Tod ereilt euch doch, und wäret ihr in hohen Burgen. Und wenn ihnen Gutes begegnet, sagen sie: "Das ist von Allah"; und wenn ihnen Schlimmes begegnet, sagen sie: "Das ist von dir."
ref: Wherever you are, death will overtake you, though you are in lofty towers, and if a benefit comes to them, they say: This is from Allah; and if a misfortune befalls them, they say: This is from you.
draft: Wherever you are, death will reach you, even if you are in fortified towers. And if something good happens to them, they say: "This is from Allah," and if something bad befalls them, they say: "This is from you."
hil: "Wherever you are, death will reach you, even if you are in fortified towers. And if something good happens to them, they say: "This is from Allah," and if something bad befalls them, they say: "This is from you.""
compare: Wherever you are, death will reach you, even if you are in fortified towers. And if something good happens to them, they say: "This is from Allah," and if something bad befalls them, they say: "This is from you."

src: So waret ihr einst, dann aber hat Allah euch Seine Huld erwiesen; darum stellt erst gehörig Nachforschungen an. Seht, Allah ist eures Tuns wohl kundig.
ref: So you were aforetime; but God has been gracious to you. So be discriminating; surely God is aware of the things you do.
draft: So you were once, but then Allah has shown you His grace; therefore investigate properly first. Allah is indeed knowledgeable about what you do.
hil: Once you were like that, but Allah has shown you His grace. Therefore, first investigate properly. Look, Allah is knowledgeable about what you do.
compare: So you were once, but then Allah has shown you His grace; therefore investigate properly first. Allah is indeed knowledgeable about what you do.

src: Da stritten sie untereinander über ihre Angelegenheit und führten insgeheim vertrauliche Gespräche.
ref: So they discussed their strategy among themselves and conferred privately,
draft: They argued amongst themselves about their matter and had confidential conversations in secret.
hil: They argued amongst themselves about their matter and had confidential conversations in secret.
compare: They argued amongst themselves about their matter and had confidential conversations in secret.

src: Sie sagten: "Bist du etwa zu uns gekommen, damit wir ALLAH alleine dienen und von dem ablassen, dem unsere Ahnen dienten?! Also lasse uns das zuteil werden, wovor du uns warnst, solltest du von den Wahrhaftigen sein."
ref: They said: "Comest thou to us, that we may worship Allah alone, and give up the cult of our fathers? bring us what thou threatenest us with, if so be that thou tellest the truth!"
draft: They said, "Have you come to us so that we may serve Allah alone and abandon what our ancestors served? If you are truthful, then let the warning you have given us come true!"
hil: They said, "Have you come to us so that we may serve Allah alone and abandon what our ancestors served? If you are truthful, then let the warning you have given us come true!"
compare: They said, "Have you come to us so that we may serve Allah alone and abandon what our ancestors served? If you are truthful, then let the warning you have given us come true!"

src: Sie waren einverstanden, mit den Zurückgebliebenen zu sein.
ref: They are content to be with those (the women) who sit behind (at home).
draft: They agreed to stay with the left behind.
hil: They agreed to be with those left behind.
compare: They agreed to be with those left behind.

src: Und ich bin dafür einer der Zeugen.
ref: It was He who created them and I testify to this fact".
draft: And I am one of the witnesses in favor of it.
hil: And I am one of the witnesses in favor of it.
compare: And I am one of the witnesses in favor of it.

src: Sprich: Der Kampf in ihm ist schwerwiegend; aber (die Menschen) vom Wege Gottes abweisen, an Ihn nicht glauben, den Zugang zur heiligen Moschee verwehren und deren Anwohner daraus vertreiben, (all das) wiegt bei Gott schwerer. Verführen wiegt schwerer als Töten.
ref: Tell them: "To fight in that month is a great sin. But a greater sin in the eyes of God is to hinder people from the way of God, and not to believe in Him, and to bar access to the Holy Mosque and turn people out of its precincts; and oppression is worse than killing.
draft: Speak: The struggle within him is grave; but (those people) who turn away from the path of God, do not believe in Him, prevent access to the holy mosque and drive out its inhabitants, (all of) that weighs heavier in the eyes of God. Tempting (others) weighs heavier than killing.
hil: Speak: The struggle within him is grave; but preventing people from following God's path, not believing in Him, preventing access to the holy mosque and expelling its inhabitants, all of this is even more serious offenses in the eyes of God. Oppression is worse than killing.
compare: Speak: The struggle within him is grave; but preventing people from following God's path, not believing in Him, preventing access to the holy mosque and expelling its inhabitants, all of this is even more serious offenses in the eyes of God. Oppression is worse than killing.

src: Und würden sie die Tora und das Evangelium und das, was zu ihnen von ihrem Herrn herabgesandt wurde, einhalten, sie würden von oben und unter ihren Füßen zu essen bekommen. Unter ihnen gibt es eine Gemeinde mit maßvollem Wandel.
ref: Had the People of the Book observed the Torah and the Gospel, and all that had been revealed to them from their Lord, sustenance would have been showered over them from above and risen from beneath their feet.
draft: And if they were to observe the Torah and the Gospel and what has been revealed to them from their Lord, they would have been given provision from above them and from beneath their feet. Among them are a moderate community.
hil: And if they were to follow the Torah and the Gospel and what was sent down to them from their Lord, they would surely eat what is above them and what is beneath their feet. Among them is a moderate community.
compare: And if they were to observe the Torah and the Gospel and what has been revealed to them from their Lord, they would have been given provision from above them and from beneath their feet. Among them are a moderate community.

src: Für sie ist eine schmerzhafte Pein bestimmt.
ref: For them there is painful punishment.
draft: For her, a painful agony is destined.
hil: A painful punishment is destined for them.
compare: For her, a painful agony is destined.

src: Er ist der beste Versorger.
ref: He is the Best of providers.
draft: He is the best provider.
hil: He is the Best Provider.
compare: He is the best provider.

src: ER fügt der Schöpfung hinzu, was ER will. Gewiß, ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: He addeth in creation what soever He listeth Verily Allah is over everything Potent.
draft: He adds to creation whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah is omnipotent over all things.
hil: He adds to creation whatever He wills. Surely, Allah is omnipotent over all things.
compare: He adds to creation whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah is omnipotent over all things.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Nehmt euch nicht Leute alsWali, über die ALLAH erzürnt ist.
ref: O ye who believe! befriend not a people against whom Allah is Wroth.
draft: Your, who have internalized the imam! Do not take people as protectors over whom Allah is angry.
hil: Do not take as friends those over whom Allah is angry, you who have embraced the faith.
compare: Do not take as friends those over whom Allah is angry, you who have embraced the faith.

src: Und wenn er ihnen verlesen wird, sagen sie: "Wir glauben an ihn.
ref: And when it is read out to them, say: "We believe in it.
draft: "We believe in him," they say when it is read to them.
hil: And when it is recited to them, they say, 'We believe in it.'
compare: And when it is recited to them, they say, 'We believe in it.'

src: Das sind Insassen des (Höllen)feuers.
ref: They are the dwellers of the Fire, therein they will abide.
draft: These are inmates of the (hell)fire.
hil: These are rightful Peoples of the Fire.
compare: These are inmates of the (hell)fire.

src: Aber diejenigen, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, werden in Gärten geführt, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werden sie ewig weilen, mit der Erlaubnis ihres Herrn.
ref: And those who believed (in the Oneness of Allah and His Messengers and whatever they brought) and did righteous deeds, will be made to enter Gardens under which rivers flow, - to dwell therein forever (i.e. in Paradise), with the permission of their Lord.
draft: But those who believe and do good deeds will be led to gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein will they abide eternally, by permission of their Lord.
hil: Those who believed and did good deeds will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow, where they will dwell forever with the permission of their Lord.
compare: But those who believe and do good deeds will be led to gardens beneath which rivers flow; therein will they abide eternally, by permission of their Lord.

src: Wie lasset ihr euch da (von Ihm) abwenden?
ref: How then can you turn away?
draft: How do you let yourself turn away from Him?
hil: How do you let yourselves turn away from Him?
compare: How do you let yourselves turn away from Him?

src: Dabei sind sie demütig gegen Allah und verkaufen Seine Zeichen nicht gegen einen winzigen Preis. Jene haben ihren Lohn bei ihrem Herrn.
ref: They do not sell the Verses of Allah for a little price, for them is a reward with their Lord.
draft: They are humble before Allah and do not sell his signs for a tiny price. They will have their reward with their Lord.
hil: They are humble before Allah and do not sell His signs for a paltry price. Those have their reward with their Lord.
compare: They are humble before Allah and do not sell His signs for a paltry price. Those have their reward with their Lord.

src: Sprich: "Mein Herr kennt ihre Zahl am besten.
ref: They will say, 'Seven; and their dog was the eighth of them.'
draft: Speak: "My Lord knows their number best."
hil: Say, 'My Lord knows their number best.'
compare: Say, 'My Lord knows their number best.'

src: Dann machte Er seine Nachkommenschaft aus dem Erguß eines verächtlichen Wassers.
ref: Then made his offspring from the extract of base fluid,
draft: Then He made his offspring from the discharge of a despicable water.
hil: He then made his offspring out of the discharge of contemptible water.
compare: Then He made his offspring from the discharge of a despicable water.

src: Abweisen werde Ich von meinen Zeichen diejenigen, die sich auf der Erde zu Unrecht hochmütig verhalten. Wenn sie auch jedes Zeichen sehen, glauben sie nicht daran.
ref: I will turn away from My revelations those who behave proudly on earth without justification.
draft: I will reject those who behave arrogantly and unfairly on earth from my signs. Even if they see every sign, they won't believe in it.
hil: I will reject those who behave arrogantly and unjustly on earth from my signs. Even if they see every sign, they will not believe in it.
compare: I will reject those who behave arrogantly and unjustly on earth from my signs. Even if they see every sign, they will not believe in it.

src: Bereits brachten wir dir eine Aya von deinem HERRN.
ref: We have come to you with a token from your Lord.
draft: We have already brought you an Aya from your LORD.
hil: We have already brought you a Sign from your Lord.
compare: We have already brought you a Sign from your Lord.

src: Euch wird nicht schaden, wer irregeht, wenn ihr der Rechtleitung folgt. Zu ALLAH ist eure Rückkehr allesamt, dann wird ER euch darüber in Kenntnis setzen, was ihr zu tun pflegtet.
ref: Fear for your own souls; he who has strayed cannot harm you in the least if you are on guidance; towards Allah only you will all return – He will then inform you of what you used to do.
draft: You will not be harmed by those who go astray, if you follow the guidance. To Allah is your return, all of you, and then He will inform you about what you used to do.
hil: You will not be harmed by those who go astray, if you follow the guidance. To Allah is your return, all of you, and then He will inform you about what you used to do.
compare: You will not be harmed by those who go astray, if you follow the guidance. To Allah is your return, all of you, and then He will inform you about what you used to do.

src: Behaltet sie aber nicht aus Schadenslust, um Übertretungen zu begehen.
ref: But do not take them back to hurt them, and whoever does that, then he has wronged himself.
draft: Keep them, however, not out of a desire to do harm, to commit transgressions.
hil: Do not keep them out of a desire to harm and commit transgression.
compare: Keep them, however, not out of a desire to do harm, to commit transgressions.

src: ER erschuf die Himmel und die Erde in Gesetzmäßigkeit und gestaltete euch, dann machte eure Gestalten schön.
ref: He created the heavens and the earth with Truth and shaped you, giving you excellent shapes.
draft: He created the heavens and the earth in regularity and fashioned you, then made your forms beautiful.
hil: He created the heavens and the earth in order and shaped you, then made your forms beautiful.
compare: He created the heavens and the earth in regularity and fashioned you, then made your forms beautiful.

src: Sag: "Ist dies besser oder die Dschanna der Ewigkeit, die den Muttaqi versprochen wurde?!"
ref: Ask them: "Is this better or a garden for everlasting abode which has been promised the pious and devout?
draft: Say, "Is this better or the Jannah of eternity that was promised to the Muttaqi?!"
hil: Say: "Is this better or the Jannah of eternity that was promised to the Muttaqi?!"
compare: Say, "Is this better or the Jannah of eternity that was promised to the Muttaqi?!"

src: Allah will für euch Erleichterung; Er will für euch nicht Erschwernis, - damit ihr die Anzahl vollendet und Allah als den Größten preist, dafür, daß Er euch rechtgeleitet hat, auf daß ihr dankbar sein möget.
ref: Allah intendeth for you ease, and intendeth not for you hardship; so ye shall fulfil the number and shall magnify Allah for His having guided you, and haply ye may give thanks.
draft: Allah wants to give you relief; He does not want to burden you - so that you may complete the number and praise Allah as the greatest, for He has guided you rightly, so that you may be grateful.
hil: Allah wants to grant you relief; He does not want to burden you - so that you may complete the count and praise Allah as the greatest, for He has guided you rightly, that you may be grateful.
compare: Allah wants to give you relief; He does not want to burden you - so that you may complete the number and praise Allah as the greatest, for He has guided you rightly, so that you may be grateful.

src: Ich habe Dir das gelobt, was ich in meinem Bauch trage - nur für den Gottesdienst (zu weihen), so nimm es von mir an!
ref: I have vowed to You what (the child that) is in my womb to be dedicated for Your services (free from all worldly work; to serve Your Place of worship), so accept this, from me.
draft: I have promised you what I carry in my stomach - only for the service (to consecrate), so accept it from me!
hil: I have pledged to you what I carry in my stomach - only for consecration, so accept it from me!
compare: I have pledged to you what I carry in my stomach - only for consecration, so accept it from me!

src: Also welche von beiden Gruppen ist mehr berechtigt, sich sicher zu fühlen, solltet ihr es wissen?
ref: Tell me, whose way is the way of peace, if you have the knowledge?
draft: So which of the two groups is more entitled to feel safe, should you know?
hil: So which of the two groups is more entitled to feel safe, should you know?
compare: So which of the two groups is more entitled to feel safe, should you know?

src: Dann bezichtigten sie ihn der Lüge, dann richteten WIR sie zugrunde.
ref: Then they accused him of lies; so We annihilated them.
draft: Then they accused him of lying, then WE destroyed them.
hil: Then they accused him of lying, then WE destroyed them.
compare: Then they accused him of lying, then WE destroyed them.

src: Und sie sagen: "O du, dem (angeblich) die Ermahnung offenbart worden ist, du bist ja fürwahr besessen.
ref: And yet they say: "You, to whom this Exposition has been sent are surely possessed of the Devil.
draft: "And they say: 'O you, to whom the admonition has (supposedly) been revealed, you are indeed possessed.'"
hil: And they say, 'O you to whom the admonition has been (supposedly) revealed, you are indeed insane.'
compare: "And they say: 'O you, to whom the admonition has (supposedly) been revealed, you are indeed possessed.'"

src: Bereits sehen WIR das Schweifen deines Gesichts himmelwärts. So werden WIR dich gewiß eine Gebetsrichtung einnehmen lassen, an der du Wohlgefallen findest. So wende dich mit dem Gesicht in Richtung von Almasdschidil-haram, und allerorts, wo ihr seid, wendet euch mit dem Gesicht in seine Richtung! Auch sicher, diejenigen, denen die Schrift zuteil wurde, wissen zweifellos, daß es doch die Wahrheit von ihrem HERRN ist. Und ALLAH ist gewiß nicht achtlos dem gegenüber, was ihr tut.
ref: We observe you turning your face, several times towards heaven (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him); so We will definitely make you turn (for prayer) towards a qiblah which pleases you; therefore now turn your face towards the Sacred Mosque (in Mecca); and O Muslims, wherever you may be, turn your faces (for prayer) towards it only; and those who have received the Book surely know that this is the truth from their Lord; and Allah is not unaware of their deeds. (Allah seeks to please the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him.)
draft: We already see the drifting of your face towards the sky. So we will certainly let you take a direction of prayer that you find pleasing. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid al-Haram, and wherever you are, turn your face in its direction! Also, surely those who have been given the Scripture know that it is the truth from their Lord. And Allah is certainly not oblivious to what you do.
hil: We already see your face turning skyward. So we will surely let you take a prayer direction that you find pleasing. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid al-Haram, and wherever you are, turn your face in its direction! Surely, those to whom the Scripture was given know that this is certainly the truth from their Lord. Allah is certainly not unaware of what you do.
compare: We already see the drifting of your face towards the sky. So we will certainly let you take a direction of prayer that you find pleasing. So turn your face towards Al-Masjid al-Haram, and wherever you are, turn your face in its direction! Also, surely those who have been given the Scripture know that it is the truth from their Lord. And Allah is certainly not oblivious to what you do.

src: Schreit heute nicht um Hilfe!
ref: Invoke not loudly this day!
draft: Don't cry out for help today!
hil: Don't cry out for help today!
compare: Don't cry out for help today!

src: Es wurde befohlen: "O Noah, geh an Land, (und sei) mit Unserem Frieden begleitet!
ref: It was said, “O Nooh!
draft: "It was commanded: 'O Noah, disembark, (and be) accompanied by Our peace!'"
hil: And it was said, 'O Noah, disembark, (and be) accompanied by Our peace!'
compare: "It was commanded: 'O Noah, disembark, (and be) accompanied by Our peace!'"

src: Sie sagten: "Al-'aziz! Er hat doch einen Vater, der ein Greis ist, so nimm einen von uns an seiner Stelle fest.
ref: They said: "O Minister, he has an aged father, so keep one of us in his place.
draft: They said, "Al-'aziz! He does have a father who is an old man, so take one of us in his place."
hil: They said, "O Minister, he has an aged father, so keep one of us in his place. We see you are a virtuous man."
compare: They said, "O Minister, he has an aged father, so keep one of us in his place. We see you are a virtuous man."

src: Das ist die Huld Gottes. Er läßt sie zukommen, wem Er will. Und Gott besitzt große Huld.
ref: This is Allah’s munificence, which He may give to whomever He wills; and Allah is Extremely Munificent.
draft: "This is the grace of God. He bestows it on whom He wills. And God possesses great grace."
hil: "That is the grace of God. He bestows it on whom He pleases. And God possesses the greatest blessing."
compare: "This is the grace of God. He bestows it on whom He wills. And God possesses great grace."

src: Ein Wohlgefallen von Gott ist aber größer.
ref: But the greatest bliss is the Good Pleasure of Allah.
draft: A pleasure from God, however, is greater.
hil: A satisfaction of God, however, is greater.
compare: A satisfaction of God, however, is greater.

src: Begebt euch in einen Schatten mit drei Verzweigungen,
ref: Go to the shadow with three ramifications,
draft: "Enter a shadow with three branches."
hil: Enter the shadow with three branches.
compare: Enter the shadow with three branches.

src: Sie sagten: "Bist du zu uns gekommen, um uns von unseren Göttern abwendig zu machen? So bring uns doch her, was du uns androhst, wenn du zu den Wahrhaftigen gehörst."
ref: They said: art thou come Unto us that thou mayest turn us aside from our gods? then bring thou upon us that wherewith thou threatenest us, if thou art of the truth-tellers.
draft: They said: "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? Then show us what you have promised us if you belong to the truthful."
hil: They said, "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? Then show what you have promised us if you belong to the truthful."
compare: They said, "Have you come to turn us away from our gods? Then show what you have promised us if you belong to the truthful."

src: Das ist der Lohn der Ungläubigen.
ref: This is the recompense of those who do not believe.
draft: "This is the reward of the unbelievers."
hil: This is the reward of the unbelievers.
compare: "This is the reward of the unbelievers."

src: So zieh mit deinen Angehörigen in einem Teil der Nacht fort, und folge du hinterdrein. Und keiner von euch soll sich umdrehen.
ref: Depart with your family in a part of the night and walk behind them and let none of you turn round.
draft: So leave with your relatives in a part of the night, and follow behind. And none of you shall turn around.
hil: So leave with your relatives in a part of the night, and follow behind. And none of you shall turn around.
compare: So leave with your relatives in a part of the night, and follow behind. And none of you shall turn around.

src: Und sie kamen vor ALLAH allesamt. Die Schwachen sagten dann zu denjenigen, die sich in Arroganz erhoben haben: "Wir waren doch Gefolgsleute von euch! Könnt ihr von uns (nicht) etwas von ALLAHs Peinigung abwehren?" Sie sagten: "Hätte ALLAH uns rechtleiten lassen, hätten wir euch gewiß rechtgeleitet. Es ist uns gleich, ob wir uns in Ungeduld oder in Geduld üben. Für uns gibt es kein Entrinnen mehr."
ref: They will all publicly come in the presence of Allah – then those who were weak will say to those who were the leaders, “We were your followers – is it possible for you to avert some of Allah’s punishment from us?” They will answer, “If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you; it is the same for us, whether we panic or patiently endure – we have no place of refuge.” (* This conversation will take place between the disbelievers and their leaders.)
draft: And they all came before Allah. The weak ones then said to those who had behaved arrogantly: "We were your followers! Can you spare us some of Allah's punishment?" They said, "If Allah had guided us, we would have surely guided you. It is the same to us whether we are impatient or patient, for us there is no escape."
hil: They all came before Allah. The weak ones then said to those who had behaved arrogantly, "We were your followers! Can you spare us some of Allah's punishment?" They said, "If Allah had guided us, we would have surely guided you. It is the same to us whether we are impatient or patient, for us there is no escape."
compare: And they all came before Allah. The weak ones then said to those who had behaved arrogantly: "We were your followers! Can you spare us some of Allah's punishment?" They said, "If Allah had guided us, we would have surely guided you. It is the same to us whether we are impatient or patient, for us there is no escape."

src: (Und ich bin zu euch gesandt worden, auf) daß ihr Vergebung von eurem Herrn erflehet und euch dann reumütig zu Ihm bekehret. Er wird euch dann bis zum Ende einer festgesetzten Frist reich versorgen.
ref: and: 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord, then repent to Him, and He will give you fair enjoyment unto a term stated, and He will give of His bounty to every man of grace.
draft: (And I have been sent to you so that you may implore forgiveness from your Lord and then repent to Him in remorse. He will then provide you abundantly until the end of a predetermined term.)
hil: And I have been sent to you so that you implore forgiveness from your Lord and then repent to Him in remorse. He will then provide you abundantly until the end of a predetermined term.
compare: (And I have been sent to you so that you may implore forgiveness from your Lord and then repent to Him in remorse. He will then provide you abundantly until the end of a predetermined term.)

src: Kein Volk kann seine Frist überschreiten; noch können sie dahinter zurückbleiben.
ref: No people can hasten or delay the term already fixed for them.
draft: No people can exceed their deadline; nor can they stay behind.
hil: No nation can exceed its term, nor can they stay behind.
compare: No nation can exceed its term, nor can they stay behind.

src: Sie belauschen nicht die hohen Angesehenen. Und sie werden von jeder Seite beworfen,
ref: So that they are not able to listen to the angels of higher (echelons), and are pelted from all sides
draft: "They do not eavesdrop on the highly respected. And they are thrown from every side."
hil: They do not eavesdrop on the highly respected. And they are pelted from every side.
compare: "They do not eavesdrop on the highly respected. And they are thrown from every side."

src: Also Niedergang sei denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, an ihrem Tag, der ihnen angedroht wird.
ref: Alas the woe for those who refuse to believe in the Day which has been promised them.
draft: Also downfall shall be upon those who committed kufr on their day, which is threatened to them.
hil: Let downfall be upon those who have committed kufr on their promised Day.
compare: Let downfall be upon those who have committed kufr on their promised Day.

src: Allah ist Gnädig zu den Menschen.
ref: God is Kind towards the servants.
draft: Allah is merciful to people.
hil: Allah is Gracious to people.
compare: Allah is Gracious to people.

src: Aber die Heuchler wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: But the hypocrites do not know.
draft: But the hypocrites do not know.
hil: But the hypocrites do not know.
compare: But the hypocrites do not know.

src: Er sagte: "Nein! Vielmehr ist euer Herr der Herr der Himmel und der Erde, Der sie erschaffen hat. Und ich gehöre zu denjenigen, die euch darüber Zeugnis ablegen.
ref: He said: "In fact it was your Lord, the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them; and I bear witness to this.
draft: He said, "No! Rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them. And I am one of those who testify to that."
hil: He said, "No! Rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them. And I am one of those who testify to it."
compare: He said, "No! Rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them. And I am one of those who testify to it."

src: Sie sagte: "Ach, wehe mir!
ref: She said: "Woe betide me!
draft: She said: "Oh, woe to me!
hil: She said, 'Oh, woe to me!'
compare: She said: "Oh, woe to me!

src: So darfst du nicht meinen, daß Gott sein Versprechen an die Gesandten bricht.
ref: Think not that God would go back on His promise (made) to the apostles.
draft: So you must not think that God breaks his promise to the messengers.
hil: You should not assume that God breaks his promise to the messengers.
compare: You should not assume that God breaks his promise to the messengers.

src: Ah sieh!
ref: Alas indeed!
draft: Oh, look!
hil: Ah! Look!
compare: Oh, look!

src: Ich schwöre bei den sich Verbergenden,
ref: I swear by the slinkers,
draft: I swear by those who hide themselves.
hil: I swear by those who conceal themselves.
compare: I swear by those who conceal themselves.

src: Und ich wurde angewiesen, von den Muslimen zu sein,
ref: And I have been commanded to be of those that surrender,
draft: And I was instructed to be of the Muslims.
hil: I was instructed to be from among the Muslims.
compare: I was instructed to be from among the Muslims.

src: ALLAH hat sie euch vergeben. Und ALLAH ist allvergebend, allnachsichtig.
ref: God has overlooked (your failings) in this (respect), for God is forgiving and forbearing.
draft: ALLAH has forgiven you. And ALLAH is all-forgiving, all-merciful.
hil: Allah has forgiven you. And Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.
compare: ALLAH has forgiven you. And ALLAH is all-forgiving, all-merciful.

src: Nein, sondern ALLAH gehört die Bestimmung insgesamt. Wollen diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlichten, etwa nicht zur Kenntnis nehmen, daß wenn ALLAH wollte, ER alle Menschen rechtleitete?!
ref: So, do not the people of faith (still look forward to such a sign in response to the demand of the unbelievers and) despair as a result of knowing that had Allah so willed, He could have guided all to the Truth.
draft: No, but the determination belongs entirely to ALLAH. Do those who have internalized faith not realize that if ALLAH had willed, he would have guided all people?
hil: No, but the overall determination belongs to Allah. Do those who have internalized faith not realize that if Allah willed, He would have guided all people?
compare: No, but the determination belongs entirely to ALLAH. Do those who have internalized faith not realize that if ALLAH had willed, he would have guided all people?

src: Auch gewähre ICH ihnen noch mehr Zeit. Doch Meine Bestrafung ist hart.
ref: And I will give them respite; indeed My secret plan is extremely solid.
draft: Also, I will grant them more time. But my punishment is harsh.
hil: I will grant them more time, but my punishment is severe.
compare: Also, I will grant them more time. But my punishment is harsh.

src: Und der geraden und der ungeraden (Zahl),
ref: The multiple and the one,
draft: "And the even and the odd (number)"
hil: And the even and the odd (number)
compare: "And the even and the odd (number)"

src: Da vergaben Wir ihm dies.
ref: So We forgave him.
draft: We forgave him this.
hil: Then we forgave him this.
compare: Then we forgave him this.

src: Da kehrte Er Sich ihnen mit Erbarmen zu, auf daß sie sich bekehren möchten. Wahrlich, Allah ist der Gnädige, der Barmherzige.
ref: So He softened towards them that they may repent; for God surely accepts repentance and is merciful.
draft: He turned to them with mercy so that they might repent. Truly, Allah is the Compassionate, the Merciful.
hil: He turned to them with mercy so that they may repent. Truly, Allah is the Merciful, the Compassionate.
compare: He turned to them with mercy so that they might repent. Truly, Allah is the Compassionate, the Merciful.

src: O die ihr glaubt, wenn ihr auf eine festgesetzte Frist, einer vom anderen, eine Geldschuld aufnehmt, dann schreibt es auf. Und ein Schreiber soll (es) für euch gerecht aufschreiben.
ref: O believers, when you negotiate a debt for a fixed term, draw up an agreement in writing, though better it would be to have a scribe write it faithfully down; and no scribe should refuse to write as God has taught him, and write what the borrower dictates, and have fear of God, his Lord, and not leave out a thing.
draft: O you who believe, when you take a debt for a specified term, write it down between you. And let a scribe write (it) between you accurately.
hil: O you who believe, if you take a debt for a fixed term, write it down between you, one who owes the debt and the other who lends it to him. And let a scribe write it between you accurately.
compare: O you who believe, when you take a debt for a specified term, write it down between you. And let a scribe write (it) between you accurately.

src: Gärten und Beerengehege
ref: Orchards and vineyards,
draft: Gardens and berry enclosures.
hil: Gardens and berry enclosures.
compare: Gardens and berry enclosures.

src: Habt ihr etwa keinen Einblick?!
ref: Can you still not comprehend?
draft: Do you have no insight?!
hil: Do you have no insight?!
compare: Do you have no insight?!

src: Und dein Herr wird dir wahrlich geben, und dann wirst du zufrieden sein.
ref: For your Lord will certainly give you, and you will be content.
draft: And your Lord will surely give you, and then you will be satisfied.
hil: And your Lord will surely give you, and then you will be satisfied.
compare: And your Lord will surely give you, and then you will be satisfied.

src: Aber nein! Vielmehr sagen sie: "(Das ist) ein Bündel von wirren Träumen. Nein! Vielmehr hat er ihn ersonnen. Nein! Vielmehr ist er ein Dichter. So soll er uns ein Zeichen bringen, so wie die Früheren gesandt wurden."
ref: Yet they say: "These are only confused dreams," or rather: "He has invented them;" or: "He is only a poet. Let him therefore bring a miracle to us as the earlier (apostles) were sent with."
draft: But no! Rather they say, "(That is) a bundle of confused dreams. No! Rather he has conceived it. No! Rather he is a poet. So he shall bring us a sign, as the ancients were sent."
hil: "No," they say, "rather (that is) a bundle of confused dreams. No! Rather, he has conceived it. No! Rather, he is a poet. So, he should bring us a sign, (just) as the (ones) before (were) sent."
compare: "No," they say, "rather (that is) a bundle of confused dreams. No! Rather, he has conceived it. No! Rather, he is a poet. So, he should bring us a sign, (just) as the (ones) before (were) sent."

src: Und gebt den Frauen ihre Brautgabe als Schenkung.
ref: Give women their dowries graciously.
draft: And give women their dowry as a gift.
hil: And give women their dowry as a gift.
compare: And give women their dowry as a gift.

src: Und bestimmt wirst du sie unter allen Menschen am gierigsten nach Leben finden, und mehr noch als diejenigen, die Götzen anbeten.
ref: You will see they are covetous of life more than other men, even more than those who practise idolatry.
draft: And surely you will find her to be the most eager for life of all people, and even more so than those who worship idols.
hil: And surely you will find her to be the most eager for life of all people, and even more so than those who worship idols.
compare: And surely you will find her to be the most eager for life of all people, and even more so than those who worship idols.

src: "Mein Söhnchen! Sollte es sich auch nur um das Gewicht eines Senfkorns handeln, das sich in einem Stein, in den Himmeln oder auf Erden befinden sollte, ALLAH bringt sie. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allgütig, allkundig.
ref: 'O my son, if it should be but the weight of one grain of mustard-seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or in the earth, God shall bring it forth; surely God is All-subtle, All-aware.
draft: "My little son! Even if it is only the weight of a mustard seed, which should be in a stone, in the heavens or on earth, ALLAH brings them. Surely, ALLAH is all-good, all-knowing."
hil: My little son! Even if it be the weight of a mustard seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or in the earth, Allah will bring it forth. Verily, Allah is Subtle, Aware.
compare: My little son! Even if it be the weight of a mustard seed, and though it be in a rock, or in the heavens, or in the earth, Allah will bring it forth. Verily, Allah is Subtle, Aware.

src: Ich will auch nicht (einfach) euch widersprechen im Hinblick auf das, was ich euch verbiete.
ref: I have no desire to do what I forbid you from doing.
draft: I don't (simply) want to contradict you either with regard to what I forbid you.
hil: I do not intend to simply contradict you in terms of what I forbid you.
compare: I do not intend to simply contradict you in terms of what I forbid you.

src: Und die Berge wie Wolleflocken sein werden,
ref: The mountains like the tufts of (carded) wool,
draft: And the mountains will be like woolen flakes.
hil: And the mountains shall be like tufts of wool.
compare: And the mountains shall be like tufts of wool.

src: Und ihre Zungen behaupten lügnerisch, daß für sie das Beste bestimmt ist.
ref: Their tongues utter falsehoods (when they say) the finest of wages shall be theirs.
draft: And their tongues falsely claim that the best is determined for them.
hil: Their tongues falsely claim that the best is determined for them.
compare: And their tongues falsely claim that the best is determined for them.

src: Diejenigen aber, die sich um Unsertwillen abmühen, werden Wir ganz gewiß Unsere Wege leiten. Und Allah ist wahrlich mit den Gutes Tuenden.
ref: And those who strove in Our way – We shall surely show them Our paths; and indeed Allah is with the virtuous.
draft: But those who strive in Our cause, We will surely guide them to Our paths. And indeed Allah is with the doers of good.
hil: But those who toil in Our cause, We will surely guide them to Our paths. And Allah is truly with those who do good.
compare: But those who toil in Our cause, We will surely guide them to Our paths. And Allah is truly with those who do good.

src: So diene Ihm und verlasse dich auf Ihn.
ref: So worship Him (O Muhammad SAW) and put your trust in Him.
draft: Serve Him and rely on Him.
hil: Serve Him and put your trust in Him.
compare: Serve Him and rely on Him.

src: Und solltet ihr darin niemanden finden, dann betretet sie nicht, bis euch Erlaubnis gewährt wird.
ref: If you find that no one is in, then do not enter unless you have received permission.
draft: And if you don't find anyone in there, then don't enter until you are granted permission.
hil: If you don't find anyone in there, then do not enter until permission is granted.
compare: If you don't find anyone in there, then do not enter until permission is granted.

src: Dann machte ich doch ihnen Da'wa öffentlich,
ref: Then I called them loudly and more openly,
draft: Then I publicly made Da'wa to them.
hil: Then I publicly made them Da'wa.
compare: Then I publicly made Da'wa to them.

src: Doch wer ALLAH und Seinem Gesandten widerspricht und ALLAHs Richtlinien überschreitet, den wird ER ins Feuer eintreten lassen, darin wird er ewig bleiben. Und für ihn ist eine erniedrigende Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: Those who disobey God and the Prophet and exceed the bounds of law, will be taken to Hell and abide there for ever and shall suffer despicable punishment.
draft: But whoever contradicts Allah and His Messenger and transgresses Allah's limits, He will admit him to a fire, wherein he shall abide forever. And for him is a humiliating punishment determined.
hil: But whoever contradicts Allah and His Messenger and transgresses Allah's limits, he will be admitted to a fire wherein he shall abide forever. And for him is a humiliating punishment determined.
compare: But whoever contradicts Allah and His Messenger and transgresses Allah's limits, He will admit him to a fire, wherein he shall abide forever. And for him is a humiliating punishment determined.

src: Und Er hat eure Gattinnen, von denen ihr euch durch den Rückenschwur trennt, nicht (wirklich) zu euren Müttern gemacht. Und Er hat eure angenommenen Söhne nicht (wirklich) zu euren Söhnen gemacht.
ref: Neither has He made your wives whom you declare to be like your mothers' backs, your real mothers. [AzZihar is the saying of a husband to his wife, "You are to me like the back of my mother" i.e. You are unlawful for me to approach.], nor has He made your adopted sons your real sons.
draft: And He did not make your wives, from whom you keep away by saying, "Be as my mother's back," your real mothers. Nor did He make your adopted sons your real sons.
hil: He did not make your wives, from whom you keep away by saying, "Be as my mother's back," your real mothers. Nor did He make your adopted sons your real sons.
compare: And He did not make your wives, from whom you keep away by saying, "Be as my mother's back," your real mothers. Nor did He make your adopted sons your real sons.

src: Und ALLAH genügt als Allwissender.
ref: God suffices as Knower.
draft: And Allah suffices as the All-Knowing.
hil: And God suffices as the All-Knowing.
compare: And Allah suffices as the All-Knowing.

src: Die Hölle, in der sie brennen. Welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: Hell; which they shall enter; what an evil resting-place!
draft: The hell in which they burn. What a terrible place!
hil: The hell in which they burn. What a terrible place!
compare: The hell in which they burn. What a terrible place!

src: Als er nun den Ort des Sonnenuntergangs erreichte, fand er, daß sie in einer verschlammten Quelle unterging.
ref: Until, when he reached the setting place of the sun, he found it setting in a spring of black muddy (or hot) water.
draft: When he reached the place of sunset, he found that it sank in a muddy spring.
hil: When he reached the place of sunset, he found that it sank in a muddy spring.
compare: When he reached the place of sunset, he found that it sank in a muddy spring.

src: Am Tag, da das Beben einsetzt
ref: The day the convulsive (first blast) shatters convulsively
draft: On the day the shaking starts.
hil: On the day when the shaking begins.
compare: On the day the shaking starts.

src: Und ER ist Derjenige, Der vom Himmel Wasser hinabsenden ließ. So haben WIR damit Pflanzenwuchs jeder Art ermöglicht, so haben WIR daraus Grünes sprießen lassen, von dem WIR übereinander liegende Saatkörner hervorbrachten. Und aus den Dattelpalmen, aus ihrem Blütenstand (haben WIR hervorgebracht) herunterhängende Dattelbüschel und Dschannat mit Trauben, Oliven und Granatäpfeln - einander ähnelnd und nicht ähnelnd. Betrachtet ihre Früchte, wenn sie Früchte tragen und reif werden. Gewiß, darin sind zweifelsohne Ayat für Menschen, die den Iman verinnerlichen.
ref: And it is He Who sends down water from the sky; so with it We produced all things that grow; hence We produce from it vegetation from which We bring forth grains in clusters; and from the pollen of dates, dense bunches – and gardens of grapes and olives and pomegranates, similar in some ways and unlike in some; look at its fruit when it bears yield, and its ripening; indeed in it are signs for the people who believe.
draft: And HE is the One who sent down water from the sky, and with it We brought forth vegetation of every kind, and out of it We brought forth green foliage. From it, We produce grains arranged in layers. And from the palm trees, from their branches, We produce clusters of dates hanging low and near, and gardens of grapes, olives and pomegranates, similar yet dissimilar to one another. Observe their fruit as it ripens and develops. Surely, in all this, there are signs for people who believe.
hil: And He is the One who sent down water from the sky, which enabled us to produce vegetation of all kinds, we sprouted greenery from it, from which we brought forth overlapping grain, and out of the date-palm, from its sheaths, We bring out clusters of dates, and gardens of grapes, olives, and pomegranates alike and different. Look at their fruits when they bear fruit and ripen. Surely, in that, there are signs for people who internalize faith.
compare: And HE is the One who sent down water from the sky, and with it We brought forth vegetation of every kind, and out of it We brought forth green foliage. From it, We produce grains arranged in layers. And from the palm trees, from their branches, We produce clusters of dates hanging low and near, and gardens of grapes, olives and pomegranates, similar yet dissimilar to one another. Observe their fruit as it ripens and develops. Surely, in all this, there are signs for people who believe.

src: Und daß Er der Herr des Sirius ist.
ref: That He is the Lord of Sirius;
draft: And that He is the Lord of Sirius.
hil: And that He is the Lord of Sirius.
compare: And that He is the Lord of Sirius.

src: Und da sie deinem Herrn in einer Reihe vorgeführt werden: «Ihr seid zu Uns gekommen, so wie Wir euch das erste Mal erschaffen haben.
ref: And they will be set before your Lord in (lines as) rows, (and Allah will say): "Now indeed, you have come to Us as We created you the first time.
draft: And when they are presented before your Lord in rows, [He will say], "You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time.
hil: "You will be presented before your Lord in rows: "You have come to Us as We created you the first time."
compare: And when they are presented before your Lord in rows, [He will say], "You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time.

src: Da löschten Wir ihre Augen aus. "Kostet nun Meine Strafe und Meine Warnungen."
ref: So We blinded their eyes, "Then taste you My Torment and My Warnings."
draft: We extinguished their eyes. "Now taste My punishment and My warnings."
hil: We put out their eyes. "Now taste My punishment and My warnings."
compare: We extinguished their eyes. "Now taste My punishment and My warnings."

src: Als zu ihnen die Gesandten von vor ihnen und von hinter ihnen kamen: "Dient niemandem außer ALLAH."
ref: Their apostles came to them one after the other (saying): "Do not worship any one but God."
draft: When the messengers came to them from in front of them and from behind them, saying, "Serve no one but Allah."
hil: When the messengers came to them from in front of them and from behind them, saying, "Serve no one but Allah."
compare: When the messengers came to them from in front of them and from behind them, saying, "Serve no one but Allah."

src: ER wird sie mit Seiner Gnade umgeben. Gewiß, ALLAH ist allvergebend, allgnädig.
ref: God will admit them into His mercy; God is indeed most forgiving and merciful.
draft: He will surround them with His grace. Indeed, Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
hil: He will surround them with His grace. Surely, Allah is Most Forgiving, Most Merciful.
compare: He will surround them with His grace. Surely, Allah is Most Forgiving, Most Merciful.

src: Ist derjenige, der qanit während der Nacht sudschud- und qiyam-vollziehend ist, der sich vor dem Jenseits in Acht nimmt und der sich die Gnade seines HERRN erhofft, (etwa mit dem Kafir gleich)?!
ref: Can one who prays in the watches of the night, bowing in homage or standing attentive, fearful of the life to come, and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, (be like one who does not)?
draft: Is the one who is qanit during the night performing sudschud and qiyam, who fears the hereafter and hopes for the mercy of his Lord, (equal to the Kafir)?!
hil: The one who is devout during the night, performing sujud and qiyam, fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, is he equal to the disbeliever?!
compare: The one who is devout during the night, performing sujud and qiyam, fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, is he equal to the disbeliever?!

src: Ausgenommen der auserwählten Diener Gottes.
ref: Other than the chosen creatures of God.
