draft: Excluding the chosen servants of God.
hil: Except for the chosen servants of God.
compare: Excluding the chosen servants of God.

src: Wir werden es gewiß nicht betreten, bis sie aus ihm herausgehen.
ref: We will not enter it until they leave it.
draft: We certainly will not enter it until they come out of it.
hil: We certainly will not enter it until they come out of it.
compare: We certainly will not enter it until they come out of it.

src: Allah verfährt barmherzig mit euch.
ref: Surely God is compassionate to you.
draft: Allah deals mercifully with you.
hil: Allah deals mercifully with you.
compare: Allah deals mercifully with you.

src: Schau, wie Wir die einen von ihnen vor den anderen auszeichnen; aber das Jenseits ist wahrlich größer an Rangstufen und größer an Auszeichnungen.
ref: "See, how We favour one over the other; and in life to come are higher ranks and favours greater still.
draft: Look how We distinguish some of them over others; but the Hereafter is truly greater in ranks and greater in distinctions.
hil: See how We distinguish some of them over others; but the Hereafter is truly greater in ranks and greater in distinctions.
compare: Look how We distinguish some of them over others; but the Hereafter is truly greater in ranks and greater in distinctions.

src: Beide rannten dann zur Tür und sie zerriß sein Hemd von hinten, dann stießen beide auf ihren Ehemann an der Tür.
ref: Both of them raced to the door, and she (grabbed and) rent his shirt from behind.
draft: Both then ran to the door and she tore his shirt from behind, then both collided with their husband at the door.
hil: Both of them then ran to the door, and she tore his shirt from behind. Then both collided with their husband at the door.
compare: Both of them then ran to the door, and she tore his shirt from behind. Then both collided with their husband at the door.

src: DU bist Unser Maula, so leiste uns Beistand gegen die kufr-betreibenden Leute!"
ref: And help us against the people of the unbelievers.
draft: "You are our spokesman, so provide us with support against the kufr-operating people!"
hil: You are our patron, so give us support against those engaging in kufr!
compare: You are our patron, so give us support against those engaging in kufr!

src: Nein! Vielmehr haben Wir diesen da und ihren Vätern Nießbrauch gewährt, bis sie ein langes Leben geführt haben.
ref: We allowed them and their fathers time to enjoy till the very end of their lives.
draft: No! Rather we have granted this one and their fathers usufruct until they have led a long life.
hil: Rather, we granted usufruct to this one and their fathers until they have lived a long life.
compare: Rather, we granted usufruct to this one and their fathers until they have lived a long life.

src: Als die Karawane aufgebrochen war, sprach ihr Vater: "Wahrlich, ich spüre den Geruch Yusufs, auch wenn ihr mich für schwachsinnig haltet."
ref: The caravan departed (from Egypt) and Jacob said (at home): "Say not that I am in my dotage, but I get the smell of Joseph."
draft: When the caravan set off, her father said: "Truly, I sense the smell of Joseph, even if you think of me as a fool."
hil: "Truly, I can smell Joseph's scent even if you think I am foolish," her father said, as the caravan set off.
compare: "Truly, I can smell Joseph's scent even if you think I am foolish," her father said, as the caravan set off.

src: So ließ der Satan sie diesbezüglich Fehler begehen, so brachte er sie hinaus von dem, wo sie sich befanden. Und WIR sagten: "Steigt ab!
ref: Then the Satan caused the twain to slip on account thereof, and drave them forth from that which the twain were in.
draft: So the Satan made them commit mistakes in this regard, so he took them out of where they were. And WE said: "Descend!
hil: The Satan caused them to commit mistakes in this regard and took them out from where they were. And WE said, "Descend!"
compare: The Satan caused them to commit mistakes in this regard and took them out from where they were. And WE said, "Descend!"

src: Aber sie verleugnen den Erbarmer.
ref: But they do not believe in Ar-Rahman.
draft: But they deny the Merciful.
hil: But they deny the Merciful.
compare: But they deny the Merciful.

src: Soll ich etwa andere außer Ihm zu Göttern nehmen?
ref: “What! Shall I appoint Gods other than Allah?
draft: Should I take others besides Him as gods?
hil: Should I take others as gods besides Him?
compare: Should I take others besides Him as gods?

src: Und bittet euren HERRN um Vergebung, dann seid Ihm gegenüber reumütig!
ref: "Beg your Lord to forgive you, and turn to Him.
draft: And ask your Lord for forgiveness, then be repentant towards Him!
hil: And seek forgiveness from your Lord, then turn to Him in repentance.
compare: And ask your Lord for forgiveness, then be repentant towards Him!

src: Alles geschieht zu einem vorbestimmten Termin.
ref: For every age there is a law.
draft: All happens at a predetermined time.
hil: All is done at a predetermined time.
compare: All happens at a predetermined time.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Bemüht euch eurer Verpflichtung ALLAH gegenüber nachzukommen und seid Zeugen in gerechter Weise!
ref: O you who believe, stand up as witnesses for God in all fairness, and do not let the hatred of a people deviate you from justice.
draft: "You who have internalized the imam! Strive to fulfill your obligation to Allah and be witnesses in a just manner!"
hil: O believers, who have firmly established the commands of Allah, be witnesses with justice and do not let the enmity of anyone lead you to injustice. Be just, for it is nearer to piety, and fear Allah. Surely, Allah is well aware of your deeds.
compare: O believers, who have firmly established the commands of Allah, be witnesses with justice and do not let the enmity of anyone lead you to injustice. Be just, for it is nearer to piety, and fear Allah. Surely, Allah is well aware of your deeds.

src: Darum wartet ab; seht, ich warte auch mit euch ab."
ref: So watch and wait (for the sign); I am waiting and expecting with you."
draft: Therefore wait; see, I also wait with you.
hil: Therefore wait; see, I also wait with you.
compare: Therefore wait; see, I also wait with you.

src: Dem Allvergebenden der Verfehlung und Dem Annehmenden der Reue, Dem Harten im Strafen, Dem mit den Wohltaten. Es gibt keine Gottheit außer Ihm. Zu Ihm ist das Werden.
ref: The Forgiver of sin, and the Most Acceptor of Repentance, the Severe in Punishing, the Greatly Rewarding; there is no God except Him; towards Him only is the return.
draft: To the All-Forgiving of the transgression and the Accepting of the repentance, to the Severe in punishment, to the Bestower of favors. There is no deity except Him. To Him is the destination.
hil: To the All-Forgiving for the transgression and the Accepting of repentance, the Severe in punishment, the Bestower of favors. There is no deity except Him. To Him is the destination.
compare: To the All-Forgiving of the transgression and the Accepting of the repentance, to the Severe in punishment, to the Bestower of favors. There is no deity except Him. To Him is the destination.

src: Allah ist dessen, was ihr tut, Kundig.
ref: This will absolve you of some of your sins; and God is cognisant of all you do.
draft: Allah is knowledgeable of what you do.
hil: Allah is well aware of what you do.
compare: Allah is knowledgeable of what you do.

src: Diejenigen aber, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, befinden sich in den Gärten des Paradieses. Sie haben bei ihrem Herrn, was sie wollen.
ref: And those who believe and work righteous works will be in meadows of the Gardens theirs will be whatsoever they list, in the presence of their Lord.
draft: But those who believe and do good deeds are in the Gardens of Paradise. They have with their Lord whatever they desire.
hil: Those who believe and do good deeds are in the Gardens of Paradise. They have with their Lord whatever they desire.
compare: But those who believe and do good deeds are in the Gardens of Paradise. They have with their Lord whatever they desire.

src: Derjenige, den Allah rechtleitet, ist auf dem rechten Weg. Diejenigen aber, die Er irreführt, sind wahrlich jene, die verloren haben.
ref: He alone is guided whom God shows the way; and whom He leads astray is surely lost.
draft: The one whom Allah guides is on the right path. But those whom He leads astray, truly they are the lost.
hil: Whomever Allah guides is the guided one. And those whom He sends astray, they are indeed the losers.
compare: The one whom Allah guides is on the right path. But those whom He leads astray, truly they are the lost.

src: Ihr wendet euch jedoch davon ab.
ref: To which you pay no heed.
draft: You turn away from it.
hil: You, however, turn away from it.
compare: You turn away from it.

src: Siehst du!
ref: What thinkest thou?
draft: See!
hil: Do you see!
compare: See!

src: Und sie ziehen sich den Zorn Allahs zu, und für sie ist die Armut vorgeschrieben, weil sie Allahs Zeichen verleugneten und die Propheten ungerechterweise ermordeten.
ref: That is because they have been disbelieving in the signs of Allah, and slaying the prophets without justice.
draft: And they draw upon themselves the wrath of Allah and poverty is ordained for them, because they denied Allah's signs and unjustly killed the prophets.
hil: They draw upon themselves the wrath of Allah, and poverty is ordained for them because they denied Allah's signs and unjustly killed the prophets.
compare: And they draw upon themselves the wrath of Allah and poverty is ordained for them, because they denied Allah's signs and unjustly killed the prophets.

src: Allah weiß, was ihr offen tut und was ihr heimlich tut.
ref: God knows what you reveal and what you hide.
draft: Allah knows what you do openly and what you do in secret.
hil: Allah knows what you do openly and what you do in secret.
compare: Allah knows what you do openly and what you do in secret.

src: Am Tag, da du siehst, wie den gläubigen Männern und den gläubigen Frauen ihr Licht vor ihnen und zu ihrer Rechten eilt: «Eine frohe Botschaft für euch heute: Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen; darin werdet ihr ewig weilen. Das ist der großartige Erfolg.»
ref: The day when you will see the believing men and believing women, that their light runs before them and on their right – it being said to them, “This day, the best tidings for you are the Gardens beneath which rivers flow – abide in it forever; this is the greatest success.”
draft: On the day when you see the believing men and believing women, with their light proceeding before them and to their right: "Good news for you today: Gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide forever." That is the great success.
hil: On the day you see the believing men and believing women, with their light proceeding before them and to their right, good news for you today: gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide forever. This is the great success.
compare: On the day when you see the believing men and believing women, with their light proceeding before them and to their right: "Good news for you today: Gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide forever." That is the great success.

src: (Andere) sagten: "Euer Herr kennt die (Zeit), die ihr verbracht habt, am besten.
ref: "Your Lord knows best," they said, "how long you have stayed.
draft: (Other) said: "Your Lord knows best the time you have spent."
hil: Others said, 'Your Lord knows best the time you have spent.'
compare: (Other) said: "Your Lord knows best the time you have spent."

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der euch die Nacht einrichtete, um darin zu ruhen, sowie den Tag mit Licht.
ref: It is He who made the night for you to rest, and made the day enlightening.
draft: He is the one who set up the night for you to rest in it and the day with light.
hil: He is the One who appointed the night for you to rest therein, and the day to give you light.
compare: He is the one who set up the night for you to rest in it and the day with light.

src: Da erhörten Wir ihn und schenkten ihm Jahya und heilten seine Frau.
ref: So We heard him and gave him John, and cured his wife (of barrenness).
draft: We listened to him and gave him Jahya and healed his wife.
hil: We heard his prayer and gave him Jahya and healed his wife.
compare: We heard his prayer and gave him Jahya and healed his wife.

src: Esst von den Tay-yibat und tut gottgefällig Gutes!
ref: Eat of the Taiyibat [all kinds of Halal (legal) foods which Allah has made legal (meat of slaughtered eatable animals, milk products, fats, vegetables, fruits, etc.], and do righteous deeds.
draft: Eat of the Tay-yibat and do good deeds that please God!
hil: Eat from the good things and do what is pleasing to God!
compare: Eat of the Tay-yibat and do good deeds that please God!

src: Und sie sagen: «O weh uns! Das ist der Tag des Gerichtes!»
ref: And they will say: Ah! woe be Unto us! this is the Day of Requital.
draft: And they say, "Oh woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!"
hil: And they say, 'Oh woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!'
compare: And they say, "Oh woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!"

src: Auf Ihn ver lassen sich diejenigen, die sich (überhaupt auf jemanden) verlassen.
ref: The trusting place their trust in Him."
draft: Those who rely on someone at all rely on him.
hil: Those who rely on someone, rely on him.
compare: Those who rely on someone at all rely on him.

src: Und wen ALLAH irre gehen läßt, für den wirst du keinen Weg (zum Iman) finden.
ref: For them who are not given the guidance by God, you will never find a way.
draft: And whoever Allah lets go astray, you will not find a way (to faith) for him.
hil: Whoever Allah leads astray, you will not find a way (to faith) for him.
compare: And whoever Allah lets go astray, you will not find a way (to faith) for him.

src: Solcherart erwecken WIR die Toten, damit ihr euch entsinnt.
ref: Similarly, We shall raise up the dead, so that you may remember or take heed.
draft: In this way we awaken the dead, so that you remember.
hil: In this manner, We awaken the dead so that you may remember.
compare: In this manner, We awaken the dead so that you may remember.

src: ALLAH gehört alles, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist. Und gewiß, bereits haben WIR denjenigen, denen die Schrift vor euch zuteil wurde, sowie euch angewiesen: "Handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber! Und solltet ihr Kufr betreiben, so gehört ALLAH gewiß alles, was in den Himmeln und was auf Erden ist." Und ALLAH bleibt immer absolut autark, alllobenswürdig.
ref: And to Allah only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; and indeed We have commanded those who received the Books before you, and commanded you, that keep fearing Allah; and if you disbelieve, undoubtedly to Allah only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; and Allah is Independent, Worthy Of All Praise.
draft: ALLAH owns everything that is in the heavens and on the earth. And indeed, WE have already instructed those to whom the Scripture was given before you, as well as yourselves: "Act with Taqwa towards ALLAH! And if you commit Kufr, then surely ALLAH owns everything that is in the heavens and on the earth." And ALLAH is always absolutely self-sufficient, worthy of all praise.
hil: Allah owns everything in the heavens and on the earth. Indeed, We have already instructed those who were given the scripture before you, as well as you: "Act with Taqwa towards Allah! And if you commit Kufr, then surely Allah owns everything in the heavens and on earth." And Allah is always absolutely self-sufficient and worthy of all praise.
compare: ALLAH owns everything that is in the heavens and on the earth. And indeed, WE have already instructed those to whom the Scripture was given before you, as well as yourselves: "Act with Taqwa towards ALLAH! And if you commit Kufr, then surely ALLAH owns everything that is in the heavens and on the earth." And ALLAH is always absolutely self-sufficient, worthy of all praise.

src: Dann sing das Lob deines Herrn und bitte Ihn um Vergebung. Siehe, Er wendet sich gnädig wieder zu.
ref: Then proclaim the Purity of your Lord while praising Him, and seek forgiveness from Him; indeed He is the Most Acceptor of Repentance.
draft: Then sing the praise of your Lord and ask Him for forgiveness. Behold, He will turn to you with kindness again.
hil: Then glorify your Lord and seek His forgiveness. Behold, He will turn to you with mercy again.
compare: Then glorify your Lord and seek His forgiveness. Behold, He will turn to you with mercy again.

src: Das sind die, von denen Gott weiß, was in ihrem Herzen ist. Wende dich von ihnen ab, ermahne sie und sprich zu ihnen über sie selbst eindringliche Worte.
ref: The secrets of their hearts are well known to Allah; so avoid them and explain to them, and speak to them clearly in their affairs.
draft: These are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts. Turn away from them, admonish them, and speak to them with penetrating words about themselves.
hil: Those are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts. Turn away from them, admonish them, and speak to them with penetrating words about themselves.
compare: These are the ones whom God knows what is in their hearts. Turn away from them, admonish them, and speak to them with penetrating words about themselves.

src: Er hat doch einen Vater, der ein Greis ist, so nimm einen von uns an seiner Stelle fest.
ref: Verily, he has an old father (who will grieve for him); so take one of us in his place.
draft: He indeed has a father who is an old man, so take one of us instead of him.
hil: He does indeed have a father who is old, so take one of us instead of him.
compare: He indeed has a father who is an old man, so take one of us instead of him.

src: Aber nein, er ist mit der Wahrheit gekommen und hat die Gesandten bestätigt.
ref: Not in the least. He has brought the truth and confirmed the other messengers.
draft: But no, he came with the truth and confirmed the messengers.
hil: No, he has come with the truth and confirmed the messengers.
compare: No, he has come with the truth and confirmed the messengers.

src: Und sie fragen dich nach Dhul-qarnain.
ref: They will question thee concerning Dhool Karnain.
draft: And they ask you about Dhul-Qarnain.
hil: They ask you about Dhul-Qarnain.
compare: And they ask you about Dhul-Qarnain.

src: Fir'auns und der Tamud?
ref: Of Pharaoh and Thamud come to you?
draft: Fir'auns and the Tamud?
hil: Pharaohs and the Tamud?
compare: Fir'auns and the Tamud?

src: Also wenn die Augen strahlen,
ref: Yet when the eyes are dazzled,
draft: "So when the eyes gleam"
hil: So when the eyes sparkle
compare: "So when the eyes gleam"

src: Diese haben ihre Belohnung bei ihrem HERRN. Gewiß, ALLAH ist schnell im Zur-Rechenschaft-Ziehen.
ref: Their reward is verily with their Lord; and swift is the reckoning of God!
draft: "They will receive their reward from their LORD. Indeed, Allah is swift in reckoning."
hil: Those will receive their reward from their Lord. Indeed, Allah is swift in reckoning.
compare: "They will receive their reward from their LORD. Indeed, Allah is swift in reckoning."

src: Sag: O ihr Menschen, wenn ihr über meine Religion im Zweifel seid, so diene ich nicht denjenigen, denen ihr anstatt Allahs dient, sondern ich diene Allah, Der euch abberuft.
ref: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "O you mankind! If you are in doubt as to my religion (Islam), then (know that) I will never worship those whom you worship, besides Allah.
draft: Say: O people, if you are in doubt about my religion, then I do not serve those whom you serve instead of Allah, but I serve Allah who will take you away.
hil: Say: O people, if you have doubts about my religion, I do not worship those whom you worship instead of Allah, but I worship Allah who will recall you.
compare: Say: O people, if you have doubts about my religion, I do not worship those whom you worship instead of Allah, but I worship Allah who will recall you.

src: Und dies zum Schutz vor jedem rebellischen Satan.
ref: Protecting them against every wayward devil,
draft: And this to protect against every rebellious Satan.
hil: And this is for protection against every rebellious Satan.
compare: And this is for protection against every rebellious Satan.

src: Und WIR umhüllten ihre Herzen mit Bedeckung, damit sie ihn nicht begreifen, und machten ihre Ohren schwerhörig.
ref: And We put covers over their hearts and deafness in their ears that they should not understand it.
draft: And WE covered their hearts with coverings, so they do not understand him, and made their ears hard of hearing.
hil: And We covered their hearts with veils, lest they should understand it, and made their ears hard of hearing.
compare: And WE covered their hearts with coverings, so they do not understand him, and made their ears hard of hearing.

src: Als die Nacht über ihn hereinbrach, sah er einen Himmelskörper.
ref: Then when the night darkened on him, he beheld a star.
draft: When night fell, he saw a celestial body.
hil: When night fell, he saw a celestial object.
compare: When night fell, he saw a celestial body.

src: So machen Wir die Zeichen klar für ein Volk, das begreift.
ref: In this wise We detail the signs for a people who reflect.
draft: So we make the signs clear for a people who understand.
hil: Thus we explain our signs to those who understand.
compare: Thus we explain our signs to those who understand.

src: Und die Berge, die du für fest hältst, wirst du wie Wolken dahingehen sehen: Das (ist das) Werk Allahs, Der alles vollendet hat.
ref: You will see the mountains and think they are firmly planted, but they will pass away like flying clouds: Artistry of God who perfected everything.
draft: And the mountains, which you deem to be steadfast, will be seen as fleeting clouds: That is the doing of Allah, Who perfects all things.
hil: And the mountains, which you think to be firm, shall pass away like the passing of clouds, the doing of Allah, Who perfected all things.
compare: And the mountains, which you think to be firm, shall pass away like the passing of clouds, the doing of Allah, Who perfected all things.

src: Ist nicht zu ihnen der deutliche Beweis dessen gekommen, was in den früheren Blättern steht?
ref: Have not clear proofs come to them in what is contained in the earlier Books?
draft: Has not the clear evidence of what is written in the earlier pages come to them?
hil: Has not the clear proof of what is written in the earlier scriptures come to them?
compare: Has not the clear proof of what is written in the earlier scriptures come to them?

src: Als sie dann vor ihn (Yusuf) traten, da sagten sie: "O `Aziz, die Not hat uns und unsere Familie geschlagen, und wir haben Ware von geringem Wert mitgebracht; so gib uns das volle Maß und sei wohltätig gegen uns. Wahrlich, Allah belohnt die Wohltätigen."
ref: Then when they reached in the company of Yusuf they said, “O governor! Calamity has struck us and our household, and we have brought goods of little value, so give us the full measure and be generous to us; undoubtedly Allah rewards the generous.”
draft: When they came before him (Yusuf), they said: "O Aziz, we and our family have been struck by hardship and we have brought merchandise of little worth, so give us full measure and be charitable to us. Surely Allah rewards the charitable."
hil: When they came before him (Yusuf), they said: "O minister, we and our family have fallen upon hard times, and we have brought goods of little value. So give us full measure and be charitable to us. Surely Allah rewards the charitable."
compare: When they came before him (Yusuf), they said: "O Aziz, we and our family have been struck by hardship and we have brought merchandise of little worth, so give us full measure and be charitable to us. Surely Allah rewards the charitable."

src: Sie sagten: "Bitte für uns deinen Herrn, uns Klarheit zu geben, wie sie sein soll! Die Kühe erscheinen uns (alle) ähnlich.
ref: "Call on your Lord," they said, "to name its variety, as cows be all alike to us.
draft: They said, "Ask your Lord to clarify how it should be for us! The cows all look alike to us.
hil: They said, "Ask your Lord to clarify for us how it should be! The cows all look alike to us."
compare: They said, "Ask your Lord to clarify for us how it should be! The cows all look alike to us."

src: Der Tag der Entscheidung ist wahrlich die festgesetzte Zeit für sie alle
ref: The Day of Judgement is your promised day of meeting,
draft: The day of decision is truly the appointed time for all of them.
hil: The day of judgment is truly the appointed time for all of them.
compare: The day of judgment is truly the appointed time for all of them.

src: (Es ist) die Befreiung eines Sklaven
ref: To free a neck (from the burden of debt or slavery),
draft: The liberation of a slave.
hil: The liberation of a slave.
compare: The liberation of a slave.

src: Es ziemt dem Allerbarmer nicht, Sich Kinder zu nehmen.
ref: When it does not behove the Merciful to have a son.
draft: It is not fitting for the Most Merciful to have children.
hil: It is not fitting for the Most Merciful to have children.
compare: It is not fitting for the Most Merciful to have children.

src: Aber niemals werden sie ihn sich wünschen wegen dessen, was ihre Hände vorausgeschickt haben.
ref: And they will never wish there for, because of that which their hands have sent forward.
draft: But they will never wish for him because of what their hands have sent ahead.
hil: But they will never wish for him because of what their hands have sent ahead.
compare: But they will never wish for him because of what their hands have sent ahead.

src: Ist es nur eine, soll sie die Hälfte haben.
ref: If there is only one, she gets one-half.
draft: If there's only one, she should have half.
hil: If there is only one, she should have half.
compare: If there's only one, she should have half.

src: Und sollte eine Schwerbelastete um (die Entlastung von) ihrer Last rufen, der (Gerufene) wird (ihr) davon nichts abnehmen, und selbst dann nicht, wäre er von den Nahverwandten.
ref: Even if one weighted down calls for help with its burden, nothing can be lifted from it, even if they were related.
draft: And if a heavily burdened person calls for (relief from) their burden, the (called person) will not take it away from them, not even if they were close relatives.
hil: And if a heavily burdened person calls for the relief of their burden, the called person will not relieve them of it, not even if they were close relatives.
compare: And if a heavily burdened person calls for the relief of their burden, the called person will not relieve them of it, not even if they were close relatives.

src: Allah ist Allhörend, Allsehend.
ref: Truly, Allah is Ever All-Hearer, All-Seer.
draft: Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.
hil: Truly Allah is All-Hearing and All-Seeing.
compare: Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

src: Und wir haben bestimmt gesündigt.»
ref: We were definitely in the wrong.”
draft: "And we have definitely sinned."
hil: We have certainly sinned.
compare: "And we have definitely sinned."

src: Allah wird euer Tun sehen, und (auch) Sein Gesandter und die Gläubigen.
ref: Allah will see your deeds, and (so will) His Messenger and the believers.
draft: "Allah will see your deeds, and (also) His messenger and the believers."
hil: God will see your conduct, and so will His apostle and the faithful.
compare: "Allah will see your deeds, and (also) His messenger and the believers."

src: Und bestimme für uns im Diesseits Gutes, und auch im Jenseits.
ref: Enjoin for us good in the world, and good in the world to come.
draft: And determine good for us in this world, and also in the hereafter.
hil: Determine good for us in this world and in the hereafter.
compare: Determine good for us in this world and in the hereafter.

src: Allah schämt Sich nicht, ein Gleichnis auch nur mit einer Mücke oder mit etwas darüber (hinaus) zu prägen. Was nun diejenigen angeht, die glauben, so wissen sie, daß es die Wahrheit von ihrem Herrn ist. Was aber diejenigen angeht, die ungläubig sind, so sagen sie: "Was will denn Allah damit als Gleichnis?" Er läßt damit viele in die Irre gehen und leitet viele damit recht, doch läßt Er damit nur die Frevler in die Irre gehen,
ref: Surely Allah is not ashamed to set forth any parable-- (that of) a gnat or any thing above that; then as for those who believe, they know that it is the truth from their Lord, and as for those who disbelieve, they say: What is it that Allah means by this parable: He causes many to err by it and many He leads aright by it! but He does not cause to err by it (any) except the transgressors,
draft: "Allah is not ashamed to make an example of even a mosquito or above it. As for those who believe, they know that it is the truth from their Lord. But as for those who disbelieve, they say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" He misleads many thereby and guides many thereby. And He misleads not except the defiantly disobedient,"
hil: "Allah is not ashamed to make an example of even a mosquito or something beyond it. Those who believe know that it is the truth from their Lord. As for those who disbelieve, they say, "What does Allah mean by this as an example?" By this, He leads many astray and guides many aright. But He misleads only the defiantly disobedient."
compare: "Allah is not ashamed to make an example of even a mosquito or something beyond it. Those who believe know that it is the truth from their Lord. As for those who disbelieve, they say, "What does Allah mean by this as an example?" By this, He leads many astray and guides many aright. But He misleads only the defiantly disobedient."

src: Diejenigen aber, die ungläubig waren, (bekommen zu hören): «Sind euch nicht meine Zeichen immer wieder verlesen worden?
ref: As for the infidels, (it will be said): "Were not My messages read out to you?
draft: "But those who were unbelievers, (will hear): "Have not my signs been recited to you again and again?"
hil: But those who disbelieved (will hear): 'Have not my signs been recited to you again and again?'
compare: But those who disbelieved (will hear): 'Have not my signs been recited to you again and again?'

src: Die, denen ihr anstelle Gottes dient, können euch keinen Lebensunterhalt bringen.
ref: Surely those you worship other than God have no power over your means of livelihood.
draft: Those whom you serve instead of God cannot provide for your livelihood.
hil: Those whom you serve instead of God cannot provide for your livelihood.
compare: Those whom you serve instead of God cannot provide for your livelihood.

src: Und den, dem Wir ein langes Leben geben, setzen wir körperlichem Verfall aus.
ref: Whoever reaches old age, We reverse in natural disposition.
draft: And for those to whom We grant a long life, We expose them to physical decay.
hil: And whomever We bring to an old age, We reverse him in creation, so do they not understand?
compare: And for those to whom We grant a long life, We expose them to physical decay.

src: Diejenigen, die den ehrbaren Ehefrauen (Untreue) vorwerfen und hierauf nicht vier Zeugen beibringen, die geißelt mit achtzig Hieben und nehmt von ihnen niemals mehr eine Zeugenaussage an - das sind die (wahren) Frevler -,
ref: Those who defame chaste women and do not bring four witnesses should be punished with eighty lashes, and their testimony should not be accepted afterwards, for they are profligates,
draft: Those who accuse honorable wives of infidelity and cannot bring forth four witnesses, shall be punished with eighty lashes and never accept their testimony again - they are the true wrongdoers.
hil: Those who accuse honorable wives of infidelity and cannot bring forth four witnesses shall be punished with eighty lashes and never accept their testimony again—they are the true wrongdoers.
compare: Those who accuse honorable wives of infidelity and cannot bring forth four witnesses shall be punished with eighty lashes and never accept their testimony again—they are the true wrongdoers.

src: Und verzehrt ihn nicht maßlos und ihrem Erwachsenwerden zuvorkommend.
ref: And do not consume it extravagantly or hastily before they grow up.
draft: And do not consume it excessively, and be proactive in their growing up.
hil: And do not consume it excessively while being proactive in their coming of age.
compare: And do not consume it excessively while being proactive in their coming of age.

src: Alsdann sagte einer von ihnen: "Tötet Yusuf nicht, sondern werft ihn in die Tiefe des Brunnens hinein, so finden ihn einige Reisende, solltet ihr dies tun wollen."
ref: One of them said: "If you must do so, then do not kill Joseph, but throw him into an unused well. Some passing caravan may rescue him."
draft: Then one of them said, "Do not kill Joseph, but if you must do something, throw him into the depths of the well; some caravan will find him."
hil: Then one of them said, "Do not kill Joseph, but cast him into the bottom of the dark pit, some caravan will find him, if you must do something."
compare: Then one of them said, "Do not kill Joseph, but cast him into the bottom of the dark pit, some caravan will find him, if you must do something."

src: Erklärt nicht für haram die Tay-yibat dessen, was ALLAH euch für halal erklärte, und übertretet nicht!
ref: Make not unlawful the Taiyibat (all that is good as regards foods, things, deeds, beliefs, persons, etc.) which Allah has made lawful to you, and transgress not.
draft: Do not declare as haram the Tay-yibat of what ALLAH has declared halal to you and do not transgress!
hil: Do not declare as haram the Tay-yibat of what Allah has declared halal to you, and do not transgress!
compare: Do not declare as haram the Tay-yibat of what ALLAH has declared halal to you and do not transgress!

src: Und sie erkundigen sich bei dir: "Ist es wahr?"
ref: Yet they want to be informed if it is true.
draft: And they ask you: "Is it true?"
hil: And they ask you: "Is it true?"
compare: And they ask you: "Is it true?"

src: Eine Gruppe davon pflegte er zu unterdrücken, indem er ihre Söhne erschlug und ihre Frauen leben ließ.
ref: He persecuted a group of them, slaughtering their sons, while sparing their daughters.
draft: One group of them he maintained by suppressing their sons and letting their wives live.
hil: A group of them he used to oppress by killing their sons and letting their women live.
compare: A group of them he used to oppress by killing their sons and letting their women live.

src: Ein Buch, dessen Zeichen im einzelnen dargelegt sind, als arabischer Koran, für Leute, die Bescheid wissen,
ref: A Book whose verses have been distinguished and explained, a lucid discourse for people who understand,
draft: A book, whose characters are explained in detail, as an Arabic Quran, for people who know.
hil: A book whose signs are fully explained, like the Arabic Quran, for people who understand.
compare: A book whose signs are fully explained, like the Arabic Quran, for people who understand.

src: Und sie fragen dich nach einer Fatwa, sag: "ALLAH gibt euch Fatwa hinsichtlich der Kalala. Wenn ein Mensch stirbt, ohne daß er Kinder (oder Eltern), aber eine Schwester (väterlicherseits) hinterläßt, so bekommt sie die Hälfte dessen, was er hinterläßt, und er beerbt sie, wenn sie keine Kinder (oder Eltern) hinterläßt.
ref: They ask you for a ruling. Say, ‘Allah gives you a ruling concerning the kalalah: If a man dies and has no children [or parents], but has a sister, for her shall be a half of what he leaves, and he shall inherit from her if she has no children.
draft: And they ask you for a Fatwa, say: "ALLAH gives you a Fatwa regarding the Kalala. If a person dies without leaving children (or parents), but a sister (paternal) is left behind, she receives half of what he leaves behind, and he inherits her if she does not leave behind children (or parents).
hil: And if they ask you for a ruling, say: Allah gives you a ruling concerning one having neither descendants nor ascendants as heirs. If a man dies, leaving a sister only, she shall have half of what he leaves. And he inherits her (after her death) if she dies childless.
compare: And if they ask you for a ruling, say: Allah gives you a ruling concerning one having neither descendants nor ascendants as heirs. If a man dies, leaving a sister only, she shall have half of what he leaves. And he inherits her (after her death) if she dies childless.

src: Laß die Ungläubigen nicht meinen, sie hätten (Uns) übertroffen.
ref: The infidels should not think that they can bypass (the law of God).
draft: Let not the unbelievers think they have (out)done (Us).
hil: Do not let the disbelievers think that they have surpassed us.
compare: Let not the unbelievers think they have (out)done (Us).

src: "Yusuf, du Wahrhaftiger! Gib uns eine Antwort über sieben fette Kühe, die von sieben mageren Kühen gefressen werden, und über sieben grüne Ähren und (sieben) andere Vertrocknete, vielleicht kehre ich zu den Menschen zurück, vielleicht wissen sie es dann."
ref: (And coming to the prison) he said: "O Joseph the truthful, tell us (the meaning of) seven fat cows being devoured by seven lean ones, and seven green ears of corn and seven seared, that I may go back to the people and tell them."
draft: "Yusuf, you truthful one! Give us an answer about seven fat cows, which are eaten by seven skinny cows, and about seven green ears of grain and (seven) others that are dry. Perhaps I will return to the people, perhaps then they will know it."
hil: Yusuf, you truthful one! Give us an answer about seven fat cows which are devoured by seven skinny cows, and about seven green ears of grain, and (seven) others that are dry. Perhaps I will return to the people; maybe they will know then.
compare: "Yusuf, you truthful one! Give us an answer about seven fat cows, which are eaten by seven skinny cows, and about seven green ears of grain and (seven) others that are dry. Perhaps I will return to the people, perhaps then they will know it."

src: Ihr dient anstatt Allahs nur Götzen und schafft (dabei nur) ungeheuerliche Lüge. Gewiß, diejenigen, denen ihr anstatt Allahs dient, vermögen euch nicht zu versor gen.
ref: You only serve, apart from God, idols and you create a calumny; those you serve, apart from God, have no power to provide for you.
draft: You serve only idols instead of Allah and (thus create) only monstrous falsehood. Indeed, those whom you serve instead of Allah are not able to provide for you.
hil: You worship only idols instead of Allah and thus create unacceptable lies. Surely, those whom you worship instead of Allah are not able to provide for you.
compare: You worship only idols instead of Allah and thus create unacceptable lies. Surely, those whom you worship instead of Allah are not able to provide for you.

src: Auf Ihn vertraue ich.
ref: In Him I have put my trust.
draft: I trust him.
hil: I trust in Him.
compare: I trust him.

src: (Und auch) acht Tiere zu Paaren: von den Schafen zwei und von den Ziegen zwei. - Sprich: Sind es die beiden Männchen, die Er verboten hat, oder die beiden Weibchen, oder was der Leib der beiden Weibchen enthält?
ref: There are eight pairs, two of the species of sheep and two of goats. Ask them which has He forbidden, the two males or the two females, or what the females carry in their wombs?
draft: (And also) eight animals in pairs: two of them are sheep and two of them are goats. - Say: Are they the two males that He has prohibited, or the two females, or what is contained in the bodies of the two females?
hil: Eight animals in pairs: two of them are sheep and two of them are goats. Say: Are they the two males that He has forbidden, or the two females, or what the bodies of the two females contain?
compare: Eight animals in pairs: two of them are sheep and two of them are goats. Say: Are they the two males that He has forbidden, or the two females, or what the bodies of the two females contain?

src: Dieser (Quran) ist nichts als eine Ermahnung für die Welten.
ref: This is only a warning for mankind.
draft: "This (Quran) is nothing but a reminder for the worlds."
hil: This (Quran) is nothing but a reminder for the worlds.
compare: "This (Quran) is nothing but a reminder for the worlds."

src: Und den, der an Allah glaubt und recht handelt, wird Er in Gärten führen, durch die Bäche fließen, worin (er) auf ewig verweilen wird. Allah hat ihm wahrlich eine treffliche Versorgung gewährt.
ref: And those who believe in Allah and work righteousness, He will admit to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow, to dwell therein for ever: Allah has indeed granted for them a most excellent Provision.
draft: "And (as for) those who believe in Allah and do good deeds, He will make them enter gardens beneath which rivers flow, to abide therein forever; Allah has indeed given them a goodly sustenance."
hil: And those who believe in Allah and do good deeds, God will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, where they abide eternally. God has truly granted them an excellent provision.
compare: "And (as for) those who believe in Allah and do good deeds, He will make them enter gardens beneath which rivers flow, to abide therein forever; Allah has indeed given them a goodly sustenance."

src: Und sie sagen: "Er ist ja fürwahr besessen."
ref: They say: “Surely he is afflicted with madness”;
draft: "They say: 'He is indeed possessed.'"
hil: They say, 'Indeed, he is possessed.'
compare: They say, 'Indeed, he is possessed.'

src: Gewiß, ALLAH ist allumfassend, allwissend.
ref: Allah is All-Sufficient for His creatures' needs, All-Knowing.
draft: Sure, Allah is all-encompassing, all-knowing.
hil: Indeed, Allah is all-bounteous, all-knowing.
compare: Sure, Allah is all-encompassing, all-knowing.

src: So machten Wir es zu einem warnenden Beispiel für die Zeitgenossen und die Nachfolgenden und zu einer Ermahnung für die Gottesfürchtigen.
ref: And whom We made an example for the people (of the day) and those after them, and warning for those who fear God.
draft: So we made it a warning example for contemporaries and those who follow and a reminder for the God-fearing.
hil: We made it a warning example for contemporaries and those who follow and a reminder for the God-fearing.
compare: So we made it a warning example for contemporaries and those who follow and a reminder for the God-fearing.

src: (Damals als Allah sie dir in deinem Traum in geringer Anzahl zeigte; und hätte Er sie dir in großer Anzahl gezeigt, wäret ihr sicherlich Versager und über die Sache uneins gewesen; Allah aber bewahrte (euch davor); wahrlich, Er kennt wohl, was in den Herzen ist.
ref: God showed (the Makkans) to be few in your dream, for if He had shown them to be many you would surely have lost courage and disagreed about the (wisdom) of the battle. But God spared you this, for He surely knows what is in the hearts of men.
draft: Back then, when Allah showed them to you in small numbers in your dream; and if He had shown them to you in large numbers, you would surely have failed and been divided over the matter; but Allah protected you from that; truly, He knows well what is in the hearts.
hil: Back then, when God showed them to be few in your dream, for if He had shown them to be many you would surely have lost courage and disagreed about the wisdom of the battle. But God brought you in sight of victory you longed for.
compare: Back then, when Allah showed them to you in small numbers in your dream; and if He had shown them to you in large numbers, you would surely have failed and been divided over the matter; but Allah protected you from that; truly, He knows well what is in the hearts.

src: Gewiß, für die Unrecht-Begehenden ist eine qualvolle Peinigung bestimmt.
ref: Verily, there is a painful torment for the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.)."
draft: Certainly, a painful punishment is destined for those who commit injustice.
hil: Certainly, those who commit injustice are destined for a painful punishment.
compare: Certainly, a painful punishment is destined for those who commit injustice.

src: Damit Gott einem jeden vergelte, was er erworben hat.
ref: That God may reward each soul for its deeds.
draft: May God repay everyone according to what he has earned.
hil: May God repay each person according to what they have earned.
compare: May God repay each person according to what they have earned.

src: So erfolgt auch das Herauskommen.
ref: Even thus will be the life after death.
draft: So also is the coming out.
hil: Thus, the exit also takes place.
compare: Thus, the exit also takes place.

src: Und ER machte für euch Bekleidungen, die euch vor der Hitze schützen, und Bekleidungen, die euch vor eurer Gewalttätigkeit (gegeneinander) schützen.
ref: He has given you garments to protect you from the heat, and garments to protect you from your own violence.
draft: And HE made clothing for you that protects you from the heat, and clothing that protects you from your violence (towards each other).
hil: And HE created clothing for you that protects you from the heat and clothing that protects you from your violence (towards each other).
compare: And HE made clothing for you that protects you from the heat, and clothing that protects you from your violence (towards each other).

src: Das Gleichnis Seiner Erleuchtung ist wie eine Aushöhlung, in der eine Leuchte ist.
ref: The allegory of His light is that of a pillar on which is a lamp.
draft: The allegory of his enlightenment is like a hollowing out in which a lamp is.
hil: The likeness of His enlightenment is like a hollow in which there is a lamp.
compare: The likeness of His enlightenment is like a hollow in which there is a lamp.

src: Da erretteten Wir ihn und diejenigen, die mit ihm waren, im Schiff. Und Wir machten sie zu Nachfolgern und ließen diejenigen ertrinken, die Unsere Zeichen für Lüge erklärten.
ref: They denied him, but We delivered him, and those with him in the ship, and We made them generations replacing one after another, while We drowned those who belied Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.).
draft: We rescued him and those who were with him in the ship. And We made them successors and let those who declared Our signs as lies to drown.
hil: We saved him and those who were with him in the ship and made them successors. And We drowned those who denied Our signs.
compare: We rescued him and those who were with him in the ship. And We made them successors and let those who declared Our signs as lies to drown.

src: Wie kann Ihm ein Sohn gehören, wo ER niemals eine Partnerin hatte und doch alles erschuf?! Und ER ist über alles allwissend.
ref: How can He have children when He has no wife? He created all things and He is the All-Knower of everything.
draft: How can a son belong to Him, when He never had a partner and yet created everything?! And He is omniscient above all.
hil: How can a son belong to Him, when He never had a partner and yet created everything?! And He is omniscient above all.
compare: How can a son belong to Him, when He never had a partner and yet created everything?! And He is omniscient above all.

src: Sie waren gegen den Gesandten ihres Herrn ungehorsam. I) a ergriff Er sie mit einem sich steigernden heftigen Griff.
ref: When they disobeyed the apostle of their Lord He seized them with an overwhelming punishment.
draft: They were disobedient to their master's envoy. I) He took her with an increasingly violent grip.
hil: They disobeyed their Lord's envoy. I) He took hold of her with an increasingly violent grip.
compare: They disobeyed their Lord's envoy. I) He took hold of her with an increasingly violent grip.

src: Sollte euch ALLAHs Peinigung unerwartet oder voraussehbar überkommen, werden etwa andere damit zugrunde gerichtet außer den unrecht-begehenden Leuten?"
ref: If God's chastisement comes upon you, suddenly or openly, shall any be destroyed, except the people of the evildoers?'
draft: "Should Allah's punishment come upon you unexpectedly or predictably, will anyone be destroyed besides the wrongful people?"
hil: If Allah's punishment comes upon you unexpectedly or predictably, will anyone be destroyed besides the wrongdoers?
compare: "Should Allah's punishment come upon you unexpectedly or predictably, will anyone be destroyed besides the wrongful people?"

src: Als sie deren Zusammenfluß erreicht hatten, vergaßen sie ihren Fisch, so nahm er seinen Weg ins Meer wie einen Tauchpfad.
ref: When they reached the confluence they forgot the fish (they had brought as food) which swiftly made its way into the sea.
draft: When they reached their confluence, they forgot their fish, so it took its way into the sea like a diving path.
hil: When they reached their confluence, they forgot about their fish, and it took its path into the sea as if diving.
compare: When they reached their confluence, they forgot about their fish, and it took its path into the sea as if diving.

src: Und (ER gebietet euch), daß ihr eure Verantwortung den Waisen gegenüber in gerechter Weise erfüllt."
ref: Allah directs you to treat the orphans with justice.
draft: And (HE commands you) that you fulfill your responsibility towards the orphans in a just manner.
hil: And He commands you to fulfill your responsibility towards orphans in a just manner.
compare: And He commands you to fulfill your responsibility towards orphans in a just manner.

src: Und wenn ihr krank oder auf Reisen seid, oder wenn einer von euch vom Abort kommt, oder wenn ihr die Frauen berührt habt und ihr kein Wasser findet, dann sucht einen sauberen Boden und streicht euch davon über das Gesicht und die Hände. Gott will euch keine Bedrängnis auferlegen, sondern Er will euch rein machen und seine Gnade an euch vollenden, auf daß ihr dankbar seid.
ref: When you wish to stand up for prayer, wash your faces, and your hands up to the elbows, and pass wet palms over your heads and wash your feet up to the ankles; and if you need a bath, clean yourselves thoroughly; and if you are sick or on a journey, or one of you returns from answering the call of nature, or you have cohabited with women, and you do not find water, then cleanse (yourself) with clean soil – therefore stroke your soiled palms over your faces and your hands with it; Allah does not will to place you in hardship, but He wills to fully purify you and complete His favour upon you, so that you may be grateful.
draft: And if you are sick or traveling, or if one of you comes from the toilet, or if you have touched women and cannot find water, then look for a clean ground and wipe your face and hands with it. Allah does not want to impose any difficulty on you, but He wants to purify you and complete His grace upon you, so that you may be grateful.
hil: And if you are sick or traveling, or if one of you comes from the toilet, or if you have touched women and cannot find water, then look for clean soil and wipe your face and hands with it. Allah does not want to impose any hardship on you, but He wants to purify you and complete His grace upon you, so that you may be grateful.
compare: And if you are sick or traveling, or if one of you comes from the toilet, or if you have touched women and cannot find water, then look for a clean ground and wipe your face and hands with it. Allah does not want to impose any difficulty on you, but He wants to purify you and complete His grace upon you, so that you may be grateful.

src: ER ist Derjenige, Der Herzensruhe in die Herzen der Mumin hinabsandte, damit sie mehr Iman zu ihrem Iman gewinnen. Und ALLAH gehören die Gehilfen der Himmel und der Erde. Und ALLAH ist immer allwissend, allweise.
ref: It is He who sent down the sense of security into the hearts of believers so that their faith may increase with belief, -- God's are the armies of the heavens and the earth; and God is all-knowing and all-wise; --
draft: "He is the one who sent tranquility into the hearts of the Mumin so that they may increase in Iman (faith). And Allah's are the assistants of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is always all-knowing, all-wise."
hil: He is the one who sent tranquility into the hearts of the believers so that they may increase in their faith. To Allah belong the armies of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is always all-knowing and all-wise.
compare: He is the one who sent tranquility into the hearts of the believers so that they may increase in their faith. To Allah belong the armies of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is always all-knowing and all-wise.

src: Esset von ihren Früchten, wenn sie Früchte tragen, doch gebet davon am Tage der Ernte (dem Armen) seinen Anteil, seid (dabei aber) nicht verschwenderisch! Wahrlich, Er liebt diejenigen nicht, die nicht maßhalten.
ref: So eat of their fruit when they are in fruit, and give on the day of harvesting His due, and do not be extravagant, for God does not love those who are prodigal.
draft: Eat from their fruits when they bear fruits, but give their due Zakat (charity) on the day of their harvest, and do not waste. Surely, Allah does not like the wasteful.
hil: Eat from their fruits when they bear fruits, but give their due Zakat (charity) on the day of their harvest, and do not waste. Surely, Allah does not like the wasteful.
compare: Eat from their fruits when they bear fruits, but give their due Zakat (charity) on the day of their harvest, and do not waste. Surely, Allah does not like the wasteful.

src: (Alles) Lob gehört Allah, dem Herrn der Weltenbewohner!
ref: All praise be to God, the Lord of all the worlds.
draft: All praise belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds' inhabitants.
hil: All praise belongs to Allah, Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds.
compare: All praise belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds' inhabitants.

src: Ihr meintet, daß der Gesandte und die Gläubigen niemals mehr zu ihren Angehörigen zurückkehren würden, und das ist euch in euren Herzen ausgeschmückt worden.
ref: You had imagined that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and this notion was embellished in your hearts.
draft: You thought that the messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and that has been embellished in your hearts.
hil: You thought that the messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and that this has been embellished in your hearts.
compare: You thought that the messenger and the believers would never return to their families, and that this has been embellished in your hearts.

src: Und gehorcht ALLAH und gehorcht dem Gesandten!
ref: Obey God and obey His Apostle.
draft: And obey ALLAH and obey the Messenger!
hil: Obey God and obey the Apostle!
compare: And obey ALLAH and obey the Messenger!

src: Als der Prophet einer seiner Gattinnen eine Mitteilung im geheimen anvertraute.
ref: The Prophet told something in confidence to one of his wives.
draft: When the Prophet confided a message to one of his wives in secret.
hil: When the Prophet confided a message to one of his wives in secret.
compare: When the Prophet confided a message to one of his wives in secret.

src: Sie haben außer Ihm keinen Freund.
ref: How well does He hear!
draft: They have no friend except for him.
hil: They have no friend besides Him.
compare: They have no friend besides Him.

src: Demjenigen von beiden, von dem er dachte, daß er doch gerettet wird, sagte er dann: "Erwähne mich vor deinem Gebieter!"
ref: Then he said to the one he deemed should be saved of the two, 'Mention me in thy lord's presence.'
draft: To the one of the two, from whom he thought that he will be saved, he then said: "Mention me to your lord!"
hil: To the one he knew would be released he said: "Remember me to your lord." But Satan made him forget to mention it to his lord, and Joseph remained in prison for a number of years.
compare: To the one of the two, from whom he thought that he will be saved, he then said: "Mention me to your lord!"

src: Und (Wir sandten) zu Tamud ihren Bruder Salih. Er sagte: "O mein Volk, dient Allah! Keinen Gott habt ihr außer Ihm. Er hat euch aus der Erde entstehen lassen und sie euch zu besiedeln gegeben. So bittet Ihn um Vergebung, hierauf bereut vor Ihm. Mein Herr ist nahe und erhört (die Gebete)."
ref: And to the Thamud tribe, We sent their fellow man Saleh; he said, “O my people! Worship Allah, there is no other True God except Him; He created you from the earth and established you in it, so seek forgiveness from Him and incline towards Him in repentance; indeed my Lord is Close, Acceptor of Prayer.”
draft: And (We sent) to Thamud their brother Salih. He said: "O my people, worship Allah! You have no god but Him. He brought you forth from the earth and settled you therein. So seek His forgiveness, and turn to Him repentant. Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive (to prayer)."
hil: We sent their brother Salih to Thamud. He said: 'O my people, worship Allah! You have no other god but Him. He created you from the earth and settled you therein. So ask Him for forgiveness, then turn to Him in repentance. Surely, my Lord is Near, Responsive to prayer.'
compare: And (We sent) to Thamud their brother Salih. He said: "O my people, worship Allah! You have no god but Him. He brought you forth from the earth and settled you therein. So seek His forgiveness, and turn to Him repentant. Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive (to prayer)."

src: So macht Allah euch Seine Zeichen klar, auf daß ihr begreifen möget.
ref: So does God pronounce His decrees that you may understand.
draft: So Allah makes His signs clear to you that you may understand.
hil: Allah thus makes His signs clear to you that you may understand.
compare: So Allah makes His signs clear to you that you may understand.

src: Richte deine Augen nicht auf das, was WIR manchen von ihnen an vergänglichen Verbrauchsgütern zur Verfügung stellten. Und trauere nicht um sie, und behandle die Mumin milde!
ref: So covet not things We have bestowed on a portion of them to enjoy, and do not grieve for them, and protect those who believe;
draft: Do not focus your eyes on what WE provided some of them with as perishable consumer goods. And don't mourn them, and treat the Moomin kindly!
hil: Don't set your eyes on what WE have provided some of them with as perishable consumer goods. And don't mourn them, and treat the Moomin kindly!
compare: Don't set your eyes on what WE have provided some of them with as perishable consumer goods. And don't mourn them, and treat the Moomin kindly!

src: Und diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht und gottgefällig Gutes getan haben, werden WIR in Dschannat eintreten lassen, die von Flüssen durchflossen sind, darin werden sie für immer und ewig bleiben. Dies ist ALLAHs Versprechen, ein Wahrhaftiges.
ref: And those who believed and did good deeds – We shall soon admit them into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding in them for ever and ever; a true promise from Allah; and whose Words are more true than those of Allah?
draft: And those who have internalized the iman and done good deeds pleasing to God, We will admit them to jannat, which is traversed by rivers, wherein they will abide forever. This is Allah's true promise.
hil: And those who believe and do good deeds, We will admit them to jannat, which is traversed by rivers, wherein they will abide forever. This is Allah's true promise.
compare: And those who believe and do good deeds, We will admit them to jannat, which is traversed by rivers, wherein they will abide forever. This is Allah's true promise.

src: Auf Gott sollen die Gläubigen vertrauen.
ref: The believers should only place their trust in God.
draft: "Believers should trust in God."
hil: "Believers shall trust in God."
compare: "Believers should trust in God."

src: Alsdann wird jeder Seele nach ihrem Verdienst vergolten werden, und es soll ihnen kein Unrecht geschehen.
ref: Then every person shall be paid in full what he has earned, - and they shall not be dealt with unjustly.
draft: Then every soul shall be rewarded according to its merit, and no injustice shall be done to them.
hil: Then each soul shall be rewarded according to its merit, and no injustice shall be done to them.
compare: Then every soul shall be rewarded according to its merit, and no injustice shall be done to them.

src: Als Mose zu unserem Termin kam und sein Herr zu ihm sprach, sagte er: «Mein Herr, zeige (Dich) mir, daß ich zu Dir schaue.»
ref: When Moses arrived at the appointed time and his Lord spoke to him, he said: "O Lord, reveal Yourself to me that I may behold You."
draft: When Moses came to our appointment and his lord spoke to him, he said, "My lord, show yourself to me so that I may look upon you."
hil: When Moses came to our appointment and his Lord spoke to him, he said, "My Lord, show me that I may look upon You."
compare: When Moses came to our appointment and his lord spoke to him, he said, "My lord, show yourself to me so that I may look upon you."

src: Ist die Ermahnung unter uns nur zu ihm allein gekommen?" Nein, sie hegen Zweifel über Meine Er mahnung. Nein, sie haben Meine Strafe nicht gekostet.
ref: What, out of all of us, has the Remembrance been sent down to him (Prophet Muhammad)' No, they are doubtful about My Remembrance, no, they have not yet tasted My punishment.
draft: "Has the admonition only come to him alone among us?" No, they have doubts about My admonition. No, they have not tasted My punishment.
hil: "The admonition has only come to him among us?" No, they have doubts about My admonition. No, they have not tasted My punishment."
compare: "The admonition has only come to him among us?" No, they have doubts about My admonition. No, they have not tasted My punishment."

src: Dann lächelte er doch wegen ihrer Aussage und sagte: "Mein HERR!
ref: So he [Sulaiman (Solomon)] smiled, amused at her speech and said: "My Lord!
draft: Then he smiled because of her statement and said: "My LORD!
hil: He smiled because of her statement and said, "My Lord!"
compare: He smiled because of her statement and said, "My Lord!"

src: Ihr Menschen! Bereits kam zu euch doch eine Ermahnung von eurem HERRN, eine Heilung von dem, was in den Brüsten (an Zweifel) ist, eine Rechtleitung und eine Gnade für die Mumin.
ref: O men, a warning has come to you from your Lord, a remedy for the (doubts) of the heart, and a guidance and grace for those who believe.
draft: "Your people! Already a reminder from your LORD has come to you, a healing of what is in the breasts (of doubt), a guidance and a mercy for the believers."
hil: O mankind! Indeed, there has come to you a reminder from your Lord, a healing to what is in the breasts (of doubt), a guidance and mercy for the believers.
compare: O mankind! Indeed, there has come to you a reminder from your Lord, a healing to what is in the breasts (of doubt), a guidance and mercy for the believers.

src: Übertreibt nicht in eurem Din (und sagt nichts) außer der Wahrheit und folgt nicht den Neigungen von Leuten, die bereits vorher irregegangen sind, viele in die Irre verleitet haben und vom rechten Weg abgekommen sind."
ref: Do not wrongfully commit injustice in your religion, and do not follow the people who earlier went astray, and led many others astray, and wandered away from the Straight Path.”
draft: Do not exaggerate in your Din (religion) and do not say anything but the truth. Do not follow the inclinations of people who have gone astray before, who misled many and strayed away from the right path.
hil: Do not exaggerate in your religion and do not speak anything but the truth. Do not follow the inclinations of people who have gone astray before, who have misled many and strayed from the right path.
compare: Do not exaggerate in your Din (religion) and do not say anything but the truth. Do not follow the inclinations of people who have gone astray before, who misled many and strayed away from the right path.

src: Lasse die Kinder Isra'ils mit uns gehen, und strafe sie nicht.
ref: So let the children of Israel come with us, and do not oppress them.
draft: Let the children of Israel go with us and do not punish them.
hil: Let the Descendants of Israel go with us and do not punish them.
compare: Let the children of Israel go with us and do not punish them.

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, kehrt zu Gott um in aufrichtiger Umkehr. Möge Gott euch eure Missetaten sühnen und euch in Gärten eingehen lassen, unter denen Bäche fließen, am Tag, da Gott den Propheten und die, die mit ihm gläubig sind, nicht zuschanden macht!
ref: O ye who believe! Turn to Allah with sincere repentance: In the hope that your Lord will remove from you your ills and admit you to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow,- the Day that Allah will not permit to be humiliated the Prophet and those who believe with him.
draft: O you who believe, turn to God in sincere repentance. May God atone for your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, on the day when God will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believe with him!
hil: O you who believe, turn to Allah in a sincere turning, maybe your lord will remove from you your evil and cause you to enter gardens beneath which rivers flow, on the day on which Allah will not abase the prophet and those who believe with him; their light shall run on before them and on their right hands; they shall say: 'Our Lord, make perfect for us our light,' and grant us protection. Surely Thou hast power over all things.'
compare: O you who believe, turn to God in sincere repentance. May God atone for your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, on the day when God will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believe with him!

src: Und die Himmel sind zusammengerollt mit Seiner Allmacht. Gepriesen-erhaben ist ER und immer höher über das, was sie an Schirk betreiben.
ref: Hallowed be He and Exalted above that which they associate.
draft: And the heavens are rolled together with His omnipotence. Exalted and ever higher is He above what they practice of shirk.
hil: And the heavens are rolled together with His omnipotence. Exalted and ever higher is He above what they practice of shirk.
compare: And the heavens are rolled together with His omnipotence. Exalted and ever higher is He above what they practice of shirk.

src: (Erinnere daran), als er zum voll beladenen Schiff floh.
ref: When he fled on the laden ship,
draft: "Remember when he fled to the fully loaded ship."
hil: Remember when he fled to the fully loaded ship.
compare: "Remember when he fled to the fully loaded ship."

src: Das bewirkt es eher, daß ihr euch vor Ungerechtigkeit bewahrt.
ref: This is better than being iniquitous.
draft: This would rather cause you to protect yourselves from injustice.
hil: This rather causes you to protect yourself from injustice.
compare: This rather causes you to protect yourself from injustice.

src: Darum esset davon und speist den Notleidenden, den Bedürftigen.
ref: So eat thereof, and feed the hungry poor.
draft: Therefore, eat of it and feed the needy, the destitute.
hil: Therefore, eat from it and feed the destitute and the needy.
compare: Therefore, eat from it and feed the destitute and the needy.

src: Und pflegt keinen Verkehr mit ihnen, während ihr euch in die Moscheen zurückgezogen habt.
ref: And do not have sexual relations with them (your wives) while you are in I'tikaf (i.e. confining oneself in a mosque for prayers and invocations leaving the worldly activities) in the mosques.
draft: And do not have any sexual relations with them while you have withdrawn to the mosques.
hil: And do not have any sexual relations with them while you have withdrawn to the mosques.
compare: And do not have any sexual relations with them while you have withdrawn to the mosques.

src: Die bittere Armut und die Krankheit suchten sie heim und sie wurden erschüttert, bis der Gesandte und diejenigen mit ihm, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben, sagten: "Wann kommt ALLAHs Beistand?" Ja!
ref: Hardship and adversity befell them and they were shaken, to the extent that the Noble Messenger and the believers along with him said, “When will the help of Allah come?”; pay heed!
draft: The bitter poverty and illness tormented them and they were shaken until the envoy and those with him who internalized the faith said: "When will Allah's help come?" Yes!
hil: The severe poverty and illness plagued them, and they were shaken, until the envoy and those with him who had internalized the faith said, "When will Allah's help come?" Yes!
compare: The bitter poverty and illness tormented them and they were shaken until the envoy and those with him who internalized the faith said: "When will Allah's help come?" Yes!

src: Sie werden, wenn sie die Pein sehen, zu wissen bekommen, wer weiter vom Weg abgeirrt ist.
ref: They will know soon who is farther away from the path when they see the punishment!
draft: You will, when you see the pain, get to know who has strayed further from the path.
hil: They will know who has strayed further from the path when they see the pain.
compare: You will, when you see the pain, get to know who has strayed further from the path.

src: Diejenigen, die nicht umkehren, sind die, die Unrecht tun.
ref: Those who do not repent behave wickedly.
draft: Those who do not turn back are the ones who do wrong.
hil: Those who do not repent are the ones who do wrong.
compare: Those who do not repent are the ones who do wrong.

src: Bereits ALLAH hat uns von euren Begebenheiten kundgetan. Und ALLAH wird eure Taten sehen sowie Sein Gesandter, dann werdet ihr zum Allwissenden über das Verborgene und das Sichtbare zurückgebracht, dann wird ER euch das kundtun, was ihr zu tun pflegtet.
ref: And God will watch your actions, and so will the Messenger; then you will be returned to the Knower of the Invisible and the Visible, and He will inform you of what you used to do.”
draft: Already Allah has informed us about your incidents. And Allah will see your deeds as well as His messenger, then you will be brought back to the Omniscient about the hidden and the visible, then He will inform you of what you used to do.
hil: Already God has informed us about your incidents. And God, together with His apostle, will witness your deeds. Then you will be brought back to the one who knows the unknown and the known, and He will inform you of what you used to do.
compare: Already God has informed us about your incidents. And God, together with His apostle, will witness your deeds. Then you will be brought back to the one who knows the unknown and the known, and He will inform you of what you used to do.

src: Das ist die Rede eines edlen Gesandten,
ref: That this is indeed the word of the noble Messenger,
draft: This is the speech of a noble envoy.
hil: This is the speech of a noble messenger.
compare: This is the speech of a noble messenger.

src: Und ihnen wurde kein Aufschub gewährt.
ref: They were granted no respite.
draft: And they were not granted any postponement.
hil: And they were not granted any delay.
compare: And they were not granted any postponement.

src: Und sie riefen: "Malik! Laß deinen HERRN uns vernichten!" Er sagte: "Gewiß, ihr müsst bleiben."
ref: And they shall call, 'O
draft: And they shouted: "Malik! Let your Lord destroy us!" He said: "Certainly, you must remain."
hil: And they cried: "Malik! Let your Lord destroy us!" He said: "Certainly, you must remain."
compare: And they shouted: "Malik! Let your Lord destroy us!" He said: "Certainly, you must remain."

src: Alif Lam Ra. Dies sind die Zeichen des weisen Buches.
ref: Alif-Lam-Ra*; these are verses of the Book of wisdom. (*alphabets of the Arabic language; Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)
draft: Alif Lam Ra. These are the signs of the wise book.
hil: Alif Lam Ra. These are the verses of the authoritative Book.
compare: Alif Lam Ra. These are the verses of the authoritative Book.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter. Würden sie doch dafür eine klare Bestätigung vorlegen! Und keiner begeht noch mehr Unrecht als derjenige, der im Namen ALLAHs Lügen erfindet!
ref: These, our people, have taken for themselves gods beside Him - wherefore bring they not for them an authority manifest? --and who doth greater wrong than he who fabricateth against God a lie?
draft: These are our people, they took gods in place of Him. Would that they could present a clear confirmation for it! And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah!
hil: These are our people, they took gods in place of Him. Would that they could present a clear confirmation for it! And who is more wicked than the one who fabricates a lie against God?
compare: These are our people, they took gods in place of Him. Would that they could present a clear confirmation for it! And no one commits more injustice than the one who invents lies in the name of Allah!

src: Da sprach Pharao: "Bringt mir einen jeden kundigen Zauberer herbei."
ref: "Bring the cleverest magicians to me," said the Pharaoh.
draft: Pharaoh said, "Bring me every knowledgeable sorcerer."
hil: Then Pharaoh said, "Bring me every skilled sorcerer."
compare: Then Pharaoh said, "Bring me every skilled sorcerer."

src: Ja! Nieder mit Madyan, wie es nieder mit Thamud war.
ref: Lo! a far removal for Madyan, even as Thamud were removed afar!
draft: Yes! Down with Midian, just as it was down with Thamud.
hil: Yes! Down with Midian, just as it was down with Thamud.
compare: Yes! Down with Midian, just as it was down with Thamud.

src: Verzeihe uns, vergib uns und erbarme Dich unser!
ref: Pardon us and grant us Forgiveness.
draft: Forgive us, forgive us, and have mercy on us!
hil: Forgive us, pardon us, and have mercy upon us!
compare: Forgive us, forgive us, and have mercy on us!

src: So war es.
ref: Thus it was.
draft: So it was.
hil: So it was.
compare: So it was.

src: Bring du sie vom Westen.»
ref: You make it come from the West."
draft: "Bring them from the west."
hil: Bring them from the west.
compare: Bring them from the west.

src: Erbärmlich ist der Fisq-Name nach dem Iman. Und wer nicht bereut, so sind diese die Unrecht-Begehenden.
ref: And whoever does not repent – then it is they who are unjust.
draft: The Fisq name after the Imam is miserable. And those who do not repent, they are the wrongdoers.
hil: The Fisq name after the Imam is miserable. And those who do not repent, they are the wrongdoers.
compare: The Fisq name after the Imam is miserable. And those who do not repent, they are the wrongdoers.

src: ER ist unser Maula!"
ref: He is our Maula (Lord, Helper and Protector)."
draft: "He is our bully!"
hil: "He is our bully!"
compare: "He is our bully!"

src: Ihr habt doch keine Gottheit außer Ihm und mindert nicht das Maß und das Wiegen. Ich sehe doch, daß es euch gut geht, auch gewiß, ich fürchte um euch die Peinigung eines alles umfassenden Tages.
ref: Worship Allah, you have no other Ilah (God) but Him, and give not short measure or weight, I see you in prosperity; and verily I fear for you the torment of a Day encompassing.
draft: You have no deity other than Him; nor are you ones who reduce [your rightful share in divine gifts,] nor are you ones who exceed [the bounds of propriety]. Behold, I see that you are all living in prosperity [for the time being], and so do I - but, verily, I dread suffering for you on the Day when all-encompassing suffering shall overwhelm [you]!
hil: You have no god except Him, and do not lessen the measure and the scale. I see that you are doing well, but certainly I fear for you the punishment of an all-encompassing day.
compare: You have no deity other than Him; nor are you ones who reduce [your rightful share in divine gifts,] nor are you ones who exceed [the bounds of propriety]. Behold, I see that you are all living in prosperity [for the time being], and so do I - but, verily, I dread suffering for you on the Day when all-encompassing suffering shall overwhelm [you]!

src: Er sagte: "Kann ich ihn euch etwa anders anvertrauen, als ich euch seinen Bruder vorher anvertraut habe? Doch ALLAH ist Der beste Beschützer und ER ist Der Allgnädigste der Gnade-Erweisenden."
ref: He said: I intrust you with him only as I intrusted you with his brother aforetime; Allah is the best Guard, and He is the Most Merciful of the merciful.
draft: He said, "Can I entrust him to you in any other way than I entrusted his brother to you before? But Allah is the best protector and He is the most gracious of the merciful."
hil: He said, "Can I entrust him to you in any other way than I entrusted his brother to you before? But Allah is the best protector and He is the most gracious of the merciful."
compare: He said, "Can I entrust him to you in any other way than I entrusted his brother to you before? But Allah is the best protector and He is the most gracious of the merciful."

src: Diejenigen, die ungläubig waren, sagten zu ihren Gesandten: "Wir werden euch ganz gewiß aus unserem Land vertreiben, oder aber ihr kehrt zu unserem Glaubensbekenntnis zurück!"
ref: The unbelievers said to their apostles: "We shall drive you out of our land, or else you come back to our fold."
draft: Those who were unbelievers said to their messengers: "We will certainly drive you out of our land, or you will return to our creed!"
hil: Those who were disbelievers said to their messengers, 'We will certainly drive you out of our land, or you will return to our creed!'
compare: Those who were unbelievers said to their messengers: "We will certainly drive you out of our land, or you will return to our creed!"

src: Als sie kam, da wurde gesprochen: "Ist dein Thron wie dieser?" Sie sagte: "Es ist, als wäre er ein und derselbe." Und uns wurde (davon) Wissen, schon vor ihr, verliehen; und wir hatten uns bereits (Allah) ergeben.
ref: And when she came she was asked: 'Is your throne like this' And she replied: 'It looks like it' And we were given the knowledge before her, and wereMuslims.
draft: When she arrived, it was said: "Is your throne like this?" She said: "It is as if it were the same." And knowledge had already been given to us, even before her, and we had already submitted (to Allah).
hil: When she arrived, it was said: 'Is your throne like this?' She said, 'It is as if it were the same.' And knowledge had already been given to us, even before her, and we had already submitted (to Allah).
compare: When she arrived, it was said: "Is your throne like this?" She said: "It is as if it were the same." And knowledge had already been given to us, even before her, and we had already submitted (to Allah).

src: Und wenn ihr Schwierigkeiten miteinander habt, so wird für ihn eine andere stillen.
ref: But if you find this difficult, let some other woman suckle (the child) for her.
draft: And if you have difficulties with one another, another will silence for him.
hil: And if you have difficulties with one another, then let another woman breastfeed for him (the father of the child).
compare: And if you have difficulties with one another, then let another woman breastfeed for him (the father of the child).

src: Am Tag, an dem Wir den Himmel zusammenfalten, wie das Urkundenbuch die Schriftstücke zusammenfaltet. Wie Wir eine erste Schöpfung am Anfang gemacht haben, wiederholen Wir sie.
ref: The day We shall roll up the heavens like a written scroll, We shall revert it (to nothing) as it was before We first created it.
draft: On the day when we fold the sky together, like the record book folds the documents. Like we made a first creation in the beginning, we repeat it.
