hil: As the night fell upon him, he saw a celestial body. He said, 'That is my Lord.'
compare: As the night fell upon him, he saw a celestial body. He said, "That is my Lord."

src: Aber Allah ist voll Huld gegen die Weltenbewohner.
ref: But gracious is God to the people of the world.
draft: But Allah is full of grace towards the inhabitants of the world.
hil: Allah is full of grace towards the inhabitants of the world.
compare: Allah is full of grace towards the inhabitants of the world.

src: Und Wir haben den untersten Himmel mit Leuchten geschmückt und haben sie zu Wurfsteinen gegen die Satane gemacht.
ref: We have adorned the lower heaven with lamps, and have made them a means to drive away the satans.
draft: And We have adorned the lowest heaven with lights and made them missiles for the devils.
hil: And We have adorned the nearest (lowest) heaven with lamps (stars) to be an adornment as well as to guard (from the devils by using them as missiles against the devils). Such is the Decree of Him the All-Mighty, the All-Knower.
compare: And We have adorned the nearest (lowest) heaven with lamps (stars) to be an adornment as well as to guard (from the devils by using them as missiles against the devils). Such is the Decree of Him the All-Mighty, the All-Knower.

src: Ihr könnt auf der Erde nichts vereiteln. Und ihr habt außer Gott weder Freund noch Helfer.
ref: You cannot thwart Him on the earth, and have no friend or helper apart from Him.
draft: You cannot thwart anything on earth, and you have neither friend nor helper except God.
hil: You cannot thwart anything on earth, and you have neither friend nor helper except God.
compare: You cannot thwart anything on earth, and you have neither friend nor helper except God.

src: "Aber jetzt erst! Wo du dich doch zuvor widersetztest und zu den Unheilstiftern gehörtest?
ref: "Yes, now" (was the answer), "though before this you were disobedient and rebellious.
draft: "But now, finally! Where you previously resisted and belonged to the troublemakers?"
hil: "But now, after all! Where previously you resisted and belonged to the mischief-makers?"
compare: "But now, after all! Where previously you resisted and belonged to the mischief-makers?"

src: Und euch wird nur für das vergolten, was ihr zu tun pflegtet,
ref: And be rewarded but only for what you had done,
draft: And only what you used to do will be paid back to you.
hil: You will be recompensed only according to your deeds.
compare: You will be recompensed only according to your deeds.

src: Du bist aber nur ein Warner.
ref: (Muhammad), you are only a warner.
draft: You're just a warning.
hil: You are nothing but a bearer of warnings.
compare: You are nothing but a bearer of warnings.

src: Sag: Wollt ihr mit uns über Allah streiten, wo Er doch unser und euer Herr ist?
ref: Say: "Why do you dispute with us about God when He is equally your Lord and our Lord?
draft: Say: Do you wish to argue with us about Allah, when He is our Lord and your Lord as well?
hil: Say: Will you contend with us regarding Allah, whereas He is our Lord even as He is Your Lord; unto us our works, and unto you your works? And we are His devotees.
compare: Say: Do you wish to argue with us about Allah, when He is our Lord and your Lord as well?

src: Und derjenige (Mann) aus Ägypten, der ihn gekauft hatte, sagte zu seiner Frau: "Nimm ihn freundlich auf.
ref: The Egyptian who bought him instructed his wife: "House him honourably.
draft: And the (man) from Egypt who bought him said to his wife, "Take him in kindly."
hil: And he, the man from Egypt who bought him, said to his wife, 'Take him in kindly.'
compare: And the (man) from Egypt who bought him said to his wife, "Take him in kindly."

src: Hast du nicht jene gesehen, denen ein Teil der Schrift gegeben wurde?
ref: Have you not seen those who were given a portion of the Scripture?
draft: Have you not seen those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given?
hil: Have you not seen those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given?
compare: Have you not seen those to whom a portion of the Scripture was given?

src: Und jedesmal wenn du den Quran rezitiert hast, errichteten WIR zwischen dir und denjenigen, die keinen Iman an das Jenseits verinnerlichen, einen unsichtbaren Vorhang.
ref: When you recite the Qur'an, We place a hidden veil between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter;
draft: And every time you recited the Quran, We erected between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter an invisible barrier.
hil: And every time you recited the Quran, We erected an invisible barrier between you and those who do not internalize faith in the Hereafter.
compare: And every time you recited the Quran, We erected between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter an invisible barrier.

src: Und bitte um Vergebung für deine Sünde und lobpreise deinen Herrn am Abend und am frühen Morgen.
ref: And ask forgiveness for thy sin, and proclaim the praise of thy Lord at evening and dawn.
draft: And ask for forgiveness for your sin and praise your Lord in the evening and early morning.
hil: Please ask for forgiveness for your sins and praise your Lord in the evening and early morning.
compare: And ask for forgiveness for your sin and praise your Lord in the evening and early morning.

src: Für diejenigen von euch, die sich von ihren Frauen durch den Rückenspruch scheiden...
ref: Those among you who make their wives unlawful (Az-Zihar) to them by saying to them "You are like my mother's back."
draft: "For those of you who divorce their wives through the phrase 'I divorce you' said behind their back..."
hil: "For those of you who divorce their wives through the phrase 'I divorce you' said behind their back..."
compare: "For those of you who divorce their wives through the phrase 'I divorce you' said behind their back..."

src: Es wird dir nichts gesagt außer dem, was den Gesandten vor dir gesagt wurde.
ref: Nothing is said to you which had not been said to other apostles before you.
draft: You will be told nothing except what was told to the messengers before you.
hil: No one will be able to tell you anything except what was already told to the messengers before you.
compare: You will be told nothing except what was told to the messengers before you.

src: Und sie wurden zum Guten des Gesagten rechtgeleitet.
ref: They were guided to purity of speech.
draft: And they were guided right for the good of what was said.
hil: "And they were guided aright in consequence of what was said."
compare: "And they were guided aright in consequence of what was said."

src: Es ist nur eine Ermahnung für die ganze Schöpfung.
ref: It is only a warning for all mankind.
draft: It is only a warning for the whole creation.
hil: "It is only a reminder for the entire creation."
compare: "It is only a reminder for the entire creation."

src: Und urteile zwischen ihnen nach dem, was Gott herabgesandt hat, und folge nicht ihren Neigungen.
ref: And judge between them according to what God revealed, and do not follow their desires.
draft: And judge between them according to what God has revealed, and do not follow their whims.
hil: Judge between them by what God has revealed and do not follow their whims.
compare: And judge between them according to what God has revealed, and do not follow their whims.

src: Gewiß, ALLAH liebt nicht die Freudenerregten.
ref: God does not like those who exult.
draft: Surely, Allah does not love those who enjoy themselves excessively.
hil: Surely, Allah does not love those who excessively enjoy themselves.
compare: Surely, Allah does not love those who excessively enjoy themselves.

src: Und wenn eine jede Seele, die Unrecht begangen hat, alles besäße, was auf Erden ist, würde sie versuchen, sich damit (von der Strafe) loszukaufen.
ref: And if every one that hath wronged had all that is in the earth, surely he would ransom himself therewith.
draft: "And if every soul that has committed injustice possessed everything that is on earth, it would try to redeem itself with it (from the punishment)."
hil: If every unjust soul owned everything on earth, it would certainly give it in order to redeem itself, but they will secretly feel repentant when they saw the punishment, and it has been judged between them with fairness and they will not be wronged.
compare: "And if every soul that has committed injustice possessed everything that is on earth, it would try to redeem itself with it (from the punishment)."

src: Und auch die in Erfahrung bringe, die heucheln.
ref: And that he might know those who played the hypocrite.
draft: And also those who pretend to be something they are not, get to know them.
hil: Get to know even those who are hypocritical.
compare: Get to know even those who are hypocritical.

src: Und das Wasser begann zu sinken, und die Angelegenheit war entschieden. Und das Schiff kam auf dem Güdyy zur Rast.
ref: Withhold (your rain)." And the water was diminished (made to subside) and the Decree (of Allah) was fulfilled (i.e. the destruction of the people of Nuh (Noah).
draft: And the water began to sink, and the matter was decided. And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
hil: And the water began to sink, and the matter was decided. And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.
compare: And the water began to sink, and the matter was decided. And the ship came to rest on the Güdyy.

src: Gewiß, sie sind ein Volk von Frevlern."
ref: They are certainly a rebellious people."
draft: "Surely, they are a people of wrongdoers."
hil: They are certainly a people of wrongdoers.
compare: "Surely, they are a people of wrongdoers."

src: Gewiß, WIR haben dir die Schrift mit der Wahrheit hinabgesandt, damit du zwischen den Menschen richtest mit dem, was ALLAH dir erklärt hat.
ref: Surely We have sent down to thee the Book with the truth, so that thou mayest judge between the people by that God has shown thee.
draft: Certainly, WE have sent down to you the Scripture with truth so that you may judge between the people by that which Allah has shown you.
hil: Surely, we have sent down to you the Book with the truth so that you may judge between people based on what Allah has taught you.
compare: Certainly, WE have sent down to you the Scripture with truth so that you may judge between the people by that which Allah has shown you.

src: Dafür werdet ihr dann Uns gegenüber keinen Rächer für euch finden.
ref: Then you will not find any avenger against Us.
draft: "For this, you will not find any avenger for yourselves against us."
hil: "For this, you will not find any avenger for yourselves against us."
compare: "For this, you will not find any avenger for yourselves against us."

src: Und es gibt keinen unter euch, der nicht dahin wie zur Tränke gehen würde?
ref: There is not one among you who will not reach it.
draft: And is there anyone among you who would not go there as if to a well?
hil: And there is none among you who would not go there as if to a drink.
compare: And is there anyone among you who would not go there as if to a well?

src: Dann wird Er euch eure Sünden vergeben und euch eingehen lassen in Gärten, unter denen Bäche fließen, und in angenehme Wohnungen in den Gärten von Eden. Das ist der großartige Erfolg.
ref: He will forgive you your sins and admit you into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, and superb dwellings in everlasting Gardens of Eden; this is the greatest success.
draft: Then He will forgive you your sins, and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, and to pleasant dwellings in the gardens of Eden. That is the supreme triumph.
hil: Then He will forgive you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, and to pleasant dwellings in the gardens of Eden. That is the supreme triumph.
compare: Then He will forgive you your sins, and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow, and to pleasant dwellings in the gardens of Eden. That is the supreme triumph.

src: Da zogen sie beide weiter, bis, als sie dann zu den Bewohnern einer Stadt kamen, sie ihre Bewohner um etwas zu essen baten; diese aber weigerten sich, sie gastlich aufzunehmen. Da fanden sie in ihr eine Mauer, die einzustürzen drohte, und so richtete er sie auf. Er (Musa) sagte: "Wenn du wolltest, hättest du dafür wahrlich Lohn nehmen können."
ref: So they both set out again; until they came to the people of a dwelling – they asked its people for food – they refused to invite them – then in the village they both found a wall about to collapse, and the chosen bondman straightened it; said Moosa, “If you wished, you could have taken some wages for it!”
draft: They both continued on until they came to the inhabitants of a town, where they asked the inhabitants for something to eat; but they refused to receive them hospitably. Then they found a wall therein that was about to fall down, and he (Moses) set it up. He (Moses) said: "If you had wished, certainly you could have charged a compensation for it."
hil: They both continued on until they came to the inhabitants of a town, where they asked the inhabitants for something to eat, but they refused to receive them hospitably. Then they found a wall therein that was about to fall down, and he (Moses) set it up. He said: "If you had wished, certainly you could have charged a compensation for it."
compare: They both continued on until they came to the inhabitants of a town, where they asked the inhabitants for something to eat; but they refused to receive them hospitably. Then they found a wall therein that was about to fall down, and he (Moses) set it up. He (Moses) said: "If you had wished, certainly you could have charged a compensation for it."

src: Dann werden diese ihnen die Rede erwidern: "Gewiß, ihr seid zweifelsohne Lügner."
ref: They will fling back at them the saying, 'Surely, you are truly liars.'
draft: Then these will respond to them: "Certainly, you are undoubtedly liars."
hil: "They will reply to them: 'Certainly, you are undoubtedly liars.'"
compare: Then these will respond to them: "Certainly, you are undoubtedly liars."

src: Ist es denn für die Menschen verwunderlich, daß Wir einem Mann von ihnen (als Offenbarung) eingegeben haben: "Warne die Menschen und verkünde denen, die glauben, die frohe Botschaft, daß sie bei ihrem Herrn einen wahrhaftigen Stand haben"? Die Ungläubigen sagen: "Das ist wahrlich ein deutlicher Zauberer.3"
ref: Are people amazed that We have sent to a man among them, the divine revelation that “Warn the people and convey glad tidings to the believers that for them with their Lord is the place* of truth”? The disbelievers say, “Indeed he is an open magician.” (* Positions of honour on the Day of Resurrection or in heaven.)
draft: Is it surprising for the people that We have revealed to a man from among them: "Warn the people and give good tidings to those who believe that they will have a [firm] precedence of honor with their Lord?" [But] the disbelievers say, "Indeed, this is an obvious magician." [Quran 10:2]
hil: Is it surprising for people that We have revealed to a man from among them, "Warn mankind and give good news to those who believe that they will have a true position of prominence with their Lord?" The disbelievers say, "This is clearly a magician." [Quran 10:2]
compare: Is it surprising for the people that We have revealed to a man from among them: "Warn the people and give good tidings to those who believe that they will have a [firm] precedence of honor with their Lord?" [But] the disbelievers say, "Indeed, this is an obvious magician." [Quran 10:2]

src: Allah weiß besser über ihren Glauben Bescheid. Wenn ihr sie dann als gläubig erkennt, dann schickt sie nicht zu den Ungläubigen zurück.
ref: When believing women come to you as emigrants, examine them, Allah knows best as to their Faith, then if you ascertain that they are true believers, send them not back to the disbelievers, they are not lawful (wives) for the disbelievers nor are the disbelievers lawful (husbands) for them.
draft: "Allah knows better about their faith. If you recognize them as believers, do not send them back to the unbelievers."
hil: Allah knows better about their faith. If you recognize them as believers, do not send them back to the unbelievers.
compare: "Allah knows better about their faith. If you recognize them as believers, do not send them back to the unbelievers."

src: ALLAH erlegt einer Seele nichts auf, außer was sie vermag. Ihr gebührt, was sie erworben, und ihr obliegt, was sie sich angeeignet hat.
ref: Allah does not burden anyone, except with something within its capacity; beneficial for it is the virtue it earned, and harmful for it is the evil it earned; “Our Lord!
draft: ALLAH imposes nothing on a soul except what it can bear. It is entitled to what it has earned, and it is responsible for what it has acquired.
hil: ALLAH places not burden on any soul other than that which it can bear. It deserves what it has earned, and it is responsible for what it has acquired.
compare: ALLAH imposes nothing on a soul except what it can bear. It is entitled to what it has earned, and it is responsible for what it has acquired.

src: ER sagte: "Du wirst Mich nicht sehen!
ref: "You cannot behold Me," He said.
draft: He said: "You will not see me!"
hil: He said, 'You cannot behold Me,'.
compare: He said: "You will not see me!"

src: Er sprach: "O Noah, er gehört nicht zu deiner Familie; siehe, dies ist kein rechtschaffenes Benehmen. So frage Mich nicht nach dem, von dem du keine Kenntnis hast.
ref: He said: "O Nuh (Noah)! Surely, he is not of your family; verily, his work is unrighteous, so ask not of Me that of which you have no knowledge!
draft: He said, "O Noah, he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so ask Me not for that about which you have no knowledge.
hil: He said, "O Noah, he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so do not question Me about something you don't know."
compare: He said, "O Noah, he is not of your family; indeed, he is [one whose] work was other than righteous, so do not question Me about something you don't know."

src: Auch hat Er die Herdentiere erschaffen.
ref: And the cattle! He hath created them.
draft: Also, He has created the herd animals.
hil: He has also created the herd animals.
compare: He has also created the herd animals.

src: Er sagte zu seinen Angehörigen: "Bleibt hier.
ref: "Wait here," he said to his family; "I have seen a fire.
draft: He said to his relatives: "Stay here."
hil: He said to his relatives, "Stay here."
compare: He said to his relatives: "Stay here."

src: Und wir erklärten den Tag des Gerichtes für Lüge,
ref: And rejected the Day of Judgement as a lie
draft: And we declared the Day of Judgement as a lie.
hil: And we denied the Day of Judgment as a lie.
compare: And we declared the Day of Judgement as a lie.

src: Und gewähre ihnen Einblick, denn sie werden den Einblick haben.
ref: And wait; they will come to know soon.
draft: And grant them insight, for they will have insight.
hil: Grant them insight, for they shall have insight.
compare: And grant them insight, for they will have insight.

src: Dem das Königreich der Himmel und der Erde gehört; und Allah ist Zeuge von allem.
ref: Whose kingdom spreads over the heavens and the earth. God is witness over everything.
draft: To whom belongs the kingdom of heaven and earth; and Allah is witness to everything.
hil: To Him only belongs the kingship of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is a Witness over all things.
compare: To Him only belongs the kingship of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is a Witness over all things.

src: Sie möchten gern die Worte Gottes abändern. Sprich: «Ihr dürft uns nicht folgen.
ref: They want to change God's word, but tell them, "You shall not follow us.
draft: They would like to change the words of God. Say, "You must not follow us."
hil: Do not follow us, they would like to change the words of God.
compare: They would like to change the words of God. Say, "You must not follow us."

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr eure beigesellten Partner, an die ihr anstelle von ALLAH Bittgebete richtet? Zeigt mir, was sie von der Erde erschufen!
ref: Proclaim, “Just show me your partners (false deities) whom you worship other than Allah; show me which part of the earth have they created – or do they have any share in the heavens?”
draft: Say: "How do you see your associated partners to whom you direct supplications instead of Allah? Show me what they have created on Earth!"
hil: Say: "How do you see your associated partners whom you direct supplications instead of Allah? Show me what they have created on Earth!"
compare: Say: "How do you see your associated partners to whom you direct supplications instead of Allah? Show me what they have created on Earth!"

src: Dann erretten WIR Unsere Gesandten und diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlicht haben. Solcherart obliegt es Uns, die Mumin zu erretten.
ref: Then We shall save Our Noble Messengers and the believers – this is it; it is incumbent upon Our mercy to save the Muslims.
draft: Then we shall save our messengers and those who have internalized the faith. In this way, it is our duty to save the believers.
hil: We shall save our messengers and those who have internalized the faith. Thus, it is our responsibility to save the believers.
compare: Then we shall save our messengers and those who have internalized the faith. In this way, it is our duty to save the believers.

src: Allah ist mit den Standhaften.
ref: Truly! Allah is with As-Sabirin (the patient ones, etc.).
draft: Allah is with the steadfast.
hil: Allah is with the steadfast.
compare: Allah is with the steadfast.

src: Die die Engel abberufen, während sie gute (Menschen) gewesen sind.
ref: Those whom the angels cause to die (when they are) good.
draft: The angels recall those who have been good.
hil: The angels recall those who have been good.
compare: The angels recall those who have been good.

src: Und wer von euch krank ist oder an seinem Haupt ein Leiden hat, der soll Ersatz leisten durch Fasten, Mildtätigkeit oder Darbringen eines Schlachtopfers.
ref: But if you are sick or have ailment of the scalp (preventing the shaving of hair), then offer expiation by fasting or else giving alms or a sacrificial offering.
draft: And whoever among you is sick or has a head ailment, they shall make up for it by fasting, giving charity, or sacrificing an animal.
hil: And whoever among you is sick or has an ailment preventing the shaving of their hair, they shall make expiation by fasting or else giving alms or a sacrificial offering.
compare: And whoever among you is sick or has a head ailment, they shall make up for it by fasting, giving charity, or sacrificing an animal.

src: O die ihr glaubt, wenn ihr gläubige Frauen heiratet und euch hierauf von ihnen scheidet, bevor ihr sie berührt habt, dann dürft ihr für sie keine von euch berechnete Wartezeit aussetzen; gewährt ihnen eine Abfindung und gebt sie auf schöne Weise frei.
ref: O you who believe, when you marry believing women then divorce them before having (sexual) contact with them, you have no right to demand observance of the 'waiting period' of them. But provide suitably for them, and let them go with honour.
draft: O you who believe, if you marry believing women and then divorce them before you have touched them, then there is no waiting period for you to count for them; so give them a gift and release them in a gracious manner.
hil: O you who believe, if you marry believing women and then divorce them before you have touched them, you should not subject them to waiting periods you have set out for them; you shall compensate them and release them with kindness.
compare: O you who believe, if you marry believing women and then divorce them before you have touched them, you should not subject them to waiting periods you have set out for them; you shall compensate them and release them with kindness.

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr es? Wenn ALLAH mich und diejenigen mit mir zugrunde richtet oder Gnade erweist, wer gewährt den Kafir einen Schutz vor einer qualvollen Peinigung?"
ref: Say: "Just think: If God destroys me and those with me, or is benevolent to us, who will then protect the unbelievers from a painful doom?"
draft: Say: "How do you see it? If ALLAH destroys me and those with me or grants mercy, then who will protect the Kafirs from a painful punishment?"
hil: Say: 'How do you see it? If Allah were to destroy me and those with me or grant mercy, then who will protect the unbelievers from a painful punishment?'
compare: Say: 'How do you see it? If Allah were to destroy me and those with me or grant mercy, then who will protect the unbelievers from a painful punishment?'

src: Es ist die Gemeinschaft eures Vaters Ibrahim. ER nannte euch Muslime vorher und in diesem (Quran), damit der Gesandte Zeuge über euch wird und ihr Zeugen über die Menschen werdet.
ref: He hath named you Muslims of old time and in this (Scripture), that the messenger may be a witness against you, and that ye may be witnesses against mankind. So establish worship, pay the poor-due, and hold fast to Allah.
draft: It is the community of your father Ibrahim. He named you Muslims before and in this (Quran), so that the Messenger could bear witness about you and you could bear witness about the people.
hil: It is the community of your father Ibrahim. He called you Muslims before and in this (Quran), so that the Messenger could bear witness about you and you could bear witness about the people.
compare: It is the community of your father Ibrahim. He named you Muslims before and in this (Quran), so that the Messenger could bear witness about you and you could bear witness about the people.

src: Den Herrn von Mose und Aaron.»
ref: "The Lord of Moses and Aaron."
draft: "To Mr. Moses and Aaron."
hil: To Mr. Moses and Aaron.
compare: To Mr. Moses and Aaron.

src: Und sie sagten: "Was ist los mit diesem Gesandten, er ißt die Speisen und geht zu den Märkten, würde zu ihm doch ein Engel herabgesandt, damit er mit ihm einWarner wird!
ref: But they say: "What sort of prophet is this who eats food and walks the market places? Why was no angel sent to him to act as admonisher with him?
draft: And they said, "What is wrong with this messenger? He eats food and goes to the marketplaces. Why was an angel not sent down to him to be a warner alongside him?"
hil: They said, "What's wrong with this messenger? He eats food and goes to the marketplaces. Why wasn't an angel sent down to him to be a warner alongside him?"
compare: And they said, "What is wrong with this messenger? He eats food and goes to the marketplaces. Why was an angel not sent down to him to be a warner alongside him?"

src: Er ist es, Der euch bei Nacht abberuft und weiß, was ihr bei Tag begangen habt, und euch hierauf an ihm auferweckt, damit eine festgesetzte Frist erfüllt wird.
ref: It is He indeed who sends you to death at night, and knows what you do in the day, then makes you rise with it again in order that the fixed term of life be fulfilled.
draft: He is the one who calls you during the night and knows what you have done during the day, and then wakes you up so that a set period of time can be fulfilled.
hil: He is the one who summons you during the night, and knows what you have done during the day. He then awakens you to fulfill a set period of time.
compare: He is the one who summons you during the night, and knows what you have done during the day. He then awakens you to fulfill a set period of time.

src: Und hütet ja eure Eide. So macht euch Allah Seine Zeichen klar, auf daß ihr dankbar sein möget.
ref: So God makes clear to you His signs; haply you will be thankful.
draft: And guard your oaths. Thus Allah makes clear to you His signs that you may be grateful.
hil: And guard your oaths. Thus Allah makes clear to you His signs that you may be grateful.
compare: And guard your oaths. Thus Allah makes clear to you His signs that you may be grateful.

src: Sie sagten: "Verbrennt ihn und helft euren Göttern, wenn ihr etwas tun wollt."
ref: They said: "Burn him, and save your gods, if you are men of action."
draft: They said: "Burn him and help your gods if you want to do something."
hil: They said: "Burn him and help your gods if you want to do something."
compare: They said: "Burn him and help your gods if you want to do something."

src: Gewiß, ALLAH bleibt immer allwissend, allkundig.
ref: Indeed Allah is Ever All-Knower, Well-Acquainted with all things.
draft: Certainly, Allah always remains omniscient and all-knowing.
hil: "Verily, Allah remains all-knowing and all-aware".
compare: Certainly, Allah always remains omniscient and all-knowing.

src: Ihr werdet (noch) erfahren, über wen eine Strafe kommen wird, die ihn in Schande stürzt, und wer ein Lügner ist.
ref: You will come to know who it is on whom descends the torment that will cover him with ignominy, and who is a liar!
draft: You will (yet) experience about whom a punishment will come, which will shame him, and who is a liar.
hil: You will (yet) learn over whom a punishment will come, which will bring him into disgrace, and who is a liar.
compare: You will (yet) learn over whom a punishment will come, which will bring him into disgrace, and who is a liar.

src: Aber diejenigen, die böse Taten begehen und danach bereuen und glauben-, gewiß, dein Herr ist danach wahrlich Allvergebend und Barmherzig.
ref: Yet those who do wrong, then repent and believe, are forgiven, for your Lord is forgiving and kind.
draft: But those who commit evil deeds and then repent and believe - indeed, your Lord is thereafter surely all-forgiving and merciful.
hil: But those who commit evil deeds and then repent and believe - indeed, your Lord is surely all-forgiving and merciful.
compare: But those who commit evil deeds and then repent and believe - indeed, your Lord is thereafter surely all-forgiving and merciful.

src: Sie sind doch nicht ihre Mütter. Ihre Mütter sind die, die sie geboren haben.
ref: Their mothers are none else but those who gave birth to them.
draft: You are not their mothers. Their mothers are the ones who gave birth to them.
hil: They are not their mothers. Their mothers are the ones who gave birth to them.
compare: They are not their mothers. Their mothers are the ones who gave birth to them.

src: Als ob sie wohlverwahrte Eier wären.
ref: Like sheltered eggs in a nest.
draft: As if they were well-protected eggs.
hil: As if they were well-protected eggs.
compare: As if they were well-protected eggs.

src: Reisende kamen vorbei. Sie sandten ihren Wasserschöpfer, und er ließ seinen Eimer hinunter.
ref: A caravan happened to pass, and sent the water-carrier to bring water from the well.
draft: Travelers passed by. They sent down their water scoop, and he lowered his bucket.
hil: Travelers passed by. They sent down their water scoop, and he lowered his bucket.
compare: Travelers passed by. They sent down their water scoop, and he lowered his bucket.

src: Er ist zweifelsohne dieWahrheit von unserem HERRN! Wir waren doch vor ihm Muslime."
ref: Indeed even before it we have been from those who submit themselves to Allah in Islam as Muslims (like 'Abdullah bin Salam and Salman Al-Farisi, etc.).
draft: He is undoubtedly the truth of our LORD! We were Muslims before him after all.
hil: He is undoubtedly the truth of our LORD! We were Muslims before him after all.
compare: He is undoubtedly the truth of our LORD! We were Muslims before him after all.

src: 'Ain-sin-qaf.
ref: 'Am Sin Qaf.
draft: Ain-sin-qaf.
hil: Ain-sin-qaf.
compare: Ain-sin-qaf.

src: Und Wir wollen euch sicherlich prüfen, bis Wir diejenigen von euch ausscheiden, die kämpfen und standhaft sind.
ref: We shall certainly test you until We know those who strive hard for the cause of God and those who exercise patience.
draft: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient, and We will test your affairs.
hil: And indeed, We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient, and We will test your affairs.
compare: And We will surely test you until We make evident those who strive among you [for the cause of Allah] and the patient, and We will test your affairs.

src: ALLAH gewährt viel Rizq, wem ER will, und läßt es wenig sein.
ref: God outspreads and straitens His provision unto whomsoever He will.
draft: ALLAH grants much Rizq to whom HE wills, and makes it little.
hil: ALLAH grants ample sustenance to whomever HE pleases among HIS servants, and HE can restrict it.
compare: ALLAH grants ample sustenance to whomever HE pleases among HIS servants, and HE can restrict it.

src: Du brichst das Versprechen nicht.»
ref: Verily Thou failest not the tryst.
draft: "You don't break the promise."
hil: You do not break the promise.
compare: You do not break the promise.

src: Und diejenigen, die weder neben ALLAH an einen anderen Gott Bittgebete richten, noch den Menschen töten, den ALLAH für haram erklärte, außer mit Berechtigung, noch Zina begehen.
ref: And those who call not unto anot her god along with Allah and slay not any soul which Allah hath forbidden, save in justification, and commit not fornication.
draft: And those who do not associate anything with Allah in supplication, nor take the life which Allah has forbidden except in [the course of] justice, nor commit unlawful sexual intercourse.
hil: And those who do not direct their supplication to anyone but Allah, nor kill any person whom Allah has forbidden [to be killed], except with legal right, nor commit unlawful sexual intercourse.
compare: And those who do not associate anything with Allah in supplication, nor take the life which Allah has forbidden except in [the course of] justice, nor commit unlawful sexual intercourse.

src: (Sei nicht traurig,) denn du kannst nicht die Toten hören lassen noch die Tauben den Ruf hören lassen, wenn sie den Rücken kehren.
ref: You cannot make the dead to listen nor the deaf hear the call when they have turned back and retreated,
draft: "Don't be sad, because you cannot make the dead hear nor can you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs."
hil: Don't be sad, for you cannot make the dead hear nor can you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs.
compare: "Don't be sad, because you cannot make the dead hear nor can you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs."

src: Diese sind die Weggenossen des Feuers. Darin werden sie ewig sein.
ref: Those are the dwellers of the Fire, and they will abide therein forever.
draft: These are the companions of the fire. Therein they shall be everlasting.
hil: They are the companions of the fire. Therein they shall be everlasting.
compare: These are the companions of the fire. Therein they shall be everlasting.

src: Darum führe uns unter den Bezeugenden auf."
ref: Enroll us among the witnesses."
draft: "Therefore lead us among the witnesses."
hil: Therefore lead us among the witnesses.
compare: Therefore lead us among the witnesses.

src: Also lasse uns das zuteil werden, wovor du uns warnst, solltest du von den Wahrhaftigen sein."
ref: If so, bring on us what you threaten us with, if what you say is true."
draft: "Also let us have what you warn us against, should you be one of the truthful."
hil: Thus, let us experience what you warn us against, if you are indeed among the truthful.
compare: Thus, let us experience what you warn us against, if you are indeed among the truthful.

src: O Prophet, mühe dich gegen die Ungläubigen und Heuchler ab und sei hart gegen sie! Ihr Zufluchtsort wird die Hölle sein - ein schlimmer Ausgang!
ref: O Herald of the Hidden! Fight against the disbelievers and the hypocrites, and be stern with them; and their destination hell; and what an evil place to return!
draft: O Prophet, struggle against the disbelievers and hypocrites and be stern with them! Their refuge will be Hell - what a terrible destination!
hil: O Prophet, struggle against the unbelievers and hypocrites, and be harsh with them! Their refuge shall be Hell - what an evil destination!
compare: O Prophet, struggle against the disbelievers and hypocrites and be stern with them! Their refuge will be Hell - what a terrible destination!

src: Es sind Finsternisse, die einen über den anderen, wenn er seine Hand ausstreckt, beinahe sieht er sie nicht.
ref: If you stretch your hand, you could hardly see it.
draft: There are eclipses, one above the other, when he stretches out his hand, he almost doesn't see them.
hil: There are layers of darkness upon darkness, when he stretches out his hand, he almost does not see them.
compare: There are layers of darkness upon darkness, when he stretches out his hand, he almost does not see them.

src: Darin bleiben sie ewig, wie die Himmel und die Erde (des Jenseits) bleiben - außer was dein HERR will. Gewiß, dein HERR macht, was ER will.
ref: Remaining in it as long as the heavens and the earth remain, except as much as your Lord willed*; indeed your Lord may do whatever, whenever, He wills. (* Remaining forever even after the heavens and the earth are destroyed.)
draft: They will remain therein forever, as the heavens and the earth (of the hereafter) will remain - except what your Lord wills. Indeed, your Lord does what He wills.
hil: They will remain therein forever, just as the heavens and the earth of the Hereafter will remain – except what your Lord wills. Indeed, your Lord does what He wills.
compare: They will remain therein forever, as the heavens and the earth (of the hereafter) will remain - except what your Lord wills. Indeed, your Lord does what He wills.

src: Zwei Männer von denjenigen, die Ehrfurcht haben und denen ALLAH von Seinen Gaben gewährte, sagten: "Tretet zu ihnen durch das Tor ein! Und wenn ihr es durchschritten habt, werdet ihr dann doch Sieger sein.
ref: Two men of those who feared, but whom God had blessed, said, “Go at them by the gate; and when you have entered it, you will prevail.
draft: Two men from among those who have awe and to whom Allah granted from His bounties said, "Enter through the gate with them, and when you have entered it, you will indeed be victorious.
hil: Two men among those who have fear and to whom ALLAH granted His bounties said: "Enter the gate with them, and once you have entered it, you will surely be victorious."
compare: Two men among those who have fear and to whom ALLAH granted His bounties said: "Enter the gate with them, and once you have entered it, you will surely be victorious."

src: Am Tag, da Allah sie alle auferweckt, da werden sie Ihm schwören, wie sie euch schwören, und meinen, sie hätten eine Grundlage.
ref: On the day that God will raise them together, they will swear before Him as they swear before you, and imagine they are on the right path.
draft: On the day when Allah resurrects them all, they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they have a basis.
hil: On the day when God will resurrect them all together, they will swear to Him as they swore to you and they will think that they have a good case but they are certainly liars.
compare: On the day when Allah resurrects them all, they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they have a basis.

src: Aber trefft nicht heimlich eine Abmachung mit ihnen, außer ihr sagt geziemende Worte.
ref: And do not consummate the marriage until the term prescribed is fulfilled.
draft: But do not secretly make an agreement with them, unless you speak suitable words.
hil: Do not secretly make an agreement with them, except if you speak appropriate words.
compare: But do not secretly make an agreement with them, unless you speak suitable words.

src: Dann wurde er ein Blutklumpen; dann bildete und vervollkommnete Er (ihn)
ref: Then formed into an embryo? Then He fashioned, shaped and proportioned
draft: Then he became a blood clot; then He formed and perfected it.
hil: He then became a blood clot, and then God formed and perfected him.
compare: He then became a blood clot, and then God formed and perfected him.

src: Um undankbar zu sein für das, was Wir ihnen zukommen ließen. So genießet nur.
ref: That they may show ingratitude for that which We have vouchsafed unto them.
draft: To be ungrateful for what We bestowed upon them. So enjoy only.
hil: To be ungrateful for what We bestowed upon them. So enjoy only.
compare: To be ungrateful for what We bestowed upon them. So enjoy only.

src: Wissen sie denn nicht, daß Allah die Versorgung großzügig gewährt, wem Er will, und auch bemißt?
ref: Do they not know that God enhances or restricts the provision of any one He will.
draft: Do you not know that Allah generously grants provision to whomever He wills and also measures it?
hil: Do you not know that Allah grants provision generously to whomever He wills and also measures it?
compare: Do you not know that Allah grants provision generously to whomever He wills and also measures it?

src: Und ALLAH gegenüber sollen die Mumin Tawakkul üben!
ref: And in God let the believers put their trust.
draft: And the believers should practice trust in ALLAH!
hil: And the believers should exercise trust in ALLAH.
compare: And the believers should exercise trust in ALLAH.

src: Und erwähne in der Schrift Isma'il! Gewiß, er war wahrhaftig im Versprechen und war ein Gesandter, ein Prophet.
ref: And remember Ismail in the Book; he was indeed true to his promise and was a Noble Messenger, a Prophet.
draft: And mention Isma'il in the scripture. Surely, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger, a prophet.
hil: And mention Isma'il in the scripture. Surely, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger, a prophet.
compare: And mention Isma'il in the scripture. Surely, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger, a prophet.

src: Oder (sind jene sicher davor,) daß Er sie nicht durch vorgewarnte Vernichtung erfaßt? Euer Herr ist wahrlich Gütig Barmherzig.
ref: Or, that he will not take hold of them by giving them a fright? verily thy Lord is Kind, Merciful.
draft: Or (are those [people] sure) that He does not seize them with warned destruction? Your Lord is truly Kind, Merciful.
hil: Is it that those [people] are safe from being seized by forewarned destruction? Your Lord is truly Kind, Merciful.
compare: Is it that those [people] are safe from being seized by forewarned destruction? Your Lord is truly Kind, Merciful.

src: Und Allah hat euch aus Erde erschaffen, dann aus einem Samentropfen, dann machte Er euch zu Paaren. Und kein weibliches Wesen wird schwanger oder entbindet ohne Sein Wissen.
ref: God has created you from dust, then from a drop of semen and then divided you into pairs; no female conceives or gives birth without His knowledge; and no one's life is prolonged or shortened, but it is recorded in a Book.
draft: And Allah created you from earth, then from a drop of semen, then He made you pairs. And no female being becomes pregnant or gives birth without His knowledge.
hil: Allah created you from the earth, then from a drop of semen and then made you into pairs. And no female becomes pregnant nor gives birth except with His knowledge.
compare: And Allah created you from earth, then from a drop of semen, then He made you pairs. And no female being becomes pregnant or gives birth without His knowledge.

src: Und wenn sie ein Zeichen sehen, so verdrehen sie es zu Spott
ref: When they see a sign, they laugh at it,
draft: And when they see a sign, they turn it into mockery.
hil: And when they see a sign, they turn it into mockery.
compare: And when they see a sign, they turn it into mockery.

src: Belehrt hat ihn der Besitzer starker Kräfte,
ref: Bestowed on him by the Supreme Intellect,
draft: The owner of strong powers taught him.
hil: "The owner of strong powers taught him"
compare: The owner of strong powers taught him.

src: Und ALLAH ist über das, was ihr tut, allwissend.
ref: God is aware of what you do.
draft: And ALLAH is all-knowing about what you do.
hil: But God knows well what you do.
compare: And ALLAH is all-knowing about what you do.

src: Sie sagten: "O Moses, siehe, dort lebt ein tyrannisches Volk, und wir werden es (das Land) nicht betreten, ehe jene es nicht verlassen haben.
ref: They said: "O Moses, in that land live a people who are formidable; we shall never go there until they leave.
draft: They said: "O Moses, behold, there lives a tyrannical people, and we will not enter it (the land) until they have left it.
hil: They said, 'O Moses, behold, there lives a tyrannical people, and we will not enter it (the land) until they have left it.'
compare: They said: "O Moses, behold, there lives a tyrannical people, and we will not enter it (the land) until they have left it.

src: Was dich an Gutem traf, dies ist von ALLAH. Und was dich an Unglück traf, dies ist aufgrund eigener (Verfehlungen).
ref: What comes to you of good is verily from God; and what comes to you of ill is from your own self (your actions).
draft: What hit you of good is from ALLAH. And what hit you of adversity, is from your own actions.
hil: What befalls you of good is from Allah, and what befalls you of misfortune is due to your own wrongdoing.
compare: What befalls you of good is from Allah, and what befalls you of misfortune is due to your own wrongdoing.

src: Und zu Uns führt der Lebensweg.
ref: To Us is the arrival.
draft: And the path of life leads us to Us.
hil: The path of life leads to Us.
compare: The path of life leads to Us.

src: Das ist die Ermahnung derer, die mit mir sind, und die Ermahnung derer, die vor mir lebten. Aber die meisten von ihnen kennen die Wahrheit nicht, so wenden sie sich ab.
ref: Say, “Bring your proof; this is the remembrance of those with me and those before me”; but in fact most of them do not know the Truth, so they turn away.
draft: This is the admonition of those who are with me, and the admonition of those who lived before me. But most of them do not know the truth, so they turn away.
hil: This is the admonition of those who are with me, and the admonition of those who lived before me. But most of them do not know the truth, so they turn away.
compare: This is the admonition of those who are with me, and the admonition of those who lived before me. But most of them do not know the truth, so they turn away.

src: Gewiß, manches Spekulieren ist eine Verfehlung.
ref: And spy not, neither backbite one another.
draft: Certainly, some speculation is a misdeed.
hil: Certainly, some speculation is a misdeed.
compare: Certainly, some speculation is a misdeed.

src: Er sprach: "lch bin der Bote deines Herrn.
ref: If thou fearest God...
draft: He said: "I am the messenger of your master."
hil: He said, 'I am the messenger of your master.'
compare: He said, 'I am the messenger of your master.'

src: Und sie folgten dem, was die Satane während der Herrschaft Salomos vortrugen; doch nicht Salomo war ungläubig, sondern. die Satane waren ungläubig; sie brachten den Menschen die Zauberei bei sowie das, was den beiden Engeln in Babel, Harut und Marut, herabgesandt wurde.
ref: And they follow that which the Satans recited in the reign of Sulaiman; and Sulaiman blasphemed not, but the Satans blasphemed.; teaching people magic; and they follow that also which was sent down unto the two angels in Babil, Harut, and Marut.
draft: And they followed what the devils gave forth during the reign of Solomon. But it was not Solomon who disbelieved, but the devils disbelieved, teaching people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Harut and Marut.
hil: And they followed what the devils gave forth during the reign of Solomon. It was not Solomon who disbelieved, but the devils disbelieved, teaching people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Harut and Marut.
compare: And they followed what the devils gave forth during the reign of Solomon. But it was not Solomon who disbelieved, but the devils disbelieved, teaching people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Harut and Marut.

src: (Dies) als Belohnung von deinem Herrn, als hinreichende Gabe,
ref: A recompense from your Lord, a sufficient gift,
draft: As a reward from your Lord, as a sufficient gift,
hil: As a reward from your Lord, as a sufficient gift,
compare: As a reward from your Lord, as a sufficient gift,

src: Du siehst dann die, die Unrecht tun, erschrocken vor dem, was sie erworben haben, und es wird über sie hereinbrechen. Diejenigen aber, die glauben und die guten Werke tun, befinden sich in den Gärten des Paradieses.
ref: You will see (on the Day of Resurrection), the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.) fearful of that which they have earned, and it (Allah's Torment) will surely befall them, while those who believe (in the Oneness of Allah Islamic Monotheism) and do righteous deeds (will be) in the flowering meadows of the Gardens (Paradise), having what they wish from their Lord.
draft: You will then see those who do wrong, frightened by what they have earned, and it will come down upon them. But those who believe and do good deeds are in the gardens of Paradise.
hil: You will see those who do wrong, frightened by what they have earned, and it will come down upon them. But those who believed and did good deeds are admitted into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, and they will abide therein forever.
compare: You will see those who do wrong, frightened by what they have earned, and it will come down upon them. But those who believed and did good deeds are admitted into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, and they will abide therein forever.

src: (Die Folgen) eurer Übertretungen tragt nur ihr selbst.
ref: Your violations are against your own souls.
draft: "The consequences" of your violations only affect yourself.
hil: The consequences of your transgressions affect only yourself.
compare: "The consequences" of your violations only affect yourself.

src: Ihm gehört, wer in den Himmeln und auf der Erde ist. Alle sind Ihm demütig ergeben.
ref: All those who are in the heavens and the earth are His, and they are all obedient to Him.
draft: He owns whoever is in the heavens and on the earth. All are humbly devoted to Him.
hil: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and on the earth. All are humbly devoted to Him.
compare: He owns whoever is in the heavens and on the earth. All are humbly devoted to Him.

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter. Würden sie doch dafür eine klare Bestätigung vorlegen!
ref: “These – the people of ours – have set up Gods besides Allah; why do they not bring a clear proof regarding them?
draft: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him. If only they could present a clear confirmation for it!
hil: These are our people, they have taken gods besides Him. If only they could present a clear confirmation for it!
compare: These are our people, they have taken gods besides Him. If only they could present a clear confirmation for it!

src: Er ist es, Der euch Gehör, Augenlicht und Herzen hat entstehen lassen.
ref: It is He, Who has created for you (the sense of) hearing (ears), sight (eyes), and hearts (understanding).
draft: He is the one who has created hearing, sight, and hearts for you.
hil: He is the One who brought forth for you the faculties of hearing, sight, and hearts.
compare: He is the One who brought forth for you the faculties of hearing, sight, and hearts.

src: "O Moses, tritt vor und fürchte dich nicht; denn du gehörst zu jenen, die in Sicherheit sind.
ref: "O Moses, approach," (said the Voice), "and have no fear. You will be safe.
draft: "O Moses, step forward and do not be afraid; for you belong to those who are in safety."
hil: O Moses, step forward and fear not; for you are among those who are in safety.
compare: "O Moses, step forward and do not be afraid; for you belong to those who are in safety."

src: Zu ihnen kam ein edler Gesandter:
ref: A respected prophet had come to them (saying):
draft: "A noble messenger came to them."
hil: A noble messenger came to them.
compare: "A noble messenger came to them."

src: Ist das (etwa) eine Gunst, die du mir vorhältst, daß du die Kinder lsra'ils geknechtet hast?"
ref: But the favour you oblige me with is that you have enslaved the children of Israel."
draft: Is that (perhaps) a favor that you withhold from me, that you have enslaved the children of Israel?
hil: Is that (perhaps) a favor you're holding back from me, that you enslaved the children of Israel?
compare: Is that (perhaps) a favor you're holding back from me, that you enslaved the children of Israel?

src: Und Allah gab ihm die Herrschaft und die Weisheit und lehrte ihn von dem, was Er wollte.
ref: David slew Goliath, and Allah bestowed on him the kingship and wisdom, and taught him from that He willed.
draft: And Allah gave him the sovereignty and wisdom and taught him from what He wanted.
hil: And Allah granted him sovereignty and wisdom and taught him of what He willed.
compare: And Allah gave him the sovereignty and wisdom and taught him from what He wanted.

src: Und die Engel stehen an seinem Rand.
ref: The angels will stand on all its sides.
draft: And the angels stand on its edge.
hil: And the angels stand on its edge.
compare: And the angels stand on its edge.

src: Wisset, daß wahrlich das diesseitige Leben nur ein Spiel und ein Zeitvertreib ist und ein Prunk und Geprahle unter euch und ein Wettrennen um Vermehrung von Gut und Kindern. Es gleicht dem reichlichen Regen, dessen Pflanzenwuchs den Säern gefällt. Dann verdorrt er; und du siehst ihn vergilben; hierauf wird er brüchig; und im Jenseits gibt es eine strenge Strafe, aber auch Vergebung von Allah und Wohlgefallen. Und das diesseitige Leben ist nichts anderes als eine Nutznießung, durch die man sich betören läßt.
ref: Know that the life of this world is nothing but play and pastime, and adornment, and boasting amongst yourselves, and the desire to surpass each other in wealth and children; like the rain the produce of which pleased the farmer, then dried so you see it yellow, and then turned into dry trampled hay; and in the Hereafter is a severe punishment, and the forgiveness from Allah and His pleasure; and the life of this world is nothing but counterfeit wealth.
draft: "Know that truly the present worldly life is just a game and pastime and adornment and a source of boasting among yourselves, and a quest for multiplying wealth and children. It is like the abundant rain, the growth produced by which pleases the cultivators, then it withers away so that you see it turn yellow, and then it becomes scattered debris. And in the hereafter, there is severe punishment as well as forgiveness from Allah and good pleasure. Whereas the life of this world is nothing but an illusory enjoyment."
hil: Know that truly the present worldly life is no more than play and amusement, a show and boasting among you, a quest for riches and children. It is like abundant rain that produces beautiful crops for the cultivators; then they wither, then you see them turn yellow, then they become dry and fragmented. And in the hereafter there is severe punishment but also forgiveness from God and acceptance. And this worldly life is nothing but an illusory pleasure that deludes.
compare: "Know that truly the present worldly life is just a game and pastime and adornment and a source of boasting among yourselves, and a quest for multiplying wealth and children. It is like the abundant rain, the growth produced by which pleases the cultivators, then it withers away so that you see it turn yellow, and then it becomes scattered debris. And in the hereafter, there is severe punishment as well as forgiveness from Allah and good pleasure. Whereas the life of this world is nothing but an illusory enjoyment."

src: Der Mensch lehnt sich wahrlich auf,
ref: Verily, man does transgress all bounds (in disbelief and evil deed, etc.).
draft: The human truly rebels.
hil: The human truly rebels.
compare: The human truly rebels.

src: Dann werden Wir euch eure Sünden vergeben; wahrlich, Wir werden jenen, die Gutes tun, noch mehr (an Gnade) erweisen."
ref: We shall forgive you your wrong-doings. We shall increase (the reward) for the good-doers."
draft: "Then We will forgive you your sins; truly, We will give to those who do good an even greater reward."
hil: We will then forgive you your sins; truly, We will bestow an even greater bounty upon those who do good.
compare: We will then forgive you your sins; truly, We will bestow an even greater bounty upon those who do good.

src: Kein Willkomm (sei) ihnen! Sie sollen im Feuer brennen.
ref: Verily, they shall burn in the Fire!
draft: No welcome to them! They should burn in the fire.
hil: No welcome to them! They should burn in the fire.
compare: No welcome to them! They should burn in the fire.

src: Und erlahmt nicht in der Verfolgung der Leute. Wenn ihr leidet, so leiden sie auch, wie ihr leidet; ihr aber erhofft von Gott, was sie nicht erhoffen. Gott weiß Bescheid und ist weise.
ref: Do not relax in pursuit of the disbelievers; if you are suffering, they also suffer as you do; and you expect from Allah what they do not; and Allah is All Knowing, Wise.
draft: And do not become weary in pursuit of the people. If you suffer, they also suffer, just as you suffer; but you hope from God what they do not hope. God knows and is wise.
hil: Do not falter in pursuing people, and if you suffer, they also suffer just as you suffer; but you hope for what they do not hope for from God who knows and is wise.
compare: Do not falter in pursuing people, and if you suffer, they also suffer just as you suffer; but you hope for what they do not hope for from God who knows and is wise.

src: Und wir werden gewiß nicht gepeinigt werden.»
ref: We are not the punished!
draft: "And we will certainly not be tormented."
hil: And we will certainly not be tormented.
compare: "And we will certainly not be tormented."

src: Diejenigen, die auf ihren Herrn hören, erhalten das Beste. Diejenigen, die nicht auf ihn hören, würden wohl, wenn sie alles, was auf der Erde ist, besäßen und noch einmal soviel dazu, sich damit loskaufen wollen. Sie erwartet eine böse Abrechnung, und ihre Heimstätte ist die Hölle - welch schlimme Lagerstätte!
ref: For those who obeyed the command of Allah is goodness and if those who did not obey Him owned all that is in the earth and in addition a similar one like it, they would give it to redeem their souls; it is they who will have a wretched account, and their destination is hell; and what a wretched resting place!
draft: Those who listen to their lord receive the best. Those who do not listen to him would probably want to redeem themselves with everything on earth and even more. A bad settlement awaits them, and their home is hell - what a terrible resting place!
hil: Those who listen to their Lord will receive the best. Those who do not listen to him, even if they owned everything on earth and twice as much, would want to redeem themselves with it. A bad settlement awaits them, and their home is hell - what a terrible resting place!
compare: Those who listen to their lord receive the best. Those who do not listen to him would probably want to redeem themselves with everything on earth and even more. A bad settlement awaits them, and their home is hell - what a terrible resting place!

src: ALLAH leitet zum Seinem Licht recht, wen ER will.
ref: God guides to His light whom He will.
draft: ALLAH guides to His light whoever He wants.
hil: Allah guides to His light whom He wills to the right path.
compare: Allah guides to His light whom He wills to the right path.

src: Diesen wird ALLAH Gnade erweisen.
ref: Allah will have His Mercy on them.
draft: Allah will show mercy to him.
hil: Allah will show mercy to him.
compare: Allah will show mercy to him.

src: Sie sagen: "Pflegten nicht doch eure Gesandten mit den klaren Beweisen zu euch zu kommen?"
ref: They will say: "Did not your apostles come to you with clear proofs?"
draft: They say, "Did not your messengers used to come to you with clear proofs?"
hil: They say, "Did not your messengers used to come to you with clear proofs?"
compare: They say, "Did not your messengers used to come to you with clear proofs?"

src: Meine Söhne! Geht und erkundigt euch nach Yusuf und seinem Bruder und verzweifelt nicht an den Ruhh von ALLAH, denn es zweifeln an den Ruhh von ALLAH nur die Kafir-Leute."
ref: O sons, go in search of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair of the mercy of God. Only they despair of God's mercy who do not believe."
draft: "My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair of the mercy of Allah, for only the disbelieving people despair of the mercy of Allah."
hil: "My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair of the mercy of Allah, for only the disbelieving people despair of the mercy of Allah."
compare: "My sons! Go and inquire about Yusuf and his brother and do not despair of the mercy of Allah, for only the disbelieving people despair of the mercy of Allah."

src: Sag: "Weshalb habt ihr ALLAHs Propheten vorher getötet, solltet ihr Mumin sein?!"
ref: Say: "Why have you then been slaying God's apostles as of old, if you do believe?"
draft: Say, "Why did you kill Allah's prophets before, if you are believers?!"
hil: Say: "Why did you kill Allah's prophets before, if you are believers?!"
compare: Say, "Why did you kill Allah's prophets before, if you are believers?!"

src: Und unter den Leuten der Schrift gibt es wahrlich manche, die an Allah glauben und (an) das, was zu euch (als Offenbarung) herabgesandt worden ist, und was zu ihnen (selbst) herabgesandt worden ist.
ref: And there are, certainly, among the people of the Scripture (Jews and Christians), those who believe in Allah and in that which has been revealed to you, and in that which has been revealed to them, humbling themselves before Allah.
draft: And among the people of the Scripture are those who believe in Allah and (in) what has been revealed to you, and in what has been revealed to them, humbling themselves before Allah.
hil: And among the people of the book are certainly some who believe in God and in what has been revealed to you and what has been revealed to them, humbling themselves before God. They do not trade the signs of God for a small price.
compare: And among the people of the Scripture are those who believe in Allah and (in) what has been revealed to you, and in what has been revealed to them, humbling themselves before Allah.

src: Darin ist wahrlich ein Zeichen für euch, wenn ihr gläubig seid.
ref: In this will be a portent for you if you do believe.
draft: Therein is truly a sign for you, if you have faith.
hil: Therein is truly a sign for you, if you have faith.
compare: Therein is truly a sign for you, if you have faith.

src: Und zu Madyan (entsandten WIR) ihren Bruder Schu'aib. So sagte er: "Meine Leute!
ref: And We sent towards Madyan, their fellowman Shuaib – he therefore said, “O my people!
draft: "And to Midian (We sent) their brother Shu'aib. So he said: "My people!
hil: "And to Midian (We sent) their brother Shu'eyb. He said, "O my people!"
compare: "And to Midian (We sent) their brother Shu'eyb. He said, "O my people!"

src: DU bist unser Wali, so vergib uns und erweise uns Gnade! Und DU bist der Beste der Vergebenden.
ref: You are our saviour, so forgive us and have mercy on us, for You are the best of forgivers.
draft: "You are our Guardian, so forgive us and show us mercy! And You are the best of forgivers."
hil: "You are our Guardian, so forgive us and show us mercy! And You are the best of forgivers."
compare: "You are our Guardian, so forgive us and show us mercy! And You are the best of forgivers."

src: Und es begreifen sie nur die Wissenden.
ref: But only those endowed with knowledge will comprehend them.
draft: And only the knowledgeable understand it.
hil: And only the wise understand it.
compare: And only the wise understand it.

src: Oder fühlt ihr euch etwa sicher vor Dem, Dessen (Anweisung) im Himmel ist, daß ER über euch Sandsturm schickt?!
ref: Or have you become so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not send a violent wind to shower stones at you?
draft: Or do you feel safe from the One Whose command is in the heaven to send against you a storm of stones?
hil: Do you think you are safe from the One Whose command is in the heaven to send against you a sandstorm?
compare: Do you think you are safe from the One Whose command is in the heaven to send against you a sandstorm?

src: Kann es sein, daß wenn er stirbt oder getötet wird, daß ihr auf euren Fersen (zum Kufr) umkehrt?
ref: So what if he dies or is killed! Will you turn back and go away in haste?
draft: It is possible that if he dies or is killed, you will turn back (to disbelief) on your heels?
hil: It is possible that if he dies or is killed, you will revert (to disbelief) on your heels?
compare: It is possible that if he dies or is killed, you will revert (to disbelief) on your heels?

src: Und da die Berge versetzt und zu einer Luftspiegelung werden.
ref: The mountains put in motion turning into a mirage.
draft: And as the mountains are moved and become a mirage.
hil: And as the mountains are moved and become a mirage.
compare: And as the mountains are moved and become a mirage.

src: Und gehorcht Allah und Seinem Gesandten, und streitet nicht miteinander, sonst würdet ihr den Mut verlieren, und eure Kraft würde vergehen! Und seid standhaft!
ref: And obey Allah and His apostle, and dispute not, lest ye flag and your predominance depart, and be patient.
draft: And obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not fight among yourselves, or else you will lose courage, and your strength will be gone! And be steadfast!
hil: Obey Allah and His messenger, and do not fight among yourselves lest you lose courage and your strength disappears. And be steadfast!
compare: And obey Allah and His Messenger, and do not fight among yourselves, or else you will lose courage, and your strength will be gone! And be steadfast!

src: Das sind die (wahren) Lügner.
ref: These are the liars.
draft: These are the (true) liars.
hil: They alone are the liars.
compare: These are the (true) liars.

src: Doch sollten sie dich verraten wollen, so haben sie ALLAH bereits vorher verraten, dann hat ER sie unterwerfen lassen.
ref: But if they intend to betray you (O Muhammad SAW), they have already betrayed Allah before. So He gave (you) power over them.
draft: "But if they want to betray you, they have already betrayed ALLAH before, then HE has made them submissive."
hil: If they try to deceive you, they have already deceived God before. So He gave you mastery over them, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.
compare: If they try to deceive you, they have already deceived God before. So He gave you mastery over them, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.

src: Und wenn die Gräber umgewühlt werden,
ref: When the graves are overturned,
draft: And when the graves are disturbed.
hil: And when graves are upheaved
compare: And when graves are upheaved

src: Allah wird alles ans Licht bringen, wovor ihr euch fürchtet."
ref: Say: 'Mock on; God will bring forth what you fear.'
draft: "Allah will bring to light everything that you fear."
hil: "Allah will bring to light everything that you fear."
compare: "Allah will bring to light everything that you fear."

src: Richte Bittgebete an deinen HERRN mit dem, wozu ER dich verpflichtete, wir sind gewiß rechtgeleitet!"
ref: Pray for us to your Lord, by the means of His covenant which is with you; we will certainly come to guidance.”
draft: "Direct supplications to your LORD with what HE has obligated you, we are certainly well-guided!"
hil: Invoke your Lord for us because of His Promise to you, we are certainly well-guided!
compare: "Direct supplications to your LORD with what HE has obligated you, we are certainly well-guided!"

src: Entweder peinigst du sie, oder du gewährst ihnen Gutes."
ref: Either you punish them, or treat them with kindness."
draft: Either you torment them or you grant them good things.
hil: Either you torment them or you grant them good things.
compare: Either you torment them or you grant them good things.

src: Dies ist ein von Ihm gemachtes Versprechen, ein Wahrhaftiges - (erwähnt) in At-taurat, Alindschil und im Quran. Und wer hält sein Versprechen besser als ALLAH ein?!
ref: Rejoice wherefore in your bargain which ye have made.
draft: This is a promise made by him, a truthful one - mentioned in the Torah, the Gospel, and the Quran. And who keeps their promise better than Allah?!
hil: That is a binding promise upon Him in the Torah, the Gospel and the Koran; and who is there that more truthfully fulfills his covenant than Allah?
compare: That is a binding promise upon Him in the Torah, the Gospel and the Koran; and who is there that more truthfully fulfills his covenant than Allah?

src: Die (wahren) Gläubigen sind ja diejenigen, die an Allah und Seinen Gesandten glauben und hierauf nicht zweifeln und sich mit ihrem Besitz und mit ihrer eigenen Person auf Allahs Weg abmühen.
ref: They alone are believers who come to believe in God and His Apostle, then never doubt again, and struggle wealth and soul in the way of God.
draft: The (true) believers are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, but strive with their wealth and their selves in the way of Allah.
hil: The (true) believers are those who believe in God and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, but strive with their wealth and themselves in the way of God.
compare: The (true) believers are those who believe in God and His Messenger and do not doubt thereafter, but strive with their wealth and themselves in the way of God.

src: Aber die meisten von ihnen wissen nicht Bescheid.
ref: But most of them do not know.
draft: But most of them don't know.
hil: Most of them don't know what's going on.
compare: Most of them don't know what's going on.

src: Da kam seine Frau in Aufregung heran, und sie schlug ihre Wange und sagte: "(Ich bin doch) eine unfruchtbare alte Frau!"
ref: His wife came out lamenting, striking her forehead, and said: "I, am old and barren woman?"
draft: His wife came up in excitement and she struck her cheek and said, "(I am) an infertile old woman!"
hil: Then his wife came up in excitement, struck her cheek and said, '(I am) an infertile old woman!'
compare: His wife came up in excitement and she struck her cheek and said, "(I am) an infertile old woman!"

src: Solltest DU sie peinigen, so sind sie doch Deine Diener.
ref: If Thou punish them, lo! they are Thy slaves, and if Thou forgive them (lo! they are Thy slaves).
draft: If you torment them, they are still your servants.
hil: And if you torment them, they are still your servants.
compare: And if you torment them, they are still your servants.

src: Und wenn diejenigen, die Schirk betrieben, die von ihnen beigesellten Partner gesehen haben, werden sie sagen: "Unser HERR!
ref: And when the polytheists will see their ascribed partners, they will say, “Our Lord!
draft: And when those who practiced sorcery see their associates, they will say, "Our Lord!
hil: And when those who practiced sorcery see their associates, they will say, 'Our Lord!'
compare: And when those who practiced sorcery see their associates, they will say, "Our Lord!

src: So wurden ihre Häuser dem Erdboden gleichgemacht, auch der Brunnen ist verlassen und das Schloß ist errichtet.
ref: How many a well and fortress reinforced lie abandoned!
draft: So their houses were leveled to the ground, the well is abandoned and the castle has been built.
hil: Their houses were leveled to the ground, the well is abandoned, and the castle has been built.
compare: So their houses were leveled to the ground, the well is abandoned and the castle has been built.

src: Dann brachten WIR heraus, wer in ihr von den Mumin war.
ref: So We evacuated everyone who was a believer there,
draft: Then WE figured out who among them was a Moomin.
hil: We then found out who among them was a Moomin.
compare: Then WE figured out who among them was a Moomin.

src: Wollt ihr denn geduldig sein? Und dein Herr ist Allsehend.
ref: And O dear Prophet, your Lord is All Seeing.
draft: Do you want to be patient? And your Lord is All-Seeing.
hil: Do you want to have patience? And your Lord is All-Seeing.
compare: Do you want to have patience? And your Lord is All-Seeing.

src: Sie haben sich ihre Schriftgelehrten und Mönche zu Herren genommen außer Allah; und den Messias, den Sohn der Maria.
ref: They have taken their rabbis and their priests as lords instead of God, as well as the Messiah son of Mary.
draft: They have taken their scribes and monks as lords besides Allah, and the Messiah, the son of Mary.
hil: They have taken their scribes and monks as lords besides Allah, and the Messiah, the son of Mary.
compare: They have taken their scribes and monks as lords besides Allah, and the Messiah, the son of Mary.

src: Sag: "Wie seht ihr das, was ALLAH euch vom Rizq hinabsandte, dann ihr es in Haram und Halal eingeteilt habt?"
ref: Say: "Have you thought of what God has sent you for food, of which you have labelled some as lawful and some forbidden?"
draft: Say, "What do you think about what ALLAH sent down to you as Rizq and then you divided it into Haram and Halal?"
hil: Say, 'Have you reflected on what Allah has sent down to you as sustenance, and then you divided it into Haram and Halal?' Say (further), 'Did Allah permit it, or are you inventing lies against Allah?'
compare: Say, "What do you think about what ALLAH sent down to you as Rizq and then you divided it into Haram and Halal?"

src: Ebenso zu Seinen Ayat zählt, daß ER für euch von eurem Wesen Partnerwesen erschuf, damit ihr bei ihnen Geborgenheit findet. Und ER setzte zwischen euch Liebe und Barmherzigkeit. Gewiß, darin sind doch Ayat für Leute, die nachdenken.
ref: And among His signs is that He created spouses for you from yourselves for you to gain rest from them, and kept love and mercy between yourselves; indeed in this are signs for the people who ponder.
draft: Likewise, among His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
hil: Among His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them, and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed, in that are signs for people who reflect.
compare: Likewise, among His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquility in them; and He placed between you affection and mercy. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.

src: Hierauf legte Er sie den Engeln vor und sagte: "Teilt Mir deren Namen mit, wenn ihr wahrhaftig seid!"
ref: After this he taught Adam the names of all things. Then He set these before the angels and asked, "Tell Me the names of these things, if you are right (in thinking that the appointment of a vicegerent will cause disorder)".
draft: Then He presented them to the angels and said,"Tell Me their names,if ye are truthful!"
hil: He then presented them to the angels and said, "Tell me their names if you are truthful!"
compare: Then He presented them to the angels and said,"Tell Me their names,if ye are truthful!"

src: Und ohne die Huld Allahs gegen euch und Seine Barmherzigkeit würde niemand von euch jemals lauter sein.
ref: And whosoever followeth the footsteps of the Satan, then he only urgeth to indecency and abomination.
draft: And without the grace of Allah upon you and His mercy, none of you would ever be pure.
hil: And without Allah's grace and mercy towards you, none of you could ever be pure.
compare: And without Allah's grace and mercy towards you, none of you could ever be pure.

src: Dann entfernten sie sich. ALLAH möge ihre Herzen (vom Iman) entfernen, weil sie gewiß Leute sind, die nicht begreifen.
ref: Indeed God has turned their hearts away (from the truth), for they cannot discern the law of heaven.
draft: Then they moved away. MAY Allah remove faith from their hearts, certainly because they are people who do not understand.
hil: Then they moved away. May Allah remove faith from their hearts, certainly because they are people who do not understand.
compare: Then they moved away. MAY Allah remove faith from their hearts, certainly because they are people who do not understand.

src: Wenn wir wollten, könnten auch wir etwas Derartiges sagen. Das sind nichts als Fabeln der Früheren.»
ref: Had we wanted, we could have said the like of this; these are nothing but myths of the ancients.”
draft: "If we wanted to, we could also say something like that. These are nothing but fables of the ancients."
hil: If we wanted to, we could also say something similar. These are nothing but myths of the past.
compare: "If we wanted to, we could also say something like that. These are nothing but fables of the ancients."

src: Josef, wende dich davon ab. Und (du), bitte um Vergebung für deine Schuld. Du gehörst ja zu denen, die sich versündigt haben.»
ref: Ignore this affair, O Joseph; and you, O woman, ask forgiveness for your sin, for you were surely errant."
draft: Josef, turn away from it. And ask for forgiveness for your guilt. You are one of those who have sinned.
hil: Joseph, turn away from it. And seek forgiveness for your guilt. You belong to those who have sinned.
compare: Josef, turn away from it. And ask for forgiveness for your guilt. You are one of those who have sinned.

src: Und gewiß, manch einer von euch zögert. Und wenn ein Unglück euch heimsucht, sagt er: "ALLAH hat mir bereits eine Wohltat erwiesen, daß ich unter ihnen nicht anwesend war."
ref: Someone among you will surely lag behind, and if calamity should befall you, will say: "God was gracious to me that I was not among them."
draft: And surely, some of you hesitate. And when a misfortune befalls you, he says: "ALLAH has already shown me a kindness that I was not present among them."
hil: {"output": "And indeed, some of you hesitate. And if a misfortune befalls you, he says, 'Surely Allah has already favored me that I was not present among them.'"}.
compare: {"output": "And indeed, some of you hesitate. And if a misfortune befalls you, he says, 'Surely Allah has already favored me that I was not present among them.'"}.

src: Und als sie die Peinigung überkam, sagten sie: "Musa!
ref: And whenever the punishment came upon them they said, “O Moosa!
draft: And when the pain came upon them, they said, "Moses!
hil: And when the torment came upon them, they said, "Moses!"
compare: And when the pain came upon them, they said, "Moses!

src: Sie schwören euch bei ALLAH, damit sie euch zufriedenstellen, während ALLAH und Sein Gesandter doch berechtigter sind, zufriedengestellt zu werden, sollten sie Mumin sein.
ref: They swear by God to please you; but if they are believers it would have been worthier to have pleased God and His Apostle.
draft: They swear by Allah to satisfy you, while Allah and His Messenger are more entitled to be satisfied if they are believers.
hil: They swear by Allah to satisfy you, whereas Allah and His Messenger have more right to be satisfied, if they are believers.
compare: They swear by Allah to satisfy you, while Allah and His Messenger are more entitled to be satisfied if they are believers.

src: So wende dein Gesicht in Richtung der geschützten Gebetsstätte!
ref: And wheresoever you people are, turn your faces (in prayer) in that direction.
draft: Turn 1 Output: Turn your face towards the protected place of worship!
hil: Turn your face towards the protected place of worship!
