compare: Turn your face towards the protected place of worship!

src: Also vergalten Wir es ihnen. Siehe nun, wie das Ende der Leugner war!
ref: So We took revenge from them – therefore see what sort of fate befell those who denied!
draft: Also we will repay them. See now how the end of the disbelievers was!
hil: Therefore, We recompensed them. Now see how the end of the deniers was!
compare: Also we will repay them. See now how the end of the disbelievers was!

src: Er hat euch aus der Erde entstehen lassen und sie euch zu bebauen und zu bestellen gegeben.
ref: He hath caused you to spring out of the earth, and hath made you dwell therein.
draft: He has caused you to arise from the earth and given it to you for cultivation and management.
hil: He caused you to arise from the earth and gave it to you for cultivation and management.
compare: He caused you to arise from the earth and gave it to you for cultivation and management.

src: Und sie sagen: "Dies sind verwehrtes Vieh und verwehrte (Früchte auf den) Saatfelder(n).
ref: They also say: "These cattle and these crops are consecrated. None may eat of them other than those we permit," -- so they assert.
draft: And they say, "These are forbidden cattle and forbidden (fruits on the) crop fields".
hil: And they say, 'These are forbidden cattle and forbidden (fruits on the) crop fields'.
compare: And they say, "These are forbidden cattle and forbidden (fruits on the) crop fields".

src: Er sagte: "Ihr befindet euch in einer (noch) schlechteren Lage. Und Allah weiß sehr wohl, was ihr beschreibt."
ref: But Joseph kept this secret and did not disclose it to them, and said (to himself): "You are worse in the degree of evil, for God knows better of what you allege."
draft: He said: "You are in an even worse situation. And Allah knows very well what you describe."
hil: He said, "You are in an even worse situation. And Allah knows very well what you describe."
compare: He said: "You are in an even worse situation. And Allah knows very well what you describe."

src: Und er wird froh zu seinen Angehörigen zurückkehren.
ref: And will return to his people full of joy.
draft: And he will return happily to his relatives.
hil: He will return happily to his relatives.
compare: He will return happily to his relatives.

src: Darin sind gehobene Liegen
ref: And within it are couches placed on high,
draft: There are elevated sun loungers.
hil: There are elevated sun loungers.
compare: There are elevated sun loungers.

src: Fir'aun sagte: "Was ist denn der Herr der Weltenbewohner?"
ref: The Pharaoh asked: "And what is the Lord of all the worlds?"
draft: Pharaoh said: "What, then, is the Lord of the worlds?"
hil: {"output": "Pharaoh asked, 'What is the Lord of the worlds?'"}.
compare: {"output": "Pharaoh asked, 'What is the Lord of the worlds?'"}.

src: Und wer Kufr gegenüber dem Iman betreibt, dessen Handeln ist zweifellos nichtig, und er gehört im Jenseits zu den Verlierern.
ref: Useless shall be rendered the acts of those who turn back on their faith, and they will be among the losers in the life to come.
draft: "And whoever practices disbelief towards the Imam, his actions are undoubtedly void, and he will be among the losers in the Hereafter."
hil: And whoever commits disbelief towards the Imam, their actions are undoubtedly void, and they will be among the losers in the afterlife.
compare: "And whoever practices disbelief towards the Imam, his actions are undoubtedly void, and he will be among the losers in the Hereafter."

src: ER sagte: "Ist dies nicht dieWahrheit?!"
ref: He will say, 'Is not this the truth?'
draft: He said: "Isn't this the truth?!"
hil: He said, "Isn't this the truth?!"
compare: He said: "Isn't this the truth?!"

src: Die Menschen fragen dich nach der Stunde. Sag: Das Wissen darüber ist nur bei Allah.
ref: People ask thee ccncerning the Hour.
draft: The people ask you about the hour. Say: The knowledge about it is only with Allah.
hil: The people ask you about the hour. Say: The knowledge about it is only with Allah.
compare: The people ask you about the hour. Say: The knowledge about it is only with Allah.

src: Und ALLAH erschuf alles sich bewegende Lebewesen aus Wasser. So geht manch einer von ihnen auf seinem Bauch, und manch einer von ihnen geht auf zwei Beinen, und manch einer von ihnen geht auf Vieren. ALLAH erschafft, was ER will! Gewiß, ALLAH ist über alles allmächtig.
ref: And Allah created every animal on earth, from water; so among them is a kind that moves upon its belly; and among them is a kind that moves upon two legs; and among them a kind that moves upon four legs; Allah creates whatever He wills; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.
draft: And Allah created every moving creature from water. Some of them go on their bellies, some of them on two legs, and some of them on four. Allah creates whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
hil: God created all moving creatures out of water. Some of them move upon their bellies, some walk on two legs, and some on four. God creates whatever He wills. Surely, God is All-Powerful.
compare: And Allah created every moving creature from water. Some of them go on their bellies, some of them on two legs, and some of them on four. Allah creates whatever He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.

src: Die Juden sagen: "Auf nichts fußen die Christen"; und die Christen sagen: "Auf nichts fußen die Juden", obwohl sie doch (beide) die Schrift lesen.
ref: The Jews say, 'The Christians stand not on anything'; the Christians say, 'The Jews stand not on anything'; yet they recite the Book.
draft: "The Jews say: 'The Christians have no basis'; and the Christians say: 'The Jews have no basis', even though (both) read the scripture."
hil: The Jews say that the Christians have no basis, and the Christians say that the Jews have no basis, even though they both read the scripture.
compare: "The Jews say: 'The Christians have no basis'; and the Christians say: 'The Jews have no basis', even though (both) read the scripture."

src: Das Gleichnis dessen, was sie in diesem diesseitigen Leben spenden, ist wie das Gleichnis vom Wind, der bittere Kälte bringt und die Äcker von Leuten, die Unrecht begangen haben, heimsucht und dann zerstört. Und ALLAH fügte ihnen kein Unrecht zu, sondern sie fügten sich selbst Unrecht zu.
ref: The example of what they spend in this worldly life is similar to the freezing cold wind which struck the fields of a nation who wronged themselves, and destroyed it completely; and Allah did not oppress them, but it is they who wronged themselves.
draft: The parable of what they spend in this worldly life is like the parable of a wind which brings bitter cold and strikes the harvest of the people who have wronged themselves and destroys it. And Allah has not wronged them, but they wrong themselves.
hil: The parable of what they spend in this worldly life is like the parable of a wind that brings bitter cold and strikes the fields of people who committed injustice, then destroys them. And Allah did not wrong them but they wronged themselves.
compare: The parable of what they spend in this worldly life is like the parable of a wind which brings bitter cold and strikes the harvest of the people who have wronged themselves and destroys it. And Allah has not wronged them, but they wrong themselves.

src: An jenem Tag waren sie dem Unglauben näher als dem Glauben, sie sagten ja mit ihrem Munde, was nicht in ihrem Herzen war.
ref: They were that day, nearer to disbelief than to Faith, saying with their mouths what was not in their hearts.
draft: On that day they were closer to unbelief than to belief, they said yes with their mouths what was not in their hearts.
hil: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to belief, as they said with their mouths what was not in their hearts.
compare: On that day, they were closer to disbelief than to belief, as they said with their mouths what was not in their hearts.

src: (Ich vermag) nur etwas zu übermitteln von Allah und Seinen Botschaften. Und wer sich Allah und Seinem Gesandten widersetzt, gewiß, für ihn wird es das Feuer der Hölle geben, ewig und auf immer darin zu bleiben.
ref: “I only convey the commands from Allah, and His messages; and whoever disobeys the commands of Allah and His Noble Messenger – then indeed for him is the fire of hell, in which they will remain for ever and ever.”
draft: (I am able) to convey only something from Allah and His messages. And whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger, indeed for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein eternally.
hil: I am only able to convey something from Allah and His messages. And who opposes Allah and His Messenger, surely, for him there will be the fire of Hell, to abide therein eternally.
compare: (I am able) to convey only something from Allah and His messages. And whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger, indeed for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein eternally.

src: Dann erfaßte Ich jene, die ungläubig waren, und wie war es mit der Verleugnung!
ref: So We seized the unbelievers. How great was the change I wrought in their condition then!
draft: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how was the denial!
hil: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how was the denial!
compare: Then I seized those who were unbelievers, and how was the denial!

src: Und die Soldaten deines HERRN kennt niemand außer Ihm.
ref: And none knoweth the hosts of thy Lord but He.
draft: And no one knows the soldiers of your Lord but Him.
hil: No one knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him.
compare: No one knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him.

src: Doch sie fügten damit niemandem Schaden zu, es sei denn mit der Ermächtigung Allahs.
ref: Yet they could not harm any one or without the dispensation of God.
draft: But they did not harm anyone with it, unless with the authorization of Allah.
hil: They did not harm anyone with it, except with the authorization of Allah.
compare: But they did not harm anyone with it, unless with the authorization of Allah.

src: Fir'aun sagte: "Laßt mich Musa töten; soll er (doch) seinen Herrn anrufen!
ref: "Let me kill Moses," the Pharaoh said, "and let him call to his Lord.
draft: Pharaoh said: "Let me kill Moses; let him (then) call upon his Lord!"
hil: Pharaoh said: "Let me kill Moses; let him (then) call upon his Lord!"
compare: Pharaoh said: "Let me kill Moses; let him (then) call upon his Lord!"

src: Und wer Allah Götter zur Seite stellt, der hat wahrhaftig eine gewaltige Sünde begangen.
ref: And he who ascribes compeers to God is guilty of the gravest sin.
draft: "And whoever sets gods beside Allah, then surely he has committed a monstrous sin."
hil: And whosoever sets up partners with Allah has surely perpetrated an enormous wrong.
compare: "And whoever sets gods beside Allah, then surely he has committed a monstrous sin."

src: Gewiß, Er weiß über das Innerste der Brüste Bescheid.
ref: Indeed, He knows the secrets of the hearts.
draft: "Surely, he knows about the innermost of breasts."
hil: Verily, He knows the innermost secrets of the hearts.
compare: Verily, He knows the innermost secrets of the hearts.

src: Sie sagten: "Wir brachen das Versprechen dir gegenüber nicht aus eigener Kraft.
ref: They replied: 'We have not failed in our promise to you through our choosing.
draft: They said, "We did not break the promise to you on our own."
hil: They said, 'We did not break the promise to you on our own.'
compare: They said, "We did not break the promise to you on our own."

src: Sollte er von ihr dann (zum dritten Mal) die Talaq-Scheidung vollzogen haben, so wird sie für ihn danach nicht mehr halal, bis sie einen anderen Ehemann heiratet.
ref: If a man divorces her again (a third time), she becomes unlawful for him (and he cannot remarry her) until she has married another man.
draft: If he then (for the third time) performed the Talaq divorce from her, she will not be halal for him afterwards until she marries another husband.
hil: If he has then performed the Talaq divorce from her (for the third time), she will no longer be halal for him thereafter until she marries another husband.
compare: If he has then performed the Talaq divorce from her (for the third time), she will no longer be halal for him thereafter until she marries another husband.

src: Und es ist für euch kein Vergehen, wenn ihr Heiratsabsichten gegenüber solchen Frauen andeutet oder bei euch innerlich hegt.
ref: You commit no error by announcing your engagement to women, or by keeping it to yourselves.
draft: And it is not wrong for you to hint at marriage intentions or to secretly nurture them towards such women.
hil: It is not a sin for you to express or withhold marriage intentions towards such women.
compare: And it is not wrong for you to hint at marriage intentions or to secretly nurture them towards such women.

src: Und WIR erretteten diejenigen, die den Iman verinnerlichten und Taqwa gemäß zu handeln pflegten.
ref: We deliver those who believe and take heed for themselves.
draft: And WE saved those who internalized the Iman and acted according to Taqwa.
hil: And We saved those who internalized faith and acted according to Taqwa.
compare: And WE saved those who internalized the Iman and acted according to Taqwa.

src: Du bist der, der alles hört und weiß.»
ref: Thou art the Hearer, the Knower.
draft: "You are the one who hears and knows everything."
hil: You are the one who hears everything and knows everything.
compare: You are the one who hears everything and knows everything.

src: Aber wenn sie sich dessen enthalten, ist das besser für sie.
ref: But to refrain (i.e. not to discard their outer clothing) is better for them.
draft: But if they refrain from it, it is better for them.
hil: But if they refrain from that, it is better for them.
compare: But if they refrain from it, it is better for them.

src: Abziehende der Kopfhäute,
ref: That would skin the scalp.
draft: "removal of the scalp"
hil: Removal of scalp.
compare: "removal of the scalp"

src: Meine Leute! Handelt euren Standpunkten entsprechend, auch ich handle.
ref: Do on your part what you can, O people, I will do what I will.
draft: My people! Act according to your positions, as I do.
hil: My people, act according to your positions, as I do.
compare: My people, act according to your positions, as I do.

src: Waret ihr dabei, als Allah euch dies gebot?" Wer ist also ungerechter als der, welcher eine Lüge gegen Allah ersinnt, um die Leute ohne Wissen irrezuführen?
ref: Then who doth greater wrong than he who deviseth a lie concerning Allah, that he may lead mankind astray without knowledge. Lo!
draft: "Were you there when Allah commanded you this?" Who, then, is more unjust than he who invents a lie against Allah to mislead people without knowledge?
hil: "Do you have any knowledge that Allah commanded you about this?" Thus, who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah to mislead people without knowledge?
compare: "Were you there when Allah commanded you this?" Who, then, is more unjust than he who invents a lie against Allah to mislead people without knowledge?

src: Den Menschen erschaffen hat aus einem Embryo.
ref: Created man from an embryo;
draft: "Created humans from an embryo".
hil: "He created humans from an embryo".
compare: "He created humans from an embryo".

src: (Dies ist) das Gleichnis des (Paradies)gartens, der den Gottesfürchtigen versprochen ist: Er ist durcheilt von Bächen'; sein Ernteertrag ist immerwährend und (auch) sein Schatten.
ref: The likeness of Paradise promised the pious and devout is (of a garden) with streams of rippling water, everlasting fruits and shade.
draft: "The parable of the garden of paradise, which is promised to the God-fearing: it is crossed by streams; its harvest is perpetual and also its shade."
hil: "This is the description of the paradise which is promised to the pious. Rivers flow beneath it, and its fruits and shade are unending."
compare: "This is the description of the paradise which is promised to the pious. Rivers flow beneath it, and its fruits and shade are unending."

src: Und die ihr Zeugnis ablegen,
ref: Who uphold their testimonies,
draft: And those who bear witness,
hil: And those who give witness,
compare: And those who bear witness,

src: Aber Er läßt in seine Barmherzigkeit eingehen, wen Er will.
ref: But He admits whomsoever He pleases into His Mercy.
draft: But He admits into His mercy whom He wants.
hil: He admits into His mercy whom He wills.
compare: But He admits into His mercy whom He wants.

src: Und als Unsere Boten zu Lot kamen, war er ihretwegen besorgt und fühlte sich außerstande, ihnen zu helfen. Sie sprachen: "Fürchte dich nicht und sei nicht traurig, wir wollen dich und die Deinen sicher retten, bis auf deine Frau, die zu denen gehört, die zurückbleiben sollen.
ref: And when Our sent angels came to Lut, he was unhappy at their arrival and was depressed – and they said, “Do not fear or grieve; we will surely rescue you and your family, except your wife, who is of those who will stay behind.”
draft: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was concerned for them and felt unable to help them. They said, "Do not fear or grieve, we will surely save you and your household, except your wife who is of those who remain behind."
hil: When our messengers came to Lot, he was concerned about them and felt unable to help them. They said, 'Do not fear or grieve, we will surely save you and your household, except for your wife who is one of those who will remain behind.'
compare: And when our messengers came to Lot, he was concerned for them and felt unable to help them. They said, "Do not fear or grieve, we will surely save you and your household, except your wife who is of those who remain behind."

src: Und gewiß, bereits erleichterten WIR den Quran zur Ermahnung! Gibt es etwa einen sich Erinnernden?!
ref: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will pay heed?
draft: And indeed, We have made the Quran easy for remembrance. Is there anyone who will take heed?
hil: And indeed, We have made the Quran easy as a reminder. Is there anyone who will take heed?
compare: And indeed, We have made the Quran easy as a reminder. Is there anyone who will take heed?

src: Allah sieht die Menschen wohl,
ref: And under God's eyes are devotees
draft: Allah probably sees the people.
hil: God indeed sees the people,
compare: God indeed sees the people,

src: (Erinnere) an den Tag, wenn er euch zum Tag des Zusammenbringens zusammenbringt. Dies ist der (Anklage-)Tag wegen Übervorteilung.
ref: The day He will gather you together on the Day of Gathering, will be the day of Judgement.
draft: Remember the day when he brings you together for the Day of Gathering. This is the Day of Accusation due to fraud.
hil: Remember the Day when He will gather you for the Day of Gathering. This is the Day of Indictment because of fraud.
compare: Remember the Day when He will gather you for the Day of Gathering. This is the Day of Indictment because of fraud.

src: Und am Tag, da Er sie versammelt, als hätten sie nur eine Stunde vom Tag verweilt, um einander kennenzulernen. Den Verlust haben diejenigen, die die Begegnung mit Gott für Lüge erklärt haben und der Rechtleitung nicht gefolgt sind.
ref: And on the day when He will raise all of them together, as if they had never stayed on earth except for a moment during the day, they will recognise one another; for completely ruined are those who denied the meeting with Allah and were not on guidance.
draft: And on the day when He gathers them as if they had not stayed but an hour of a day to know each other. Those who have declared meeting with God as a lie and have not followed guidance will be the losers.
hil: On the day when He gathers them as if they had only lingered for an hour of the day to get to know each other, only those will lose who have declared meeting with God as a lie and have not followed guidance.
compare: On the day when He gathers them as if they had only lingered for an hour of the day to get to know each other, only those will lose who have declared meeting with God as a lie and have not followed guidance.

src: ALLAH will ihnen keinen Anteil am Jenseits gewähren.
ref: It is Allah's Will to give them no portion in the Hereafter.
draft: ALLAH will not grant them a share in the hereafter.
hil: ALLAH will not grant them a share in the hereafter.
compare: ALLAH will not grant them a share in the hereafter.

src: Sie sagte zu seiner Schwester: "Spüre ihm nach."
ref: She told his sister: "Follow him."
draft: She said to his sister, "Track him down."
hil: She said to his sister, "Track him down."
compare: She said to his sister, "Track him down."

src: Zakaria! Gewiß, WIR überbringen dir doch frohe Botschaft von einem Jungen Namens Yahya. Dessen Namen haben WIR niemandem zuvor gegeben.
ref: O Zakariyya! verily We give thee the glad tidings of a boy: his name shall be Yahya; We have not afore-time made his namesake.
draft: Zakaria! Surely, we bring you good news of a boy named Yahya, whose name we have not given to anyone before.
hil: Zakaria! Surely, we bring you good news of a boy named Yahya, whose name we have not given to anyone before.
compare: Zakaria! Surely, we bring you good news of a boy named Yahya, whose name we have not given to anyone before.

src: Und wer an Allah glaubt und das Rechte tut - Er wird seine Übel von ihm nehmen und wird ihn in Gärten führen, durch die Bäche fließen, worin (sie) auf ewig verweilen.
ref: He who believed and did the right, will have his evil deeds expunged by God and admitted to gardens with rivers flowing by, and abide there perpetually.
draft: And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove his misdeeds from him and will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally.
hil: And whoever believes in Allah and does right - He will remove his misdeeds from him and admit him to gardens with flowing streams, where they will abide forever.
compare: And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove his misdeeds from him and will admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide eternally.

src: Da könnt ihr weder (etwas) abwenden noch Hilfe erfahren. Und wer von euch Unrecht tut, den lassen Wir große Strafe kosten "
ref: Then you shall neither be able to repel your punishment nor shall get any help from anywhere; and whoso is guilty. of iniquity'' among you, We shall make him taste a severe torment.
draft: You can neither prevent (anything) nor get help. And those who do wrong among you, We will make them bear great punishment.
hil: You will neither be able to avert (anything) nor find help. And whoever among you does wrong, We will make them bear great punishment.
compare: You can neither prevent (anything) nor get help. And those who do wrong among you, We will make them bear great punishment.

src: Wer ist dieser, der um ALLAHs willen eine Hasan-Anleihe macht, damit ALLAH sie für ihn um ein Vielfaches vermehrt?!
ref: Who will give a goodly loan to God which He might double many times?
draft: Who is this person who, for the sake of Allah, is making a Hasan loan so that Allah may multiply it for him multiple times?
hil: Who is this that takes out a Hasan loan for the sake of Allah, so that He may increase it many times over for him?
compare: Who is this person who, for the sake of Allah, is making a Hasan loan so that Allah may multiply it for him multiple times?

src: So fragt die Leute der Ermahnung, wenn ihr (es) nicht wißt.
ref: If you do not know, then ask the keepers of the oracles of God.
draft: So ask the people for advice if you don't know.
hil: Ask the people for advice if you don't know.
compare: So ask the people for advice if you don't know.

src: Du Mensch!
ref: O Man!
draft: You human!
hil: You human!
compare: You human!

src: Zu Ihm ist eure Rückkehr, alle zusammen - ein wahrhaftiges Versprechen von ALLAH.
ref: To Him will you all return: God's promise is true.
draft: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise of Allah.
hil: Towards Him only you all are to return; the promise of Allah; indeed He creates for the first time and then after its extinction creates it again, in order to give those who believe and do good deeds, the reward of justice; and for the disbelievers, boiling water to drink and a painful punishment – the recompense of their disbelief.
compare: To Him is your return, all together - a true promise of Allah.

src: Gewiß, denjenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben, werden weder ihre Vermögenswerte noch ihre Kinder vor ALLAH etwas nutzen.
ref: As for those who disbelieve, neither wealth nor children will avail them in the least against God.
draft: Certainly, those who have engaged in disbelief, neither their wealth nor their children will benefit them before Allah.
hil: Certainly, those who have disbelieved, neither their possessions nor their children will be of any benefit to them before Allah.
compare: Certainly, those who have engaged in disbelief, neither their wealth nor their children will benefit them before Allah.

src: Sag: "Nennt sie doch!" Oder macht ihr Ihm etwa Mitteilung über das, was ER auf der Erde nicht kennt oder sind dies nur Worthülsen?!
ref: Proclaim, “Just name them – or is it that you inform Him of something which in His knowledge does not exist in the earth – or is it just superficial talk?”
draft: Say, "Name them!" Or are you telling him about something he doesn't know on earth, or are these just empty words?!
hil: Say, "Name them!" Or are you making him aware of something on Earth that he does not know, or is this only empty words?"
compare: Say, "Name them!" Or are you making him aware of something on Earth that he does not know, or is this only empty words?"

src: Sie sagten: "Wer hat dies mit unseren Göttern getan? Er gehört wahrlich zu den Ungerechten."
ref: They said: who hath wrought this to our gods? verily he is of the wrong-doers.
draft: They said, "Who has done this with our gods? Surely he belongs to the unjust."
hil: They said: "Who has done this with our gods? Surely he belongs to the unjust."
compare: They said, "Who has done this with our gods? Surely he belongs to the unjust."

src: Diese sind diejenigen, die ihrem HERRN gegenüber Kufr betrieben haben. Und diese sind es, um deren Hälse Eisenringe sein werden.
ref: They are the ones who deny their Lord, and they will have collars around their necks.
draft: These are the ones who have committed Kufr towards their LORD. And these are the ones whose necks will be chained with iron rings.
hil: Those are they who defied their Lord, and they are the ones whose necks will be chained with iron rings.
compare: Those are they who defied their Lord, and they are the ones whose necks will be chained with iron rings.

src: So diene Mir und verrichte das Gebet zu Meinem Gedenken.
ref: So serve Me and establish Prayers to remember Me.
draft: Serve Me and perform the prayer in My remembrance.
hil: Serve me and perform the prayer in my remembrance.
compare: Serve Me and perform the prayer in My remembrance.

src: Was ist mit diesem Buch, daß es nichts, weder klein noch groß, ausläßt, ohne es zu erfassen?»
ref: What sort of Book is this that leaves neither a small thing nor a big thing, but has recorded it with numbers!"
draft: What about this book that leaves nothing out, neither small nor large, without capturing it?"
hil: What about this book that leaves nothing out, neither small nor large, without capturing it?
compare: What about this book that leaves nothing out, neither small nor large, without capturing it?"

src: Und für sie ist eine andauernde Peinigung bestimmt,
ref: There is perpetual punishment for them,
draft: And an ongoing torment is destined for them.
hil: And an enduring torment is destined for them.
compare: And an enduring torment is destined for them.

src: Das ist eine Ermahnung für dich und dein Volk. Und ihr werdet zur Verantwortung gezogen.
ref: And it is undoubtedly an honour for you and your people; and you will soon be questioned.
draft: This is an admonition for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.
hil: The admonition is for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.
compare: The admonition is for you and your people. And you will be held accountable.

src: Das ist etwas von Allahs Huld gegen uns und gegen die Menschen. Aber die meisten Menschen sind nicht dankbar.
ref: This is among God's favours to us and to all mankind; but most men are not grateful.
draft: This is something from Allah's grace towards us and towards people. But most people are not grateful.
hil: This is God's grace upon us and upon humanity. However, most people are not grateful.
compare: This is something from Allah's grace towards us and towards people. But most people are not grateful.

src: Und keiner von euch soll sich umdrehen.
ref: Walk behind them and let no one turn around.
draft: "And none of you shall turn around."
hil: And none of you shall turn around.
compare: "And none of you shall turn around."

src: Das ist eine Gemeinschaft, die dahingegangen ist. Sie erhält, was sie erworben hat, und ihr erhaltet, was ihr erworben habt.
ref: Those are a people who have passed away; theirs is that which they earned and yours that which ye earn.
draft: This is a community that has passed away. It receives what it has earned, and you receive what you have earned.
hil: This was a community that has passed away. For them is what they earned, and yours is what you earn; and you will not be questioned about their deeds.
compare: This was a community that has passed away. For them is what they earned, and yours is what you earn; and you will not be questioned about their deeds.

src: Aber die bösen Ränke umschließen nur ihre Urheber.
ref: But their evil plots will turn back on the plotters themselves.
draft: But the evil intrigues only entangle their perpetrators.
hil: But the evil intrigues only entangle their perpetrators.
compare: But the evil intrigues only entangle their perpetrators.

src: Er ist es, Der in Wahrheit die Himmel und die Erde erschuf; und am Tage, da Er spricht: "Sei!" wird es so sein.
ref: It is He who created the heavens and the earth with a definite purpose. The day He will say "Be, " it will be.
draft: He is the one who truly created the heavens and the earth; and on the day when He says "Be!" it will be so.
hil: He is the one who in truth created the heavens and the earth, and on the day when He decrees a matter, He only says to it: "Be!" - and it is.
compare: He is the one who in truth created the heavens and the earth, and on the day when He decrees a matter, He only says to it: "Be!" - and it is.

src: Doch wenn sie dich auffordern, Mir das zur Seite zu setzen, wovon du keine Kenntnis hast, dann gehorche ihnen nicht. In weltlichen Dingen aber verkehre mit ihnen auf gütige Weise.
ref: But if they (both) strive with you to make you join in worship with Me others that of which you have no knowledge, then obey them not, but behave with them in the world kindly, and follow the path of him who turns to Me in repentance and in obedience.
draft: But if they ask you to set aside what you have no knowledge of to me, do not obey them. In worldly matters, however, associate with them in a kindly manner.
hil: If they ask you to put aside what you have no knowledge of to me, do not obey them. But in mundane matters, treat them kindly.
compare: But if they ask you to set aside what you have no knowledge of to me, do not obey them. In worldly matters, however, associate with them in a kindly manner.

src: Das ist es, was Er euch geboten hat, auf daß ihr es begreifen möget.
ref: These things has God enjoined on you. Haply you may understand.
draft: This is what He commanded you, so that you may understand it.
hil: This is what He commanded you, so that you may understand it.
compare: This is what He commanded you, so that you may understand it.

src: Das geschah, um Schlechtigkeit und Unsittlichkeit von ihm abzuwenden.
ref: Thus it was, that We might turn away from him evil and illegal sexual intercourse.
draft: "That happened to prevent his wickedness and immorality."
hil: "That happened to prevent his wickedness and immorality."
compare: "That happened to prevent his wickedness and immorality."

src: Diese sind unsere Leute, sie nahmen sich anstelle von Ihm Götter.
ref: As for these our people here, they have taken to other gods apart from Him.
draft: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.
hil: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.
compare: These are our people, they took gods instead of Him.

src: Es steht uns nicht zu, eine Ermächtigung zu bringen - außer mit der Erlaubnis Allahs.
ref: It is not in our power to bring a miracle for you without the leave of God.
draft: It is not up to us to bring authorization - except with the permission of Allah.
hil: It is not for us to bring an authority save by the leave of God.
compare: It is not up to us to bring authorization - except with the permission of Allah.

src: Er sagte: "Meine Leute! Wie seht ihr es?
ref: He said: "O my people, think.
draft: He said: "My people! How do you see it?".
hil: He said: 'O my people! What is your view?'
compare: He said: "My people! How do you see it?".

src: Und die Ungläubigen werden sagen: "Unser Herr, zeige uns jene der Ginn und der Menschen, die uns irreführten, damit wir sie mit unseren Füßen treten, so daß sie zu den Niedrigsten gehören."
ref: Those who disbelieve will say: "O Lord, show us those among the jinns and men who had led us astray that we may trample them underfoot and make them wholly abject."
draft: And the disbelievers will say: "Our Lord, show us those among the jinn and mankind who misled us, so we may put them under our feet and they shall be among the lowest."
hil: And the disbelievers will say: 'Our Lord, show us those from among the jinn and mankind who have led us astray, so we may put them under our feet and they shall be among the lowest.'
compare: And the disbelievers will say: 'Our Lord, show us those from among the jinn and mankind who have led us astray, so we may put them under our feet and they shall be among the lowest.'

src: Aber nein, bei deinem Herrn!
ref: But no, by your Lord!
draft: But no, by your Lord!
hil: But no, by your Lord!
compare: But no, by your Lord!

src: So wurde in ihren Herzen (die Zuneigung) zum Kalb wegen ihres Kufr eingeprägt.
ref: (The image of) the calf had sunk deep into their hearts on account of unbelief.
draft: So in their hearts (affection) for the calf was impressed because of their Kufr.
hil: And so in their hearts was impressed (affection) for the calf because of their Kufr.
compare: And so in their hearts was impressed (affection) for the calf because of their Kufr.

src: Und wir sind Ihm ergeben.
ref: To Him we are submitters (Muslims)'
draft: And we are devoted to Him.
hil: And we are submissive to Him.
compare: And we are devoted to Him.

src: So siehe wiederholt hin, siehst du irgend etwas an Rissen?!
ref: Turn your eyes again. Do you see any fissures?
draft: So look again and again, do you see anything in the cracks?!
hil: So look repeatedly, do you see anything in the cracks?!
compare: So look again and again, do you see anything in the cracks?!

src: Und gebt den Frauen ihre Brautgabe als Schenkung. Und wenn sie euch gern etwas davon erlassen, so könnt ihr dies unbedenklich zum Wohlsein verbrauchen.
ref: Give to women their dowers willingly, but if they forego part of it themselves, then use it to your advantage.
draft: And give women their bridal gift as a donation. And if they are gladly waiving something of it, you can use it without hesitation for your wellbeing.
hil: And give women their bridal gift as a donation. And if they are willing to waive some of it, you can use it for your own benefit without hesitation.
compare: And give women their bridal gift as a donation. And if they are willing to waive some of it, you can use it for your own benefit without hesitation.

src: Aber er kann ihnen keinen Schaden zufügen, außer mit Allahs Erlaubnis. Und auf Allah sollen sich die Gläubigen verlassen.
ref: But he cannot harm them in the least, except as Allah permits, and in Allah let the believers put their trust.
draft: But he cannot harm them except with Allah's permission. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
hil: He cannot harm them unless with the permission of Allah. And the believers should rely on Allah.
compare: But he cannot harm them except with Allah's permission. And upon Allah let the believers rely.

src: Muhammad ist nicht der Vater eines eurer Männer, sondern der Gesandte Allahs und der letzte aller Propheten, und Allah besitzt die volle Kenntnis aller Dinge.
ref: Muhammad is not the father of any man among you, but a messenger of God, and the seal of the prophets. God has knowledge of everything.
draft: Muhammad is not the father of any of your men, but the Messenger of Allah and the last of the prophets. And Allah has full knowledge of all things.
hil: Muhammad is not the father of any of your men, but the Messenger of Allah and the last of the prophets. And Allah has full knowledge of all things.
compare: Muhammad is not the father of any of your men, but the Messenger of Allah and the last of the prophets. And Allah has full knowledge of all things.

src: Denn ER ist mir gegenüber immer großzügig gewesen.
ref: He has been gracious to me.
draft: For HE has always been generous to me.
hil: Because HE has always been generous to me.
compare: Because HE has always been generous to me.

src: "So halte sie fest und befiel deinem Volk, sich an das Schönste in ihnen zu halten!
ref: “Hold fast to them, and exhort your people to adopt the best of them.
draft: "So hold on to them and command your people to keep to the best in them!"
hil: Thus, hold on to them and instruct your people to hold on to the best in them!
compare: "So hold on to them and command your people to keep to the best in them!"

src: Und wer darauf verzichtet, wird dies eine Kaffara für ihn sein.
ref: But if anyone remits the retaliation by way of charity, it shall be for him an expiation.
draft: And whoever refrains from it, this will be a kaffara for him.
hil: And whoever refrains from it will incur a penalty for it.
compare: And whoever refrains from it, this will be a kaffara for him.

src: Und nachdem das Beben sie erfaßt hatte, sagte er: "HERR!
ref: When they arrived they were seized by a tremor.
draft: And after the tremor had seized them, he said, "LORD!
hil: And when the tremor seized them, he said, 'Lord!'
compare: And when the tremor seized them, he said, 'Lord!'

src: Das sind die Gefährten des Feuers, sie werden darin ewig weilen.
ref: They are the residents of Hell, and will there for ever abide.
draft: These are the companions of fire, they will dwell therein forever.
hil: Those are the companions of the fire, they will abide therein eternally.
compare: These are the companions of fire, they will dwell therein forever.

src: Dabei lesen sie (alle) das Buch. Auch diejenigen, die unwissend sind, äußern sich in der gleichen Weise.
ref: So too the ignorant say the like of them.
draft: They (all) read the book. Even those who are ignorant express themselves in the same way.
hil: They (all) read the book. Even those who are ignorant express themselves in the same way.
compare: They (all) read the book. Even those who are ignorant express themselves in the same way.

src: Und wer sich Satan statt Allah zum Beschützer nimmt, der hat sicherlich einen offenkundigen Verlust erlitten
ref: He who holds Satan as friend in place of God will assuredly be damned to perdition.
draft: And whoever takes Satan instead of Allah as a protector has certainly suffered a clear loss.
hil: And whoever takes Satan as a guardian instead of Allah, he has certainly suffered a manifest loss.
compare: And whoever takes Satan as a guardian instead of Allah, he has certainly suffered a manifest loss.

src: Sie versuchten ihn in bezug auf seine Gäste zu überreden.
ref: And they indeed sought to shame his guest (by asking to commit sodomy with them).
draft: They tried to persuade him regarding his guests.
hil: They tried to convince him with regard to his guests.
compare: They tried to convince him with regard to his guests.

src: Und sagte: «Ich bin krank.»
ref: And said: "I am sick (of what you worship)!"
draft: And said, "I am sick."
hil: And said, 'I am sick.'
compare: And said, "I am sick."

src: Gewiß, wir kehren zu unserem HERRN zurück,
ref: We shall return to our Lord.
draft: Certainly, we return to our Lord.
hil: Indeed, we return to our Lord.
compare: Certainly, we return to our Lord.

src: Aber sie ziehen ihn der Lüge.
ref: But they denounced him as a liar.
draft: But they accuse him of lying.
hil: But they accuse him of lies.
compare: But they accuse him of lying.

src: Und sie leisten wissentlich falsche Eide.
ref: And they swear to a lie while they know.
draft: "They knowingly make false oaths."
hil: And they knowingly make false oaths.
compare: "They knowingly make false oaths."

src: Diejenigen aber, die glauben und gute Werke tun, werden die Bewohner des Paradieses sein. Darin werden sie ewig bleiben.
ref: But those who believe and do good deeds are people of Paradise, and shall live there forever.
draft: Those who believe and do good deeds will be the inhabitants of paradise. Therein, they will dwell forever.
hil: Those, however, who believe and do good deeds will be the inhabitants of paradise. They will abide therein forever.
compare: Those who believe and do good deeds will be the inhabitants of paradise. Therein, they will dwell forever.

src: ALLAH ist Derjenige, Der für euch das Meer gratis fügbar machte, damit die Schiffe darauf nach Seiner Anweisung fahren, damit ihr von Seiner Gunst anstrebt und damit ihr euch dankbar erweist.
ref: It is God who subjugated the ocean for you so that ships may ply through it by His command, and you may seek His bounty, and may haply be grateful.
draft: ALLAH is the One who made the sea available to you for free, so that the ships sail on it according to His instructions, so that you may strive for His favor and show gratitude.
hil: Allah is the One who made the sea available to you for free, so that the ships sail on it according to His instructions, so that you may strive for His favor and show gratitude.
compare: ALLAH is the One who made the sea available to you for free, so that the ships sail on it according to His instructions, so that you may strive for His favor and show gratitude.

src: Aber gegen sie wird Allah dir genügen.
ref: So Allah will suffice you against them.
draft: But Allah will suffice you against them.
hil: But Allah will suffice you against them.
compare: But Allah will suffice you against them.

src: Sag: "Entsinnt ihr euch nicht?!"
ref: Say: "Then why do you not bethink yourselves?"
draft: Say: "Don't you remember?!"
hil: Say: "Do you not remember?!"
compare: Say: "Do you not remember?!"

src: Außer deinen auserwählten Dienern unter ihnen.»
ref: Except the chosen ones among Your creatures."
draft: "Except for your chosen servants among them."
hil: Except for your chosen servants among them;
compare: Except for your chosen servants among them;

src: Doch verkünde den Geduldigen eine frohe Botschaft
ref: But give good news to the steadfast.
draft: But proclaim a joyful message to the patient.
hil: Proclaim good tidings to the patient ones.
compare: But proclaim a joyful message to the patient.

src: ER sagte: "Geh! Wer dir von ihnen folgt, dann ist Dschahannam gewiß eure Vergeltung - eine ausreichende Vergeltung!
ref: He said, “Be gone – therefore whoever among them follows you – so hell is the recompense for you all, a sufficient punishment.”
draft: He said, "Go! Whoever follows you among them, then Dschahannam is certainly your retribution - a sufficient retribution!"
hil: He said, 'Go! Whoever follows you among them, then Dschahannam is certainly your retribution - a sufficient retribution!'
compare: He said, "Go! Whoever follows you among them, then Dschahannam is certainly your retribution - a sufficient retribution!"

src: Und sie gesellten ALLAH einen Teil von dem bei, was ER an Äckern und An'am erschuf, und sagten: "Dies gehört ALLAH - ihrer Behauptung nach - und dies gehört den von uns beigesellten Partnern." Und was den von ihnen beigesellten Partnern gehört, erreicht ALLAH nicht, aber was ALLAH gehört, dies erreicht die von ihnen beigesellten Partner.
ref: They allocate a share from God's own created fields and cattle to God, and they say: "This is God's" -- or so they think -- "and that, of the compeers of God," so that what belongs to the compeers does not reach God, but that which is God's may reach the compeers (set up by them).
draft: And they associate with Allah partners - the created idols and livestock – and they say, "This belongs to Allah ," according to their claim, "and this belongs to our partners [associated with Him]." But what is controlled by their "partners" [in association] does not reach Allah, while the deeds of Allah - He alone - will be brought back [to Him].
hil: "They associate partners with Allah from what He created of fields and livestock, and they say, "This belongs to Allah , according to their claim, and this to our partners we associate [with Him]." However, what belongs to their "partners" [in association] does not reach Allah , while what belongs to Allah - it is [We] alone - that reaches the associates [with Him]."
compare: "They associate partners with Allah from what He created of fields and livestock, and they say, "This belongs to Allah , according to their claim, and this to our partners we associate [with Him]." However, what belongs to their "partners" [in association] does not reach Allah , while what belongs to Allah - it is [We] alone - that reaches the associates [with Him]."

src: ALLAH ermahnt euch, daß ihr jemals Gleiches wiederholt, solltet ihr Mumin sein.
ref: God counsels you not to do a thing like this, if you are believers.
draft: ALLAH reminds you that you should never repeat the same mistake again, if you are a believer.
hil: O believers, Allah reminds you not to repeat the same mistake again if you are a believer.
compare: O believers, Allah reminds you not to repeat the same mistake again if you are a believer.

src: Tritt ein unter Meine Diener,
ref: "Enter then among My votaries,
draft: "Enter among my servants,".
hil: "Enter among my servants,".
compare: "Enter among my servants,".

src: Und in der Nacht.
ref: Or at night.
draft: And during the night.
hil: And during the night.
compare: And during the night.

src: Den Geduldigen wird ihr Lohn voll erstattet, ohne daß es (viel) gerechnet wird.
ref: Only those who persevere will get their reward measureless."
draft: The patient will be fully compensated without (much) calculation.
hil: The patient will be fully compensated without (much) calculation.
compare: The patient will be fully compensated without (much) calculation.

src: Gewiß, er ist doch euer Meister, der euch die Magie lehrte, und ihr werdet es doch noch wissen. Ich werde zweifelsohne eure Füße und eure Hände wechselseitig abtrennen und werde euch gewiß noch allesamt kreuzigen!"
ref: He is indeed your leader who taught you magic; so now you will come to know; I swear, I will certainly cut off your hands and your feet from alternate sides, and crucify all of you.”
draft: "Surely, he is your master who taught you magic, and you will still know it. I will undoubtedly sever your feet and hands alternately and will certainly crucify all of you!"
hil: Surely, he is your master who taught you magic, and you will still know it. I will undoubtedly sever your feet and hands alternately and will certainly crucify all of you!
compare: "Surely, he is your master who taught you magic, and you will still know it. I will undoubtedly sever your feet and hands alternately and will certainly crucify all of you!"

src: Aber wir werden gewiß, so Gott will, die richtige finden.»
ref: If God wills we shall be guided aright."
draft: But we will certainly find the correct one, God willing.
hil: We will certainly find the right one, God willing.
compare: We will certainly find the right one, God willing.

src: Not und Leid berührten sie, und sie wurden hin und her geschüttelt, so daß der Gesandte und diejenigen, die mit ihm gläubig waren, dann sagten: Wann kommt die Unterstützung Gottes? Wahrlich, die Unterstützung Gottes ist nahe.
ref: Affliction and adversity befell them; and they were shaken until the Messenger, and those who believed with him, said: 'When will the victory of Allah come' Is it not so that the victory of Allah is near.
draft: Distress and sorrow touched them, and they were shaken back and forth so that the messenger and those who believed with him said, "When will the help of God come?" Surely, the help of God is near.
hil: Distress and sorrow touched them, and they were shaken back and forth, so that the messenger and those who believed with him said, "When will the help of God come?" Surely, the help of God is near.
compare: Distress and sorrow touched them, and they were shaken back and forth so that the messenger and those who believed with him said, "When will the help of God come?" Surely, the help of God is near.

src: Sag: Das Wissen darüber ist nur bei Allah. Aber die meisten Menschen wissen nicht.
ref: Say: 'The knowledge of it is only with God, but most men know not.'
draft: Say: The knowledge about this is only with Allah. But most people do not know.
hil: Say: The knowledge about it is only with Allah. Yet, most people are unaware.
compare: Say: The knowledge about it is only with Allah. Yet, most people are unaware.

src: Und wenn du zehn (Jahre) vervollständigst, dann ist dies dir überlassen. Und ich will es dir nicht schwer machen.
ref: If thou completest ten, that shall be of thy own accord; I do not desire to' press hard 'upon thee.
draft: And when you complete ten (years), then it's up to you. And I don't want to make it hard for you.
hil: And if you complete ten (years), then it's up to you. And I don't want to make it difficult for you.
compare: And if you complete ten (years), then it's up to you. And I don't want to make it difficult for you.

src: Wenn es unter euch auch nur zwanzig gibt, die standhaft sind, werden sie zweihundert besiegen. Und wenn es unter euch hundert gibt, werden sie tausend von denen, die ungläubig sind, besiegen.
ref: Urge the believers to fight; if there are twenty persevering men among you, they shall overcome two hundred; and if there are a hundred among you, they shall overcome a thousand disbelievers because the disbelievers are a people who do not have sense.
draft: If among you are just twenty who persevere, they will defeat two hundred. And if there are among you a hundred who persevere, they will overcome a thousand who do not believe.
hil: If there are only twenty among you who persevere, they will defeat two hundred. And if there are a hundred among you, they will overcome a thousand of those who disbelieve.
compare: If among you are just twenty who persevere, they will defeat two hundred. And if there are among you a hundred who persevere, they will overcome a thousand who do not believe.

src: Er sprach: "So ist es; dein Herr aber spricht: "Es ist Mir ein leichtes, und Ich habe dich zuvor geschaffen, als du ein Nichts warst.""
ref: (The angel) answered: "Thus will it be. Your Lord said: 'This is easy for Me; for when I brought you into being you were nothing.'
draft: He said: "So it is; but your Lord says: "It is easy for Me, and I created you before, while you were nothing."
hil: He said, 'So it is! But your Lord says, 'It is easy for me, and I created you before when you were nothing.'
compare: He said: "So it is; but your Lord says: "It is easy for Me, and I created you before, while you were nothing."

src: "Gewiß, ihr und das, dem ihr anstatt Allahs dient, seid Brennstoff der Hölle. Ihr werdet dahin hinabgehen."
ref: Verily you and those you worship other than God will be faggots for Hell; and come to it you will.
draft: "Surely, you and what you worship besides Allah are fuel for Hellfire. You will go down into it."
hil: Indeed, you and what you worship instead of Allah are fuel for the hellfire. You will descend into it.
compare: Indeed, you and what you worship instead of Allah are fuel for the hellfire. You will descend into it.

src: Das ist das, was im Jenseits für die Gottesfürchtigen folgt.
ref: Such is the payment of the righteous.
draft: This is what follows in the afterlife for the God-fearing.
hil: That is what follows in the hereafter for the righteous.
compare: That is what follows in the hereafter for the righteous.

src: Und Pharao und diejenigen, die vor ihm lebten, und die verschwundenen Städte zeigten sündiges Verhallen.
ref: Then came the Pharaoh, and those before him whose habitations were overthrown while they were committing crimes.
draft: And Pharaoh and those who lived before him, and the disappeared cities showed sinful behavior.
hil: And Pharaoh and those who lived before him, and the disappeared cities showed sinful behavior.
compare: And Pharaoh and those who lived before him, and the disappeared cities showed sinful behavior.

src: Besitzer von Kraft und beim Herrn des Thrones in Ansehen,
ref: Full of power, well-established (in position) with the Lord and Master of the Throne,
draft: Owners of power and in the Lord's throne's esteem.
hil: Owners of power and held in high esteem by the Lord of the Throne.
compare: Owners of power and held in high esteem by the Lord of the Throne.

src: Und wenn dem Menschen Unglück zustößt, richtet er an Uns Bittgebete im Liegen, im Sitzen oder im Stehen.
ref: When man is afflicted with adversity he calls to Us, whether lying on his side, or sitting or standing.
draft: And when misfortune befalls human, he directs prayers of supplication to Us while lying down, sitting or standing.
hil: And if hardship befalls man, he prays to Us, whether lying down, sitting or standing.
compare: And if hardship befalls man, he prays to Us, whether lying down, sitting or standing.

src: Für sie gibt es Strafe im diesseitigen Leben; aber die Strafe des Jenseits ist wahrlich härter. Und sie werden vor Allah keinen Behüter haben.
ref: They will be punished in the life of this world, and indeed the punishment of the Hereafter is the most severe; and there is none to save them from Allah.
draft: "For them there is punishment in this life, but the punishment of the hereafter is truly harder. And they will not have a guardian before Allah."
hil: They will have punishment in this life, but the punishment of the hereafter is truly harder. And they will have no guardian before Allah.
compare: "For them there is punishment in this life, but the punishment of the hereafter is truly harder. And they will not have a guardian before Allah."

src: Weiß er denn nicht, wenn der Inhalt der Gräber herausgeworfen wird
ref: Does he not know when the contents of the graves are laid bare
draft: He doesn't know, if the contents of the graves are thrown out.
hil: Does he not know that when the contents of the graves are thrown out?
compare: Does he not know that when the contents of the graves are thrown out?

src: Er vergibt, wem Er will, und Er bestraft, wen Er will.
ref: He forgiveth whomsoever He will and tormenteth whomsoever He will.
draft: He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills.
hil: He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills.
compare: He forgives whom He wills and punishes whom He wills.

src: Ausgenommen davon sind jene, derer dein Herr Sich erbarmt hat, und dazu hat Er sie erschaffen. Und das Wort deines Herrn ist in Erfüllung gegangen: "Wahrlich, Ich werde Gahannam mit den Ginn und den Menschen insgesamt füllen."
ref: Except those upon whom your Lord had mercy; and this is why He created them; and the Word of your Lord has been concluded that, “Indeed I will, surely, fill hell with jinns and men combined.”
draft: Excluded from this are those whom your Lord has mercy on and He has created them for it. And the Word of your Lord has been fulfilled: "Surely, I will fill Hell with jinn and people all together."
hil: Excluded from this are those whom your Lord has had mercy, and He has created them for it. And the Word of your Lord has been fulfilled: "Surely, I will fill Hell with jinn and people all together."
compare: Excluded from this are those whom your Lord has mercy on and He has created them for it. And the Word of your Lord has been fulfilled: "Surely, I will fill Hell with jinn and people all together."

src: O ihr, die ihr glaubt, wenn ihr Allah fürchtet, wird Er euch Entscheidungskraft gewähren und eure Übel von euch nehmen und euch vergeben; und Allah ist voll großer Huld.
ref: O believers, if you follow the path shown by God, He will give you a standard (of right and wrong), and overlook your sins, and forgive you. God is abounding in benevolence.
draft: O you who believe, if you fear Allah, He will grant you the ability to make right decisions and remove your evils from you and forgive you; and Allah is full of great bounty.
hil: O you who believe, if you fear Allah, He will grant you wisdom, remove your evils from you, and forgive you; and Allah is full of great bounty.
compare: O you who believe, if you fear Allah, He will grant you wisdom, remove your evils from you, and forgive you; and Allah is full of great bounty.

src: Und er setzte es ihnen vor.
ref: He set it before them.
draft: And he presented it to them.
hil: And he presented it to them.
compare: And he presented it to them.

src: Und (erinnere daran), als Ibrahim von seinem HERRN mit Worten geprüft wurde, und er sie dann einhielt. ER sagte: "Gewiß, ICH mache dich zum Imam für die Menschen."
ref: Remember, when his Lord tried Abraham by a number of commands which he fulfilled, God said to him: "I will make you a leader among men."
draft: And (remember) when Ibrahim was tested by his Lord with words, and he fulfilled them. He said: "Surely, I will make you a leader for the people."
hil: And (remember) when Ibrahim was tested by his Lord with words, and he fulfilled them. He said: "Surely, I will make you a leader for the people."
compare: And (remember) when Ibrahim was tested by his Lord with words, and he fulfilled them. He said: "Surely, I will make you a leader for the people."

src: Mein HERR schenke mir von den gottgefällig Guttuenden."
ref: (And he prayed:) "O Lord, grant me a righteous son."
draft: "My LORD, grant me of the God-pleasing good deeds."
hil: O My Lord, grant me the God-pleasing good deeds.
compare: O My Lord, grant me the God-pleasing good deeds.

src: Er sagte: "Gewiß, ich bin der Gesandte des Herrn der Weltenbewohner."
ref: He said: "I have been sent by the Lord of all the worlds."
draft: He said, "Certainly, I am the messenger of the Lord of the worlds."
hil: He said, 'Surely, I am the Messenger of the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds.'
compare: He said, 'Surely, I am the Messenger of the Lord of the inhabitants of the worlds.'

src: Nun - und beim Schreibrohr und bei dem, was sie nie derschreiben!
ref: NUN. I CALL to witness the pen and what they inscribe,
draft: Now - and at the writing tube and at what they never write!
hil: Now - and at the writing tube and at what they never write!
compare: Now - and at the writing tube and at what they never write!

src: Wir aber sehen sie nahe.
ref: But We see it very near.
draft: We, however, see them close.
hil: But we see them closely.
compare: We, however, see them close.

src: Ich habe doch davor ein Leben lang unter euch verweilt.
ref: (Remember that I am one of you) and have lived a whole life with you before (its revelation).
draft: I have dwelt among you my whole life before.
hil: I have dwelt among you my entire life before.
compare: I have dwelt among you my entire life before.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Zweifelsohne eignen sich viele von den Rabbinern und Priestern Vermögenswerte von Menschen durch das für nichtig Erklärte an und halten vom Weg ALLAHs ab.
ref: O believers, many rabbis and priests devour the possessions of others wrongfully, and keep men away from the path of God.
draft: You who have internalized the Imam! Undoubtedly, many of the rabbis and priests appropriate assets of people through what is declared invalid and deviate from the path of Allah.
hil: O you who have internalized the faith! Undoubtedly, many of the rabbis and priests appropriate assets of people through what is declared invalid and deviate from the path of Allah.
compare: O you who have internalized the faith! Undoubtedly, many of the rabbis and priests appropriate assets of people through what is declared invalid and deviate from the path of Allah.

src: Und als Unsere Gesandten zu Lut kamen, geriet er ihretwegen in eine böse Lage und war durch ihre Anwesenheit beklommen.
ref: And when Our Messengers came to Lout (Lot), he was grieved on their account and felt himself straitened for them (lest the town people should approach them to commit sodomy with them).
draft: And when our envoys came to Lot, he was put in an uncomfortable position because of them and was uneasy about their presence.
hil: When our messengers came to Lot, he was put in an uncomfortable position because of them and was uneasy about their presence.
compare: When our messengers came to Lot, he was put in an uncomfortable position because of them and was uneasy about their presence.

src: ER war Derjenige, Der dich mit Seinem Sieg und mit den Mumin gestärkt hat.
ref: It is He who has strengthened you with His help and with believers
draft: He was the one who strengthened you with his victory and with the mumins.
hil: He was the one who strengthened you with his victory and with the faithful.
compare: He was the one who strengthened you with his victory and with the faithful.

src: Bestimmt ist für sie eine gewaltige Pein,
ref: For them is great suffering.
draft: Certainly a tremendous pain is for them.
hil: Surely, a tremendous suffering is predetermined for them.
compare: Surely, a tremendous suffering is predetermined for them.

src: Als Abraham sagte: «Mein Herr, mache dieses Gebiet sicher, und laß mich und meine Söhne es meiden, den Götzen zu dienen.
ref: Remember when Abraham prayed: "O Lord, make this a city of peace, and preserve me and my progeny from worshipping idols:
draft: When Abraham said, "My Lord, make this land safe and let me and my sons refrain from worshipping idols."
hil: Abraham said, 'My Lord, make this land safe and let me and my sons refrain from worshipping idols.'
compare: When Abraham said, "My Lord, make this land safe and let me and my sons refrain from worshipping idols."

src: Diese haben eine höhere Rangstufe als die, die erst nachher gespendet und gekämpft haben.
ref: They are higher in position than those who spent after (the victory) and fought.
draft: These have a higher rank than those who only donated and fought afterwards.
hil: Those who have achieved a higher rank are those who have donated and fought before the others.
compare: These have a higher rank than those who only donated and fought afterwards.

src: Und wenn gegen euch tatsächlich gekämpft wird, werden wir euch ganz gewiß helfen."
ref: If you are fought against, we will help you.'
draft: "And if there is actually fighting against you, we will certainly help you."
hil: If there is actually fighting against you, we will certainly help you.
compare: "And if there is actually fighting against you, we will certainly help you."

src: Sag: "Seht ihr, woran ihr anstelle von ALLAH Bitt-gebete richtet, sollte ALLAH mir Schädigendes wollen, könnten sie das Schädigende von Ihm wegnehmen? Oder sollte ER mir eine Gnade wollen, könnten diese Seine Gnade zurückhalten?"
ref: Say: "Then just think. Can those whom you worship apart from God remove the distress God is pleased to visit upon me, or withhold a blessing God is pleased to favour me with?'
draft: Say, "Do you see to what instead of Allah you are directing supplication? If Allah should intend me harm, can they remove His harm? Or if He should intend me mercy, can they withhold His mercy?"
hil: Say, "Do you see to whom you direct supplication instead of Allah? If Allah were to intend harm to me, could they remove that harm from Him? Or if He were to intend mercy for me, could they withhold that mercy of His?"
compare: Say, "Do you see to whom you direct supplication instead of Allah? If Allah were to intend harm to me, could they remove that harm from Him? Or if He were to intend mercy for me, could they withhold that mercy of His?"

src: Sie sagen: «Ja doch.
ref: They will say, “Yes indeed, why not?”
draft: They say: "Yes, of course."
hil: They say, 'Yes, of course.'
compare: They say: "Yes, of course."

src: ALLAH setzte keinem Mann zwei Herzen in seinem Innern ein. Und ER machte eure Ehefrauen, denen ihr (die Formel von) Zihar aussprecht, nicht zu euren Müttern. Ebenfalls machte ER die nach euch Genannten nicht zu euren Söhnen. Dies ist euer Wort aus euren Mündern. Und ALLAH sagt dasWahre und ER leitet zum wahren Weg recht.
ref: Allah has not kept two hearts in the body of any man; nor has He made them your mothers those wives of yours, whom you declare to be your mothers; nor has He made them your sons, whom you have adopted; this is the statement of your mouths; and Allah proclaims the truth and it is He Who shows the path.
draft: ALLAH did not put two hearts in any man's inner self. And HE did not make your wives whom you pronounce Zihar with, your mothers. Also, HE did not make those whom you call upon besides HIM, your sons. This is only a saying from your mouths. And ALLAH speaks the truth and HE guides to the right way.
hil: Allah did not create a dual heart in any man. And He did not make your wives, whom you declare zihar, your mothers. And He did not make your adopted sons your [true] sons. These are just utterances that you say with your mouths. Allah speaks truthfully, and He guides to the [right] path.
compare: Allah did not create a dual heart in any man. And He did not make your wives, whom you declare zihar, your mothers. And He did not make your adopted sons your [true] sons. These are just utterances that you say with your mouths. Allah speaks truthfully, and He guides to the [right] path.

src: Die vor einem jagenden Löwen fliehen?
ref: Fleeing from a lion?
draft: Fleeing in front of a hunting lion?
hil: Are they fleeing from a hunting lion?
compare: Are they fleeing from a hunting lion?

src: Ich habe ihnen nichts anderes gesagt als das, was Du mir befohlen hast, nämlich: >Dienet Gott, meinem Herrn und eurem Herrn. < Ich war Zeuge über sie, solange ich unter ihnen weilte. Als Du mich abberufen hast, warst Du der Wächter über sie. Und Du bist über alle Dinge Zeuge.
ref: “I have not told them except what You commanded me, that ‘Worship Allah, Who is my Lord and is also your Lord’; I was aware of them till I was among them; and when You raised me, only You watched over them; and all things are present before You.”
draft: I have told them nothing other than what you ordered me to, namely: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord." I was a witness over them as long as I dwelt among them. When you recalled me, you were the watcher over them, and you are witness to all things.
hil: I have told them nothing other than what you ordered me to, namely: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord." I was a witness over them as long as I dwelt among them. When you recalled me, you were the watcher over them, and you are witness to all things.
compare: I have told them nothing other than what you ordered me to, namely: "Serve God, my Lord and your Lord." I was a witness over them as long as I dwelt among them. When you recalled me, you were the watcher over them, and you are witness to all things.

src: Immer wieder, wenn eine Umma eingetreten ist, hat sie ihre Vorgängerin verflucht.
ref: Every time a crowd enters, it will curse its sister-crowd.
draft: Again and again, when a new community has formed, it has cursed its predecessor.
hil: Again and again, when a community has entered, it has cursed its predecessor.
compare: Again and again, when a new community has formed, it has cursed its predecessor.

src: Ihre Herberge wird Gahannam sein, und dies ist ein schlimmes Ende!
ref: Their abode is Hell, an evil destination?
draft: Your abode will be Gahannam, and this is a terrible end!
hil: Their abode will be Gahannam, and this is a terrible end!
compare: Your abode will be Gahannam, and this is a terrible end!

src: Alif Lam Mim Ra'. Das sind die Verse des Buches. Und was dir von deinem Herrn hinabgesandt wurde, ist die Wahrheit. Jedoch die meisten Menschen glauben nicht.
ref: Alif-Lam-Meem-Ra*; these are verses of the Book; and that which has been sent down upon you from your Lord is true, but most men do not believe. (* Alphabets of the Arabic language – Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)
draft: "Alif Lam Mim Ra'. These are the verses of the book. And what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, but most people do not believe."
hil: Alif Lam Mim Ra'. These are the verses of the Book. And what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, but most people do not believe.
compare: "Alif Lam Mim Ra'. These are the verses of the book. And what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, but most people do not believe."

src: Also hinsichtlich des Schaums, so wird er beiseite geworfen, doch hinsichtlich dessen, das den Menschen nützt, so verbleibt es in der Erde. Solcherart prägt ALLAH die Gleichnisse.
ref: Thus Allah sets forth parables (for the truth and falsehood, i.e. Belief and disbelief).
draft: Concerning the foam, it is swept away, but concerning that which benefits mankind, it remains in the earth. In this way, Allah presents examples.
hil: Regarding foam, it will be cast away, but concerning that which benefits people, it will remain on the earth. This is how Allah explains His parables.
compare: Concerning the foam, it is swept away, but concerning that which benefits mankind, it remains in the earth. In this way, Allah presents examples.

src: Und die Thamud, das Volk Lots und die Leute des Waldes.
ref: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, as well as the dwellers of the Wood, had denied.
draft: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, and the people of the forest.
hil: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, and the people of the forest.
compare: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, and the people of the forest.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber, und eine Seele soll danach schauen, was sie für morgen vorausschickte!
ref: O ye who believe! fear Allah, and let every soul look to that which it sendeth forward for the morrow.
draft: You who have internalized the Iman! Act with Taqwa towards ALLAH, and let each soul look to what it sent ahead for tomorrow!
hil: O believers, act with Taqwa towards God, and let each soul look to what it sent ahead for tomorrow!
compare: O believers, act with Taqwa towards God, and let each soul look to what it sent ahead for tomorrow!

src: Diejenigen, die ihr Vermögen bei Nacht und Tag, geheim oder offen, spenden, haben ihren Lohn bei ihrem Herrn, sie haben nichts zu befürchten, und sie werden nicht traurig sein.
ref: Those who spend of their wealth in the way of God, day and night, in secret or openly, have their reward with their Lord, and have nothing to fear or regret.
draft: Those who donate their wealth at night and day, in secret or openly, will have their reward with their Lord, they have nothing to fear, and they will not be saddened.
hil: Those who donate their wealth at night and day, in secret or openly, will have their reward with their Lord, they have nothing to fear, and they will not be saddened.
compare: Those who donate their wealth at night and day, in secret or openly, will have their reward with their Lord, they have nothing to fear, and they will not be saddened.

src: Sag: Die Angelegenheit ist ganz und gar (in) Allahs (Entscheidung). Sie halten in ihrem Innersten verborgen, was sie dir nicht offenlegen; sie sagen: "Wenn wir etwas von der Angelegenheit (zu entscheiden) hätten, würden wir hier nicht getötet."
ref: Slumber overtook a party, while another party cared only for themselves, thinking of Allah thoughts that were not true, the guess of ignorance, saying: 'Have we any say in the affair' Say: 'The entire affair belongs to Allah' They conceal in themselves what they do not disclose to you.
draft: Say: "The matter is entirely (in) Allah's (decision). They keep hidden within themselves what they do not reveal to you. They say: "If we had anything to do with this matter, we would not have been killed here."
hil: Say: 'The matter is entirely in Allah's decision. They keep in secret what they do not reveal to you in their hearts, and they say, 'If we had something to decide in this matter, we would not have been killed here.'
compare: Say: "The matter is entirely (in) Allah's (decision). They keep hidden within themselves what they do not reveal to you. They say: "If we had anything to do with this matter, we would not have been killed here."

src: Aber Allah hat (euch) bewahrt.
ref: But Allah saved (you).
draft: But Allah has preserved you.
hil: But God saved you.
compare: But Allah has preserved you.

src: Ihr, die den Iman verinnerlicht habt! Seid nicht wie diejenigen, die Kufr betrieben haben und zu ihren Brüdern sagten, als diese sich auf Handelsreisen oder Feldzügen befanden: "Wären sie bei uns geblieben, wären sie weder gestorben, noch getötet worden." (Sagt es nicht), damit ALLAH dies als Bitterkeit (nur) in ihren Herzen bleiben läßt. Und ALLAH (alleine) macht lebendig und läßt sterben. Und ALLAH ist dessen, was ihr tut, allsehend.
ref: O People who Believe! Do not be like the disbelievers who said regarding their brothers who went on a journey or on holy war, “If they had been here with us they would not have died or been killed” – so that Allah may make it as despair in their hearts; and Allah gives life and causes death; and Allah is seeing your deeds.
draft: You who have internalized the Iman! Do not be like those who have committed kufr and said to their brothers when they were on trade trips or military campaigns: "If they had stayed with us, they would neither have died nor been killed." Do not say this, so that Allah may let bitterness (only) remain in their hearts. And Allah alone gives life and causes death. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.
hil: O believers! Do not be like those who have been kafirs and said to their brothers when they were on trade trips or military campaigns: 'If they had stayed with us, they would neither have died nor been killed.' (Do not say it), so that Allah may let bitterness (only) remain in their hearts. And Allah alone gives life and causes death. And Allah is the Seer of what you do.
compare: You who have internalized the Iman! Do not be like those who have committed kufr and said to their brothers when they were on trade trips or military campaigns: "If they had stayed with us, they would neither have died nor been killed." Do not say this, so that Allah may let bitterness (only) remain in their hearts. And Allah alone gives life and causes death. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.

src: Und ALLAH kennt das, was ihr verheimlicht und was ihr offenlegt.
ref: God knows what you hide and disclose.
draft: And ALLAH knows what you conceal and what you reveal.
hil: And God knows what you conceal and what you reveal.
compare: And ALLAH knows what you conceal and what you reveal.

src: Nun hatten Wir ihm zuvor Ammenbrüste verwehrt.
ref: We made (Moses) refuse a wet nurse.
draft: Now we had previously denied him wet nurses.
hil: Previously, we had denied him wet nurses.
compare: Previously, we had denied him wet nurses.

src: Aber diejenigen, die ihren Herrn fürchten, für sie wird es Obergemächer geben, über denen (andere) Obergemächer gebaut sind, unterhalb derer Flüsse strömen. (Das ist) Allahs Versprechen.
ref: But as for those who are wary of their Lord, for them there will be lofty abodes with [other] lofty abodes built above them, with streams running beneath them—a promise of Allah.
draft: But for those who fear their Lord, there will be high chambers (in Paradise) above which (other) high chambers are built, with rivers flowing beneath them. (That is) the promise of Allah.
hil: For those who fear displeasing their Lord, lofty mansions will be built above mansions, with rivers rippling past below them: a promise of Allah; and Allah does not go back on His promise.
compare: But for those who fear their Lord, there will be high chambers (in Paradise) above which (other) high chambers are built, with rivers flowing beneath them. (That is) the promise of Allah.

src: Dann sag: "Wollt ihr denn nicht Taqwa gemäß handeln!"
ref: So tell them: "Why do you not fear Him?"
draft: Then say, "Don't you want to act according to Taqwa?"
hil: Say: "Will you not act according to Taqwa?"
compare: Say: "Will you not act according to Taqwa?"

src: Es ist wie das Gleichnis derjenigen (, die es) nahe vor ihnen (erlebten).
ref: Like those who had tasted the gravity of their actions a little before them.
draft: It is like the parable of those who experienced it before them.
hil: The semblance of those who experienced it before them is like a parable.
compare: The semblance of those who experienced it before them is like a parable.

src: Und unterlaßt nicht aus Verdruß, es aufzuschreiben, ob es klein oder groß ist, (um es festzulegen) bis zu seiner Frist. Das ist für euch gerechter bei Gott und richtiger für das Zeugnis und bewirkt eher, daß ihr keine Zweifel hegt.
ref: Unless it be merchandise present that you give and take between you; then it shall be no fault in you if you do not write it down.
draft: And do not cease, out of annoyance, to write it down, whether it is small or large, (to fix it) until its appointed time. That is more just for you with God and more upright for testimony and will ensure that you have no doubts.
hil: Do not refrain from writing it down out of vexation, be it small or large, to fix it until its deadline. That is more just for you with God, more proper as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts.
compare: Do not refrain from writing it down out of vexation, be it small or large, to fix it until its deadline. That is more just for you with God, more proper as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts.

src: Das (allein schon) genügt als deutliche Sünde.
ref: And this is a sufficient manifest sin.
draft: That alone is sufficient as a clear sin.
hil: That alone is already sufficient as a distinct sin.
compare: That alone is already sufficient as a distinct sin.

src: Sag: "Das Schlechte und das Gute sind nicht gleich, selbst dann nicht, solltest du an dem großen Ausmaß des Schlechten Gefallen finden." So handelt Taqwa gemäß ALLAH gegenüber - ihr Verständige! -, damit ihr erfolgreich werdet.
ref: Say, “The impure (evil) and the pure (good) are not equal, even though the abundance of the impure may attract you; therefore keep fearing Allah, O men of intellect, so that you may succeed.”
draft: Say, "The bad and the good are not equal, even if you should find pleasure in the abundance of bad." This is how Taqwa acts according to Allah - you, the sensible ones! - so that you may succeed.
hil: Say, "The bad and the good are not equal, even if you should find pleasure in the abundance of bad." Act with Taqwa towards Allah, you wise ones! So that you may achieve success.
